41006009	I tɛl dɛn fɔ wɛr sus, bɔt dɛn nɔ fɔ kɛr ɔda klos.
41006010	Jizɔs se, “Wɛn una go na ɛni tɔng, di fɔs os we una go we dɛn gri fɔ mek una tap, na de una fɔ tap sote una kɔmɔt na da tɔng de.
41006011	If una go na ɛni tɔng we di pipul dɛn nɔ rɛspɛkt una ɛn dɛn nɔ gri yɛri wetin una de tɛl dɛn; bifo una kɔmɔt de, una fɔ shek di dɔti we de ɔnda una fut, fɔ sho se di pipul dɛn dɔn du bad.”
41006012	Di lanin bɔy dɛn go ɔlɔbɔt de tɛl pipul fɔ lɛf fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du.
41006013	Dɛn drɛb plɛnti dɛbul kɔmɔt insay pipul, dɛn rɔb ɔliv ɔyl pan sik pipul dɛn ed ɛn mɛn dɛn.
41006014	Jizɔs in nem prɛd ɔlɔbɔt sote King Ɛrɔd we bin de rul na Galili yɛri bɔt am. Sɔm pipul se, “Dis man na Jɔn we bin de baptayz pipul, na in dɔn rayz frɔm in grev; na dat mek i gɛt pawa fɔ du dɛn wɔnda ful wok ya.”
41006015	Sɔm ɔda pipul se, “Dis man na Ila yja.” Ɛn sɔm ɔda wan dɛn se, “Dis man na prɔfɛt lɛkɛ dɛn lɔntɛm prɔfɛt.”
41006016	Wɛn King Ɛrɔd yɛri ɔl wetin Jizɔs bin de du, i se, “Na Jɔn we bin de baptayz! A bin dɔn mek dɛn kɔt in ed kɔmɔt, bɔt naw i dɔn rayz frɔm in grev!”
41006017	King Ɛrɔd tɔk dat bikɔs i bin mek dɛn ol Jɔn ɛn put am na jel, fɔseka Ɛro dias we i mared; Ɛro dias na bin in brɔda Filip in wɛf.
41006018	Jɔn bin tɛl Ɛrɔd se i nɔ rayt fɔ mek i mared in brɔda Filip in wɛf.
41006019	Dat mek Ɛro dias mɛmba bad fɔ Jɔn ɛn i bin want mek dɛn kil am, bɔt i nɔ bin ebul du ɛni tin bikɔs Ɛrɔd nɔ bin gri fɔ kil am.
41006020	King Ɛrɔd bin fred Jɔn bikɔs i bin no se Jɔn de waka tret ɛn i nɔ de du bad, so i du ɔl wetin i ebul fɔ mek natin nɔ du Jɔn. Ɛnitɛm we King Ɛrɔd kin yɛri wetin Jɔn de tɛl pipul bɔt Gɔd, dat kin mek i wɔri, bɔt pan ɔl dat i kin gladi fɔ yɛri am.
41006021	Di tɛm rich we Ɛro dias gɛt chans fɔ du wetin i want du Jɔn. Wan de, King Ɛrɔd bin mek pati fɔ in batde. Di king kɔl dɛn bigman we de wok na dɛn gɔvmɛnt ɔfis, dɛn ami ɔfisa ɛn dɛn bigman na di kɔntri fɔ go di pati.
41006022	Wɛn Ɛro dias in gyal pikin dans na di pati, i so dans fayn dat King Ɛrɔd ɛn di pipul dɛn we go di pati gladi fɔ am. So King Ɛrɔd tɛl am se, mek i aks am fɔ ɛni tin we i want, in go gi am.
41006023	Di king swɛ se in go gi am ɛni tin we i aks fɔ, ɛn if i want sɛf, in go sheb di kɔntri we i de rul ɛn gi am wan pat.
41006024	Di gyal go aks in mama na do wetin in fɔ aks Ɛrɔd fɔ gi am. In mama se, “Tɛl am fɔ gi yu Jɔn we bin de baptayz pipul, in ed.”
41006025	Di gyal tɔn bak wantɛm go tɛl King Ɛrɔd se in want mek i gi am Jɔn we bin de baptayz pipul, in ed na plet wantɛm.
41006026	Di king in at pwɛl, bɔt i nɔ bin want fɔ brok di prɔmis we i bin dɔn mek, bikɔs i bin dɔn swɛ ɛn di pipul dɛn na di pati bin dɔn yɛri wetin i tɔk.
41006027	Di king sɛn soja man fɔ go kɔt Jɔn in ed kɔmɔt ɛn bring am kam. Di soja man go na di jel we Jɔn bin de, ɛn kɔt in ed kɔmɔt.
41006028	I put di ed na plet, bring am kam gi Ɛro dias in pikin; di pikin tek am gi in mama.
41006029	Wɛn Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri wetin bi, dɛn go tek di bɔdi bɛr am.
41006030	Di apɔsul dɛn tɔn bak go mit Jizɔs; dɛn tɛl am ɔl wetin dɛn du ɛn ɔl wetin dɛn lan pipul.
41006031	Jizɔs se, “Una lɛ wi go blo na ples we pipul nɔ de.” Plɛnti pipul bin de kam ɛn go so Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin gɛt chans sɛf fɔ it.
41006032	So dɛn tek bot go na ples we pipul nɔ tap.
41006033	Bɔt plɛnti pipul we no dɛn, si dɛn wɛn dɛn de go, so pipul dɛn ɔlɔbɔt na di tɔng rɔn go na di ples we Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn bin de go bifo dɛn rich de.
41006034	Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt insay di bot, i mit bɔku pipul de wet fɔ am; Jizɔs sɔri fɔ dɛn, bikɔs dɛn bin jɛs de lɛkɛ ship we nɔ gɛt pɔsin fɔ mɛn dɛn, so i bigin fɔ lan dɛn plɛnti tin.
41006035	Bay da tɛm de ivintɛm bin dɔn kam, Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn go mit am ɛn se, “Masta, pipul nɔ tap na dis ples ya ɛn ivintɛm dɔn kam;
41006036	mek di pipul dɛn go bay sɔntin fɔ it na dɛn vilej ɛn dɛn fam we de klos ya.”
41006037	Jizɔs se, “Una gi dɛn sɔntin fɔ it.” Dɛn ansa se, “Yu want mek wi tek tu ɔndrɛd silva kɔpɔ bay bred gi di pipul dɛn?”
41006038	Jizɔs se, “Una go luk ɔmɔs lof bred una gɛt.” Wɛn dɛn go luk, dɛn kam tɛl am se dɛn gɛt fayv lof bred ɛn tu fish.
41006039	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn ɔl fɔ sidɔm bay grup pan di gras.
41006040	Dɛn ɔl sidɔm bay grup: ɔndrɛd-ɔndrɛd ɔ fifti-fi fti.
41006041	Jizɔs tek di fayv bred ɛn di tu fish, i luk ɔp ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki fɔ di fish ɛn bred, dɔn i kɔt kɔt di bred ɛn di fish ɛn gi in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sheb gi di pipul dɛn.
41006042	Ɔlman it te dɛn bɛlful.
41006043	Wɛn dɛn dɔn gɛda wetin lɛf, i ful twɛlv blay.
41006044	Pan ɔl di pipul dɛn we it, di man dɛn nɔmɔ na bin fayv tawzin.
41006045	Jizɔs mek in lanin bɔy dɛn tek bot krɔs go oba na Bɛtsa yda, in lɛf biɛn fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn fɔ tɔn bak go na dɛn os.
41006046	Afta i dɔn tɛl dɛn fɔ go, i go ɔp wan il fɔ pre.
41006047	Da ivintɛm de, di lanin bɔy dɛn bin de insay di bot midul wata ɛn Jizɔs bin de na di bich.
41006048	Di briz bin tra nga fɔ di lanin bɔy dɛn, ɛn Jizɔs si se i bin tra nga fɔ dɛn fɔ padul. So midul nɛt bay tri oklɔk, Jizɔs go to dɛn, i bin de waka pantap di wata. I bin dɔn de pas dɛn,
41006049	na in dɛn si am de waka pantap di wata, dɛn min se na gost de kam mit dɛn, so dɛn ala big wan!
41006050	Dɛn ɔl bin fred. So Jizɔs tɔk to dɛn wantɛm. I se, “Una tek kɔrej, una nɔ fred, na mi dis!”
41006051	Jizɔs go mit dɛn insay di bot, na in di big briz tap fɔ blo. Di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda.
41006052	Dɛn nɔ bin ɔnda stand sɛf wɛn Jizɔs tek fayv lof bred fid fayv tawzin pipul. Dɛn at nɔ bin opin.
41006053	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn krɔs go oba na Gɛnɛzarɛt, dɛn tay di bot na di sho.
41006054	As dɛn kɔmɔt insay di bot so, di pipul dɛn tɔk wantɛm se na Jizɔs.
41006055	So dɛn rɔn go ɔlɔbɔt na di tɔng dɛn na da eria de, dɛn put dɛn sik pipul pan mata ɛn kɛr dɛn go ɛni say we dɛn yɛri se Jizɔs de.
41006056	Ɛni say we Jizɔs go, tɔng ɔ vilej, dɛn kin kɛr sik pipul go le dɛn na di ples we pipul de mit, ɛn dɛn kin beg Jizɔs fɔ mek dɛn tɔch di bɔtɔm pat sɛf pan in klos; ɛnibɔdi we tɔch in klos, kin wɛl.
41007001	Sɔm Faresi dɛn ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha we kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm go mit Jizɔs.
41007002	Dɛn si Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn de it wit dɛn an we nɔ klin, dat min se dɛn nɔ bin was dɛn lɛkɛ aw di Faresi dɛn se, fɔ mek dɛn klin na Gɔd yay. (
41007003	Di Faresi dɛn ɛn ɔl di ɔda Ju dɛn nɔ de it pas dɛn was dɛn an di spɛshal we we dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn bin lan dɛn yon Ju pipul fɔ du;
41007004	ɛn wɛn dɛn bay tin na makit, dɛn nɔba it am pas dɛn was am spɛshal we; dɛn bin de du plɛnti ɔda tin we dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn bin lan dɛn yon Ju pipul fɔ du, lɛkɛ fɔ was kɔp, pɔt ɛn plet ɛn fɔ wep bed spɛshal we.)
41007005	Di Faresi dɛn ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Wetin du yu lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ de du lɛkɛ aw wi gra npapa-papa dɛn lan wi? Wetin du dɛn nɔ de was dɛn an di spɛshal we bifo dɛn it?”
41007006	Jizɔs ansa se, “Na tru da lɔntɛm prɔfɛt we nem Ayzaya bin tɔk bɔt una wɛn i rayt se, ‘Gɔd se, dɛn pipul ya rɛspɛkt mi wit dɛn mɔt, bɔt dɛn nɔ want du wetin a tɛl dɛn fɔ du, bikɔs dɛn at nɔ de fɔ mi.
41007007	Di pre we dɛn de pre to mi nɔ min natin, bikɔs dɛn de lan pipul dɛn lɔ we nɔto mi yon!’ ”
41007008	Jizɔs se, “Una dɔn tap fɔ du wetin Gɔd tɛl mɔta lman fɔ du, ɛn una de du ɔl wetin mɔta lman tɛl una fɔ du.”
41007009	I tɔk igen se, “Una tink se una gɛt sɛns we una nɔ tek wetin Gɔd tɛl una fɔ du mek natin ɛn una jɛs de du wetin una gra npapa-papa dɛn bin tɛl una yon Ju pipul dɛn fɔ du!
41007010	Mozis bin se, ‘Una fɔ rɛspɛkt una mama ɛn papa; ɛn dɛn fɔ kil ɛnibɔdi we tɔk bad bɔt in mama ɔ in papa.’
41007011	Bɔt una se if pɔsin gɛt tin fɔ gi in papa ɔ in mama we go ɛp dɛn, bɔt di pɔsin se, ‘Dis na Kɔban’ (dat min, a dɔn prɔmis fɔ gi Gɔd dis tin ya),
41007012	una se da pɔsin de nɔ gɛt fɔ gi in mama ɔ in papa di tin we bin go ɛp dɛn.
41007013	Dat sho se una dɔn lɛf fɔ du wetin Gɔd se, ɛn una jɛs de du dɛn tin we una gra npapa-papa dɛn lan una yon Ju pipul fɔ du, ɛn una de lan una pikin dɛn dɛn sem tin de. Una de du plɛnti ɔda tin dɛn lɛkɛ dɛn wan ya.”
41007014	Jizɔs kɔl di pipul dɛn bak ɛn se, “A want mek una ɔl lisin mi gud, so dat una go lan.
41007015	Una fɔ no se, nɔto wetin pɔsin de it de mek i sin, bɔt na wetin i de du ɛn wetin i de tɔk de mek i sin ɛn mek i nɔ klin na Gɔd yay. [
41007016	Udat gɛt yes fɔ yɛri, mek i yɛri.]”
41007017	We Jizɔs lɛf di pipul dɛn ɛn go insay di os, in lanin bɔy dɛn go mit am ɛn aks am wetin di pare bul min.
41007018	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Una nɔ ɔnda stand wetin a tɔk? Nɔto wetin pɔsin de it de mek in at nɔ klin,
41007019	bikɔs di tin we pɔsin de it nɔ de go na in at, na in bɛlɛ i de go, bifo i pul am kɔmɔt na di bɔdi.” (Wɛn Jizɔs tɔk dat, i sho se wi kin it ɛni tin we fɔ it.)
41007020	I tɔk igen se, “Wetin pɔsin de tɔk de kɔmɔt insay in at, na dat de mek di pɔsin nɔ klin na Gɔd yay.
41007021	Na di at de mek pɔsin mekɔp fɔ du bad, fɔ liv fri layf, fɔ tif, fɔ kil,
41007022	fɔ kip ɔda pɔsin wɛf ɔ man, fɔ put yay pan ɔda pɔsin prɔpati, fɔ du ɛni kayn bad, fɔ mek pipul ful, fɔ pwɛl in kɔmpin nem, fɔ mek prawd, ɛn fɔ du fulish tin.
41007023	Na ɔl dɛn bad tin ya de kɔmɔt insay pɔsin in at ɛn na dɛn de mek pɔsin sin.”
41007024	Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt de, i go na wan ples we de klos Taya. I nɔ bin want mek ɛnibɔdi no di os we i de, bɔt di pipul dɛn fɛnɔt usay i de.
41007025	Wan uman bin lib de we dɛbul bin de insay in gyal pikin. Wɛn i yɛri bɔt Jizɔs, i go fɔdɔm bifo Jizɔs in fut wantɛm.
41007026	Di uman bin de tɔk Grik, bɔt in trayb na bin Sayro fi ni shian. I beg Jizɔs fɔ drɛb di dɛbul kɔmɔt insay in pikin.
41007027	Jizɔs se, “Na di pikin dɛn fɔs fɔ it, i nɔ rayt fɔ tek di pikin dɛn it gi dɔg.”
41007028	Di uman ansa se, “Yɛs sa, bɔt di dɔg dɛnsɛf we kin sidɔm ɔnda tebul kin de pik di af-af we de fɔdɔm na di pikin dɛn an.”
41007029	Jizɔs se, “Fɔ wetin yu tɔk so, yu kin go na yu os saful, ɛn no se di dɛbul dɔn kɔmɔt insay yu pikin.”
41007030	Wɛn di uman go na in os, i mit di pikin ledɔm na bed; di dɛbul bin dɔn kɔmɔt insay am.
41007031	Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di eria we de klos Taya, ɛn pas insay Saydɔn; we i kɔmɔt de, i pas klos Lek Galili ɛn go na di eria we dɛn kɔl di Tɛn Tɔng dɛn.
41007032	Sɔm pipul bring wan dɛfyes man we nɔ bin ebul tɔk gud to Jizɔs ɛn beg am fɔ mek i put in an pan di man in ed ɛn pre fɔ am.
41007033	So Jizɔs kɛr di man go na kɔna, i put in finga dɛn insay di man in yes, dɔn i pit ɛn tɔch di man in tɔng.
41007034	I luk ɔp na ɛvin, i pini, dɔn i se, “Ɛffata,” dat min, “Yu yes go opin.”
41007035	Di man in yes opin, in tɔng lus, i bigin tɔk klia wan.
41007036	Jizɔs tɛl di pipul dɛn nɔ fɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin bi to di man. Di mɔ we Jizɔs de wɔn dɛn nɔ fɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi, na di mɔ dɛn bin de tɛl pipul wetin Jizɔs du.
41007037	Di pipul dɛn we yɛri bɔt wetin Jizɔs du, lɔs wit wɔnda. Dɛn se, “I sabi in wok gud gud! I de mek dɛfyes pipul yɛri, ɛn mumu pipul tɔk.”
41008001	Wan ɔda tɛm, plɛnti pipul bin go gɛda rawnd Jizɔs. Dɛn nɔ bin gɛt natin fɔ it. Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn se,
41008002	“A sɔri fɔ dɛn pipul ya bikɔs dɛn dɔn de wit wi tri de ɛn dɛn nɔ gɛt natin fɔ it;
41008003	if a tɛl dɛn fɔ go na dɛn os wit angri bɛlɛ, sɔntɛm dɛn go fent na rod, bikɔs plɛnti kɔmɔt fawe.”
41008004	Di lanin bɔy dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Wetin wi go gi dɛn fɔ it, wi nɔ gɛt bred na dɛzat lɛkɛ dis.”
41008005	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Ɔmɔs bred una gɛt?” Dɛn ansa se, “Wi gɛt sɛvin lof bred, sa!”
41008006	Jizɔs tɛl ɔl di pipul dɛn fɔ sidɔm na grɔn, i tek di sɛvin bred, wɛn i dɔn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, i kɔt kɔt dɛn ɛn gi di lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sheb gi di pipul dɛn. Di lanin bɔy dɛn gi di pipul dɛn.
41008007	Dɛn bin gɛt tu-tri lili fish sɛf. Jizɔs pre pan di fish ɛn mek di lanin bɔy dɛn sheb am gi di pipul dɛn.
41008008	Ɔlman it te dɛn bɛlful, ɛn wɛn di lanin bɔy dɛn dɔn gɛda wetin lɛf, dɛn gɛt sɛvin ful blay.
41008009	Na bɔt fo tawzin pipul bin lib de.
41008010	We Jizɔs dɔn mek ɔlman go na dɛn os, in ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn tek bot go Dalma nuta.
41008011	Sɔm pan di Faresi dɛn go mit Jizɔs ɛn bigin agyu wit am. Dɛn kam fɔ tray am so dɛn aks am fɔ du wɔnda ful wok we go sho se in na di Mɛsaya.
41008012	Jizɔs pini ɛn aks dɛn se, “Wetin mek una dɛn tide pipul ya want mek a sho una mɔ sayn? A de tɛl una fɔ tru se a nɔ go sho una ɛni sayn.”
41008013	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn lɛf di pipul dɛn ɛn tek bot krɔs go oba na di ɔda say.
41008014	Dɛn bin fɔgɛt fɔ kɛr plɛnti bred, na wan gren bred nɔmɔ dɛn bin gɛt na di bot.
41008015	Wɛn dɛn de go, Jizɔs wɔn dɛn. I se, “Una tek tɛm wit di yist we di Faresi dɛn ɛn Ɛrɔd de yus.”
41008016	Di lanin bɔy dɛn bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin se, “Na bikɔs wi nɔ bring bred mek i tɔk so!”
41008017	Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de tɔk, so i aks dɛn se, “Wetin du una de tɔk se una nɔ gɛt bred? Una nɔ ɔnda stand yet? Una at nɔ opin?
41008018	Una gɛt yay, una nɔ de si? Una gɛt yes, una nɔ de yɛri? Una nɔ mɛmba
41008019	we a bin kɔt kɔt dɛn fayv bred fɔ gi fayv tawzin pipul? Ɔmɔs ful blay bred bin lɛf?” Dɛn ansa se, “Na bin twɛlv blay, sa!”
41008020	Jizɔs tɔk igen se, “Ɛn we a bin kɔt kɔt sɛvin bred fɔ gi fo tawzin pipul, ɔmɔs ful blay bred una bin gɛda?” Dɛn ansa se, “Na bin sɛvin blay, sa!”
41008021	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Pan ɔl dat, una nɔ ɔnda stand yet?”
41008022	Wɛn dɛn rich Bɛtsa yda, sɔm pipul kɛr wan blɛnyay man go to Jizɔs.
41008023	Jizɔs ol di blɛnyay man in an, i waka wit di man kɔmɔt na di vilej. I pit pan di man in tu yay, dɔn i tɔch dɛn. I aks am se, “Yu si ɛni tin?”
41008024	Di man luk, i se, “Yɛs, sa, a si sɔm pipul de waka, bɔt dɛn tan lɛkɛ tik we de waka.”
41008025	Jizɔs tɔch di man in yay igen. Di man ebul si gud, i bigin si ɔltin klia wan.
41008026	Jizɔs se, “Go na yu os, bɔt nɔ go bak na di vilej yet!”
41008027	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go na di vilej dɛn we de na Siza ria Fili pay. Wɛn dɛn de na rod de go, Jizɔs aks di lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Wetin pipul de tɔk bɔt mi, udat dɛn se a bi?”
41008028	Sɔm pan di lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Sɔm pipul se yu na Jɔn we bin de baptayz pipul; sɔm se yu na Ila yja, ɛn sɔm ɔda wan dɛn se yu na wan pan dɛn prɔfɛt we bin de lɔntɛm.”
41008029	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Bɔt udat una se a bi?” Pita ansa se, “Yu na di Mɛsaya, dat na di wan we Gɔd dɔn pik!”
41008030	I wɔn dɛn mek dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi se in na di wan we Gɔd dɔn pik.
41008031	I tɛl dɛn se, “Mɔta lman Pikin go sɔfa plɛnti. Di Ju bigman dɛn, di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn go se dɛn nɔ no am ɛn dɛn go kil am. I go de na di grev, bɔt i go rayz di de we mek tri.”
41008032	Jizɔs tɔk am plen wan, Pita kɔl Jizɔs na kɔna ɛn se, “Masta, nɔ tɔk lɛkɛ dat!”
41008033	Jizɔs luk di lanin bɔy dɛn, i tɔk to Pita, i se, “Pita, kɔmɔt biɛn mi, na Setan in wok yu de du so! Yu de tink lɛkɛ aw mɔta lman de tink, yu nɔ de tink lɛkɛ aw Gɔd de tink.”
41008034	Jizɔs kɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn; i tɛl dɛn se, “If ɛnibɔdi want bi mi lanin bɔy, di pɔsin nɔ fɔ du wetin in want fɔ du nɔmɔ, i fɔ rɛdi fɔ sɔfa ɛn day fɔseka mi, ɛn du ɔl wetin a de du.
41008035	Ɛnibɔdi we de tray fɔ sev in layf, go lɔs am; bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lɔs in layf fɔseka mi ɛn di Gud Nyus, go gɛt di tru layf.
41008036	Wetin pɔsin go gen if i gɛt di ol wɔl, ɛn day go ɛl ɛn lɔs di tru layf? Natin!
41008037	Wetin pɔsin go gi fɔ gɛt in layf bak? Natin!
41008038	If ɛnibɔdi de shem fɔ tɔk bɔt mi ɛn wetin a dɔn lan am, tɛm lɛkɛ dis we pipul nɔ biliv Gɔd ɛn dɛn wikɛd, Mɔta lman Pikin go shem fɔ da pɔsin de wɛn i kam lɛkɛ King ɛn layt we kɔmɔt ɛvin de shayn pan am wit di enjɛl dɛn; di sem layt we de shayn pan in Papa Gɔd.”
41009001	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “A de tɛl una se sɔm pan una we de ya naw, nɔ go day sote dɛn dɔn si Gɔd kam rul na dis wɔl wit pawa.”
41009002	Wɛn siks de pas, Jizɔs tek Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn go na wan ay il, na dɛn nɔmɔ bin lib de. Wantɛm, Jizɔs in bɔdi chenj bifo di lanin bɔy dɛn yay;
41009003	in klos sɛf bin wayt pas sha tin ɛn i bin de shayn brayt brayt wan, nɔbɔdi na wɔl nɔ ebul bruk klos klin lɛkɛ dat.
41009004	Dɛn di tri lanin bɔy dɛn si Ila yja ɛn Mozis de tɔk wit Jizɔs.
41009005	Pita bigin tɔk to Jizɔs. I se, “Masta, i gud we wi de ya so! Lɛ wi bil tri bafa, wan fɔ yu, wan fɔ Mozis, ɛn wan fɔ Ila yja.”
41009006	Pita nɔ bin no wetin fɔ tɔk, bikɔs in ɛn di ɔda tu lanin bɔy dɛn bin de fred bad.
41009007	Wantɛm wan klawd kam kɔba di san, dɛn yɛri vɔys de tɔk na di klawd se, “Dis na mi Pikin we a lɛk bad, una lisin wetin i de tɛl una.”
41009008	Dɛn luk rawnd kwik, bɔt dɛn nɔ si nɔbɔdi pas Jizɔs in wan gren.
41009009	We dɛn kɔmɔt na di ay il go na di tɔng, Jizɔs wɔn dɛn nɔ fɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin dɛn si, bɔt dɛn fɔ wet sote Mɔta lman Pikin dɔn rayz frɔm di grev.
41009010	Dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin bi, bɔt dɛn bin de aks dɛn kɔmpin wetin Jizɔs min wɛn i se, “Pɔsin we day go rayz frɔm di grev.”
41009011	Dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Wetin mek di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn se Ila yja gɛt fɔ kam bak na wɔl bifo dɛn tin ya go bi?”
41009012	Jizɔs ansa se, “Ila yja mɔs kam ɛn rɛdi ɔltin. Bɔt wetin du dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se Mɔta lman Pikin go sɔfa plɛnti ɛn pipul nɔ go tek am mek natin?
41009013	A de tɛl una se, Ila yja bin dɔn kam, bɔt di pipul dɛn du am wetin dɛn lɛk, ɛn na so dɛn bin dɔn rayt bɔt am na Gɔd in Buk.”
41009014	Wɛn dɛn go mit di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn, dɛn mit plɛnti pipul gɛda rawnd dɛn, ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn de agyu wit di lanin bɔy dɛn.
41009015	Wɛn di pipul dɛn si Jizɔs, dɛn ɔl wɔnda bad, dɛn rɔn go mit am ɛn tɛl am kabɔ.
41009016	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una bin de tɔk wit di lanin bɔy dɛn?”
41009017	Wan pɔsin na di krawd se, “Ticha, a bring mi bɔy pikin we dɛbul dɔn tɔn mumu kam to yu.
41009018	Ɛnitɛm we di dɛbul kin kam pan am, i kin wap am dɔng na grɔn, frɔsh kin de kɔmɔt na in mɔt, i kin de cham in tit ɛn in bɔdi kin stif. A bin beg yu lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ drɛb di dɛbul, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ebul drɛb am.”
41009019	Jizɔs se, “Una dɛn tide pipul ya, una nɔ biliv, aw lɔng una want mek a de wit una bifo una go biliv? Aw lɔng a fɔ bia wit una? Una bring di bɔbɔ kam to mi!” Dɛn kɛr di bɔbɔ go to Jizɔs.
41009020	Wɛn dɛn de kɛr am go to Jizɔs, di dɛbul wap am dɔng wit fiks wɛn i si Jizɔs. Di bɔbɔ fɔdɔm na grɔn, i bigin rol rol ɛn pul frɔsh na in mɔt.
41009021	Jizɔs aks di bɔbɔ in papa se, “Frɔm ustɛm di dɛbul kam insay yu pikin?” Di man se, “Frɔm we i smɔl.
41009022	Ɛn plɛnti tɛm di dɛbul kin mek i fɔdɔm na faya ɛn insay wata fɔ kil am. If yu ebul fɔ ɛp wi, duya, sɔri fɔ wi ɛn ɛp wi, sa.”
41009023	Jizɔs aks di man se, “Wetin du yu aks mi if a ebul mɛn yu pikin? Pɔsin we biliv pan Gɔd ebul fɔ du ɛni tin.”
41009024	Di pikin in papa ala wantɛm se, “A biliv, sa, duya, ɛp mi fɔ biliv mɔ ɛn mɔ!”
41009025	Wɛn Jizɔs si se mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul de rɔn kam gɛda rawnd dɛn, i tɔk pan di dɛbul; i se, “Yu dɛbul we de mek pɔsin tɔn mumu, ɛn mek pɔsin dɛf, a de tɛl yu fɔ kɔmɔt insay dis bɔbɔ, ɛn nɔ fɔ go insay am igen!”
41009026	Di dɛbul mek di bɔbɔ ala big wan, dɔn i wap am dɔng na grɔn wit fiks bifo i kɔmɔt insay am. Di bɔbɔ ledɔm na grɔn lɛkɛ dayman ɛn plɛnti pipul tɔk se i dɔn day.
41009027	Bɔt Jizɔs ol di bɔbɔ in an ɛn ɛp am fɔ grap, di bɔbɔ tinap.
41009028	Wɛn Jizɔs rich na os, di lanin bɔy dɛn go mit am ɛn aks am se, “Masta, wetin du wi nɔ bin ebul drɛb di dɛbul kɔmɔt insay di bɔbɔ?”
41009029	Jizɔs ansa se, “Una nɔ go ebul drɛb dɛn kayn dɛbul ya pas una pre.”
41009030	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt de ɛn pas insay Galili. Jizɔs nɔ bin want mek ɛnibɔdi no se in lib de,
41009031	bikɔs i bin de lan in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Dɛn go ol Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn and am oba gi pipul we go kil am. I go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
41009032	Dɛn nɔ bin no wetin Jizɔs min, bɔt dɛn fred fɔ aks am.
41009033	Wɛn dɛn rich Kepanyɔm, dɛn go na wan os. Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una bin de tɔk we wi de kam na rod?”
41009034	Dɛn nɔ ansa, bikɔs wɛn dɛn bin de kam, dɛn bin de aks dɛn kɔmpin se uswan pan dɛn impɔtant pas dɛn ɔl.
41009035	Jizɔs sidɔm, i kɔl di twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “If ɛni wan pan una want fɔ bi una edman, i fɔ put in yay dɔng ɛn wok fɔ una.”
41009036	Jizɔs tek wan lili pikin, put am midul dɛn ɔl. I tot di pikin na in an ɛn tɛl dɛn se,
41009037	“Ɛnibɔdi we tɛl pikin lɛkɛ dis fɔ kam na in os fɔseka mi, na mi di pɔsin tɛl fɔ kam na in os; nɔto mi nɔmɔ di pɔsin tɛl fɔ kam na in os, i tɛl di wan we sɛn mi, insɛf fɔ kam na in os.”
41009038	Jɔn se, “Ticha, wi si wan man de tek yu nem drɛb dɛbul. Wi tɛl am mek i lɛf fɔ du dat, bikɔs i nɔ de wit wi.”
41009039	Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ tɛl am fɔ tap, bikɔs ɛnibɔdi we de tek mi nem du wɔnda ful wok, nɔ go tɔk bad bɔt mi wantɛm, wantɛm so.
41009040	Pɔsin we nɔ de mekɔp bad fɔ wi, de fɔ wi.
41009041	A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, if ɛnibɔdi gi una wan kɔp wata fɔ drink bikɔs una na mi lanin bɔy dɛn, di pɔsin go gɛt di pe fɔ dat.
41009042	“Ɛnibɔdi we go mek ɛni wan pan dɛn mi lili pikin ya sin, i go bɛtɛ fɔ am if dɛn tay big ston na in nɛk ɛn ib am na dip wata.
41009043	If yu an de mek yu sin, kɔt am kɔmɔt; i go bɛtɛ fɔ mek yu gɛt wan an ɛn gɛt layf we go de sote go na ɛvin, pas fɔ mek yu gɛt tu an ɛn go ɛl we di faya nɔ de ɔt. [
41009044	Da say we wɔrɔm we nɔ de day go it dɛn ɛn faya we nɔ de ɔt go bɔn dɛn.]
41009045	If yu fut de mek yu sin, kɔt am kɔmɔt, i go bɛtɛ fɔ mek yu gɛt wan fut ɛn gɛt layf we go de sote go na ɛvin, pas fɔ mek yu gɛt tu fut ɛn go ɛl. [
41009046	Da say we wɔrɔm we nɔ de day go it dɛn ɛn faya we nɔ de ɔt go bɔn dɛn.]
41009047	If yu yay de mek yu sin, pul am kɔmɔt, i bɛtɛ fɔ mek yu gɛt wan yay ɛn gɛt layf we go de sote go na ɛvin, pas fɔ mek yu gɛt tu yay ɛn go ɛl.
41009048	Da say we wɔrɔm we nɔ de day go it dɛn ɛn faya we nɔ de ɔt go bɔn dɛn.
41009049	“Faya go mek ɔlman klin lɛkɛ aw sɔl kin mek dɛn tin we dɛn de sakri fays, klin.
41009050	“Sɔl na gud tin, bɔt if i nɔ gɛt tes igen, wetin fɔ put pan am fɔ mek i gɛt tes? “Una fɔ mek sɔl de na una layf, so dat una ɔl go gɛt wanwɔd ɛn kol at.”
41010001	Jizɔs kɔmɔt Kepanyɔm go Judia, dɛn i krɔs Riva Jɔdan. Plɛnti pipul go gɛda rawnd am, ɛn i lan dɛn bɔt Gɔd lɛkɛ aw i kin de du.
41010002	Di Faresi dɛn aks am kwɛshɔn fɔ tray am; dɛn se, “I rayt fɔ mek man tɛl in wɛf se i nɔ want am fɔ bi in wɛf igen?”
41010003	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin Mozis bin tɛl una fɔ du?”
41010004	Dɛn se, “Mozis bin alaw man fɔ rayt pepa gi in wɛf fɔ sho se i want pat wit am.”
41010005	Jizɔs se, “Na we una at tra nga mek Mozis rayt da lɔ de fɔ una.
41010006	Bɔt frɔm we Gɔd mek di wɔl, na in ‘I mek tu kayn pipul, man ɛn uman;’ lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na in Buk.
41010007	‘Na dat mek man go lɛf in mama ɛn papa go mared in wɛf,
41010008	ɛn dɛn tu go de lɛkɛ wan pɔsin’. So dɛn nɔto tu pipul igen, dɛn tu dɔn bi lɛkɛ wan pɔsin.
41010009	So mek pɔsin nɔ pat man ɛn uman we Gɔd dɔn jɔyn lɛkɛ wan pɔsin.”
41010010	Wɛn dɛn rich na os, di lanin bɔy dɛn aks Jizɔs bɔt di tin we i tɔk.
41010011	Jizɔs se, “If ɛni man pat wit in wɛf, dɔn i grap go mared ɔda uman, da man de dɔn sin.
41010012	Ɛn if ɛni uman pat wit in man, dɔn i grap go mared to ɔda man, da uman de dɔn sin.”
41010013	Sɔm pipul bin kɛr dɛn pikin go to Jizɔs fɔ mek i put an pan dɛn ed ɛn blɛs dɛn, bɔt in lanin bɔy dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn nɔ fɔ ambɔg Jizɔs.
41010014	Bɔt wɛn Jizɔs si wetin di lanin bɔy dɛn de du, i vɛks pan dɛn, i se, “Una mek di pikin dɛn kam to mi, una nɔ tap dɛn; na pipul lɛkɛ dɛn pikin ya, go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
41010015	A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ mek Gɔd rul am lɛkɛ lili pikin, da pɔsin de nɔ go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
41010016	Jizɔs tot di pikin dɛn, put in an pan dɛn ed ɛn blɛs dɛn.
41010017	As Jizɔs de go, wan man rɔn go mit am ɛn nil dɔng bifo am ɛn se, “Ticha, yu we gud, wetin a fɔ du fɔ mek a gɛt layf we go de sote go?”
41010018	Jizɔs se, “Wetin du yu se a gud? Nɔbɔdi nɔ de we gud, na Gɔd in wan gren gud.
41010019	Yu no dɛn lɔ we se: ‘Yu nɔ fɔ kil yu kɔmpin mɔta lman; mared man nɔ fɔ lɛf in wɛf ɛn kip ɔda uman ɛn mared uman nɔ fɔ lɛf in man go kip ɔda man; yu nɔ fɔ tif; yu nɔ fɔ lay pan yu kɔmpin; yu nɔ fɔ rog; yu fɔ rɛspɛkt yu papa ɛn mama.’ ”
41010020	Di man ansa se, “A dɔn kip ɔl dɛn lɔ ya frɔm we mi na bin pikin.”
41010021	Jizɔs luk di man ɛn lɛk am, so i se, “Wan tin lɛf we yu nɔ du yet, go sɛl ɔl wetin yu gɛt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin, da tɛm de yu go jɛntri na ɛvin; dɛn, kam bi mi lanin bɔy.”
41010022	Wɛn di man yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, in at pwɛl bikɔs na bin jɛntri man. I sɔri wɛn i lɛf Jizɔs de go.
41010023	Jizɔs tɔn luk in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn se, “I tra nga fɔ mek pɔsin we jɛntri kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
41010024	Di wɔd we Jizɔs tɔk mek di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda, bɔt Jizɔs tɔk igen se, “Mi pikin dɛn, i tra nga fɔ pɔsin fɔ kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
41010025	I tra nga fɔ mek da big bif we nem kamɛl pas insay nidul yay, bɔt i tra nga pas dat fɔ mek jɛntri pɔsin kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
41010026	Di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda igen; dɛn aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “If na so i bi, wɛl, udat go sev?”
41010027	Jizɔs luk dɛn ɛn se, “Gɔd ebul du wetin mɔta lman nɔ ebul du; Gɔd ebul du ɔltin.”
41010028	Pita tɔk se, “Wɛl, wi dɔn lɛf ɔltin ɛn kam fala yu!”
41010029	Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, ɛnibɔdi we dɔn lɛf os, ɔ brɔda, ɔ sista, ɔ mama, ɔ papa, ɔ pikin dɛn, ɔ fam fɔseka mi ɛn di Gud Nyus,
41010030	Gɔd go gi am ɔndrɛd tɛm pas wetin i bin gɛt: os, brɔda, sista, mama ɛn papa, pikin ɛn fam; ɛn pipul go mek i sɔfa bad wan na dis wɔl, bɔt Gɔd go gi am layf we go de sote go na di wɔl we gɛt fɔ kam.
41010031	Plɛnti pipul we de bifo dɛn kɔmpin naw go de biɛn, ɛn plɛnti pipul we de biɛn naw, go go bifo.”
41010032	Wɛn dɛn bin de go na Jerusɛlɛm, Jizɔs bin de waka bifo dɛn. Di lanin bɔy dɛn bin de wɔnda, ɛn di pipul dɛn we bin de fala Jizɔs bin de fred. Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn wansay ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin pipul go du am.
41010033	Jizɔs se, “Una lisin mi, wi de go na Jerusɛlɛm, pipul go ol Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn and am oba gi di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn. Dɔn dɛn go and am oba gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju fɔ mek dɛn kil am.
41010034	Di pipul dɛn go makata am, dɛn go pit pan am ɛn kil am, bɔt i go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
41010035	Jems ɛn Jɔn, we na Zɛbidi in pikin dɛn, go mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “Ticha, wi want mek yu go du sɔntin fɔ wi.”
41010036	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una want mek a du fɔ una?”
41010037	Dɛn se, “Wɛn yu sidɔm na yu chia de rul, wi go want fɔ sidɔm klos yu, wan na yu raytan, di ɔda wan na yu lɛfan.”
41010038	Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ no wetin una de tɔk; una go ebul drink na di kɔp we a go drink, ɛn baptayz lɛkɛ aw a go baptayz?”
41010039	Dɛn se, “Wi go ebul, sa!” Jizɔs se, “Una go drink na di kɔp we a go drink ɛn una go baptayz lɛkɛ aw a go baptayz,
41010040	bɔt a nɔ gɛt di pawa fɔ mek una sidɔm na mi lɛfan ɛn mi raytan. Gɔd dɔn kip dɛn ples de fɔ dɛn pipul we i dɔn mak fɔ lib de.”
41010041	Wɛn di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri dat, dɛn vɛks pan Jems ɛn Jɔn fɔseka wetin dɛn aks Jizɔs fɔ du fɔ dɛn.
41010042	Jizɔs kɔl dɛn ɔl ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una no se dɛn pipul we de rul dɛn wan we nɔ biliv Gɔd gɛt pawa oba dɛn, ɛn dɛn de tɛl dɛn wetin dɛn fɔ du ɔltɛm.
41010043	Bɔt nɔto so i go bi fɔ una. If ɛni wan pan una want bi bigman, i fɔ wok fɔ una ɔl lɛkɛ se in na una bɔy.
41010044	Ɛni wan pan una we want fɔ de bifo, da pɔsin de fɔ wok fɔ una ɔl lɛkɛ se in na una slev.
41010045	Mɔta lman Pikin insɛf nɔ kam fɔ mek pipul bi in savant, i kam fɔ bi dɛn savant, ɛn fɔ gi in layf fɔ sev plɛnti plɛnti pipul.”
41010046	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn rich Jɛriko. As dɛn de kɔmɔt de, plɛnti pipul fala dɛn. Wan blɛnyay man we nem Batimyɔs bin sidɔm klos di rod de beg; na bin Timeyɔs in pikin.
41010047	Wɛn i yɛri se na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt de pas, i bigin ala se, “Jizɔs, yu we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi, sa!”
41010048	Plɛnti pipul ala pan am fɔ sɛt in mɔt, bɔt na di mɔ i ala lawd wan se, “Yu, we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi, sa!”
41010049	Jizɔs tinap, i tɛl di pipul dɛn se, mek dɛn kɔl di blɛnyay man. Di pipul dɛn tɛl di man se, “Nɔ wɔri igen, grap! Jizɔs de kɔl yu.”
41010050	Di man pul di klos we i bin wɛr pantap kɔmɔt, i grap kwik go mit Jizɔs.
41010051	Jizɔs aks am se, “Wetin yu want mek a du fɔ yu?” Di blɛnyay man se, “Ticha, a want mek yu mɛn mi yay, so dat a go ebul si.”
41010052	Jizɔs se, “Go, di biliv we yu biliv dɔn mek yu wɛl.” I bigin si wantɛm, i fala Jizɔs.
41011001	Wɛn dɛn bin dɔn de klos Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn dɛn dɔn rich Bɛtfej ɛn Bɛtani we de klos Mawnt Ɔliv, Jizɔs tɛl tu pan in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ go na di vilej we de bifo dɛn.
41011002	I se, “Una go na di vilej we de bifo una. As una de rich de so, una go mit dɛn tay wan dɔnki pikin we pɔsin nɔ rayd wande. Una lus am ɛn bring am kam to mi.
41011003	If ɛnibɔdi aks una wetin du una de lus am, una fɔ se, ‘Di Masta want am, bɔt i go mek wi bring am kam bak as i dɔn wit am so.’ ”
41011004	Di tu lanin bɔy dɛn go na di ples we Jizɔs sɛn dɛn ɛn dɛn mit di dɔnki pikin tay na trit klos wan os domɔt. Dɛn bigin lus am, as dɛn de lus am,
41011005	di pipul dɛn we bin tinap de aks di lanin bɔy dɛn wetin mek dɛn de lus am.
41011006	Di lanin bɔy dɛn tɔk wetin Jizɔs bin tɛl dɛn fɔ tɔk, so di pipul dɛn gri fɔ mek dɛn kɛr di dɔnki pikin go.
41011007	Di lanin bɔy dɛn kɛr di dɔnki pikin go to Jizɔs; wɛn dɛn rich, dɛn prɛd dɛn klos pantap di dɔnki pikin in bak, Jizɔs sidɔm pantap am.
41011008	Plɛnti ɔda pipul prɛd dɛnsɛf yon klos na grɔn ɛn sɔm ɔda wan dɛn brok di an dɛn pan sɔm tik ɛn ib dɛn na di rod we Jizɔs de pas.
41011009	Di pipul dɛn we bin de bifo ɛn di wan dɛn we bin de biɛn bin de ala se, “Prez Gɔd! Gɔd blɛs di wan we i dɔn sɛn fɔ kam tinap fɔ am!
41011010	Lɛ Gɔd blɛs di gɔvmɛnt we wi gra npapa-papa Devid bin gɛt ɛn we go kam bak. Una lɛ wi prez Gɔd!”
41011011	Wɛn Jizɔs rich na Jerusɛlɛm, i go na Gɔd in Os ɛn luk ɔltin we lib de. Bɔt we nɛt bin dɔn de kam, in ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go na Bɛtani.
41011012	Di ɔda de wɛn dɛn kɔmɔt Bɛtani, Jizɔs bin angri.
41011013	I si wan fig tik we bin gɛt plɛnti lif, so Jizɔs go luk di tik fɔ si if i de bia. Wɛn i rich klos di tik, i si se na soso lif nɔmɔ kɔba am, bikɔs nɔto bin di tɛm dat fɔ mek i bia.
41011014	Jizɔs swɛ di tik, i se, “Yu nɔ go bia natin igen.” Di lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk.
41011015	Wɛn Jizɔs rich Jerusɛlɛm, i go na Gɔd in Os ɛn drɛb dɛn pipul we bin de bay ɛn sɛl insay de. I tɔn oba dɛn tebul we pipul bin de chenj kɔpɔ pan, ɛn dɛn bɛnch we pipul kin sidɔm pan fɔ sɛl pijin.
41011016	I nɔ gri fɔ mek ɛnibɔdi kɛr ɛni tin fɔ sɛl go insay Gɔd in Os.
41011017	I se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, ‘Pipul fɔ kɔl mi Os di ples we fɔ pre’. Bɔt una dɔn tɔn am to ples we tifman de ayd!”
41011018	Wɛn di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, dɛn bigin fɛn we fɔ kil am. Dɛn bin de fred am, bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn bin de wɔnda wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin i de tich ɛn dɛn bin gladi.
41011019	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt na di tɔng da sem ivintɛm de.
41011020	Na mɔnin wɛn dɛn de tɔn bak, dɛn si se di fig tik dɔn day frɔm bɔtɔm te go ɔp.
41011021	Pita mɛmba wetin bin bi, so i tɔn to Jizɔs ɛn se, “Ticha, luk, da fig tik we yu bin swɛ dɔn day!”
41011022	Jizɔs se, “Una fɔ biliv Gɔd gud.
41011023	A de tɛl una se, if ɛnibɔdi tɛl dis mawnten fɔ kɔmɔt naya ɛn go na di si, ɛn di pɔsin nɔ dawt se wetin i tɔk go bi, bɔt i biliv se wetin i tɔk go bi, na so i go bi.
41011024	Na dat mek a de tɛl una se, ɛni tin we una aks Gɔd fɔ, una fɔ biliv se una go gɛt am ɛn una go gɛt am.
41011025	Ɛnitɛm we una de pre to Gɔd, una fɔ padin ɛnibɔdi we du una bad, so dat una Papa Gɔd we de na ɛvin go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una du. [
41011026	If una nɔ padin una kɔmpin, una Papa Gɔd we de na ɛvin nɔ go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una du.]”
41011027	Wɛn dɛn go bak na Jerusɛlɛm, Jizɔs bin de waka insay Gɔd in Os, na in di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn go mit am.
41011028	Dɛn aks am se, “Us rayt yu gɛt fɔ du dɛn tin ya? Udat gi yu di rayt fɔ du dɛn?”
41011029	Jizɔs ansa se, “Mek a aks una wan kwɛshɔn, if una gi mi di rayt ansa, a go tɛl una udat gi mi di rayt fɔ du dɛn tin ya.
41011030	Na Gɔd ɔ na mɔta lman sɛn Jɔn fɔ kam baptayz pipul?”
41011031	Dɛn bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin se, “If wi ansa se na Gɔd sɛn Jɔn fɔ kam baptayz pipul, i go aks wi se, ‘Wetin du una nɔ bin biliv am?’
41011032	Bɔt wi fɔ se ‘Na mɔta lman . . .’ ” (dɛn fred fɔ tɔk dat bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn bin biliv se Jɔn na tru prɔfɛt.)
41011033	So dɛn se, “Wi nɔ no!” Jizɔs se, “Misɛf nɔ go tɛl una udat gi mi di rayt fɔ du dɛn tin ya.”
41012001	Jizɔs pul wan pare bul; i se, “Wan man bin plant gre pvayn na in gadin, dɔn i mek ston wɔl rawnd di gadin. I dig ol fɔ mek di wayn ɛn bil wan ples ɔp di wɔl we pɔsin go sidɔm fɔ wach di gadin. I rɛnt di gadin gi sɔm pipul, dɔn i go patrol na ɔda kɔntri.
41012002	Wɛn di greps bigin bia, di man we gɛt di gadin sɛn in bɔy fɔ go aks di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin fɔ gi am sɔm pan di greps.
41012003	Bɔt di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin kech di bɔy, bit am ɛn drɛb am kɔmɔt na di gadin, dɛn nɔ gi am natin.
41012004	Di man we gɛt di gadin sɛn in ɔda bɔy, bɔt di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin wund in ed ɛn disgres am.
41012005	Di man sɛn ɔda bɔy, dɛn kil da wan de; dɔn dɛn kil ɛn wund plɛnti ɔda bɔy dɛn we di man sɛn.
41012006	Di las pɔsin we di man sɛn na in bɔy pikin we i lɛk. I mɛmba se we di pipul dɛn si in pikin, dɛn go rɛspɛkt am.
41012007	Wɛn di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin si di man in pikin, dɛn se, ‘Na dis pikin dis prɔpati ya go lɛf to, lɛ wi kil am, so dat di prɔpati go kam na wi an.’
41012008	Dɛn ol am ɛn kil am, ɛn drɛg am kɔmɔt na di gadin.”
41012009	Jizɔs aks in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Wetin una tink se di man we gɛt di gadin go du dɛn pipul ya? I go kil dɛn ɔl ɛn rɛnt di gadin gi ɔda pipul.
41012010	Una nɔ rid yet wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk? Dɛn rayt se, ‘Di ston we dɛn pipul we de bil nɔ luk se bɛtɛ, na in dɔn bi di wan we impɔtant pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn.
41012011	Na di Masta mek dat bi; ɛn di tin we di Masta du, so wɔndaful!’ ”
41012012	Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn tray fɔ ol Jizɔs, bikɔs dɛn bin no se na pan dɛn Jizɔs pul di pare bul. Bɔt dɛn fred di krawd, so dɛn lɛf Jizɔs go.
41012013	Dɛn sɛn sɔm Faresi dɛn ɛn sɔm pan Ɛrɔd in pati pipul dɛn to Jizɔs fɔ mek Jizɔs tɔk sɔntin we dɛn go tek kech am.
41012014	Dɛn go mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “Ticha, wi no se yu de tɔk tru ɛn yu nɔ tek ɛnibɔdi pas in kɔmpin, yu nɔ de luk if pɔsin jɛntri ɔ if i po. Yu de lan wi wetin Gɔd want mɔta lman fɔ du, fɔ tru, bɔt lɛ wi aks yu wan kwɛshɔn. I rayt fɔ mek wi pe taks to di king na Rom? Wi fɔ pe taks ɔ wi nɔ fɔ pe taks?”
41012015	Jizɔs no wantɛm se dɛn na ipo krit pipul, ɛn dɛn bin de sɛt trap fɔ kech am, so i se, “Wetin du una de tray fɔ tek wetin a tɔk kech mi? Una bring wan Roman kɔpɔ kam mek wi luk am.”
41012016	Wɛn dɛn bring di Roman kɔpɔ kam, Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Udat in pikchɔ ɛn nem de pan di kɔpɔ?” Dɛn se, “Na di king na Rom in yon.”
41012017	Jizɔs se, “Una gi di king na Rom wetin blant am ɛn una gi Gɔd wetin blant Gɔd.” Di pipul dɛn we kam fɔ tray Jizɔs wɔnda wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk.
41012018	Sɔm pan di Sadyusi dɛn kam mit Jizɔs; di Sadyusi dɛn bin biliv se pɔsin we dɔn day nɔ go rayz frɔm di grev.
41012019	Dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Ticha, Mozis bin rayt se, ‘If pɔsin in brɔda day lɛf wɛf we nɔ bɔn pikin, di brɔda we lɛf fɔ mared di uman, mek dɛn go bɔn pikin fɔ di brɔda we dɔn day.’
41012020	Sɛvin brɔda dɛn bin de, di fɔs brɔda mared, dɛn i day, in wɛf nɔ bɔn pikin bifo di man day lɛf am.
41012021	Di sɛkɛn brɔda mared di uman we in brɔda bin mared bifo i day, insɛf day ɛn di uman nɔ bɔn fɔ am. Na di sem tin bi to di tɔd brɔda.
41012022	Ɔl di sɛvin brɔda dɛn mared di wan uman, bɔt di uman nɔ bɔn fɔ dɛn. Na di uman las day.
41012023	Di de we Gɔd go mek dɛn pipul we dɔn day rayz frɔm dɛn grev, uswan pan dɛn sɛvin brɔda ya go gɛt di uman fɔ in wɛf, we dɛn ɔl sɛvin bin dɔn mared am?”
41012024	Jizɔs se, “Una mistek bad, bikɔs una nɔ no wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk, ɛn una nɔ no bɔt Gɔd in pawa.
41012025	Di tɛm we Gɔd go mek dɛn pipul we dɔn day rayz frɔm dɛn grev, mared nɔ go de igen, di pipul dɛn go tan lɛkɛ di enjɛl dɛn na ɛvin.
41012026	We una de aks if dɛn pipul we dɔn day go rayz frɔm dɛn grev, una nɔ rid yet wetin Gɔd bin mek Mozis rayt na in Buk, da say we tɔk bɔt di smɔl tik we bin de bɔn we Gɔd bin tɛl Mozis se, ‘Mi na Gɔd fɔ Ebraam, Ayzik, ɛn Jekɔb?’
41012027	Una dɔn mistek bad, bikɔs if Gɔd na Gɔd fɔ pɔsin dat min se da pɔsin de nɔto pɔsin we day, bɔt na pɔsin we gɛt layf.”
41012028	Wan Ju Lɔ ticha kam mit dɛn de agyu, i no se Jizɔs ansa dɛn wɛl, so i aks Jizɔs se, “Uswan pan di lɔ dɛn pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn?”
41012029	Jizɔs ansa am se, “Na di lɔ we se, ‘Una we na Izrɛl pipul, lisin! Di Masta na wi Gɔd, ɔda wan nɔ de.
41012030	Una fɔ lɛk di Masta we na una Gɔd wit ɔl una at, ɔl una layf, ɔl una maynd, ɛn ɔl una pawa.’
41012031	Di ɔda lɔ we impɔtant na in dis, ‘Una fɔ lɛk una kɔmpin mɔta lman lɛkɛ aw una lɛk unasɛf.’ Ɔda lɔ nɔ de we pas dɛn tu ya.”
41012032	Di Ju Lɔ ticha tɔk igen, i se, “Ticha, yu dɔn tɔk tru we yu se, na wan gren Gɔd de, ɔda wan nɔ de.
41012033	Ɛn we yu se, wi fɔ lɛk Gɔd wit ɔl wi at, ɔl wi maynd, ɛn ɔl wi pawa, ɛn wi fɔ lɛk wi kɔmpin mɔta lman lɛkɛ aw wi lɛk wisɛf. Dat bɛtɛ pas ɔl di sakri fays dɛn we wi de mek ɛn ɔl di bif dɛn we wi de bɔn we wi de sakri fays to Gɔd.”
41012034	Jizɔs no se di Ju Lɔ ticha ansa am wit sɛns, so i tɛl am se, “Di tɛm we yu go lɛ Gɔd rul yu dɔn kam klos.” Afta dat, ɔlman fred fɔ aks Jizɔs kwɛshɔn.
41012035	Wɛn Jizɔs bin de na Gɔd in Os de lan di pipul dɛn, i aks dɛn se, “Aw dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ya go se di Mɛsaya na Devid in gra npi kin-pi kin?
41012036	Gɔd in Spirit mek Devid insɛf tɔk se, ‘Gɔd tɛl mi Masta se: Sidɔm na mi raytan, sote a mek yu mas dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk yu.’
41012037	“Devid insɛf kɔl di Mɛsaya, ‘Masta,’ so aw di Mɛsaya go bi wan pan in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn?” Plɛnti pipul bin gladi fɔ yɛri wetin Jizɔs de tɔk.
41012038	Wɛn Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn mɔ, i se, “Una tek tɛm wit dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, dɛn lɛk fɔ wɛr lɔng gawn ɛn waka ɔlɔbɔt ɛn dɛn lɛk fɔ mek pipul tɛl dɛn adu na dɛn ples we plɛnti pipul gɛda.
41012039	Dɛn na pipul we lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn bɛnch we de bifo na di Ju mitin os, ɛn wɛn pipul kɔl dɛn na pati, dɛn kin lɛk fɔ go sidɔm na di ples we dɛn bigman de sidɔm.
41012040	Dɛn lɛk fɔ kapu dɛn uman dɛn prɔpati we dɛn man dɔn day, ɛn dɛn kin tinap de pre lɔng lɔng lɛkɛ se dɛn na gud pipul. Gɔd go pɔnish dɛn pas aw i go pɔnish ɔda pipul!”
41012041	Jizɔs bin sidɔm fesin di bɔks we dɛn de put kɔpɔ na Gɔd in Os de luk we di pipul dɛn de kam put dɛn kɔpɔ insay di bɔks. Plɛnti jɛntri pipul put plɛnti kɔpɔ insay di bɔks.
41012042	Dɛn wan po uman we in man bin dɔn day go put tu kɔpɔ nɔmɔ we na lɛkɛ wan sɛnt nɔmɔ, insay di bɔks.
41012043	Na in Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn se, “A de tɛl una se, dis po uman we in man dɔn day put mɔ kɔpɔ pas ɔlman we kam put kɔpɔ na di bɔks.
41012044	Ɔlman we kam put kɔpɔ jɛs put kenkeni pan di plɛnti plɛnti kɔpɔ we dɛn gɛt, bɔt dis uman put ɔl wetin i bin gɛt fɔ tek manej in layf.”
41013001	We Jizɔs bin de kɔmɔt na Gɔd in Os, wan pan in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Ticha, luk dɛn fayn ston ɛn ɔl dɛn fayn fayn bildin ya!” I bin de tɛl Jizɔs bɔt Gɔd in Os.
41013002	Jizɔs se, “Una si dɛn big bildin ya? Tɛm de kam we dɛn ɔl go fɔdɔm, ɛn wan ston nɔ go lɛf pantap in kɔmpin.”
41013003	We Jizɔs sidɔm na Mawnt Ɔliv, we de fesin Gɔd in Os, na in Pita, Jems, Jɔn ɛn Andru kam mit am ɛn aks am se,
41013004	“Tɛl wi ustɛm dɛn tin we yu bin tɛl wi bɔt go bi? Us sayn go sho wi se i nɔ go te igen we ɔl dɛn tin ya go bi?”
41013005	Jizɔs ansa se, “Una tek tɛm mek nɔbɔdi nɔ mek una ful.
41013006	Plɛnti pipul go tek mi nem kam, dɛn go se dɛn na di Mɛsaya, dɛn go mek plɛnti pipul ful.
41013007	Ɛn una nɔ fɔ wɔri wɛn una yɛri bɔt wa we de klos una ɔ wɛn una yɛri bɔt wa we de fawe. Dɛn tin de mɔs bi, bɔt di wɔl nɔ go ɛnd yet!
41013008	Wan kɔntri go fɛt ɔda kɔntri, ɛn wan neshɔn go fɛt ɔda neshɔn. Di grɔn go tri mbul plɛnti say, natin nɔ go de fɔ it. Ɔl dɛn bad tin de na di fɔs waala dɛn we go fɔdɔm. Wɔs wan dɛn go de biɛn.
41013009	“Una bikya ful, pipul go ol una ɛn kɛr una go bifo dɛn pipul we de jɔj na kot. Pipul go bit una na dɛn Ju mitin os; dɛn go kɛr una go bifo dɛn pipul we de rul, bikɔs una biliv pan mi; da tɛm de una fɔ tɔk di tru tin we una no bɔt mi.
41013010	Bifo di wɔl dɔn, pipul ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl fɔ dɔn yɛri di Gud Nyus fɔs.
41013011	Ɛnitɛm we dɛn ol una ɛn kɛr una go kot, una nɔ fɔ wɔri bɔt wetin una go tɔk, una nɔ fɔ tink bɔt dat bifo di tɛm rich, bɔt wɛn di tɛm rich, ɛni tin we Gɔd in Spirit put na una mɔt, na in una go tɔk. Da tɛm de nɔto unasɛf go tɔk, na Gɔd in Spirit go tɔk fɔ una.
41013012	Brɔda go and brɔda oba gi pipul fɔ mek dɛn kil am, semwe, papa go and in pikin gi pipul fɔ mek dɛn kil am. Pikin go fɛt in papa ɛn mama, ɛn i go mek pipul kil dɛn.
41013013	Pipul nɔ go lɛk una bikɔs una biliv pan mi, bɔt ɛnibɔdi we bia sote i day, go sev.
41013014	“Una go si di bad bad tin tinap na di ples we i nɔ fɔ de.” (Una we de rid: una ɔnda stand wetin dis min.) “Da tɛm de di pipul dɛn na Judia fɔ rɔnawe go na dɛn il,
41013015	pɔsin we de pantap in os, nɔ fɔ kam dɔng ɛn go insay di os igen fɔ tek ɛni tin.
41013016	Pɔsin we de wok na fam nɔ fɔ tɔn bak go tek in klos.
41013017	Da tɛm de, i go bad fɔ bɛlɛ uman ɛn uman we de gi pikin bɔbi!
41013018	Una pre mek dɛn tin ya nɔ bi ren sizin!
41013019	Da tɛm de pipul go sɔfa pas aw dɛn dɔn sɔfa frɔm di tɛm we Gɔd mek di wɔl sote naw; ɛn afta dat, tin lɛkɛ dat nɔ go bi igen.
41013020	Bɔt di Masta dɔn mek da tɛm de shɔt, if nɔ so, nɔbɔdi nɔ bin go lɛf na di wɔl. Bɔt fɔseka dɛn pipul we i dɔn pik, di Masta dɔn mek da tɛm de shɔt.
41013021	“If ɛnibɔdi tɛl una se, ‘Luk di Mɛsaya naya!’ ɔ ‘Luk am yanda!’, una nɔ biliv am.
41013022	Bikɔs sɔm pipul go kam we go lay se dɛn na di Mɛsaya ɛn sɔm go kam we go lay se dɛn na prɔfɛt, ɛn dɛn go du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok ɛn sho plɛnti sayn, so dat da we de, dɛn kin mek dɛn pipul ful we Gɔd dɔn pik fɔ sev, if dɛn ebul du dat.
41013023	Una fɔ wayda wek; a dɔn tɛl una ɔltin bifo dɛn bi.
41013024	“Afta pipul dɔn sɔfa ɔl dɛn tin ya, di san go dak, di mun nɔ go shayn igen.
41013025	Di sta dɛn go fɔdɔm kɔmɔt na di klawd, ɛn di pawa dɛn we de na di klawd go muf kɔmɔt na di ples we dɛn bin de.
41013026	Da tɛm de, ɔlman na wɔl go si Mɔta lman Pikin de kɔmɔt na klawd kam dɔng wit pawa ɛn brayt brayt layt go de shayn rawnd am.
41013027	I go sɛn di enjɛl dɛn ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl frɔm wan ɛnd to di ɔda fɔ gɛda dɛn pipul we i dɔn pik fɔ bi in yon, bring dɛn kam to am.
41013028	“Una luk fig tik ɛn lan. Wɛn di an dɛn de pul nyu lif, una fɔ no se ren sizin de kam.
41013029	Semwe so, wɛn una si dɛn tin we a tɛl una, de bi, una go no se di tɛm we Mɔta lman Pikin fɔ kam dɔn de klos.
41013030	A de tɛl una se, ɔl dɛn tin ya mɔs bi, bifo dɛn pipul we de naw, day.
41013031	Natin nɔ go de ɔpklawd igen ɛn di wɔl sɛf nɔ go de igen, bɔt mi wɔd dɛn go de sote go wit ɔl dɛn pawa.
41013032	“Nɔbɔdi nɔ no di de ɔ di awa we dɛn tin ya go bi; Gɔd in enjɛl dɛnsɛf ɛn Gɔd in Pikin insɛf nɔ no di de ɔ di awa; na di Papa in wan gren no di tɛm.
41013033	Una fɔ wayda wek, una fɔ de wach, bikɔs una nɔ no ustɛm dɛn tin ya go bi.
41013034	I go jɛs tan lɛkɛ we pɔsin de go patrol, i lɛf in os to in savant dɛn. I gi ɔlman in yon wok, dɔn i tɛl di wachman fɔ de wach.
41013035	So una fɔ wayda wek, ɛn una fɔ de wach, bikɔs una nɔ no di tɛm we una masta go kam; una nɔ no if i go kam midul nɛt, ivintɛm, ali mɔnin, ɔ wɛn mɔnin dɔn go fa lili bit.
41013036	Una fɔ wayda wek, mek i nɔ kam tɛm we una nɔ mekɔp ɛn mit una de slip.
41013037	Di tin we a de tɔk so, nɔto fɔ una nɔmɔ, na fɔ ɔlman. Una fɔ wayda wek!”
41014001	I bin jɛs lɛf tu de bifo di Ju ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova, we dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist. Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bin de fɛn we fɔ ol Jizɔs ɛn kil am, mek plɛnti pipul nɔ no.
41014002	Dɛn se, “Wi nɔ fɔ ol am naw dis ɔlide, bikɔs if wi du so, di pipul dɛn go fɛt.”
41014003	Jizɔs bin de na Bɛtani na Saymɔn in os, da Saymɔn we bin gɛt bad sik na in skin. As Jizɔs de it, na in wan uman kam wit sɛnt insay wan bɔtul we dɛn tek ala ba sta ston mek. Di sɛnt we bin de insay di bɔtul na bin dia dia sɛnt we dɛn tek nad mek, dɛn nɔ bin miks am wit ɛni ɔda plant. Di uman brok di bɔtul in mɔt ɛn tɔn di sɛnt pan Jizɔs in ed.
41014004	Sɔm pan di pipul dɛn we bin lib de vɛks, dɛn se, “Wetin mek dis uman wes dis dia sɛnt?
41014005	Pɔsin bin fɔ gɛt lɛkɛ tri ɔndrɛd silva kɔpɔ so, if i bin sɛl di sɛnt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin.” Dɛn bigin tɔk pan di uman.
41014006	Jizɔs se, “Una lɛf fɔ tɔk pan di uman! Wetin du una de ambɔg am? Na gud wok i dɔn du fɔ mi so!
41014007	Dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin de wit una ɔltɛm, ɛn una kin du gud fɔ dɛn ɛnitɛm we una want. Bɔt mi nɔ go de wit una ɔltɛm.
41014008	Di uman dɔn du ɔl wetin i ebul du fɔ mi, i dɔn tɔn sɛnt pan mi fɔ mek mi bɔdi rɛdi fɔ di bɛr we dɛn go bɛr mi.
41014009	A de tɛl una se, ɛni say na wɔl we dɛn de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus, dɛn mɔs mɛmba dis uman ɛn tɔk bɔt dis tin we i dɔn du so.”
41014010	Judas Iskariɔt we na wan pan di twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn go mit di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin fɔ tɛl dɛn se in go sɛl Jizɔs gi dɛn.
41014011	Wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin i tɔk, dɛn gladi ɛn prɔmis fɔ gi am kɔpɔ. So Judas bigin fɛn chans fɔ sɛl Jizɔs gi dɛn.
41014012	Di fɔs de pan di Ju ɔlide we di Ju dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist, ɛn kil ship fɔ mɛmba di Pasova, di lanin bɔy dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Usay wi fɔ go rɛdi di Pasova it?”
41014013	Jizɔs kɔl tu pan in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sɛn dɛn, i se, “Una go insay di tɔng, una go mit wan man we ol wan big jɔg wata, una fala am go na di say we i de go.
41014014	Wɛn una rich de, una tɛl di man we gɛt di os se, ‘Wi Ticha se, usay di rum we tre nja de slip de we mi ɛn mi lanin bɔy dɛn go it di Pasova it?’
41014015	Di man go sho una wan big rum we de na di garɛt. I dɔn rɛdi am fɔ wi, ɔltin we wi want de insay de, na de una fɔ rɛdi di it fɔ mɛmba di Pasova.”
41014016	Di lanin bɔy dɛn go na di tɔng, dɛn mit ɔltin lɛkɛ aw Jizɔs bin dɔn tɛl dɛn; so dɛn rɛdi di it fɔ mɛmba di Pasova.
41014017	Ivintɛm, Jizɔs ɛn ɔl di twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn go na di os.
41014018	Wɛn dɛn de it, Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una se, wan pan una we de it wit mi naw go sɛl mi.”
41014019	Di lanin bɔy dɛn at pwɛl ɛn dɛn bigin aks Jizɔs wan bay wan se, “Na mi? Na mi?”
41014020	Jizɔs ansa se, “Na wan pan una twɛlv we de put an insay di sem dish wit mi.
41014021	Mɔta lman Pikin go day lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt bɔt am na Gɔd in Buk; bɔt i go bad fɔ di pɔsin we go sɛl am. I bin fɔ bɛtɛ if da pɔsin de nɔ bin bɔn!”
41014022	Wɛn dɛn de it, Jizɔs tek bred, i pre ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I kɔt kɔt am ɛn gi in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn se, “Una tek am ɛn it am, dis na mi bɔdi.”
41014023	Dɛn i tek di kɔp ɛn pre ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I gi in lanin bɔy dɛn; dɛn ɔl drink pan di wayn.
41014024	I tɛl dɛn se, “Dis na mi blɔd we a tek mek di agrimɛnt we Gɔd mek wit in pipul dɛn. A dɔn sakri fays am fɔ plɛnti plɛnti pipul.
41014025	A de tɛl una se, a nɔ go drink wayn igen sote di tɛm we a go drink di nyu wayn na di ples we Gɔd de rul.”
41014026	Dɛn sing wan Gɔd sing, dɔn dɛn go na Mawnt Ɔliv.
41014027	Jizɔs bigin tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, i se, “Una ɔl go lɛf mi; bikɔs dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Gɔd go strayk di man we de mɛn di ship dɛn mek i day, ɛn di ship dɛn go skata.’
41014028	Bɔt wɛn a dɔn rayz frɔm di grev, a go go na Galili, una go go mit mi de.”
41014029	Pita se, “If ɔl di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn go lɛf yu, mi nɔ go go lɛf yu, sa!”
41014030	Jizɔs se, “Pita, a de tɛl yu se, dis nɛt, bifo fɔl kro tu tɛm, yu go dɔn tɔk tri tɛm se yu nɔ no mi.”
41014031	Bɔt Pita se, “If a fɔ day sɛf, a go day wit yu, bɔt a nɔ go tɔk se a nɔ no yu!” Ɔl di lanin bɔy dɛn tɔk di sem tin.
41014032	Dɛn Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn rich na wan ples we nem Gɛtse mani. Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, i se, “Una sidɔm naya, a de go pre.”
41014033	Jizɔs mek Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn fala am go. In at bin ful, i bin ebi.
41014034	I se, “Mi at so ebi dat a fil fɔ day. Una sidɔm naya, una nɔ slip, una pre wit mi.”
41014035	Jizɔs lɛf Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn, i go bifo lili bit, dɔn i ledɔm flat na grɔn ɛn bigin pre. I se, if we de, mek Gɔd nɔ mek di tɛm we i fɔ sɔfa kam.
41014036	I se, “Mi Papa, yu ebul du ɔltin, duya, nɔ mek a sɔfa dis sɔfa we a fɔ sɔfa, bɔt ɛniwe, nɔ du wetin a want, du wetin yu want.”
41014037	Wɛn Jizɔs go bak to di tri lanin bɔy dɛn, i mit dɛn de slip. I aks Pita se, “Saymɔn, yu de slip? Yu nɔ ebul wek ɛn pre wit mi wan awa sɛf?
41014038	Una fɔ wayda wek ɛn una fɔ pre mek una nɔ go sin wɛn Setan tray una. Una want du di rayt tin, bɔt una nɔ gɛt di pawa fɔ du am.”
41014039	Jizɔs lɛf dɛn go bak, i pre wit di sem wɔd dɛn we i bin pre wit di fɔs tɛm.
41014040	I go bak igen go mit Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn de slip, dɛn nɔ bin ebul opin dɛn yay sɛf, bikɔs di slip bin de mɔna dɛn. Dɛn nɔ bin no wetin fɔ tɔk sɛf.
41014041	Wɛn Jizɔs kam bak di tɔd tɛm, i aks dɛn se, “Una stil de slip, una de blo te naw? I dɔn du so! Di tɛm dɔn rich; dɛn go sɛl Mɔta lman Pikin gi dɛn bad pipul.
41014042	Una grap, lɛ wi go; una luk, di pɔsin we go sɛl mi de kam naw!”
41014043	As Jizɔs de tɔk so, na in Judas we na wan pan in lanin bɔy dɛn kam wit sɔm pipul we ol sɔd ɛn ɔda tin dɛn fɔ tek fɛt. Na di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn bin sɛn di pipul dɛn.
41014044	Judas we bin want sɛl Jizɔs bin dɔn tɛl di pipul dɛn aw dɛn go no am. I se, “Di wan we a go kis, una grip am ɛn kɛr am go wit gyad dɛn rawnd am.”
41014045	Wɛn Judas kam, i go to Jizɔs wantɛm, i se, “Masta!” Dɛn i kis am.
41014046	Di pipul dɛn go grip Jizɔs.
41014047	Sɔmbɔdi we bin tinap klos de pul in sɔd ɛn kɔt di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin in bɔy yes kɔmɔt.
41014048	Jizɔs aks di pipul dɛn se, “Una kam fɔ ol mi wit sɔd ɛn dɛn ɔda tin fɔ tek fɛt lɛkɛ se mi na tifman?
41014049	Ɛvri de bin de wit una na Gɔd in Os de lan una bɔt Gɔd, bɔt una nɔ bin ol mi. Bɔt ɔl dis bi so dat wetin dɛn bin rayt na Gɔd in Buk go bi.”
41014050	Ɔl di lanin bɔy dɛn go lɛf Jizɔs in wan gren.
41014051	Wan yɔngman bin de fala Jizɔs, na wan lapa nɔmɔ i bin tay. Di pipul dɛn want grip di man,
41014052	bɔt di man rɔn go nekɛd; i lɛf in lapa na dɛn an.
41014053	Dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go bifo di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, in os. Ɔl di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn, ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bin gɛda de.
41014054	Pita bin de fawe lili bit de fala Jizɔs wɛn dɛn de kɛr am go te dɛn rich insay di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, in yad. Wɛn dɛn rich de, Pita go sidɔm klos di gyad dɛn, de wam insɛf klos di faya.
41014055	Di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn ɔl di Ju bigman dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot bin de luk fɔ pɔsin we go tɔk wetin Jizɔs du we bad, so dat dɛn kin kil am, bɔt dɛn nɔ fɛn ɛnibɔdi.
41014056	Plɛnti pipul go lay pan Jizɔs, bɔt dɛn ɔl nɔ tɔk di sem tin.
41014057	Sɔm ɔda pipul we go lay pan Jizɔs, se,
41014058	“Wi yɛri Jizɔs tɔk se, ‘A go brok Gɔd in Os we mɔta lman bil, ɛn a go tek tri de bil ɔda wan we mɔta lman nɔ go ɛp fɔ bil.’ ”
41014059	Bɔt dɛn pipul ya sɛf nɔ tɔk di sem tin.
41014060	Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tinap bifo di pipul dɛn ɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Yu nɔ gɛt natin fɔ se? Wetin mek dɛn man ya se yu du ɔl dɛn bad tin ya?”
41014061	Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ tɔk natin. Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin aks am igen se, “Na yu na di Mɛsaya we na Gɔd, we wi de prez, in Pikin?”
41014062	Jizɔs se, “Yɛs, mi na di Mɛsaya. Una go si Mɔta lman Pikin sidɔm na Gɔd we gɛt pawa pas ɔl, in raytan, ɛn i go rayd pan di klawd wɛn i de kam!”
41014063	Di edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin vɛks ɛn chɛr in klos ɛn se, “Wetin du wi want mɔ witnɛs?
41014064	Unasɛf dɔn yɛri di bad tin we i tɔk bɔt Gɔd, wetin una se?” Ɔl di bigman dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot kɔndɛm Jizɔs ɛn se i fɔ day.
41014065	Sɔm pan dɛn bigin fɔ pit pan Jizɔs; dɛn kɔba in fes, dɛn slap am, ɛn tɛl am se if in na prɔfɛt mek i tɛl dɛn udat slap am. Di gyad dɛnsɛf bigin slap Jizɔs.
41014066	Pita bin de dɔng na di yad we wan savant-gyal we bin de wok fɔ di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, kam.
41014067	Wɛn i si Pita de wam faya, i luk am gud ɛn se, “Yusɛf bin de wit Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt!”
41014068	Bɔt Pita dinay, i se, “A nɔ no wetin yu de tɔk bɔt sɛf.” Pita grap ɛn go klos di get. [Da sem tɛm de fɔl kro.]
41014069	Di savant-gyal si Pita bak, i tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin tinap klos de, se, “Dis man na wan pan Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn!”
41014070	Bɔt Pita dinay bak. I nɔ tu te igen, di pipul dɛn we bin tinap de tɛl Pita se, “Yu na wan pan dis man in lanin bɔy dɛn, fɔ tru, bikɔs na Galili yusɛf kɔmɔt.”
41014071	Bɔt Pita bigin kɔs ɛn swɛ. I se, “A nɔ no dis man we una de tɔk bɔt!”
41014072	Wantɛm, fɔl kro sɛkɛn tɛm. Pita mɛmba wetin Jizɔs bin tɛl am. Jizɔs bin tɔk se, “Yu go se yu nɔ no mi tri tɛm bifo fɔl kro tu tɛm.” Pita bɔs kray.
41015001	Wɛn do klin, di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn, di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn, ɛn ɔl di ɔda mɛmba dɛn na di Ju gran kot go ɛng ed. Dɛn mek dɛn tay Jizɔs ɛn kɛr am go bifo Paylet.
41015002	Paylet aks Jizɔs se, “Na yu na di Ju pipul dɛn king?” Jizɔs ansa se, “Na so yu se!”
41015003	Di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tɔk se Jizɔs du plɛnti bad tin,
41015004	so Paylet aks Jizɔs igen se, “Yu nɔ gɛt natin fɔ se? Yɛri ɔl wetin dɛn tɔk se yu du!”
41015005	Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ gri fɔ tɔk ɛni tin, so Paylet wɔnda.
41015006	Wɛn di Pasova ɔlide kam, Paylet kin pul wan pɔsin we di Ju pipul dɛn want, kɔmɔt na jel.
41015007	Dis tɛm ya, wan man we nem Bara bas bin de na jel wit sɔm ɔda pipul we dɛn ɔl bin mek plɛnti pipul fɛt na di kɔntri ɛn kil pɔsin.
41015008	Plɛnti pipul go mit Paylet ɛn tɛl am mek i du lɛkɛ aw i kin du da Ju ɔlide de.
41015009	Paylet aks dɛn se, “Una want fɔ mek a fri di Ju pipul dɛn king?”
41015010	I bin no se di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin and Jizɔs oba gi am bikɔs dɛn jɛlɔs Jizɔs.
41015011	Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn fɔ tɛl Paylet se, na Bara bas i fɔ pul kɔmɔt na jel.
41015012	Paylet aks dɛn se, “Wɛl, wetin a fɔ du di man we una de kɔl di Ju pipul dɛn king?”
41015013	Dɛn ala big wan se, “Nel am pan di krɔs!”
41015014	Paylet se, “Wetin du? Wetin i du we bad?” Na da tɛm de dɛn ala big big wan pas aw dɛn bin ala fɔs, se, “Nel am pan di krɔs!”
41015015	So fɔ mek di pipul dɛn gladi, Paylet fri Barabas. I mek di soja man dɛn bit Jizɔs, dɔn i lɛf am gi dɛn fɔ mek dɛn nel am pan di krɔs.
41015016	Di soja man dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go insay Paylet in os, dɔn dɛn gɛda di ɔda soja man dɛn.
41015017	Dɛn drɛs Jizɔs wit dak rɛd klos, dɛn mek krawn wit chu kchuk ɛn wɛr am na in ed.
41015018	Dɔn dɛn bigin fɔ makata am ɛn se, “Mek di Ju pipul dɛn King gɛt lɔng layf!”
41015019	Dɛn bit am wit tik na in ed, dɛn pit pan am, dɔn dɛn nil dɔng bifo am lɛkɛ se dɛn de wɔship am.
41015020	Wɛn dɛn dɔn makata am dɔn, dɛn pul di dak rɛd klos kɔmɔt pan am, ɛn wɛr in yon klos pan am bak; dɔn dɛn kɛr am go fɔ go nel am pan di krɔs.
41015021	We dɛn de go, dɛn mit wan man we nem Saymɔn we bin kɔmɔt na wan vilej de go na di tɔng. Saymɔn na bin Alɛgza nda ɛn Rufɔs dɛn papa. I bin bɔn na Sayrini. Di soja man dɛn fos am fɔ tot di krɔs fɔ Jizɔs.
41015022	Dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go na wan ples we dɛn kɔl Gɔlgɔta, dat min “Ples we tan lɛkɛ mɔta lman ed.”
41015023	Dɛn miks wayn wit wan bita mɛrɛsin we nem ma, ɛn gi Jizɔs fɔ drink, bɔt i nɔ drink am.
41015024	Dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs, dɔn dɛn ib days fɔ sheb in klos dɛn.
41015025	Na bin nayn oklɔk mɔnin dɛn nel Jizɔs pan di krɔs.
41015026	Dɛn rayt di tin we mek dɛn kil am ɛn nel am oba Jizɔs in ed. Dɛn rayt “Di Ju Pipul Dɛn King.”
41015027	Da sem tɛm de dɛn nel tu tifman pan tu krɔs, wan na Jizɔs in raytan, wan na in lɛfan. [
41015028	So di tin we dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk we se, “Pipul dɛn min se insɛf na wikɛd man,” kam bi tru.]
41015029	Di pipul dɛn we bin de pas bin de shek dɛn ed ɛn ala pan Jizɔs. Dɛn se, “A min yu bin se yu go brok Gɔd in Os, ɛn yu go tek tri de fɔ bil am bak.
41015030	Wɛl, sev yusɛf naw, kɔmɔt na di krɔs, kam dɔng!”
41015031	Semwe so, dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bigin jok bɔt Jizɔs to dɛnsɛf. Dɛn se, “I bin de sev ɔda pipul, bɔt i nɔ ebul sev insɛf!
41015032	Mek di Mɛsaya, we na di Ju pipul dɛn king kɔmɔt na di krɔs kam dɔng, so dat wi go si ɛn biliv pan am!” Di tu ɔda pipul dɛn we bin nel pan dɛn krɔs klos Jizɔs, dɛnsɛf tɔk bad bɔt Jizɔs.
41015033	Frɔm twɛlv oklɔk te tri oklɔk santɛm, di wan ol kɔntri dak.
41015034	Shap tri, Jizɔs ala, i se, “Ilay, Ilay, lama saba ktani?” dat min, “Mi Gɔd, mi Gɔd, wetin du yu fɔsek mi?”
41015035	Wɛn sɔm pan di pipul dɛn we bin tinap klos de yɛri wetin Jizɔs se, dɛn se, “I de kɔl Ila yja fɔ kam ɛp am.”
41015036	Wan pan dɛn rɔn go sok spɔnj wit viniga ɛn tay di spɔnj pan lɔng tik, dɔn i es di tik fɔ mek Jizɔs sɔk di spɔnj. Di pɔsin se, “Una lɛ wi si if Ila yja go kam pul am kɔmɔt na di krɔs!”
41015037	Jizɔs ala big wan, dɛn i day.
41015038	Di tik tik kɔtin we bin ɛng na Gɔd in Os chɛr tu, frɔm ɔp sote kam dɔng.
41015039	Wɛn di ami ɔfisa we bin tinap bifo di krɔs si se Jizɔs dɔn day, i se, “Dis man ya na bin Gɔd in Pikin, fɔ tru!”
41015040	Sɔm uman dɛn bin tinap fawe de luk. Sɔm pan di wan dɛn we bin lib de na Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala, Meri we na smɔl Jems ɛn in brɔda Josis dɛn mama, ɛn Salomi.
41015041	Wɛn Jizɔs bin de na Galili na dɛn uman ya bin de fala am go ɔlɔbɔt ɛn na dɛn bin de ɛp am. Plɛnti ɔda uman dɛn we bin fala Jizɔs kam na Jerusɛlɛm bin lib de.
41015042	Di tɛm bin dɔn rich fɔ di Ju pipul dɛn fɔ rɛdi fɔ di de fɔ pre ɛn blo. So ivintɛm, Josɛf we kɔmɔt na wan tɔng we nem Ari ma tia, nɔ fred fɔ go aks Paylet fɔ gi am Jizɔs in bɔdi. Josɛf na bin bigman na di Ju gran kot ɛn di pipul dɛn bin rɛspɛkt am; insɛf bin de luk fɔ di tɛm we Gɔd go kam rul di wɔl.
41015044	Paylet wɔnda if Jizɔs dɔn day kwik wan so, so i kɔl di soja ami ɔfisa ɛn aks am if i dɔn te we Jizɔs day.
41015045	Wɛn di ami ɔfisa tɛl am se Jizɔs dɔn day, Paylet gi Josɛf di bɔdi.
41015046	Josɛf go bay nyu linin klos, i pul Jizɔs in bɔdi pan di krɔs ɛn rap am, dɛn i go bɛr am insay wan ston grev we dɛn bin dig; dɔn i tek big ston kɔba di grev domɔt.
41015047	Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala ɛn Meri we na Josis in mama bin de luk usay dɛn de bɛr Jizɔs.
41016001	Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo pas, Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala, Meri we na Jems in mama, ɛn Salomi, bay spays we gɛt fayn sɛnt ɛn kɛr am go fɔ rɔb pan Jizɔs in bɔdi.
41016002	Ali Sɔnde mɔnin bifo san kɔmɔt, dɛn tri uman ya go na di ston grev.
41016003	Dɛn se, “Udat go pul di ston we dɛn tek kɔba di grev domɔt fɔ wi?”
41016004	(Na bin big big ston.) Bɔt wɛn dɛn luk di grev, dɛn si se di ston we dɛn bin tek kɔba di grev domɔt dɔn rol kɔmɔt de.
41016005	Wɛn dɛn de go insay di grev, dɛn si wan yɔng man we wɛr lɔng wayt klos, i bin sidɔm na di raytan say. Di uman dɛn fred!
41016006	Di man se, “Una nɔ fred! Na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, we dɛn bin nel pan di krɔs una kam luk fɔ. I nɔ de ya, i dɔn rayz frɔm di grev. Una luk di ples we dɛn bin le am.
41016007	Una go tɛl Pita ɛn di ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn se, ‘I dɔn go bifo una na Galili, una go mit am de, lɛkɛ aw i bin dɔn tɛl una fɔ du.’ ”
41016008	Di uman dɛn kɔmɔt na di grev ɛn rɔn go to di lanin bɔy dɛn; na so dɛn bin de tri mbul, bikɔs dɛn bin de fred. Di fred we dɛn bin de fred mek dɛn nɔn nɔ ebul tɔk sɛf we dɛn de go. [
41016009	Di uman dɛn go to Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin di yɔng man tɛl dɛn, dɛn nɔ tek lɔng fɔ du dat.
41016010	Afta dat, Jizɔs sɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl fɔ tɛl pipul di mɛsej bɔt aw Gɔd go sev dɛn, dat na di mɛsej we go de sote go ɛn we Gɔd insɛf sɛn kam na wɔl.
41016011	Dɛn nɔ biliv Meri wɛn i tɛl dɛn se Jizɔs dɔn gɛt layf bak ɛn in dɔn si am.
41016012	Wɛn dat pas, tu man dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de go na wan vilej, na de Jizɔs sho insɛf difrɛn we to dɛn frɔm aw i bin sho insɛf to Meri.
41016013	Di tu man dɛn tɔn bak go tɛl dɛn kɔmpin wetin bi, bɔt dɛn nɔ biliv wetin dɛn tɛl dɛn.
41016014	Wɛn dat dɔn, Jizɔs sho insɛf to in ilɛvin lanin bɔy dɛn wɛn dɛn bin de it. I tɔk pan dɛn fɔ we dɛn nɔ bin biliv lɛkɛ aw dɛn fɔ biliv, ɛn fɔ we dɛn bin tra nga yes, ɛn we dɛn nɔ bin biliv dɛn pipul we si am afta i rayz frɔm di grev.
41016015	Jizɔs se, “Una go ɔlɔbɔt na di wɔl ɛn tɛl ɔlman di Gud Nyus bɔt mi.
41016016	Ɛnibɔdi we biliv di Gud Nyus ɛn gri fɔ mek dɛn baptayz am, Gɔd go sev am. Bɔt ɛnibɔdi we nɔ biliv di Gud Nyus, Gɔd go kɔndɛm am.
41016017	Dɛn pipul we biliv di Gud Nyus, a go gi dɛn pawa fɔ du wɔnda ful wok: dɛn go drɛb dɛbul fɔseka mi; dɛn go tɔk langwej we dɛn nɔ lan;
41016018	if dɛn ol snek ɔ if dɛn drink pɔyzin sɛf, natin nɔ go du dɛn; dɛn go put dɛn an pan pipul we sik ɛn pre fɔ dɛn, ɛn di pipul dɛn go wɛl.”
41016019	Wɛn Masta Jizɔs dɔn tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, Gɔd tek am go ɔp na ɛvin, i go sidɔm na Gɔd in raytan.
41016020	Di lanin bɔy dɛn go ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus, ɛn di Masta bin de ɛp dɛn, ɛn mek dɛn du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok we fɔ mek pipul no se na tru dɛn de tɔk.]
42001001	Ɔna re bul Tio filɔs, yu no se plɛnti pipul dɔn bigin rayt ɔl dɛn wɔnda ful tin we dɔn bi naya.
42001002	Ɛn ɔl wetin dɛn de rayt na dɛn sem tin we dɛn pipul we bin de we dɛn tin ya fɔs bigin apin, ɛn we bin de tɔk Gɔd in wɔd, tɛl wi.
42001003	So, we misɛf dɔn tek tɛm luk insay ɔl dɛn tin ya we bi, a mekɔp fɔ rayt dɛn ɔl dɔng fɔ yu, sa, wan bay wan lɛkɛ aw dɛn apin,
42001004	fɔ mek yu no aw ɔl dɛn tin we yu dɔn yɛri bɔt, apin fɔ tru.
42001005	Da tɛm we Ɛrɔd na bin King na Judia, wan man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bin de. I bin nem Zaka raya; i bin de wok ɔnda Abija. In wɛf bin nem Ili zabɛt, i bin fambul to Erɔn.
42001006	Zaka raya ɛn Ili zabɛt bin de waka tret wit Gɔd. Dɛn bin de kip ɔl di Ju Lɔ ɛn dɛn bin de du ɔl wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du.
42001007	Dɛn bin dɔn ol ɛn Ili zabɛt na uman we nɔ bin de bɔn, so dɛn nɔ bin gɛt pikin.
42001008	Wan tɛm we na dɛn man we de na Abija in grup bin de wok na Gɔd in Os, Zaka raya bin de du in wok.
42001009	Wɛn dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kin want pik di wan we go go insay insay Gɔd in Os go bɔn insɛns, dɛn kin rayt ɔlman nem dɔng, fol di pepa dɛn ɛn pik wan; dis tɛm ya na Zaka raya in nem kɔmɔt fɔ du da wok de.
42001010	Ɔl di pipul dɛn bin de na do de pre we Zaka raya de bɔn di insɛns.
42001011	Wantɛm, Zaka raya si enjɛl bifo am na di raytan say na di ples, we i de bɔn di insɛns.
42001012	We Zaka raya si di enjɛl, i wɔnda ɛn in at kɔt.
42001013	Di enjɛl se, “Zaka raya, nɔ fred! Gɔd dɔn yɛri ɛn i dɔn ansa di pre we yu de pre; yu wɛf Ili zabɛt go bɔn bɔy pikin; di nem we yu fɔ gi am na Jɔn.
42001014	Yu go gladi bad wɛn da pikin de bɔn ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul go gladi!
42001015	Da pikin de go bi bigman pan Gɔd we na wi Masta in biznɛs. I nɔ fɔ drink wayn ɔ ɛni tin we de mek pɔsin drɔnk frɔm di de we i bɔn. Gɔd in Spirit go de insay am frɔm di tɛm we i de na in mama bɛlɛ.
42001016	I go mek plɛnti Izrɛl pipul kam bak to Gɔd we na dɛn Masta.
42001017	I go gɛt Gɔd in Spirit ɛn pawa lɛkɛ Ila yja, da prɔfɛt we bin de lɔntɛm. I go waka na di rod we Gɔd sho am ɛn yus in pawa fɔ mek dɛn dadi lɛk dɛn pikin; ɛn fɔ mek dɛn pipul we nɔ de du wetin Gɔd want bigin mɛmba Gɔd ɛn du wetin i want; i go mek di Masta in pipul dɛn rɛdi fɔ am.”
42001018	Zaka raya aks di enjɛl se, “Aw a go no se dɛn tin ya go bi, fɔ tru? Mi dɔn ol, ɛn mi wɛf insɛf na ol ol uman.”
42001019	Di enjɛl ansa se, “A nem Gebrɛl. Na mi tinap bifo Gɔd de sav am ɛn i sɛn mi fɔ kam tɛl yu dis gud nyus.
42001020	Dis tin we a tɛl yu so go bi, wɛn di rayt tɛm kam. Bɔt bikɔs yu nɔ biliv wetin a tɛl yu, yu go mumu sote ɔl wetin a tɛl yu dɔn bi.”
42001021	Ɔl da tɛm de, di pipul dɛn na do bin de wet Zaka raya ɛn dɛn bin de wɔnda wetin mek i te so insay Gɔd in Os.
42001022	Wɛn i kam na do, i nɔ bin ebul fɔ tɔk to di pipul dɛn, na dat dɛn tek no se i si sɔntin insay Gɔd in Os. I nɔ ebul tɔk wan wɔd sɛf, i bin jɛs de mek sayn wit in an.
42001023	Wɛn in yon tɛm fɔ wok na Gɔd in Os dɔn, Zaka raya go na in os.
42001024	Afta sɔm tɛm, in wɛf, Ili zabɛt gɛt bɛlɛ; wɛn i gɛt di bɛlɛ i ayd insay os fayv mɔnt.
42001025	I se, “Na Gɔd sɔri fɔ mi mek a gɛt bɛlɛ so, i dɔn pul mi kɔmɔt pan shem bifo mɔta lman.”
42001026	We Ili zabɛt in bɛlɛ dɔn siks mɔnt, Gɔd sɛn enjɛl Gebrɛl na wan tɔng we dɛn kɔl Nazarɛt we de na Galili fɔ kɛr mɛsej to wan yɔng uman we nem Meri. Meri na bin uman we nɔ no man yet. Wan man we nem Josɛf, we bin de na King Devid in fambul layn bin dɔn put stɔp fɔ am.
42001028	Wɛn di enjɛl go na Meri in os, i se, “Meri, kushɛ, o! Gɔd dɔn blɛs yu ɛn i de wit yu!”
42001029	Bɔt di wɔd we di enjɛl tɔk mek Meri in at wɔri, ɛn i bigin wɔnda wetin dat min.
42001030	Na in di enjɛl se, “Meri, nɔ fred, Gɔd dɔn blɛs yu.
42001031	Yu go gɛt bɛlɛ ɛn yu go bɔn bɔy pikin, ɛn yu fɔ kɔl di pikin, Jizɔs.
42001032	I go bi impɔtant pas ɔlman, dɛn i go kɔl am Gɔd we pas ɔl, in Pikin. Gɔd we na wi Masta go mek i rul oba di Izrɛl pipul dɛn lɛkɛ Devid we na wan pan in gra npapa-papa dɛn.
42001033	I go rul oba Jekɔb in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn sote go; i nɔ go tap fɔ rul!”
42001034	Na de Meri aks di ɛnjel wan kwɛshɔn. I se, “A nɔ no man yet. Aw dat go bi?”
42001035	Di enjɛl ansa am se, “Gɔd in Spirit go kam pan yu, Gɔd we pas ɔl in pawa go kɔba yu. Na dat mek pipul go kɔl di pikin we Gɔd go sɛn we yu go bɔn, Gɔd in Pikin.
42001036	Ɛn mek a tɛl yu sɔntin igen, yu fambul we nem Ili zabɛt, we dɔn ol, we se in nɔ go bɔn, dɔn gɛt siks mɔnt bɛlɛ naw.
42001037	Natin nɔ de we Gɔd nɔ ebul du!”
42001038	Wɛn Meri yɛri dat, i tɛl di enjɛl se, “Mi na Gɔd in savant, mek ɔl wetin yu dɔn tɔk se go bi to mi, bi.” Dɔn di enjɛl lɛf am go.
42001039	I nɔ tu te afta dat, Meri rɛdi ɛn go kwik na wan tɔng we de ɔp dɛn il we de na di kɔntri we nem Judia.
42001040	I go na Zaka raya in os ɛn tɛl Ili zabɛt adu.
42001041	Wɛn Ili zabɛt yɛri Meri in vɔys, di pikin we de na Ili zabɛt in bɛlɛ jomp. Gɔd in Spirit kam insay Ili zabɛt,
42001042	so i tɔk lawd wan to Meri. I se, “Yu na di uman we Gɔd dɔn blɛs pas ɔl dɛn ɔda uman ɛn di pikin we yu go bɔn gɛt wɔnda ful blɛsin!
42001043	Udat na mi we mi Masta in mama fɔ kam fɛn mi?
42001044	As a yɛri yu vɔys so, di pikin we de insay mi bɛlɛ jomp bikɔs i gladi.
42001045	Meri, Gɔd dɔn blɛs yu bikɔs yu biliv se Gɔd go du wetin i tɛl yu se in go du.”
42001046	Meri se, “Insay mi at a de sing se Gɔd we na wi Masta, big.
42001047	Gɔd we sev mi dɔn mek mi at gladi.
42001048	I dɔn mɛmba po uman lɛkɛ mi, we na in savant. Frɔm naw sote go ɔlman go de tɔk se mi na uman we gɛt blɛsin,
42001049	bikɔs Gɔd we gɛt pawa oba ɔltin dɔn du big wok fɔ mi. Gɔd oli, i nɔ gɛt bɔt at ɔl;
42001050	frɔm tɛm, i de sɔri fɔ ɔl dɛn wan we rɛspɛkt am.
42001051	I dɔn sho se in gɛt pawa, i dɔn kɔnfyus dɛn wan we prawd ɛn mek dɛn rɔnawe ɛn pwɛl ɔl wetin dɛn bin mekɔp fɔ du.
42001052	I pul dɛn wan we gɛt pawa kɔmɔt na di ples we dɛn de rul ɛn mek dɛn po pipul rul na dɛn ples.
42001053	I dɔn gi dɛn po pipul plɛnti tin we go mek dɛn satisfay, bɔt i dɔn sɛn dɛn jɛntri wan go, i nɔ gi dɛn natin.
42001054	I dɔn ɛp wi, di Izrɛl pipul dɛn, we de sav am, bikɔs i mɛmba se in bin dɔn prɔmis wi granpapa-papa dɛn,
42001055	Ebraam ɛn in granpikin-pikin dɛn se in go sɔri fɔ dɛn sote go!”
42001056	Meri de wit Ili zabɛt lɛkɛ tri mɔnt so bifo i go bak na in os.
42001057	Wɛn di tɛm kam fɔ mek Ili zabɛt bɔn, i bɔn bɔy pikin.
42001058	In neba dɛn ɛn in fambul dɛn yɛri se Gɔd dɔn sɔri fɔ Ili zabɛt ɛn ɔlman gladi wit am.
42001059	Di de we mek et afta di pikin bɔn, dɛn ɔl kam to Ili zabɛt dɛn; na da de de dɛn bin kam gɛda de fɔ sakɔmsayz di pikin. Dɛn bin want mek dɛn kɔl di pikin Zaka raya lɛkɛ in papa.
42001060	Bɔt Ili zabɛt se, “Una nɔ kɔl am Zaka raya, in nem fɔ bi Jɔn.”
42001061	Wɛn Ili zabɛt tɔk dat, di pipul dɛn se, “Nɔbɔdi nɔ de pan una fam bul we nem Jɔn!”
42001062	Dɛn mek sayn to di papa fɔ aks am wetin di pikin in nem fɔ bi.
42001063	Zaka raya mek sayn to dɛn fɔ aks fɔ sɔntin fɔ rayt pan, i rayt se, “In nem fɔ bi Jɔn!” Dɛn ɔl wɔnda!
42001064	As Zaka raya rayt dɔn so, in vɔys kam bak ɛn in tɔng lus ɛn i bigin fɔ tɔk klia wan. I bigin fɔ prez Gɔd.
42001065	Ɔl di pipul dɛn we yɛri Zaka raya de tɔk, fred. Pipul bigin tɔk bɔt ɔl wetin bi ɔlsay na Judia.
42001066	Ɔlman we yɛri bɔt di tin we bi, bigin tɔk na dɛn at se, “Uskayn pikin dis? Wetin i go bi bambay?” Gɔd in pawa bin de pan am.
42001067	Gɔd in Spirit kam insay Zaka raya we na Jɔn in papa, ɛn i bigin fɔ tɔk ɔl wetin go bi.
42001068	I se: “Lɛ wi prez wi Masta we na di Izrɛl pipul dɛn Gɔd, bikɔs i dɔn kam to in pipul dɛn fɔ fri dɛn.
42001069	I dɔn sɛn pɔsin we gɛt pawa we go sev wi ɛn dis pɔsin ya kɔmɔt na Devid in fambul layn.
42001070	Gɔd in prɔfɛt dɛn bin dɔn tɔk lɔntɛm se
42001071	dis pɔsin go pul wi na dɛn wan we de fɛt wi dɛn an, ɛn i nɔ go mek dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk wi ebul wi.
42001072	So Gɔd stil de sɔri fɔ wi lɛkɛ aw i tɛl wi granpapa-papa dɛn se in go du ɛn i stil mɛmba di agrimɛnt we insɛf sɛf mek wit dɛn,
42001073	dat na we i prɔmis Ebraam ɛn tek oth se
42001074	in go pul wi na dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk wi, dɛn an, so wi nɔ go fred fɔ sav am,
42001075	wi go bi Gɔd in pipul dɛn ɛn wi go waka tret bifo am ɔl di tɛm we wi de na dis wɔl.
42001076	Yu, mi pikin, dɛn go kɔl yu Gɔd we pas ɔl, in prɔfɛt. Na yu go mek pipul rɛdi fɔ di tɛm we di Masta go kam;
42001077	yu go sho pipul aw dɛn go du, mek Gɔd go padin dɛn sin, mek dɛn sev.
42001078	Gɔd dɔn sɔri fɔ wi; i go mek di ali mɔnin san kam pan wi.
42001079	Da san de go shayn pan dɛn pipul we de na dak ɛn we want day, ɛn i go mek wi gɛt kol at.”
42001080	As di pikin de gro, na so i de kam klos Gɔd mɔ ɛn mɔ. I bin tap na di dɛzat sote di tɛm kam fɔ sho insɛf to pipul na Izrɛl.
42002001	Dɛn tɛm de, Ɔgɔstɔs we na bin di king na Rom sɛn tɔk ɔlɔbɔt se ɔlman we de na Roman kɔntri mɔs go mek dɛn rayt dɛn nem dɔng na rɛji sta.
42002002	Dis na bin di fɔs tɛm we ɔlman fɔ go put dɛn nem dɔng na rɛji sta. Da tɛm de, na wan man we nem Kwi rinyɔs na bin gɔvna na Sirya.
42002003	So ɔlman go na dɛn yon tɔng fɔ mek dɛn rayt dɛn nem dɔng na rɛji sta.
42002004	We Josɛf bin de na King Devid in fambul layn, i kɔmɔt Nazarɛt we de na Galili, go na Bɛtliɛm we de na Judia, di ples we King Devid bin bɔn.
42002005	Wɛn Josɛf de go, i kɛr Meri we i bin dɔn put stɔp fɔ go wit am fɔ mek insɛf go put in nem dɔng na rɛjista. Meri bin gɛt bɛlɛ da tɛm de.
42002006	Wɛn dɛn de na Bɛtliɛm, na in di tɛm rich fɔ mek Meri bɔn.
42002007	Meri bɔn in fɔs pikin we na bin bɔbɔ. I rap di pikin wit plɛnti pisis, ɛn le am pan di gras we dɛn bin kɔt fɔ dɛn ship ɛn dɛn got fɔ it, bikɔs ples nɔ bin de fɔ am insay di os we dɛn bin tap.
42002008	Na da sem pat de, sɔm shɛpad dɛn bin sidɔm de wach dɛn ship, na bin nɛt.
42002009	Dɛn si enjɛl we Gɔd, we na wi Masta, sɛn, tinap bifo dɛn. Na so ɔl di ples bin de shayn brayt wit Gɔd in layt, so dɛn bigin fred bad bad wan.
42002010	Di enjɛl se, “Una nɔ fred! A bring gud nyus fɔ una we go mek pipul gladi bad ɛn ɔl di Izrɛl pipul dɛn go gladi.
42002011	Tide na da tɔng we Devid bin bɔn, dɛn dɔn bɔn Wan Pikin we go sev una. Na di Mɛsaya we na wi Masta.
42002012	Di tin we go mek una no am, na in dis: una go mit dɛn rap di bebi wit pisis ɛn dɛn le am pan gras we dɛn kɔt fɔ dɛn ship ɛn got fɔ it.”
42002013	Wantɛm, aw di enjɛl tɔk dɔn so, na in dɛn si plɛnti plɛnti enjɛl de prez Gɔd, dɛn de sing se,
42002014	“Lɛ ɔlman prez ɛn ɔna Gɔd we de ɔp ɔp na ɛvin, mek ɔl mɔtalman we mek Gɔd gladi, gɛt kol at!”
42002015	Wɛn di enjɛl dɛn go bak na ɛvin, na in dɛn shɛpad bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin, dɛn se, “Una lɛ wi go Bɛtliɛm go si dis tin we dɔn bi, we Gɔd dɔn mek wi no bɔt.”
42002016	So dɛn waka kwik kwik go Bɛtliɛm. Dɛn mit Meri ɛn Josɛf ɛn dɛn si di lili pikin we ledɔm na di gras we dɛn put fɔ dɛn ship ɛn got.
42002017	Wɛn dɛn si di pikin, dɛn tɔk ɔl wetin di enjɛl bin dɔn tɛl dɛn bɔt am.
42002018	Ɔlman we yɛri wetin dɛn tɔk, wɔnda.
42002019	Bɔt Meri nɔ se natin, i kip ɔl dɛn tin ya na in at ɛn i kin de tink bɔt dɛn ɔltɛm.
42002020	Wɛn di shɛpad dɛn bin de tɔn bak, dɛn bin de tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, dɛn bin de sing ɛn prez am fɔ ɔl wetin dɛn bin jɛs yɛri ɛn si. Ɔltin bin bi jɛs lɛkɛ aw di enjɛl bin dɔn tɛl dɛn.
42002021	Di de we mek et afta Jizɔs bɔn, dɛn sakɔmsayz am, ɛn nem am Jizɔs. Na bin di nem dat we di enjɛl bin gi am bifo in mama gɛt in bɛlɛ.
42002022	Wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ mek Josɛf ɛn Meri go na Gɔd in Os fɔ du dɛn tin we go mek dɛn klin na Gɔd in yay lɛkɛ aw di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se, dɛn kɛr di pikin go na Gɔd in Os na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn aks Gɔd fɔ blɛs am.
42002023	Na so Gɔd in lɔ se, “Ɔl fɔs bɔy pikin fɔ du Gɔd wok.”
42002024	Pantap dat, Josɛf ɛn Meri kɛr tu dɔv ɔ tu pijin pikin go gi di man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin fɔ mek sakri fays to Gɔd, bikɔs Gɔd in lɔ tɔk igen se fɔ sakri fays tu dɔv ɔ tu pijin pikin.
42002025	Da tɛm de, wan man bin de na Jerusɛlɛm we bin nem Simyɔn. Dis man ya bin lɛk Gɔd ɛn i bin de waka tret ɛn de du ɔl wetin Gɔd want. I bin de wet fɔ di tɛm we Gɔd go sɔri fɔ di Izrɛl pipul dɛn ɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt pan waala. Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am,
42002026	ɛn i bin dɔn tɛl am se i nɔ go day sote i si di Mɛsaya we Gɔd we na wi Masta go sɛn.
42002027	Da sem de de, di Spirit tɛl Simyɔn mek i grap ɛn go tret na Gɔd in Os. I nɔ tu te, Meri ɛn Josɛf kɛr Jizɔs go insay Gɔd in Os fɔ du dɛn tin we Gɔd in lɔ se.
42002028	Simyɔn tot di pikin ɛn bigin prez ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I se:
42002029	“Gɔd, we na wi Masta, yu dɔn du wetin yu bin prɔmis mi, we na yu savant, so a kin day naw wit kol at.
42002030	A dɔn si di pɔsin insɛf we go sev ɔlman na wɔl.
42002031	Yu dɔn pik am ɛn mek ɔlman si am.
42002032	Na in na di layt we go mek dɛn wan we nɔ no yu na dis wɔl, no yu; i go mek yu pipul dɛn na Izrɛl gɛt plɛnti ɔna.”
42002033	Ɔl wetin Simyɔn tɔk bɔt Jizɔs mek in mama ɛn in papa dɛn wɔnda.
42002034	Simyɔn blɛs dɛn tri, dɔn i tɔk to Meri, i se, “Gɔd dɔn pik dis pikin ya ɛn sɛn am kam, ɛn di kam we i kam go mek plɛnti Izrɛl pipul lɛf fɔ biliv Gɔd ɛn mek plɛnti biliv am. Gɔd sɛn Jizɔs fɔ sho wi wetin Gɔd want, bɔt plɛnti pipul go tɔk se dɛn nɔ de fɔ am,
42002035	ɛn ɔda pipul go no wetin dɛn pipul de bin de tink we nɔbɔdi nɔ bin no. Meri, yusɛf at go blid wɛn ɔl dɛn tin ya bi.”
42002036	Wan uman prɔfɛt bin de we in papa na bin Fanyuɛl, na bin wan pan Asha in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn; Ana na bin ol ol uman we in man bin dɔn day. Frɔm di tɛm we i mared, in ɛn in man de sɛvin ia nɔmɔ bifo in man day. Frɔm di tɛm we in man day, i de te i ol eti-fo. De ɛn nɛt Ana bin de na Gɔd in Os de pre ɛn fast.
42002038	Insɛf kam na Gɔd in Os di sem tɛm we dɛn bring Jizɔs to Gɔd. I tɛl Gɔd tɛnki. I tɔk bɔt di Pikin to ɔl dɛn wan we bin de wet fɔ mek Gɔd fri di pipul dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm.
42002039	Wɛn Meri ɛn Josɛf dɔn du ɔltin we Gɔd in lɔ se, dɛn tɔn bak go na dɛn tɔng, dat na Nazarɛt we de na Galili.
42002040	Wɛn di pikin dɔn big ɛn i dɔn ebul tink, i bin gɛt plɛnti sɛns ɛn Gɔd bin blɛs am.
42002041	Ɛvri ia Jizɔs in mama ɛn papa kin go na Jerusɛlɛm wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ wan Ju ɔlide we nem Pasova.
42002042	Wɛn Jizɔs bin dɔn ol twɛlv ia, i fala in mama ɛn papa dɛn go Jerusɛlɛm fɔ di Pasova lɛkɛ aw dɛn kin du.
42002043	Wɛn di ɔlide dɔn, Meri ɛn Josɛf bin de tɔn bak go Nazarɛt, bɔt Jizɔs nɔ bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm yet. In mama ɛn papa nɔ bin no.
42002044	Dɛn bin min se Jizɔs de wit di ɔda pipul dɛn. Wɛn dɛn dɔn waka ol de, dɛn nɔ si am, dɛn bigin luk fɔ am to dɛn fambul ɛn dɛn pipul we dɛn no.
42002045	Bɔt dɛn nɔ si am; so dɛn tɔn bak go Jerusɛlɛm go luk fɔ am.
42002046	Di de we mek tri na in dɛn rich Jerusɛlɛm. Dɛn mit Jizɔs sidɔm na Gɔd in Os midul dɛn big Ju Lɔ ticha. Jizɔs bin de lisin wetin dɛn de tɔk ɛn insɛf bin de aks dɛn bɔt plɛnti tin.
42002047	Di we we i bin de ansa kwɛshɔn ɛn di sɛns we i bin gɛt bin mek ɔl di pipul dɛn wɔnda.
42002048	Wɛn in mama ɛn in papa si am, dɛn wɔnda. Na de in mama se, “Mi pikin, wetin mek yu du wi so? Mi ɛn yu papa bin de luk fɔ yu ɛn wi bin de wɔri we wi nɔ si yu.”
42002049	Jizɔs se, “Wetin mek una bin de luk fɔ mi? Una nɔ no se a fɔ de na mi Papa in Os?”
42002050	Bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ɔnda stand wetin i min.
42002051	Jizɔs go Nazarɛt bak wit in mama ɛn papa ɛn i yɛri dɛn wɔd. In mama kip ɔl dɛn tin ya we bi na in at.
42002052	As Jizɔs de big, na so i bin de gɛt mɔ ɛn mɔ sɛns. Gɔd bin lɛk am; ɛn mɔta lman bin lɛk am.
42003001	Di ia we mek fiftin we di king na Rom we nem King Taybiryɔs bin dɔn de na pawa, Pɔnchɔs Paylet na bin gɔvna na Judia ɛn Ɛrɔd bin de rul na Galili. Ɛrɔd in brɔda we nem Filip bin de rul na Itu riya ɛn Tra ko na ytis. Laysenyɔs bin de rul na Abi lini.
42003002	Anas ɛn Kaye fas dɛn na bin di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Da sem tɛm de, Gɔd gi Jɔn we na Zaka raya in pikin in mɛsej fɔ tɛl pipul. Wɛn dat bi, Jɔn bin tap na di dɛzat.
42003003	Jɔn bigin waka go ɔlsay na dɛn ples we de klos Riva Jɔdan de tɛl pipul se, if dɛn lɛf fɔ du bad ɛn mek i baptayz dɛn, Gɔd go padin dɛn fɔ di bad we dɛn de du.
42003004	Jɔn du jɛs lɛkɛ wetin di prɔfɛt we nem Ayzaya bin rayt na in buk, we i se: “Sɔmbɔdi de tɔk lawd na di dɛzat se, ‘Una klia di rod we di Masta go pas ɛn mek di rod tret fɔ am fɔ waka.
42003005	Ɔl dɛn vali go ful kam ɔp te dɛn lɛvul, ɔl dɛn ay il ɛn smɔl il go tɔn flat grɔn. Dɛn bɛn rod go tret, dɛn stonston rod go lɛbul.
42003006	Ɔlman na wɔl go si aw Gɔd de sev in pipul dɛn.’ ”
42003007	Plɛnti pipul kam to Jɔn fɔ mek i baptayz dɛn. Jɔn tɔk pan dɛn, i se, “Una dɛn snek ya, we de pɔyzin di wɔl, udat tɛl una fɔ rɔn kɔmɔt pan di trɔbul ɛn waala we Gɔd want bring fɔ pɔnish una?
42003008	Una fɔ lɛf fɔ du dɛn tin we nɔ rayt na Gɔd yay ɛn du dɛn tin we go sho se una dɔn lɛf fɔ du dɛn. Una lɛf fɔ se, ‘Wi na Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.’ Dat nɔ go sev una. A de tɛl una se Gɔd ebul fɔ tek pan dɛn ston ya ɛn tɔn dɛn to Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.
42003009	Di aks we fɔ tek kɔt di tik dɛn rut dɔn rɛdi naw; ɔl dɛn tik we nɔ de bia gud tin fɔ it, dɛn go kɔt dɛn ɛn trowe dɛn na faya.”
42003010	Di pipul dɛn se, “Wetin wi fɔ du naw?”
42003011	Jɔn ansa dɛn se, “Ɛnibɔdi we gɛt tu klos, fɔ gi pɔsin we nɔ gɛt, wan. Semwe so, pɔsin we gɛt tin fɔ it, fɔ sheb am wit in kɔmpin we nɔ gɛt.”
42003012	Sɔm pan dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks dɛnsɛf kam fɔ mek Jɔn baptayz dɛn. Dɛn aks Jɔn se, “Wetin wi fɔ du, sa, fɔ sho se wi dɔn lɛf fɔ du bad?”
42003013	Jɔn ansa dɛn se, “Una nɔ fɔ tek pas wetin di Roman gɔvmɛnt tɛl una fɔ tek.”
42003014	Dɛn soja man dɛnsɛf se, “We wi, wetin wi fɔ du, sa?” Jɔn ansa se, “Una nɔ fɔ fɛt pipul tek dɛn kɔpɔ, una nɔ fɔ lay pan pipul fɔ mek una gɛt mɔni. Una fɔ sati sfay wit di mɔni we dɛn pipul we una de wok fɔ de pe una.”
42003015	Ɔlman bin de wet fɔ mek di Mɛsaya kam ɛn dɛn bin de wɔnda if Jɔn na di Mɛsaya.
42003016	Jɔn se, “A de baptayz wit wata nɔmɔ, bɔt pɔsin we gɛt pawa pas mi de kam. A nɔ fit sɛf fɔ lus in sus. I go baptayz una wit Gɔd in Spirit ɛn wit faya.
42003017	I ol tin lɛkɛ lɔng fɔk na in an fɔ tek pul di cha fchaf kɔmɔt pan di wit. I go gɛda in wit put am na sto, bɔt i go bɔn di cha fchaf na faya we nɔ de tap fɔ bɔn.”
42003018	Jɔn lan dɛn plɛnti ɔda tin ɛn tɛl dɛn bɔt Jizɔs.
42003019	Jɔn bin tɔk pan Ɛrɔd we bin de rul Galili bikɔs i bin mared Ɛro dias, we na bin in brɔda wɛf, ɛn fɔ ɔl di plɛnti bad tin dɛn we i bin de du.
42003020	Pantap ɔl dɛn ɔda bad tin we Ɛrɔd bin de du, i mek dɛn ol Jɔn ɛn put am na jel!
42003021	Wɛn Jɔn bin dɔn baptayz ɔl di pipul dɛn dɔn, na in i baptayz Jizɔs insɛf. Wɛn Jizɔs bin de pre, ɛvin opin
42003022	ɛn Gɔd in Spirit tek dɔv shep kam dɔng pan am ɛn dɛn yɛri vɔys we kɔmɔt na ɛvin de tɔk se, “Yu na mi yon Pikin we a lɛk ɛn a gladi fɔ yu!”
42003023	Jizɔs bin dɔn ol lɛkɛ tati ia so we i bigin fɔ du di wok we Gɔd sɛn am fɔ du na dis wɔl. Pipul bin tink se Josɛf na bin Jizɔs in papa. Josɛf in papa bin nem Ilay, Ilay in papa bin nem Matat,
42003024	Matat in papa bin nem Livay, Livay in papa bin nem Mɛlkay, Mɛlkay in papa bin nem Jana, Jana in papa bin nem Josɛf,
42003025	Josɛf in papa bin nem Mata ta yas, Mata ta yas in papa bin nem Emɔs, Emɔs in papa bin nem Neɔm, Neɔm in papa bin nem Ɛslay, Ɛslay in papa bin nem Nagay,
42003026	Nagay in papa bin nem Meat, Meat in papa bin nem Mata ta yas, Mata ta yas in papa bin nem Sɛmɛin, Sɛmɛin in papa bin nem Josɛk, Josɛk in papa bin nem Joda,
42003027	Joda in papa bin nem Joe nan, Joe nan in papa bin nem Resa, Resa in papa bin nem Zɛru babɛl, Zɛru babɛl in papa bin nem Shiɛltiɛl, Shiɛltiɛl in papa bin nem Niray,
42003028	Niray in papa bin nem Mɛlkay, Mɛlkay in papa bin nem Aday, Aday in papa bin nem Kosam, Kosam in papa bin nem Ɛlmo dam, Ɛlmo dam in papa bin nem Ir,
42003029	Ir in papa bin nem Jɔshwa, Jɔshwa in papa bin nem Ɛlie zir, Ɛlie zir in papa bin nem Jorim, Jorim in papa bin nem Matat, Matat in papa bin nem Livay,
