42003030	Livay in papa bin nem Simyɔn, Simyɔn in papa bin nem Juda, Juda in papa bin nem Josɛf, Josɛf in papa bin nem Jonam, Jonam in papa bin nem Ɛla ya kim,
42003031	Ɛla ya kim in papa bin nem Milɛa, Milɛa in papa bin nem Mina, Mina in papa bin nem Matata, Matata in papa bin nem Netan, Netan in papa bin nem Devid,
42003032	Devid in papa bin nem bin Jɛsi, Jɛsi in papa bin nem Obɛd, Obɛd in papa bin nem Boaz, Boaz in papa bin nem Salmɔn, Salmɔn in papa bin nem Nashɔn,
42003033	Nashɔn in papa bin nem Ami na dab, Ami na dab in papa bin nem Admin, Admin in papa bin nem Ani, Ani in papa bin nem Ɛzrɔn, Ɛzrɔn in papa bin nem Pɛrɛz, Pɛrɛz in papa bin nem Juda,
42003034	Juda in papa bin nem Jekɔb, Jekɔb in papa bin nem Ayzik, Ayzik in papa bin nem Ebraam, Ebraam in papa bin nem Tɛra, Tɛra in papa bin nem Naɔ,
42003035	Naɔ in papa bin nem Serug, Serug in papa bin nem Ru, Ru in papa bin nem Peleg, Peleg in papa bin nem Ibɔ, Ibɔ in papa bin nem Shila,
42003036	Shila in papa bin nem Kea ynan, Kea ynan in papa bin nem Afa ksad, Afa ksad in papa bin nem Shɛm, Shɛm in papa bin nem Noa, Noa in papa bin nem Lamɛk,
42003037	Lamɛk in papa bin nem Metusɛla, Metusɛla in papa bin nem Inɔk, Inɔk in papa bin nem Jerɛd, Jerɛd in papa bin nem Maa la lil, Maa la lil in papa bin nem Kea ynan,
42003038	Kea ynan in papa bin nem Inɔsh, Inɔsh in papa bin nem Sɛth, Sɛth in papa bin nem Adam, Adam in papa na Gɔd.
42004001	Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt insay Riva Jɔdan, Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am, di Spirit kɛr am go na di dɛzat we de na Judia ɛn i de wit am fɔti de, ɔl di tɛm we
42004002	Setan bin de tray fɔ mek Jizɔs du bad. Jizɔs bin angri bad we i dɔn de fɔti de, i nɔ it natin.
42004003	Setan tɛl am se, “If yu na Gɔd in Pikin, mek dis ston ya tɔn bred.”
42004004	Jizɔs ansa am se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se nɔto tin fɔ it nɔmɔ de mek pɔsin liv.”
42004005	Setan kɛr Jizɔs go ɔp wan ay il ɛn sho am ɔl dɛn kɔntri na di wɔl, i nɔ te lɔng sɛf.
42004006	I se, “A go gi yu di rayt fɔ rul oba ɔl dɛn kɔntri ya ɛn mek yu ɛnjɔy ɔl dɛn gud tin we lib de we de mek pipul gladi. Dɛn tin ya dɔn kam na mi an naw ɛn a go pas am gi ɛnibɔdi we a lɛk.
42004007	A go gi yu ɔl dɛn tin ya if yu go se mi na yu masta.”
42004008	Jizɔs se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Pɔsin fɔ nil dɔng bifo Gɔd we na in Masta nɔmɔ ɛn pre to am, ɛn na in wan gren i fɔ wok fɔ.’ ”
42004009	Setan kɛr Jizɔs go Jerusɛlɛm ɛn mek i tinap pantap di tawa we de na Gɔd in Os. I tɛl Jizɔs se, “If yu na Gɔd in Pikin, ib yusɛf dɔng.
42004010	Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Gɔd go mek in enjɛl dɛn gyad yu fɔ mek natin nɔ du yu,’
42004011	ɛn igen, ‘Yu go fɔdɔm insay dɛn an fɔ mek yu fut sɛf nɔ wund pan ston.’ ”
42004012	Jizɔs ansa am se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, ‘Pɔsin nɔ fɔ tray fɔ mek Gɔd we na in Masta du wetin in want.’ ”
42004013	Wɛn Setan dɔn tray fɔ mek Jizɔs du bad ɔl kayn we, ɛn i nɔ ebul, i lɛf Jizɔs lili bit fɔs.
42004014	Jizɔs tɔn bak go Galili wit di pawa we Gɔd in Spirit gi am. Ɔlman bigin tɔk bɔt am ɔlsay na dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej we de klos Galili.
42004015	Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn na di Ju mitin os ɛn dɛn ɔl prez am.
42004016	Jizɔs go Nazarɛt. Na di tɔng dat we i de frɔm we i lili te i big. Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, kam, i go na di Ju mitin os lɛkɛ aw i bin dɔn yus fɔ du. I tinap fɔ rid Gɔd in Buk to di pipul dɛn.
42004017	Dɛn gi am Ayzaya we na bin prɔfɛt in buk fɔ rid. Jizɔs opin di buk na di ples we Ayzaya rayt se:
42004018	“Gɔd in Spirit de wit mi, bikɔs Gɔd dɔn pik mi fɔ mek a tɛl dɛn po pipul di Gud Nyus. I sɛn mi fɔ mek a tɛl dɛn slev se dɛn go fri ɛn dɛn blɛnyay pipul se dɛn go si. I sɛn mi fɔ fri dɛn wan we de lɛkɛ slev,
42004019	ɛn fɔ mek a tɛl ɔlman se di tɛm dɔn kam we Gɔd go sev in pipul dɛn.”
42004020	Jizɔs lɔk di buk ɛn gi di man we de luk di ples; dɛn i sidɔm. Ɔlman we bin de na di Ju mitin os bin de luk Jizɔs gud, dɛn bin de lisin to am.
42004021	I se, “Dis pat pan Gɔd in Buk we a rid, dɔn bi, fɔ tru, tide, jɛs lɛkɛ aw una dɔn yɛri.”
42004022	Dɛn ɔl tɔk gud bɔt Jizɔs ɛn di fayn fayn wɔd dɛn we i tɔk mek dɛn wɔnda. Dɛn se, “Nɔto Josɛf in pikin dis?”
42004023	Jizɔs se, “A shɔ se una go pul pare bul pan mi se, ‘Dɔkta, mɛn yusɛf!’ Una go want tɛl mi se mek a du ɔl dɛn wɔnda ful wok we una yɛri se a du na Kepanyɔm, na mi yon tɔng.”
42004024	Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una se prɔfɛt nɔ gɛt rɛspɛkt na di tɔng we i bɔn.”
42004025	“Una lisin mi; di tɛm we Ila yja bin de na Izrɛl, ren nɔ kam fɔ tri ia ɛn siks mɔnt ɛn bad angri bin de na di kɔntri, ɛn plɛnti uman we dɛn man bin dɔn day bin de na Izrɛl.
42004026	Gɔd nɔ sɛn Ila yja to ɛni wan pan dɛn uman ya, pas to Zare fat we bin de na Saydɔn.
42004027	Da tɛm we Ila ysha bin de na Izrɛl, plɛnti pipul we bin gɛt bad sik na dɛn skin bin de na Izrɛl, bɔt nɔto dɛn ɔl i mɛn, na Neman nɔmɔ we kɔmɔt Sirya, i mɛn.”
42004028	Wɛn di pipul dɛn we bin de na di Ju mitin os yɛri dat, dɛn ɔl vɛks.
42004029	Dɛn grap ɛn drɛb Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di tɔng. Dɛn drɔ am go ɔp ɔp di il we dɛn tɔng bin de pan ɛn dɛn bin want push am mek i fɔdɔm go dɔng di il.
42004030	Bɔt Jizɔs pas midul dɛn ɛn go.
42004031	Jizɔs go Kepanyɔm we de na Galili. I bin de lan di pipul dɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo.
42004032	Ɔl di pipul dɛn wɔnda bikɔs Jizɔs bin de lan dɛn lɛkɛ pɔsin we gɛt di rayt fɔ lan pipul dɛn tin ya.
42004033	Wan man bin tap na di Ju mitin os we bin gɛt dɛbul insay am. I ala big wan se,
42004034	“Jizɔs, we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, us biznɛs yu gɛt wit wi? Yu kam ya fɔ kil wi? A no udat na yu, a no se yu kɔmɔt to Gɔd ɛn yu dɔn gi Gɔd yu layf fɔ tru.”
42004035	Jizɔs tɔk pan di dɛbul. I se, “Lɛf fɔ tɔk ɛn kɔmɔt insay dis man!” Di dɛbul ib di man na grɔn bifo di pipul dɛn ɛn kɔmɔt insay am, bɔt i nɔ du di man natin.
42004036	Dɛn ɔl wɔnda ɛn bigin tɔk se, “Uskayn wɔd dɛn wan ya? Dis man de tɔk lɛkɛ pɔsin we gɛt di rayt ɛn pawa fɔ tɛl di dɛbul dɛn wetin dɛn fɔ du ɛn dɛn de kɔmɔt wantɛm!”
42004037	Pipul bigin tɔk ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej we de klos da eria de bɔt di wɔnda ful wok we Jizɔs du.
42004038	Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di Ju mitin os, i go na Saymɔn in os. Saymɔn in mɔdɛnlɔ bin gɛt ay fiva. Dɛn beg Jizɔs fɔ mɛn di sik uman.
42004039	Jizɔs go tinap klos di bed ɛn tɛl di fiva mek i kɔmɔt pan di uman. Di fiva kɔmɔt pan am ɛn di uman grap wantɛm ɛn go fɛn sɔntin fɔ dɛn fɔ it.
42004040	Da sem de de, ivintɛm, dɛn bin bring pipul we bin gɛt ɔl kayn sik kam to Jizɔs. I le in an pan ɔl di sik pipul dɛn ed, wan bay wan, ɛn dɛn ɔl wɛl.
42004041	Dɛbul dɛn bin kɔmɔt pan plɛnti pipul ɛn ala se, “Fɔ tru, yu na Gɔd in Pikin.” Jizɔs tɔk pan di dɛbul dɛn fɔ mek dɛn sɛt mɔt ɛn i nɔ gri mek dɛn tɔk natin, bikɔs dɛn bin no se in na di Mɛsaya.
42004042	Wɛn do klin, Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di tɔng go na wan ples we pipul nɔ de. Di pipul dɛn we i bin de wit bigin luk fɔ am ɔlɔbɔt. Wɛn dɛn si am, dɛn tɛl am mek i nɔ lɛf dɛn go igen.
42004043	Bɔt Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se in fɔ go na dɛn ɔda tɔng fɔ tɛl dɛn ɔda pipul di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd in rul bikɔs na dat Gɔd sɛn am fɔ kam du na wɔl.
42004044	Jizɔs bin de go na ɔl dɛn Ju mitin os, na Judia, de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus.
42005001	Wan de, Jizɔs bin tinap nia di lek we dɛn kɔl Gɛnɛzarɛt. Di pipul dɛn bin de shub kam klos am fɔ yɛri Gɔd in wɔd we i bin de tɔk.
42005002	Jizɔs si tu bot klos di bich, bɔt di fisha man dɛn nɔ bin de insay, dɛn bin de was dɛn fishin nɛt na di bich.
42005003	Jizɔs go na Saymɔn Pita in bot ɛn tɛl am mek i mek di bot kɔmɔt klos di sho lili bit. Jizɔs sidɔm insay di bot ɛn bigin lan di pipul dɛn.
42005004	Wɛn i dɔn lan dɛn dɔn, i tɛl Saymɔn Pita se, mek dɛn go wit di bot na di dip say na di wata ɛn sɛn dɛn nɛt dɔng de mek dɛn go kech fish.
42005005	Saymɔn Pita se, “Masta, wi dɔn wok tra nga ol nɛt ɛn wi nɔ kech natin, bɔt as na so yu se, a go sɛn di nɛt.”
42005006	Dɛn sɛn di nɛt ɛn kech fish sote dɛn nɛt bin want chɛr,
42005007	so dɛn kɔl dɛn kɔmpin dɛn we bin de na di ɔda bot fɔ kam ɛp dɛn. Wɛn dɛn kam, dɛnsɛf ful dɛn bot. Ɔl tu di bot dɛn ful sote dɛn want sink.
42005008	Wɛn Saymɔn Pita si wetin bi, i butu bifo Jizɔs ɛn ol in fut. I se, “Masta, kɔmɔt klos mi bikɔs mi na man we de pan sin!”
42005009	Wɛn Saymɔn Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn si aw di fish we dɛn kech plɛnti, dɛn wɔnda.
42005010	Jems ɛn Jɔn we na Zɛbidi in pikin dɛn we bin de wok wit Saymɔn, dɛnsɛf wɔnda. Jizɔs se, “Saymɔn, nɔ fred! Frɔm tide sote go, yu go bring pipul kam to mi lɛkɛ aw yu bin de kech fish.”
42005011	We dɛn dɔn drɔ dɛn bot kam na di bich, dɛn lɛf ɔltin we dɛn bin gɛt biɛn, ɛn fala Jizɔs.
42005012	Wan de, Jizɔs bin go na wan tɔng; i mit wan man we bin gɛt bad sik na in skin. Wɛn di man si Jizɔs, i fɔdɔm na grɔn ɛn beg am se, “Masta, if yu gri fɔ mɛn mi, yu ebul mɛn mi ɛn mek a klin.”
42005013	Jizɔs tret in an ɛn tɔch di man. I se, “A want mɛn yu. Wɛl naw!” Di bad sik kɔmɔt pan di man in skin wantɛm.
42005014	Jizɔs se, “Nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi se a dɔn mɛn yu! Go wantɛm to di man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin mek i luk yu ɛn mek di sakri fays we Mozis bin tɛl pipul fɔ mek. Dat go mek ɔlman no se yu dɔn wɛl.”
42005015	Ɔlman yɛri ɔl wetin Jizɔs de du. Plɛnti pipul kam fɔ yɛri Jizɔs ɛn fɔ mek i mɛn dɛn.
42005016	Bɔt plɛnti tɛm Jizɔs kin lɛf di pipul dɛn go fawe fɔ pre.
42005017	Wan de we Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn, sɔm dɛn Faresi ɛn sɔm dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha bin sidɔm de; dɛn bin kɔmɔt ɔlɔbɔt na Galili, Judia, ɛn Jerusɛlɛm. Gɔd in pawa bin de pan Jizɔs fɔ mɛn sik pipul.
42005018	Sɔm pipul tot wan man we para layz na mata. Dɛn kɛr am go na di os we Jizɔs bin de fɔ le am na grɔn bifo Jizɔs.
42005019	Dɛn bin want go insay di os wit di man, bɔt pipul bin plɛnti na di os, so di pipul dɛn nɔ bin ebul kɛr di sik man go insay. Dɛn klem pantap di os wit di sik man. Dɛn pul wan pat pan di ruf, dɔn dɛn sɛn di man go dɔng to Jizɔs midul di pipul dɛn.
42005020	Wɛn Jizɔs si se di pipul dɛn we bring di sik man biliv se in go mɛn di man, Jizɔs tɛl di sik man se, “Padi, Gɔd dɔn padin yu sin dɛn.”
42005021	Di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn ɛn di Faresi dɛn bigin grɔmbul se, “Udat na dis man we de pwɛl Gɔd in nem we i de mek insɛf lɛkɛ Gɔd? Nɔbɔdi nɔ de we ebul padin pɔsin in sin; na Gɔd wan gren ebul du dat!”
42005022	Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de tink, so i se, “Wetin mek una de tink se wetin a du nɔ rayt?
42005023	Pan dɛn tu tin ya, uswan tra nga fɔ tɔk pas ɔl, ‘Gɔd dɔn padin yu sin dɛn,’ ɔ ‘Grap, tek yu mata, waka go na yu os?’
42005024	A go sho una se Mɔta lman Pikin gɛt pawa na dis wɔl fɔ padin pɔsin sin.” So Jizɔs tɔk to di man we para layz. I se, “Grap, tek yu mata ɛn go na yu os.”
42005025	Aw ɔlman de luk, di man grap wantɛm, kapu in mata ɛn bigin waka go na in os, de prez Gɔd.
42005026	Ɔlman wɔnda, dɛn fred, so dɛnsɛf bigin fɔ prez Gɔd. Dɛn se, “Wi dɔn si wɔnda tide!”
42005027	We Jizɔs dɔn mɛn di man, i go na do. Na de i si wan man we de gɛda taks; i bin nem Livay. I bin sidɔm na in ɔfis. Jizɔs tɛl am mek i kam fala am.
42005028	Livay grap, i lɛf ɔltin ɛn fala Jizɔs.
42005029	Livay mek dɛn kuk big it na in os fɔ Jizɔs. Plɛnti pipul we bin de gɛda taks ɛn sɔm ɔda pipul dɛn bin de na di os ɛn dɛn ɔl bin sidɔm de it.
42005030	Sɔm Faresi ɛn sɔm pan dɛn yon Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn bigin grɔmbul pan Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn. Dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de it ɛn drink wit dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks ɛn dɛn ɔda pipul we nɔ fit fɔ miks wit Ju pipul?”
42005031	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Nɔto dɛn pipul we wɛl gɛt fɔ go to dɔkta, na dɛn pipul we sik.
42005032	A nɔ kam fɔ tɛl dɛn pipul we de du wetin di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se fɔ chenj dɛn layf, a kam fɔ tɛl dɛn wan we de pan sin fɔ mek dɛn chenj dɛn layf.”
42005033	Sɔm pipul go tɔk to Jizɔs. Dɛn se, “Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn de kip fast ɛn pre ɔltɛm, ɛn na so di Faresi dɛn lanin bɔy dɛn de du, bɔt yu yon dɛn jɛs de it ɛn drink.”
42005034	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wɛn una kɔl pipul kam na mared pati, una go tɛl dɛn mek dɛn nɔ it di tɛm we di ɔkɔ de wit dɛn?
42005035	Di tɛm de kam we pipul go kɛr di ɔkɔ go ɛn i nɔ go de wit dɛn igen; na da tɛm de dɛn go fast.”
42005036	Jizɔs pul wan pare bul. I se: “Nɔbɔdi nɔ de tek pisis we i chɛr kɔmɔt pan nyu klos fɔ pach ol klos; if i du so, i go mek ol pan di nyu klos we go pwɛl am, ɛn pantap dat, di ol klos go luk bad pas aw i bin tan, bikɔs di pisis we i chɛr kɔmɔt pan di nyu klos nɔ go bi di sem lɛkɛ di ol wan.
42005037	Nɔbɔdi nɔ go tek ol tin we dɛn tek bif kanda mek lɛkɛ bɔtul, put nyu wayn insay, if i du dat, di nyu wayn go bɔs di bif kanda ɛn di wayn go wes.
42005038	Dɛn fɔ put nyu wayn insay nyu bɔtul.
42005039	Wɛn pɔsin dɔn drink ol wayn, i nɔ go want drink nyu wayn. I go se, ‘Di ol wan bɛtɛ!’ ”
42006001	Wan de we di Ju dɛn kin pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn bin de pas midul wan kɔn fam. Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn brok sɔm pan di kɔn, pul dɛn kanda, ɛn it dɛn.
42006002	Sɔm pan di Faresi dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de du tin we di Ju Lɔ se wi nɔ fɔ du di de fɔ pre ɛn blo?”
42006003	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Una nɔ rid wetin King Devid bin du wɛn in ɛn dɛn wan we bin de wit am bin angri?
42006004	I go insay Gɔd in Os, tek di bred we dɛn bin put bifo Gɔd, it am ɛn gi dɛn wan we bin de wit am sɔm fɔ it, pan ɔl we di Ju Lɔ se nɔbɔdi nɔ fɔ it da bred de pas dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.”
42006005	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Mɔta lman Pikin na Masta fɔ di de fɔ pre ɛn blo.”
42006006	Wan ɔda de fɔ pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs go insay wan Ju mitin os ɛn lan di pipul dɛn. Wan man bin lib de we in raytan bin day.
42006007	Sɔm dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn Faresi bin de wach Jizɔs fɔ si if i go mɛn di man di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, so dat dɛn kin blem am na kot.
42006008	Bɔt Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de mekɔp, so i tɛl di man we in an day se, “Kam, tinap naya!” Di man grap, go tinap midul di ples.
42006009	Jizɔs se, “Mek a aks una sɔntin. Wetin wi Lɔ want wi fɔ du di de fɔ pre ɛn blo? Fɔ du gud ɔ fɔ du bad? Fɔ sev layf ɔ fɔ kil?”
42006010	Jizɔs luk dɛn insay dɛn yay wan bay wan, dɛn i tɛl di man we in an day se, “Es yu an, tret am!” Di man du wetin Jizɔs tɛl am ɛn di an we bin day wɛl lɛkɛ di ɔda an.
42006011	Di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn ɛn di Faresi dɛn vɛks bad ɛn bigin tɛl dɛn kɔmpin wetin dɛn go du Jizɔs fɔ kech am.
42006012	Wan ɔda tɛm, Jizɔs bin go ɔp wan il fɔ pre. I pre ol nɛt to Gɔd.
42006013	Wɛn do klin, Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn pik twɛlv pan dɛn we i kɔl apɔsul.
42006014	I pik: Saymɔn (we i gi nem Pita) ɛn in brɔda Andru; Jems ɛn Jɔn, Filip ɛn Bata lo myu,
42006015	Matyu ɛn Tɔmɔs, Jems we na bin Alfiɔs in pikin, ɛn Saymɔn we bin de fɛt fɔ fri in pipul dɛn,
42006016	Judas we na bin Jems in pikin, ɛn Judas Iskariɔt we sɛl Jizɔs.
42006017	Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt ɔp di il kam dɔng wit in apɔsul dɛn, i go tinap na di lɛvul grɔn wit plɛnti in ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn. Plɛnti pipul bin kam gɛda de, sɔm pan dɛn pipul ya bin kɔmɔt Judia, sɔm bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn sɔm bin kɔmɔt na dɛn tɔng we de klos di wata na Taya ɛn Saydɔn.
42006018	Dɛn bin kam fɔ yɛri Gɔd in wɔd ɛn fɔ mek Jizɔs mɛn dɛn. Jizɔs mɛn dɛn wan we dɛbul bin de insay.
42006019	Ɔl di pipul dɛn bin de tray fɔ tɔch Jizɔs bikɔs pawa bin de kɔmɔt pan am we mɛn dɛn ɔl.
42006020	Jizɔs luk in lanin bɔy dɛn, dɛn i bigin tɔk to dɛn. I se: “Una gɛt blɛsin, una dɛn po pipul, bikɔs Gɔd de rul una!
42006021	“Una gɛt blɛsin, una we angri naw, bikɔs una go gɛt ɔl wetin una fɔ gɛt! “Una gɛt blɛsin, una we de kray naw, bikɔs wan de una go laf!
42006022	“Una gɛt blɛsin wɛn mɔta lman nɔ lɛk una ɛn dɛn nɔ want gɛt ɛni tin fɔ du wit una, ɛn wɛn dɛn de kɔs una ɛn tɔk bad bɔt una, bikɔs una biliv Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn una de fala am!
42006023	Una fɔ gladi wɛn dat bi, una fɔ dans ɛn jomp bikɔs una go gɛt big pe we Gɔd dɔn kip fɔ una na ɛvin! Dɛn pipul we de du una dɛn tin ya, na so dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du di prɔfɛt dɛn.
42006024	“Bɔt waala go kam pan una we jɛntri naw, una dɔn gɛt ɔl di tin dɛn we dɔn mek una gladi!
42006025	“Waala go kam pan una we gɛt ɔl wetin una want naw, bikɔs tɛm de kam we una go angri! “Waala go kam pan una we de laf naw, bikɔs tɛm de kam we una go kray bita wan!
42006026	“Waala go kam pan una wɛn ɔlman de tɔk gud bɔt una; na so dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du di lay prɔfɛt dɛn.
42006027	“Bɔt a de tɛl una we de lisin mi se, una fɔ lɛk dɛn wan we de fɛt una ɛn una fɔ du gud to dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk una.
42006028	Una fɔ blɛs dɛn wan we de kɔs una ɛn pre fɔ dɛn wan we de trit una bad.
42006029	If ɛnibɔdi slap yu na wan jɔ, yu fɔ tɔn di ɔda wan gi am fɔ mek i slap insɛf. If ɛnibɔdi tek yu klos we yu wɛr pantap, yu fɔ gi am di wan we de bɔtɔm, mek i tek insɛf.
42006030	If ɛnibɔdi aks yu fɔ ɛni tin, yu fɔ gi am, ɛn if ɛnibɔdi tek tin we na yu yon, yu nɔ fɔ aks am fɔ gi yu bak.
42006031	Dɛn tin we una want mek ɔda pipul du to una, na in una fɔ du to dɛn.
42006032	“If na dɛn wan we lɛk una nɔmɔ una lɛk, una fɔ gɛt prez fɔ dat? Dɛn pipul we bad sɛf, lɛk dɛn wan we lɛk dɛn!
42006033	If una du gud to dɛn pipul nɔmɔ we de du una gud, wetin du una fɔ gɛt prez fɔ dat? Dɛn bad pipul sɛf de du dat.
42006034	If una de lɛn dɛn wan we una no se go pe una, wetin du una fɔ gɛt prez fɔ dat? Dɛn bad pipul sɛf de lɛn dɛn kɔmpin bikɔs dɛn abop se dɛn go gɛt wetin dɛn lɛn, bak!
42006035	Una fɔ lɛk dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk una ɛn du dɛn gud. Wɛn una de lɛn pɔsin sɔntin, una nɔ fɔ abop se i go gi una bak; da tɛm de una go gɛt big blɛsin fɔ dat ɛn una go bi Gɔd we pas ɔl, in pikin dɛn. Gɔd gud to pɔsin we nɔ de tɛl tɛnki ɛn to pɔsin we wikɛd.
42006036	Una fɔ sɔri fɔ pipul lɛkɛ aw una Papa Gɔd de sɔri fɔ ɔlman.
42006037	“Una nɔ jɔj ɔda pipul ɛn Gɔd insɛf nɔ go jɔj una. Una nɔ kɔndɛm ɔda pipul ɛn Gɔd insɛf nɔ go kɔndɛm una. Una padin ɔda pipul ɛn Gɔd insɛf go padin una.
42006038	Una gi ɛn Gɔd insɛf go gi una, ɛn dɛn tin we i gi una, go so plɛnti, i go jɛs tan lɛkɛ wɛn dɛn ful kitul wit sɔntin, dɛn prɛs am, dɛn shek am ɛn i rɔnoba. If una gi plɛnti, Gɔd go gi una plɛnti; if una nɔ gi plɛnti, Gɔd nɔ go gi una plɛnti.”
42006039	Jizɔs pul wan pare bul, i se: “Blɛnyay pɔsin nɔ go ebul sho in kɔmpin rod, dɛn ɔl tu go fɔdɔm insay gɔta.
42006040	Pɔsin we de lan nɔ pas di wan we de lan am, bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lan ɔl wetin i fɔ lan, gud, go sabi lɛkɛ di pɔsin we lan am.
42006041	“Wetin mek yu de si smɔl tik we fiba lɛkɛ di wan we de go insay pɔsin finga na yu kɔmpin in yay, bɔt yu nɔ de si da big tik we fiba bod we dɛn de tek bil os na yu yon yay?
42006042	Aw yu go tɛl yu kɔmpin se, ‘Padi, kam mek a pul da smɔl tik de na yu yay’ we yusɛf nɔ de si di big tik na yu yon yay? Yu ipo krit! Go pul di big tik we de na yu yon yay fɔs, so dat yu go ebul si klia wan fɔ pul di smɔl tik we de na yu kɔmpin in yay.
42006043	“Gud tik nɔ de bia bad tin fɔ it ɛn tik we nɔ gud nɔ de bia gud tin fɔ it.
42006044	Yu go no if tik gud ɔ i nɔ gud bay di tin we i de bia. Pɔsin nɔ go pik fig pan tik we gɛt chu kchuk, ɛn pɔsin nɔ go pik greps pan bush we gɛt chu kchuk.
42006045	Gud pɔsin de du gud bikɔs gud de na in at ɛn bad pɔsin de du bad bikɔs na bad ful na in at. Wetin de na pɔsin in at, we i de mɛmba ɔltɛm, na in de kɔmɔt na in mɔt.
42006046	“Wetin mek una de kɔl mi ‘Masta, Masta,’ bɔt una nɔ de du wetin a tɛl una?
42006047	Ɛnibɔdi we kam to mi ɛn yɛri mi wɔd ɛn du wetin a tɛl am, tan lɛkɛ di pɔsin we a de kam tɛl una bɔt naw.
42006048	I tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we de bil os. I dig di grɔn go dɔng dɔng ɛn le di fawndeshɔn pan akpata bifo i bigin bil. Plɛnti plɛnti wata kam ɔp te i rich di os, agbara bɔs pan di os, bɔt natin nɔ du di os bikɔs dɛn bin bil di os gud.
42006049	Bɔt di pɔsin we yɛri mi wɔd ɛn i nɔ du wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, tan lɛkɛ wan man we bil in os, i nɔ le fawndeshɔn; i nɔ bɔda fɔ dig bifo i bigin bil. Wɛn plɛnti plɛnti wata kam ɔp te i rich di os ɛn agbara bɔs pan di os, di os fɔdɔm ɛn brok pata pata!”
42007001	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk to di pipul dɛn dɔn, i go na Kepanyɔm.
42007002	Wan bigman we na bin ɔfisa na di Roman ami bin gɛt lɛkɛ wan ɔndrɛd soja man ɔnda am. In bɔy we i bin lɛk bad bin sik sote i want day.
42007003	Wɛn di Roman ɔfisa yɛri bɔt Jizɔs, i go mit sɔm Ju big man dɛn ɛn sɛn dɛn to Jizɔs fɔ lɛ dɛn beg am fɔ kam mɛn in bɔy.
42007004	Wɛn dɛn Ju bigman ya mit Jizɔs, dɛn bigin beg am, dɛn se, “Duya, wi beg, sa, kam mɛn dis ɔfisa in bɔy bikɔs na gud man.
42007005	I lɛk wi Ju pipul dɛn ɛn na insɛf bil wi Ju mitin os fɔ wi.”
42007006	Jizɔs fala dɛn go te i rich klos di Roman ɔfisa in os. Na in di ɔfisa sɛn in padi dɛn wit mɛsej fɔ Jizɔs; i se, “Masta, nɔ wɔri fɔ kam na mi os igen, bikɔs a nɔ fit fɔ mek yu kam insay mi os;
42007007	a nɔ fit fɔ go klos yu. If yu jɛs tɔk wan wɔd nɔmɔ, mi bɔy go wɛl.
42007008	Misɛf na pɔsin we gɛt bigman dɛn we gɛt pawa oba mi ɛn a gɛt soja man dɛn we de ɔnda mi. A kin tɛl wan se, ‘Go!’ ɛn i kin go; a kin tɛl ɔda wan se, ‘Kam!’ ɛn i kin kam; ɛn a kin tɛl mi bɔy se, ‘Du dis wok!’ ɛn i kin du am.”
42007009	Wɛn Jizɔs yɛri ɔl wetin di ɔfisa tɔk, i wɔnda. Na in i tɔn to di pipul dɛn we bin de fala am ɛn se, “A de tɛl una, a nɔ si pɔsin na Izrɛl wande we biliv Gɔd tra nga wan so lɛkɛ dis man.”
42007010	Wɛn di mɛse nja dɛn tɔn bak go na di Roman ɔfisa in os, dɛn mit di bɔy dɔn wɛl.
42007011	I nɔ te afta dat, Jizɔs go na wan tɔng we dɛn de kɔl Nen. Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul bin fala am go na di tɔng.
42007012	As dɛn rich na di get dɛn mit plɛnti pipul de go bɛr wan man. Di dayman in mama na uman we in man bin dɔn day ɛn na da wan gren bɔy pikin de i bin gɛt. Plɛnti pipul na di tɔng bin de fala di uman we gɛt di bɛrin.
42007013	Wɛn di Masta si di uman, i sɔri fɔ am, i se, “Nɔ kray ya!”
42007014	Wɛn Jizɔs tɔch di kɔfin, di man dɛn we bin tot di kɔfin tinap. Jizɔs tɛl di dedebɔdi se, “Bɔbɔ, grap!”
42007015	Di bɔbɔ we bin dɔn day grap sidɔm ɛn bigin tɔk. Jizɔs se, “Mami, luk yu pikin!”
42007016	Ɔl di pipul dɛn fred ɛn bigin prez Gɔd. Dɛn se, “Wi dɔn si prɔfɛt we gɛt pawa! Gɔd dɔn kam fɔ sev in pipul dɛn!”
42007017	Dis nyus bɔt Jizɔs prɛd ɔlsay na Judia ɛn dɛn kɔntri we de klos Judia.
42007018	Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn go tɛl Jɔn ɔl wetin bi.
42007019	Jɔn kɔl tu pan in yon lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn sɛn dɛn go to di Masta fɔ aks am if in na di pɔsin we in bin de tɔk se go kam ɔ if dɛn fɔ luk rod fɔ ɔda pɔsin.
42007020	Wɛn dɛn man ya kam to Jizɔs, dɛn se, “Jɔn we de baptayz sɛn wi fɔ aks yu if yu na di pɔsin we i bin de tɔk se go kam ɔ if wi fɔ luk rod fɔ ɔda pɔsin, sa?”
42007021	Da sem tɛm de, Jizɔs bin de mɛn plɛnti pipul; i mek dɛn wan we sik wɛl, i drɛb dɛbul kɔmɔt insay sɔm pipul, ɛn i mek plɛnti dɛn blɛnyay pipul si.
42007022	I tɛl Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una tɔn bak go tɛl Jɔn ɔl wetin unasɛf dɔn si ɛn wetin una dɔn yɛri; dɛn blɛnyay pipul de si, dɛn pipul we nɔ bin ebul waka, de waka, dɛn wan we gɛt bad sik na dɛn skin dɔn wɛl, dɛn dɛf pipul dɔn yɛri, dɛn dayman dɔn gɛt layf bak, ɛn dɛn po pipul dɔn yɛri di Gud Nyus.
42007023	Dɛn wan we nɔ de dawt mi gɛt blɛsin!”
42007024	Wɛn di mɛse nja dɛn we Jɔn sɛn tɔn bak, Jizɔs bigin fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt Jɔn. I se, “Wɛn una bin go to Jɔn na di dɛzat, wetin una bin want si? Una bin want si gras we de tri mbul we briz de blo?
42007025	If nɔto dat, wetin una bin go fɛn? Na pɔsin we wɛr fayn klos? Nɔ; pipul we wɛr fayn klos we gɛt ɔl wetin dɛn want de na dɛn king os!
42007026	Una tɛl mi sɔntin, wetin una bin want si? Na prɔfɛt? Ɛn una si pɔsin we pas prɔfɛt fawe, fɔ tru.
42007027	Dɛn rayt bɔt Jɔn na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, ‘A go sɛn mi mɛse nja go bifo yu fɔ klia di rod rɛdi fɔ yu!’
42007028	A de tɛl una se Jɔn pas ɔl mɔta lman, bɔt di pɔsin we gɛt lili rɛspɛkt pas ɔl dɛn wan we Gɔd de rul, pas Jɔn!”
42007029	Wɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks yɛri wetin Jɔn tɔk, dɛn gri se wetin Gɔd want, rayt, ɛn dɛn mek Jɔn baptayz dɛn.
42007030	Bɔt di Faresi dɛn ɛn di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn nɔ gri fɔ du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du ɛn dɛn nɔ gri mek Jɔn baptayz dɛn.
42007031	Jizɔs se, “Wetin a go tek kɔmpia dɛn tide pipul ya? Aw dɛn tan?
42007032	Dɛn tide pipul ya tan lɛkɛ pikin dɛn we sidɔm na makit os de ple, ɛn ala kɔl dɛn kɔmpin ɛn tɛl dɛn se, ‘Wi dɔn bit drɔm fɔ una, bɔt una nɔ gri dans! Wi dɔn sing bɛrin sing fɔ una, bɔt una nɔ pul wata na una yay!’
42007033	Wɛn Jɔn we de baptayz bin kam, i bin de fast ɛn i nɔ bin de drink wayn, bɔt una se, ‘Jɔn gɛt dɛbul.’
42007034	Naw we Mɔta lman Pikin kam, i de it ɛn drink ɛn una se, ‘Luk da awangɔt ɛn drɔnk man! I mek padi wit dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks ɛn dɛn Ju pipul we nɔ de kip di Ju Lɔ aw dɛn fɔ kip am!’
42007035	Dɛn wan we de du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du go sho se na Gɔd gɛt sɛns fɔ tru.”
42007036	Wan Faresi kɔl Jizɔs fɔ go it na in os. Jizɔs gri ɛn fala di Faresi go na in os.
42007037	Wan uman bin de na di tɔng we bin liv fri layf. Wɛn di uman yɛri se Jizɔs de it na di Faresi in os, i kɛr wan wayt ston bɔtul we bin ful wit fayn fayn dia sɛnt, go na di os.
42007038	Di uman go butu klos Jizɔs in fut ɛn bigin kray bita wan saful saful. Di wata we kɔmɔt na in yay sok Jizɔs in fut. I tek in ia wep Jizɔs in fut, dɔn i kis Jizɔs in fut fɔ sho se in rɛspɛkt am, dɔn i tek di sɛnt na di bɔtul ɛn rɔb ɔl na Jizɔs in fut.
42007039	Wɛn di Faresi we kɔl Jizɔs kam na in os fɔ kam it si wetin bi, i wɔnda, i tɔk na in at se, “If dis man na bin prɔfɛt, fɔ tru, i bin fɔ no uskayn uman de ol am so, bikɔs na uman we de pan fri layf.”
42007040	Jizɔs tɔk to di Faresi. I se, “Saymɔn, a gɛt sɔntin fɔ tɛl yu.” Di man ansa Jizɔs se, “Masta, wetin yu want tɛl mi, sa?”
42007041	Jizɔs se, “Wan man we bin de lɛn pipul kɔpɔ bin de; tu pipul bin gɛt fɔ pe am. Wan bin gɛt fɔ pe am fayv ɔndrɛd silva kɔpɔ ɛn di ɔda wan bin gɛt fɔ pe am fifti silva kɔpɔ.
42007042	Dɛn ɔl tu nɔ bin ebul fɔ pe am, so i lɛf di mɔni gi dɛn ɔl tu. Pan dɛn tu pipul ya, uswan go lɛk di man we bin lɛn dɛn mɔni pas in kɔmpin?”
42007043	Saymɔn ansa Jizɔs se, “A tink se na di man we i bin lɛn plɛnti kɔpɔ pas in kɔmpin.” Jizɔs se, “Yu rayt.”
42007044	Jizɔs luk to di uman in pat wɛn i stil de tɔk to Saymɔn. I se, “Yu si wetin dis uman de du fɔ mi, nɔto so? A kam na yu os, yu nɔ gi mi wata sɛf fɔ was mi fut, bɔt dis uman ya dɔn kray pan mi fut te dɛn dɔn sok ɛn na in ia i tek wep dɛn.
42007045	Wɛn a kam na yu os, yu nɔ kis mi sɛf, bɔt frɔm we a kam, dis uman jɛs de kis mi fut.
42007046	Yu nɔ rɔb gris sɛf na mi ed, bɔt dis uman dɔn rɔb fayn sɛnt pan mi fut.
42007047	A de tɛl yu se, di tin we dis uman du we sho se i lɛk mi bad pruv se Gɔd dɔn padin in plɛnti sin dɛn. Pɔsin we nɔ sin plɛnti, we Gɔd dɔn padin, nɔ go lɛk mi bɛtɛ.”
42007048	Jizɔs tɔn to di uman. I se, “Gɔd dɔn padin yu sin dɛn!”
42007049	Dɛn pipul we bin de it wit Jizɔs bigin tɔk se, “Uskayn man dis we de padin pɔsin fɔ in sin?”
42007050	Jizɔs se, “Uman, bikɔs yu biliv pan mi, Gɔd dɔn sev yu. Saful ya, go wit kol at!”
42008001	I nɔ tu te, Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go na dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej go tɛl di pipul dɛn di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd in rul.
42008002	Sɔm uman dɛn bin de wit Jizɔs; na uman dɛn we Jizɔs bin dɔn mɛn, sɔm bin sik ɛn sɔm bin gɛt dɛbul. Sɔm pan dɛn uman ya na bin Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala, da uman we Jizɔs pul sɛvin dɛbul kɔmɔt pan;
42008003	Joana, we in man we nem Chuza, bin de wok fɔ Ɛrɔd; wit Suzana ɛn plɛnti ɔda uman dɛn we bin de pul pan wetin dɛn gɛt gi Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn.
42008004	Bɔku pipul kɔmɔt na ɔl dɛn tɔng fɔ kam yɛri Jizɔs. Na de Jizɔs pul wan pare bul, i se:
42008005	“Wan fama bin de plant sid. Wɛn i de skata di sid dɛn, sɔm fɔdɔm na di rod; pipul mas sɔm ɛn dɛn bɔd it sɔm.
42008006	Sɔm fɔdɔm pan sto nston. Dɛn bɔs ɛn bigin fɔ gro bɔt dɛn wida ɛn day bikɔs di grɔn nɔ bin gɛt wata.
42008007	Sɔm fɔdɔm pan chu kchuk bush. Di chu kchuk bush gro ɛn kɔba di tin we bɔs.
42008008	Sɔm sid fɔdɔm na gud grɔn, dɛn gro ɛn bia plɛnti plɛnti.” Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn pul dis pare bul dɔn, i se, “Udat gɛt yes fɔ yɛri, mek i yɛri.”
42008009	Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn aks am wetin di pare bul we i pul, min.
42008010	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Gɔd dɔn gi una di chans fɔ no dɛn sikrit tin bɔt Gɔd in rul, bɔt fɔ dɛn ɔda pipul na pare bul a de pul, so dat dɛn go luk bɔt dɛn nɔ go si; dɛn go yɛri, bɔt dɛn nɔ go ɔnda stand.
42008011	“Na di pare bul in minin dis: Di sid dɛn na Gɔd in wɔd.
42008012	Dɛn sid we fɔdɔm na di rod na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd; Setan kam pul di wɔd kɔmɔt na dɛn at fɔ mek dɛn nɔ go biliv Gɔd we de sev dɛn.
42008013	Dɛn sid we fɔdɔm pan sto nston na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd; dɛn gladi ɛn biliv am, bɔt dɛn tan lɛkɛ tin we fɔ gro bɔt we nɔ gɛt rut; dɛn kin biliv fɔs, bɔt wɛn Setan tray dɛn lili bit nɔmɔ, dɛn nɔba biliv igen.
42008014	Dɛn wan we fɔdɔm pan chu kchuk bush na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd bɔt waala, jɛntri, ɛn ɛnjɔymɛnt na wɔl kil di wɔd na dɛn at ɛn mek dɛn nɔ ebul du plɛnti tin fɔ Gɔd.
42008015	Dɛn sid we fɔdɔm na gud grɔn na dɛn pipul we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd; dɛn kip di wɔd na dɛn at ɛn du wetin Gɔd in wɔd se. Dɛn nɔ tap fɔ biliv pan ɔl we Setan tray dɛn ɛn dɛn mek plɛnti ɔda pipul biliv.
42008016	“Nɔbɔdi nɔ de layt lamp ɛn kɔba am ɔ put am ɔnda tebul. I de put am pantap tebul fɔ mek ɔlman we de kam insay di os go si.
42008017	“Natin nɔ de we ayd we pɔsin nɔ go no bɔt ɛn natin nɔ de we pɔsin du na dak, we nɔ go kɔmɔt na layt.
42008018	“Una tek tɛm lisin. Ɛnibɔdi we gɛt sɔntin, Gɔd go gi am mɔ; bɔt pɔsin we nɔ gɛt, di lili bit sɛf we i tink se in gɛt, Gɔd go tek am.”
42008019	Jizɔs in mama ɛn in brɔda dɛn kam to am bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ebul go klos am bikɔs pipul bin plɛnti rawnd am.
42008020	Sɔmbɔdi tɛl Jizɔs se, “Yu mama ɛn yu brɔda dɛn de na do, dɛn want si yu.”
42008021	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Na dɛn wan we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd ɛn du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du, na dɛn na mi mama ɛn mi brɔda dɛn.”
42008022	Wan de, Jizɔs go insay wan bot wit in lanin bɔy dɛn. I tɛl dɛn mek dɛn krɔs di wata go oba say.
42008023	Wɛn di bot de go, Jizɔs bin de slip insay di bot. Wantɛm, big briz bigin blo we mek wata ful insay di bot te i want sink.
42008024	Na in di lanin bɔy dɛn go wek Jizɔs. Dɛn ala se, “Masta, Masta, na day wi de day so!” Jizɔs grap, i tɛl di big briz ɛn di swɛlin dɛn fɔ stɛdi; na de di briz tap fɔ blo wantɛm ɛn di swɛlin dɛn go dɔng.
42008025	Jizɔs aks in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Wetin mek una nɔ biliv pan Gɔd?” Ɔl di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda, dɛn fred, dɛn bigin tɔk saful se, “Uskayn man dis? I de tɛl briz ɛn wata wetin dɛn fɔ du ɛn dɛn de du am!”
42008026	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn tek bot krɔs go oba na wan kɔntri we dɛn Gara zi nis pipul bin de. Dis kɔntri ya fesin Galili.
42008027	Wɛn dɛn rich de, wan man we kɔmɔt na di tɔng kam mit Jizɔs. Di man bin gɛt dɛbul insay am. I bin dɔn te we i nɔ wɛr klos. I nɔ bin de na os, na bɛri ngrɔn i bin de slip.
42008028	As di man si Jizɔs, i ala big wan ɛn fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut. I ala se, “Jizɔs, yu we na Gɔd we pas ɔl, in Pikin, wetin yu want du mi? A de beg yu, duya, nɔ mek a sɔfa!”
42008029	Di man tɔk so bikɔs Jizɔs bin dɔn tɛl di dɛbul we bin de insay am fɔ kɔmɔt insay am. Plɛnti tɛm di dɛbul kin fos di man fɔ rɔnawe go na ples we pipul nɔ de. Ilɛk aw dɛn tay in fut ɛn in an dɛn wit ayɛn chen ɛn gyad am, i kin kɔt di chen dɛn ɛn di dɛbul kin mek i rɔnawe.
42008030	Jizɔs aks am se, “Wetin na yu nem?” I ansa Jizɔs se, “A nem Plɛnti, Plɛnti Soja man;” i tɔk dat bikɔs plɛnti dɛbul bin de insay am.
42008031	Di dɛbul dɛn beg Jizɔs fɔ mek i nɔ drɛb dɛn go na di Big Ol.
42008032	Plɛnti ɔg dɛn bin de it na wan il, di dɛbul dɛn beg Jizɔs fɔ mek i sɛn dɛn go insay di ɔg dɛn; Jizɔs gri.
42008033	Di dɛbul dɛn kɔmɔt insay di man ɛn rɔn go insay di ɔg dɛn. Di ɔg dɛn tek spid rɔn dɔng di il go fɔdɔm insay di wata ɛn drawn.
42008034	Wɛn dɛn pipul we bin de mɛn di ɔg dɛn si wetin bi, dɛn rɔn go tɛl ɔlman na di kɔntri.
42008035	Plɛnti pipul rɔn go fɔ go luk. Dɛn mit di man we di dɛbul dɛn kɔmɔt insay sidɔm de lisin to Jizɔs. I wɛr klos ɛn i soba. We di pipul dɛn si dat, dɛn fred.
42008036	Dɛn pipul we bin de we Jizɔs de drɛb di dɛbul dɛn kɔmɔt insay di man, tɛl di ɔda wan dɛn aw Jizɔs drɛb di dɛbul dɛn.
42008037	Ɔl di pipul dɛn na Gara zi nis fred bad, so dɛn tɛl Jizɔs fɔ kɔmɔt na dɛn kɔntri. So Jizɔs go insay di bot ɛn go bak na di ples we i bin kɔmɔt.
42008038	Di man we Jizɔs mɛn beg fɔ fala Jizɔs go. Jizɔs nɔ gri fɔ mek i fala am go. I tɛl am mek
42008039	i go to in pipul dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin Gɔd dɔn du fɔ am. Di man go ɔlɔbɔt na di tɔng ɛn tɛl ɔlman wetin Jizɔs du fɔ am.
42008040	Wɛn Jizɔs rich na di ɔda say, di pipul dɛn kam mit am wit gladi. Dɛn ɔl bin dɔn de wet fɔ mek i kam.
42008041	Wan bigman na di Ju mitin os we nem Jayrɔs, kam fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut ɛn beg am fɔ fala am go na in os.
42008042	Jayrɔs in wan gren gyal pikin we bin ol twɛlv ia, bin dɔn de day. Jizɔs fala Jayrɔs go. Wɛn Jizɔs de go, plɛnti pipul bin de rawnd am, dɛn ɔl bin de go wit am.
42008043	Wan uman bin de na di krawd we bin de blid fɔ twɛlv ia ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ bin ebul mɛn am.
42008044	Di uman go biɛn Jizɔs ɛn tɔch di bɔtɔm pat pan in klos. Wantɛm, wantɛm so, di blid we i de blid, tap.
42008045	Jizɔs aks di pipul dɛn se, “Udat tɔch mi klos?” Nɔbɔdi nɔ ansa am. Na in Pita tɔk se, “Masta, yusɛf si ɔl dɛn pipul ya we de klos yu de push, yu de aks u ol yu?”
42008046	Bɔt Jizɔs se, “Sɔmbɔdi tɔch mi klos. A no dat bikɔs pawa dɔn kɔmɔt pan mi!”
42008047	Di uman we tɔch Jizɔs si se Jizɔs no wetin i du. I bigin tri mbul ɛn kam fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut, ɛn tɔk bifo ɔlman wetin du i tɔch Jizɔs ɛn aw i wɛl as i tɔch Jizɔs so.
42008048	Jizɔs tɛl di uman se, “Mi pikin, bikɔs yu biliv, yu dɔn wɛl. Go naw wit kol at, ya!”
42008049	Wɛn Jizɔs bin de tɔk, Jayrɔs in bɔy kam mit Jayrɔs ɛn tɛl am se in pikin dɔn day so mek i nɔ wɔri Jizɔs igen.
42008050	We Jizɔs yɛri se di pikin dɔn day, i se, “Jayrɔs, nɔ fred, yu jɛs biliv nɔmɔ, yu pikin go grap bak!”
42008051	Wɛn dɛn rich na di os, Jizɔs nɔ gri fɔ mek ɔlman go insay; i kɔl Pita, Jɔn, Jems ɛn di pikin in mama ɛn in papa mek dɛn go insay di os wit am.
42008052	Ɔl di pipul dɛn na di os bin de kray lawd wan fɔ di pikin. Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ kray, di pikin nɔ day, i jɛs de slip.”
42008053	Di pipul dɛn laf Jizɔs bikɔs dɛn bin no se di pikin dɔn day.
42008054	Jizɔs ol di pikin in an ɛn se, “Mi pikin, grap!”
42008055	Wantɛm, wantɛm, layf kam insay di pikin bak ɛn i grap. Jizɔs tɛl dɛn fɔ gi di pikin it.
42008056	Di pikin in mama ɛn in papa wɔnda! Jizɔs tɛl dɛn mek dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin bi.
42009001	Jizɔs kɔl in twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn gi dɛn pawa fɔ drɛb dɛbul ɛn fɔ mɛn ɔl kayn sik.
42009002	I sɛn dɛn go ɔlsay fɔ tɔk bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn fɔ mɛn sik pipul.
42009003	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “We una de go so, una nɔ kɛr natin. Una nɔ kɛr wɔki nstik, bag, it, mɔni, ɛn ɔda klos.
42009004	Ɛni os we dɛn gi una fɔ tap, na de una fɔ de sote una kɔmɔt na da tɔng de.
42009005	If una go na ɛni tɔng we di pipul dɛn nɔ gri lisin to una, una kɔmɔt na da tɔng de, ɛn shek di dɔti we de ɔnda una fut fɔ mek dɛn no se dɛn dɔn du bad.”
42009006	Di lanin bɔy dɛn lɛf Jizɔs go ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn vilej de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus ɛn mɛn sik pipul.
42009007	Wɛn Ɛrɔd we bin de rul na Galili yɛri ɔl wetin de bi, i kɔnfyus bikɔs pipul bin de tɔk se Jɔn we bin de baptayz we bin dɔn day, dɔn kam bak!
42009008	Sɔm pipul se na Ila yja kam bak, ɔda wan dɛn se sɔntɛm na wan pan dɛn lɔntɛm prɔfɛt kam bak.
42009009	Ɛrɔd se, “Amin a bin dɔn kil Jɔn, udat na dis pɔsin we a de yɛri bɔt so igen?” I tray fɔ si Jizɔs.
42009010	Wɛn Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn kam bak, dɛn tɛl am ɔl wetin dɛn du. Jizɔs kɛr dɛn go na wan tɔng we nem Bɛtsa yda fɔ mek dɛn go de to dɛnsɛf.
42009011	Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri se Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn de na Bɛtsa yda, dɛn go mit dɛn de. Jizɔs gladi fɔ si dɛn. I tɛl dɛn bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn i mɛn dɛn pipul we sik.
42009012	Wɛn di ples dɔn de dak, Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn go mit am ɛn tɛl am se, “Masta, mek dɛn pipul ya go na dɛn vilej, ɛn dɛn fam we nɔ fa fɔ fɛn it ɛn ples fɔ slip bikɔs natin nɔ de naya fɔ it ɛn dis na ples we pipul nɔ tap.”
42009013	Jizɔs se, “Una gi dɛn it.” Dɛn ansa Jizɔs se, “Wi nɔ gɛt pas fayv bred ɛn tu fish. Aw wi go manej bay it fɔ ɔl dɛn pipul ya?”
42009014	Na fayv tawzin man dɛn bin lib de. Jizɔs tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una mek di pipul dɛn sidɔm fifti fifti.”
42009015	Di lanin bɔy dɛn mek di pipul dɛn sidɔm lɛkɛ aw Jizɔs tɛl dɛn.
42009016	Jizɔs tek di fayv bred ɛn di tu fish, i luk ɔp na ɛvin ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki fɔ di bred ɛn di fish, dɔn i kɔt kɔt di bred ɛn di fish ɛn gi in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sheb dɛn gi di pipul dɛn.
42009017	Dɛn ɔl it te dɛn bɛlful, dɔn di lanin bɔy dɛn gɛda twɛlv blay pan dɛn af af we lɛf.
42009018	Wan de wɛn Jizɔs in wan bin de pre, in lanin bɔy dɛn bin de wit am. Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Udat pipul dɛn se a bi?”
42009019	Dɛn ansa am se, “Sɔm pipul se yu na Jɔn we bin de baptayz. Ɔda pipul de se yu na Ila yja, sɔm se yu na wan pan dɛn lɔntɛm prɔfɛt we bin dɔn day we dɔn kam bak.”
42009020	Jizɔs aks dɛn bak se, “Wɛl, udat una se a bi?” Pita ansa se, “Yu na di Mɛsaya we Gɔd sɛn!”
42009021	Jizɔs wɔn dɛn tra nga wan mek dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi udat i bi.
42009022	I se, “Dɛn Ju bigman, dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha go mek Gɔd in Pikin sɔfa plɛnti ɛn dɛn go mek lɛkɛ se dɛn nɔ sabi am sɛf. Dɛn go kil am ɛn bɛr am. Bɔt i go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
42009023	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “If ɛnibɔdi want bi mi lanin bɔy, da pɔsin de nɔ fɔ du wetin in want fɔ du nɔmɔ, i fɔ rɛdi fɔ sɔfa ɛn day fɔseka mi ɛvri de ɛn du ɔl wetin a de du.
42009024	Ɛnibɔdi we de tray fɔ sev in layf, go lɔs am; bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lɔs in layf fɔseka mi, go gɛt di tru layf.
42009025	Wetin pɔsin go gen, if i gɛt di ol wɔl ɛn day go ɛl ɛn lɔs di tru layf?
42009026	If ɛnibɔdi de shem fɔ tɔk bɔt mi ɛn wetin a dɔn lan am, Mɔta lman Pikin go shem fɔ da pɔsin de wɛn i kam lɛkɛ King ɛn layt we kɔmɔt ɛvin de shayn pan am; di sem layt we de shayn pan in Papa Gɔd, ɛn pan di enjɛl dɛn.
42009027	A de tɛl una se, sɔm pan di wan dɛn we tinap ya naw nɔ go day sote dɛn no se Gɔd de rul di wɔl, fɔ tru.”
42009028	Wɛn wan wik dɔn pas afta Jizɔs tɔk dɛn wɔd ya, Jizɔs kɔl Pita, Jems ɛn Jɔn fɔ fala am go pre na wan ay il.
42009029	Aw Jizɔs de pre, na in, wantɛm in fes chenj ɛn in klos in kɔla chenj to wayt, we wayt pas sha tin sɛf, ɛn i bin de shayn brayt.
42009030	Aw dɛn de luk, wantɛm dɛn si Jizɔs ɛn tu man de tɔk. Dɛn man ya na bin Mozis ɛn Ila yja.
42009031	Brayt layt bin de rawnd Mozis ɛn Ila yja dɛnsɛf; dɛn bin de tɔk bɔt di day we Jizɔs gɛt fɔ day se na Jerusɛlɛm i go bi.
42009032	Slip bin dɔn kech Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn, so dɛn slip, wɛn dɛn wek dɛn si di brayt layt rawnd Jizɔs ɛn di tu man dɛn we bin tinap wit am.
42009033	Wɛn Mozis ɛn Ila yja want lɛf Jizɔs go, na in Pita se, “Masta, i gud we wi de naya. Lɛ wi bil tri bafa naya; wan fɔ yu, wan fɔ Mozis ɛn wan fɔ Ila yja.” Bɔt Pita nɔ bin tink bɔt wetin i de tɔk.
42009034	Aw Pita de tɔk, na in, wantɛm klawd kam kɔba dɛn so di ples dak; di lanin bɔy dɛn fred.
42009035	Na in dɛn yɛri vɔys de tɔk na di klawd se, “Dis na mi Pikin we a dɔn pik; una lisin wetin i de tɛl una!”
42009036	Wɛn di vɔys dɔn tɔk dɔn, dɛn nɔ si di tu man dɛn igen; na Jizɔs in wan gren bin lɛf de. Di lanin bɔy dɛn kip ɔl dɛn tin ya we bi na dɛn at. Dɛn nɔ tɛl ɛnibɔdi wetin dɛn si, dɛn wet te sɔm tɛm dɔn pas.
42009037	Di ɔda de, Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt ɔp di ay il go na di tɔng. Plɛnti pipul go mit am fɔ tɛl am, kabɔ.
42009038	Wan pan di man dɛn we go mit Jizɔs bigin ala se, “Masta, a beg yu kam luk mi pikin, na in wan gren a gɛt!
42009039	Dɛbul kin kam pan am ɛn i kin ala wantɛm. Di dɛbul kin mek di pikin gɛt fiks so i kin fɔdɔm ɛn frɔsh kin de kɔmɔt na in mɔt, dɔn i kin de fɛt fɛt na grɔn. I kin at fɔ mek di dɛbul lɛf am.
42009040	A bin beg yu lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ drɛb di dɛbul we de ambɔg di bɔbɔ, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin ebul.”
42009041	Jizɔs se, “Una dɛn tide pipul ya, una nɔ biliv ɛn una tra nga yes! Aw lɔng una want fɔ mek a de wit una ɛn bia wit una?” I tɛl di man mek i bring in pikin kam.
42009042	As di pikin de kam to Jizɔs, na in di dɛbul wap di pikin dɔng na grɔn wit fiks. Jizɔs drɛb di dɛbul kɔmɔt pan am, i and am gi in papa bak.
42009043	Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin lib de, wɔnda pan Gɔd in pawa. Ɔl wetin Jizɔs du bin mek di pipul dɛn wɔnda, na in Jizɔs bigin tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se,
42009044	“A want mek una lisin gud wetin a de kam tɛl una. Una nɔ fɔgɛt am! Dɛn go and ova Mɔta lman Pikin gi sɔm pipul.”
42009045	Di lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin ɔnda stand wetin Jizɔs min bikɔs Gɔd bin ayd di minin frɔm dɛn mek dɛn nɔ no yet wetin go bi. Di lanin bɔy dɛn bin fred fɔ aks Jizɔs wetin di wɔd we i tɛl dɛn min.
42009046	Di lanin bɔy dɛn bigin fɔ agyu bɔt uswan pan dɛn impɔtant pas dɛn ɔl.
42009047	Jizɔs bin no wetin dɛn de tink, so i tek wan pikin put am klos insɛf.
42009048	I tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Ɛnibɔdi we tɛl lili pikin lɛkɛ dis wan ya fɔ kam na in os fɔseka mi, na mi da pɔsin de dɔn tɛl fɔ kam na in os; ɛnibɔdi we tɛl mi fɔ kam na in os, dɔn tɛl di Wan we sɛn mi fɔ kam na in os. Di pɔsin we una nɔ tek bɛtɛ yay luk, na in go bi impɔtant pas una ɔl.”
42009049	Jɔn go tɔk to Jizɔs. I se, “Masta, wi si wan man de tek yu nem drɛb dɛbul. Wi tɛl di man mek i nɔ du dat bikɔs i nɔ de wit wi.”
42009050	Jizɔs se, “Una nɔ tɛl di man fɔ tap igen bikɔs pɔsin we nɔ de mekɔp bad fɔ wi, de fɔ wi.”
42009051	Wɛn di tɛm we Gɔd bin dɔn plan fɔ tek Jizɔs go ɛvin bin dɔn de rich, Jizɔs mekɔp fɔ go Jerusɛlɛm.
42009052	Jizɔs sɛn mɛse nja dɛn fɔ go bifo insɛf lɛf fɔ go. Di mɛse nja dɛn go na wan vilej na Same ria ɛn du ɔltin we Jizɔs tɛl dɛn fɔ du fɔ mek dɛn fɛn ples fɔ am fɔ slip.
42009053	Di pipul dɛn na Same ria nɔ gri fɔ mek Jizɔs tap na Same ria bikɔs dɛn bin no se na Jerusɛlɛm Jizɔs de go.
42009054	Wɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn, dat na Jems ɛn Jɔn, si se di pipul dɛn na Same ria nɔ gri fɔ mek Jizɔs tap de, dɛn go mit Jizɔs ɛn aks am se, “Masta, yu want fɔ lɛ wi mek Gɔd sɛn faya kɔmɔt ɛvin kam dɔng kam bɔn dɛn pipul ya [lɛkɛ aw Ila yja bin du?]”
42009055	Jizɔs tɔn rawnd ɛn tɔk pan Jems ɛn Jɔn. [I se, “Una nɔ no wetin de na una at. Mɔta lman Pikin nɔ kam fɔ pwɛl pipul dɛn layf, i kam fɔ sev pipul.”]
42009056	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt Sama ria go na ɔda tɔng.
42009057	As dɛn de go, wan man kam mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “A go fala yu go ɛni say we yu de go, sa!”
42009058	Jizɔs ansa am se, “Padi, dɛn bush kyat gɛt ples fɔ tap ɛn dɛn bɔd gɛt say fɔ tap, bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin nɔ gɛt ples fɔ le in ed sɛf.”
42009059	Jizɔs tɛl wan ɔda man se, “Kam fala mi!” Di man ansa am se, “Masta, mek a go bɛr mi papa fɔs.”
42009060	Jizɔs se, “Lɛf dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt di layf we Gɔd de gi fɔ bɛr dɛn fambul we dɔn day, yu fɔ go tɛl ɔda pipul bɔt Gɔd in rul.”
42009061	Wan ɔda man tɛl Jizɔs se, “Masta, a go fala yu, bɔt duya, wet mek a go tɛl mi pipul dɛn na mi os se a de go.”
42009062	Jizɔs se, “Pɔsin we de dig ol fɔ plant sid ɛn de tɔn luk biɛn am, tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we de wok we lɛf am af we; i nɔ fit fɔ de ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
42010001	Jizɔs pik sɛvi nti-tu ɔda man dɛn ɛn sɛn dɛn tu tu fɔ go ɔl di say dɛn we insɛf bin want fɔ go.
42010002	Bifo di man dɛn go, Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn pipul we Gɔd dɔn pik fɔ mek i rul dɛn tan lɛkɛ plɛnti, plɛnti plant dɛn we dɔn du fɔ kɔt, bɔt di wokman dɛn we fɔ gɛda dɛn fɔ kam to Gɔd, nɔ plɛnti. Una pre mek Gɔd we na di Masta sɛn mɔ pipul fɔ kam gɛda dɛn pipul we i dɔn pik fɔ rul, ɛn bring dɛn kam to am.”
42010003	I se, “Una go! A de sɛn una lɛkɛ ship pikin midul wulf.
42010004	We una de go so, una nɔ fɔ kɛr pɔs, una nɔ fɔ kɛr bag, ɛn una nɔ fɔ kɛr sus. Una nɔ fɔ wes tɛm fɔ tɛl pipul lɔng adu na rod.
42010005	Ɛni os we una go, una fɔ se fɔs, ‘Mek Gɔd blɛs ɔlman na dis os!’
42010006	If pɔsin de we want di blɛsin, i go gɛt di blɛsin we una pre mek i gɛt; bɔt if pɔsin nɔ de we want di blɛsin, di blɛsin we una dɔn gi am go kam bak to una.
42010007	Di fɔs os we una go we dɛn gri fɔ mek una tap, na de una fɔ de sote una tɔn bak; una nɔ fɔ kɔmɔt na wan os go tap na ɔda wan. Una fɔ it ɛn drink ɛni tin we dɛn gi una bikɔs wokman fɔ gɛt pe fɔ in wok.
42010008	If una go na ɛni tɔng we di pipul dɛn gladi fɔ una, una fɔ it ɛni tin we dɛn gi una.
42010009	Una fɔ mɛn di sik pipul dɛn we lib de, ɛn una fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn we lib de se, ‘Gɔd in rul dɔn kam klos una.’
42010010	If una go na ɛni tɔng we di pipul dɛn nɔ gladi fɔ una, una fɔ go na trit ɛn tɛl dɛn se,
42010011	‘Wi de wep di dɔti sɛf we wi mas na una tɔng kɔmɔt ɔnda wi fut fɔ sho una se una dɔn du bad. Ɛniwe, una nɔ fɔgɛt se Gɔd in rul dɔn kam klos!’
42010012	A de tɛl una se wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ mek Gɔd jɔj ɔlman, i go bɛtɛ fɔ Sɔdɔm pas da tɔng de.
42010013	“Bad tin go mit una ɔl we de na Kora zin ɛn Bɛtsa yda. If pɔsin bin du dɛn wɔnda ful wok we a bin du fɔ una, na Taya ɛn Saydɔn, dɛn pipul de bin fɔ dɔn lɛf fɔ du bad lɔntɛm; dɛn bin fɔ wɛr bag ɛn rɔb asis na dɛn bɔdi fɔ mek ɔlman no se dɛn dɔn lɛf fɔ du bad.
42010014	Di de we Gɔd go jɔj ɔlman na wɔl, i go sɔri fɔ Taya ɛn Saydɔn pas una.
42010015	Una we de na Kepanyɔm, una min se una de go ɛvin? Na ɛl una go go!”
42010016	Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Ɛnibɔdi we lisin una, na mi da pɔsin de lisin. Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ du wetin una tɛl am fɔ du, na wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, na in i nɔ gri fɔ du; ɛn ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ du wetin a tɛl am fɔ du, na wetin di pɔsin we sɛn mi tɛl am fɔ du, i nɔ gri fɔ du.”
42010017	Di sɛvi nti-tu man dɛn kam bak wit gladi ɛn tɛl Jizɔs se, “Masta, dɛn dɛbul sɛf du wetin wi tɛl dɛn fɔ du wɛn wi kɔl yu nem!”
42010018	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “A si we Setan fɔdɔm kɔmɔt na ɛvin lɛkɛ laytin.
42010019	A dɔn gi una pawa: una go mas snek, dɛn nɔ go du una natin; una go mas kɔktel, dɛn nɔ go bɛt una. A dɔn gi una pawa oba ɔl Setan in pawa so natin nɔ go du una.
42010020	Una nɔ fɔ gladi bikɔs dɛn dɛbul du wetin una tɛl dɛn fɔ du, bɔt una fɔ gladi bikɔs una nem dɔn rayt na ɛvin.”
42010021	Da sem tɛm de, Gɔd in Spirit mek Jizɔs gladi, na in Jizɔs se, “Papa, yu we na Masta na ɛvin ɛn dis wɔl! A tɛl yu tɛnki bikɔs yu dɔn sho dɛn pikin we nɔ sabi natin, dɛn tin we yu ayd pan di wan dɛn we gɛt sɛns ɛn we lan plɛnti tin. Lɛ i bi so Papa, bikɔs na so yu want.
42010022	“Mi Papa dɔn gi mi pawa oba ɔltin. Nɔbɔdi nɔ sabi Gɔd in Pikin pas di Papa wan gren; nɔbɔdi nɔ sabi di Papa pas in Pikin wan gren, ɛn ɛnibɔdi we di Pikin pik fɔ tɛl bɔt di Papa.”
42010023	Jizɔs kɔl in lanin bɔy dɛn to insɛf ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn pipul we de si dɛn tin we una de si, gɛt blɛsin!
42010024	A de tɛl una se plɛnti prɔfɛt ɛn plɛnti king bin want fɔ si dɛn tin we una de si, bɔt dɛn nɔ si dɛn. Plɛnti bin want yɛri dɛn tin we una de yɛri, bɔt dɛn nɔ yɛri dɛn.”
42010025	Wan Ju Lɔ ticha aks Jizɔs wan kwɛshɔn fɔ tɛst am; i se, “Ticha, aw a go manej fɔ gɛt layf we go de sote go?”
42010026	Jizɔs ansa am se, “Wetin dɛn rayt na di Ju Lɔ? Wetin yu kin si de wɛn yu rid am?”
42010027	Di Ju Lɔ ticha ansa Jizɔs se, “Di Lɔ se, ‘Una fɔ lɛk di Masta we na una Gɔd wit ɔl una at, wit ɔl una layf, wit ɔl una pawa, ɛn wit ɔl una maynd’ ɛn ‘Una fɔ lɛk una neba lɛkɛ aw una lɛk unasɛf.’ ”
42010028	Jizɔs se, “Yu ansa rayt. Go du ɔl wetin yu jɛs tɔk so ɛn yu go gɛt di layf we go de sote go.”
42010029	Di Ju Lɔ ticha bin want fɔ sho Jizɔs se in rayt fɔ tɔk wetin i tɔk, so i aks Jizɔs se, “Udat na mi neba?”
42010030	Jizɔs ansa am se, “Wan man bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm de go Jɛriko. As i de go tifman dɛn fɔdɔm pan am tek ɔl wetin i gɛt, bit am ɛn lɛf am na di rod af day wan.
42010031	Wan man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin apin fɔ pas na da sem rod de. I si di man we tifman bit ledɔm na grɔn, i pas na di ɔda say na di rod ɛn go in we.
42010032	Semwe so, wan pan dɛn Livayt we de ɛp dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin fɔ du Gɔd wok, pas na di ples we di man bin ledɔm. Wɛn i si di man na grɔn, i krɔs go na di ɔda say na di rod ɛn go.
42010033	Wan man we kɔmɔt Same ria kam pas na di sem rod. Wɛn i rich na di sem ples ɛn si di man we tifman bit, i sɔri fɔ am.
42010034	I go mit di man na di say we i ledɔm, i put mɛrɛsin pan di wund dɛn, dɔn i tay dɛn wit bandej. I put di man pan di ɔs we i bin de rayd. I kɛr am go na wan os we tre nja kin tap na nɛt ɛn mɛn am ol nɛt.
42010035	Di ɔda de wɛn di man we kɔmɔt Same ria want fɔ go, i kɔl di man we gɛt di os. I gi am kɔpɔ ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Padi, duya, mɛn dis man fɔ mi ya! If dis kɔpɔ we a gi yu nɔ du, wɛn a kam bak mɔs tɛl mi ɔmɔs yu put de, a go gi yu bak.’ ”
42010036	“Pan dɛn tri pipul ya we a jɛs tɔk bɔt so, uswan sho se di man we tifman bit, na in neba?”
42010037	Di Ju Lɔ ticha ansa Jizɔs se, “Na di man we sɔri fɔ am.” Jizɔs se, “Yusɛf go ɛn du lɛkɛ am.”
42010038	Wɛn Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn de go, dɛn rich na wan vilej. Dɛn go na wan uman we nem Mata in os. Mata tɛl Jizɔs adu ɛn tɛl am fɔ sidɔm.
42010039	Mata in sista bin nem Meri. Meri go sidɔm klos Jizɔs fɔ yɛri wetin i de tɔk.
42010040	Bɔt di os wok bin de mɔna Mata, so i go mit Jizɔs ɛn se, “Masta, yu nɔ si se Meri lɛf mi wan pan di wok? Tɛl am mek i kam ɛp mi!”
42010041	Jizɔs se, “Mata, Mata, yu put plɛnti tin na yu ed ɛn dat de wɔri yu,
42010042	na wan tin yu fɔ du we yu nɔ de du; na da tin de we gud na in Meri de du ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ go pul am pan am.”
42011001	Wan de Jizɔs bin de pre na wan ples; wɛn i dɔn pre dɔn, wan pan in lanin bɔy dɛn kam mit am ɛn se, “Masta, lan wi aw fɔ pre lɛkɛ aw Jɔn lan in lanin bɔy dɛn.”
42011002	Jizɔs se, “Wɛn una want pre, una fɔ se: ‘Papa Gɔd, na yu wan gren na Gɔd, mek ɔlman pre to yu ɛn ɔna yu. Wi de pre mek yu rul wi.
42011003	Gi wi wetin wi fɔ it ɛvri de.
42011004	Padin wi fɔ di bad tin dɛn wi de du, bikɔs wisɛf de padin dɛn wan we de du wi bad. Mek wi nɔ lɛf fɔ biliv yu ɛnitɛm we Setan tray wi.’ ”
42011005	Jizɔs se, “If ɛni wan pan una go mit in padi midul nɛt ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Padi, duya, lɛn mi tri bred.
42011006	A gɛt tre nja ɛn a nɔ gɛt natin fɔ gi am.’
42011007	Dɔn di padi ansa se, ‘Bo, nɔ ambɔg mi ya, a dɔn lɔk mi do ɛn a dɔn ledɔm. Mi pikin dɛn ɔl de slip. A nɔ ebul grap naw fɔ lɛn yu wetin yu want.’
42011008	A shɔ se if i nɔ grap ɛn gi di pɔsin di bred bikɔs dɛn ɔl tu na padi, i go grap ɛn gi am ɔmɔs i want bikɔs i de beg beg am.”
42011009	Jizɔs se, “Una aks Gɔd fɔ ɛni tin, i go gi una. Una luk gud, una go fɛn wetin una de luk fɔ. Una kɔnk na do, Gɔd go opin am fɔ una.
42011010	Ɛnibɔdi we aks, go gɛt wetin i want. Ɛnibɔdi we luk gud, go gɛt wetin i de luk fɔ. Ɛnibɔdi we kɔnk na do, Gɔd go opin am fɔ am.
42011011	Una dɛn papa, if una pikin aks una fɔ fish, una go tek snek gi am?
42011012	If una pikin aks una fɔ eg, una go gi am kɔktel?
42011013	If una we bad so sabi fɔ gi una pikin dɛn gud tin, Gɔd we na una Papa we de na ɛvin go gi una gud tin pas dat; i go gi dɛn wan we aks am in Spirit!”
42011014	Jizɔs bin de drɛb di dɛbul we mek wan man mumu kɔmɔt insay di man. As di dɛbul kɔmɔt insay di man so, di man bigin tɔk; dat mek di pipul dɛn ɔl wɔnda.
42011015	Sɔm pipul se, “Na Biɛlzibɔb, dat na dɛn dɛbul dɛn edman, na in de gi am di pawa fɔ drɛb dɛbul.”
42011016	Sɔm ɔda pipul kam fɔ tray Jizɔs; dɛn tɛl am fɔ mek i du wɔnda ful wok we go sho se in na di Mɛsaya, fɔ tru.
42011017	We Jizɔs no wetin di pipul dɛn de tink we mek dɛn aks am fɔ du wɔnda ful wok, i tɛl dɛn se, “If pipul de na wan kɔntri, dɛn de fɛt dɛnsɛf, da kɔntri de nɔ go las. Semwe so, if fambul dɛn de fɛt dɛnsɛf, da fambul de go skata.
42011018	If Setan in wokman dɛn de fɛt dɛnsɛf, aw Setan in rul go go bifo? Una dɔn tɛl mi se na Biɛlzibɔb a de tek drɛb dɛbul.
42011019	If na Biɛlzibɔb a de tek drɛb dɛbul, wɛl, wetin una yon pipul dɛn de tek drɛb dɛbul? Na wetin una pipul de du de sho se una nɔ rayt.
42011020	Bɔt if na Gɔd in pawa a de tek drɛb dɛbul, dat sho se fɔ tru Gɔd in rul dɔn kam to una.
42011021	“If pɔsin we gɛt trɛnk ɛn ɔltin we fɔ tek fɛt de gyad in os, nɔbɔdi nɔ go tif in tin dɛn.
42011022	Bɔt if pɔsin we gɛt trɛnk pas am go fɛt am ɛn bit am, di wan we bit am go tek ɔltin we di wan we gɛt di os bin abop pan fɔ tek fɛt, ɛn i go tif ɔl in tin dɛn ɛn kɛr dɛn go sheb dɛn wit in kɔmpin tifman dɛn.
42011023	“Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ de fɔ mi de fɛt mi, ɛn ɛnibɔdi we nɔ de ɛp mi gɛda pipul fɔ mek dɛn kam to mi, na skata i de skata dɛn.
42011024	“Wɛn dɛbul dɔn kɔmɔt insay pɔsin, i kin de pas pas na dɛn dray ples fɔ fɛn ples fɔ blo. If i nɔ ebul fɛn ples fɔ blo, i go se, ‘A go tɔn bak go tap insay di os we a bin de.’
42011025	Wɛn di dɛbul kam bak, i nɔ go mit natin insay de, i go mit di ples klin ɛn fayn.
42011026	I go go bak go bring ɔda sɛvin dɛbul we bad pas insɛf. Dɛn ɔl go tap insay de ɛn di man in kɔndishɔn go kam bad naw pas aw i bin tan fɔs.”
42011027	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, wan uman we bin de na di krawd se, “Di uman we bɔn yu ɛn mɛn yu gɛt blɛsin!”
42011028	Jizɔs se, “Yɛs, dat na tru, bɔt mɔ blɛsin de fɔ di pipul dɛn we yɛri Gɔd in wɔd ɛn du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn.”
42011029	Wɛn di pipul dɛn dɔn plɛnti, Jizɔs bigin tɔk to dɛn. I se, “Dɛn tide pipul ya bad! Dɛn de aks mi fɔ du wɔnda ful wok, bɔt a nɔ go du am. Dɛn nɔ go si ɛni wɔnda ful tin pas di wan we bin dɔn bi to prɔfɛt Jona.
42011030	Lɛkɛ aw Jona na bin sayn fɔ dɛn pipul na Ninivɛ, na so Mɔta lman Pikin go bi sayn fɔ dɛn tide pipul ya.
42011031	Wɛn Gɔd go jɔj di wɔl, da kwin we de rul na Shiba go grap ɛn tɔk se dɛn tide pipul ya dɔn du bad; i kɔmɔt fa fawe fɔ kam yɛri di sɛns we Sɔlɔmɔn de tɔk wit; ɛn pɔsin we pas Sɔlɔmɔn dɔn kam.
42011032	Di de we Gɔd go jɔj ɔlman na wɔl, dɛn pipul we bin de na Ninivɛ di tɛm we Jona bin de, go grap ɛn tɛl una se, una dɔn du bad; bikɔs dɛn bin lɛf fɔ du bad wɛn prɔfɛt Jona tɛl dɛn Gɔd in wɔd; ɛn a de tɛl una se, pɔsin de naya we pas Jona.
42011033	“Pɔsin nɔ de layt lamp put am na kɔna ɔ kɔba am wit blay, i de put am na ples we ɔlman na di os go si layt.
42011034	Yu yay tan lɛkɛ lamp na yu bɔdi. If yu gɛt gud yay, ɔl yu bɔdi go gɛt layt, bɔt if yu yay nɔ gud, ɔl yu bɔdi go de na dak.
42011035	Na dat mek yu fɔ tek tɛm mek di layt we de pan yu nɔ ɔt.
42011036	If ɔl yu bɔdi gɛt layt ɛn nɔ pat pan am nɔ dak, di layt we de pan yu go tan lɛkɛ lamp we brayt we de mek pipul si.”
42011037	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, wan pan dɛn man we dɛn kɔl Faresi aks Jizɔs fɔ go it to am; Jizɔs fala am go.
42011038	Di Faresi wɔnda fɔ si se Jizɔs nɔ was in an bifo i bigin it.
42011039	Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Una dɛn Faresi de was kɔp ɛn plet bak klin, bɔt na soso wikɛd tin de insay una at ɛn una bigyay.
42011040	Una nɔ gɛt sɛns! Nɔto di sem Gɔd we mek una bɔdi mek una at?
42011041	Una fɔ ɛp dɛn po pipul wit ɔl una at, dɛn ɔltin go klin fɔ una.
42011042	“Bɔt una dɛn Faresi, i go bad fɔ una! Una de gi wan pat pan tɛn pat pan ɔltin we una gɛt, ivin dɛn tin we una plant, bɔt una nɔ de du wetin rayt to pipul ɛn una nɔ lɛk Gɔd. Na dɛn tin ya una bin fɔ de du wit di ɔda tin dɛn we una de du.
42011043	“Una dɛn Faresi, i go bad fɔ una! Wɛn una de na di Ju mitin os, una kin lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn bɛnch we de bifo, ɛn una lɛk fɔ mek dɛn tɛl una adu na dɛn ples we pipul de plɛnti.
42011044	I go bad fɔ una dɛn Faresi! Una tan lɛkɛ grev we pipul nɔ de si so dɛn de waka pan am ɛn dɛn nɔ no sɛf se na grev dɛn de mas.”
42011045	Wan pan di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn ansa Jizɔs se, “Masta, we yu tɔk so, yu dɔn blem wisɛf!”
42011046	Jizɔs se, “I go bad fɔ una dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, bikɔs una de gi ɔda pipul ebi lod fɔ tot bɔt una nɔ de put wan finga sɛf fɔ ɛp dɛn tot di lod.
42011047	I go bad fɔ una! Na una dɔn bil sɔntin pan dɛn ston grev fɔ mɛmba dɛn prɔfɛt we una gra npapa-papa dɛn bin kil.
42011048	Ɛn una sho se una gri fɔ wetin una gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du we dɛn kil di prɔfɛt dɛn, we una dɔn bil sɔntin pan dɛn ston grev fɔ mɛmba dɛn.
42011049	Na dat mek di wan we dɛn kɔl ‘Gɔd in Sɛns’ se, ‘A go sɛn mi prɔfɛt dɛn ɛn mi mɛse nja dɛn to dɛn, bɔt dɛn go kil sɔm ɛn dɛn go mek di ɔda wan dɛn sɔfa.’
42011050	So una dɛn tide pipul ya go sɔfa fɔ ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt ya we dɛn dɔn kil frɔm we Gɔd mek di wɔl sote tide.
42011051	Una dɛn tide pipul ya go sɔfa fɔ di pipul dɛn we dɛn kil frɔm Ebɛl sote rich Zaka raya we day midul Gɔd in Os ɛn di ples we dɛn de bɔn sakri fays. Fɔ tru, a de tɛl una dɛn tide pipul ya, se una go pe fɔ di prɔfɛt dɛn blɔd!
42011052	“I go bad fɔ una dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, bikɔs una dɔn lɔk di ples we pipul fɔ go fɔ lan bɔt Gɔd ɛn kɛr di ki go. Una nɔ de go insay ɛn una nɔ gri fɔ mek ɔda pipul go insay.”
42011053	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɛn tin ya, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn Faresi bigin fos am fɔ tɔk mɔ, dɛn bigin aks am ɔl kayn kwɛshɔn;
42011054	we dɛn bin de aks Jizɔs dɛn kwɛshɔn ya na trap dɛn bin de sɛt fɔ mek i tɔk wɔd we go mek dɛn ol am.
42012001	Di pipul dɛn we bin gɛda bin plɛnti te nɔbɔdi nɔ ebul kɔnt dɛn, dɛn bin so plɛnti dat dɛn bin de mas mas dɛn kɔmpin, ples nɔ bin de fɔ put fut. Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, i se, “Una tek tɛm mek unasɛf nɔ go ipo krit lɛkɛ dɛn Faresi; di ipo krit we dɛn ipo krit tan lɛkɛ aw yist kin prɛd insay flawa.
42012002	Natin nɔ de we ayd naw we nɔ go kɔmɔt na do ɛn natin nɔ de we na sikrit we pɔsin nɔ go no.
42012003	Na dat mek, ɛni tin we pɔsin tɔk na nɛt, dɛn go yɛri am na mɔnin ɛn ɛni tin we una tu tɔk kwayɛt wan insay rum, una go yɛri ɔlman de tɔk am na trit.
42012004	“Mi padi dɛn, a de tɛl una, una nɔ fɔ fred dɛn pipul we de kil pɔsin, bɔt dɛn nɔ ebul du natin pas dat.
42012005	Bɔt a de tɛl una naw se una fɔ fred Gɔd bikɔs wɛn i dɔn mek pɔsin day, i gɛt pawa fɔ trowe di pɔsin in sol na ɛl. A de tɛl una igen se una fɔ fred Gɔd!
42012006	“Nɔto tu sɛnt nɔmɔ dɛn de sɛl fayv smɔl bɔd? Pan ɔl dat Gɔd nɔ fɔgɛt ɛni wan pan dɛn.
42012007	Gɔd no ɔmɔs ia de na una ed sɛf. Na dat mek una nɔ fɔ fred; una ɔl bɛtɛ pas plɛnti smɔl bɔd na Gɔd in yay!
42012008	“Mek a tɛl una sɔntin; ɛnibɔdi we tɛl ɔda pipul se dɛn biliv mi, Mɔta lman Pikin go tɛl Gɔd in enjɛl dɛn bɔt da pɔsin de.
42012009	Bɔt ɛnibɔdi we nɔ tɛl ɔda pipul se dɛn biliv mi, Mɔta lman Pikin nɔ go tɛl Gɔd in enjɛl dɛn bɔt da pɔsin de.
42012010	“Ɛnibɔdi we tɔk sɔntin bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin we nɔto tru, Gɔd go padin am, bɔt Gɔd nɔ go padin ɛnibɔdi we tɔk bad bɔt in Spirit.
42012011	“Wɛn dɛn kɛr una go na di Ju mitin os ɛn bifo dɛn jɔj ɛn dɛn wan we de na pawa, una nɔ wɔndrin aw una fɔ ansa dɛn ɔ wetin una fɔ tɔk.
42012012	Wɛn da tɛm de rich, Gɔd in Spirit go tɛl una wetin una fɔ tɔk.”
42012013	Wan pan di pipul dɛn se, “Masta, tɛl mi brɔda mek i gi mi mi yon pan di prɔpati we wi papa lɛf fɔ wi.”
42012014	Jizɔs ansa di man se, “Padi, udat gi mi pawa fɔ jɔj fɔ una ɛn fɔ sheb una prɔpati?”
42012015	Jizɔs tɔn to ɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn se, “A de wɔn una, una nɔ put at pan jɛntri. Nɔto di plɛnti tin dɛn we pɔsin gɛt go mek di pɔsin gɛt di tru layf.”
42012016	Dɛn Jizɔs pul wan pare bul. I se: “Plɛnti, plɛnti tin bin bia na wan jɛntri man in fam.
42012017	Di jɛntri man bigin tɔk na in at se, ‘Wetin a fɔ du naw bikɔs a nɔ gɛt ples fɔ kip ɔl dɛn tin ya?’
42012018	I se, ‘A dɔn no wetin fɔ du. A go brok ɔl dɛn sto ya ɛn bil big wan pas dɛn. Na de a go kip ɔl dɛn tin ya we bia ɛn ɔl dɛn tin we a gɛt.
42012019	Wɛn a dɔn du dat, a go de tɔk to misɛf se, yu dɔn gɛt plɛnti it ɛn plɛnti ɔda tin na sto ɛn i go te bifo dɛn dɔn, so naw, nɔ wɔri bɔt ɛni tin, jɛs de it, drink ɛn ɛnjɔy yusɛf!’
42012020	Gɔd tɛl di jɛntri man se, ‘Yu fulman! Dis nɛt ya, a go tek yu layf. Udat go gɛt ɔl dɛn tin ya we yu dɔn gɛda?’ ”
42012021	Jizɔs se, “Na so i go bi fɔ dɛn pipul we jɛs de gɛda prɔpati nɔmɔ, bɔt Gɔd no se dɛn nɔ gɛt natin.”
42012022	Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Na dat mek a de tɛl una se, una nɔ fɔ wɔri bɔt wetin una fɔ it fɔ mek una gɛt layf ɛn wetin una fɔ wɛr pan una bɔdi so dat una nɔ go de nekɛd.
42012023	Una fɔ mɛmba se layf bɛtɛ pas di tin we pɔsin de it ɛn di bɔdi bɛtɛ pas di klos we pɔsin de wɛr.
42012024	Una luk dɛn bɔd, dɛn nɔ de plant rɛs ɛn dɛn nɔ de kɔt rɛs. Dɛn nɔ gɛt sto ɛn dɛn nɔ gɛt blay fɔ kip rɛs. Pan ɔl dat, Gɔd de gi dɛn it. Una bɛtɛ pas bɔd fawe.
42012025	Uswan pan una ebul put wan de pantap di tɛm we i fɔ liv bikɔs i de wɔri fɔ in layf?
42012026	If una nɔ ebul du smɔl tin lɛkɛ dat, wetin mek una fɔ de wɔri fɔ dɛn ɔda tin?
42012027	Una mɛmba aw dɛn flawa na bush kin fayn wɛn dɛn dɔn opin; dɛn nɔ de wok, dɛn nɔ de mek klos fɔ dɛnsɛf, bɔt Sɔlɔmɔn pan ɔl di fayn we i kin fayn wɛn i drɛs, i nɔba fayn lɛkɛ dɛn flawa ya.
42012028	If Gɔd de mek gras we de na bush fayn ɛn di gras kin de tide, bɔt tumara dɛn dɔn bɔn am, Gɔd mɔs mek unasɛf gɛt fayn klos fɔ wɛr. Fɔ tru, una nɔ biliv Gɔd wit ɔl una at!
42012029	“Una nɔ put una at pan wetin una go it ɛn wetin una go drink, ɛn una nɔ wɔri bɔt dat!
42012030	Na dɛn tin de dɛn pipul we nɔ no Gɔd put dɛn at pan. Gɔd we na una Papa no se una mɔs gɛt dɛn.
42012031	Bifo dat, una fɔ put una at pan dɛn tin we impɔtant na di say we Gɔd de rul, dɛn, Gɔd go gi una ɔl dɛn ɔda tin ya.
42012032	“Una we de fala mi nɔ plɛnti, bɔt una nɔ fred; Gɔd we na una Papa go mek una rul lɛkɛ aw insɛf de rul.
42012033	Una fɔ sɛl ɔl wetin una gɛt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin; una tray fɔ gɛt dɛn pɔs we nɔ de ol, dat na dɛn plɛnti gud gud tin we nɔ go dɔn na ɛvin, bikɔs tifman nɔ go tif dɛn de ɛn bɔgbɔg nɔ go it dɛn.
42012034	Bikɔs ɔltɛm una at go de di say we una kip una jɛntri.
42012035	“Una fɔ rɛdi fɔ wetin de kam, una tay una bɛlt tayt, layt una lamp, ɛn nɔ mek dɛn ɔt.
42012036	Una fɔ tan lɛkɛ dɛn wokman we de wet fɔ dɛn masta we bin go mared fɔ kam bak na os so dat dɛn go opin di do as di masta nak so.
42012037	If di bɔy dɛn nɔ slip yet wɛn dɛn masta kam bak, dɛn go gɛt blɛsin. A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, di masta go drɛs ɛn i go kɔl in bɔy dɛn mek dɛn kam sidɔm, dɔn i go gi dɛn it.
42012038	Dɛn bɔy ya go gɛt blɛsin if dɛn masta kam midul nɛt ɔ bifo do klin ɛn mit dɛn nɔ de slip.
42012039	Bɔt una no se if pɔsin we gɛt in os no di tɛm we tifman go kam, i nɔ go slip lɛf in os mek tifman brok am go insay ɛn klia in prɔpati.
42012040	Unasɛf fɔ rɛdi ɔltɛm bikɔs Mɔta lman Pikin go kam tɛm we una nɔ mekɔp.”
42012041	Pita se, “Masta, dis pare bul we yu jɛs pul so, na fɔ wi we na yu lanin bɔy dɛn nɔmɔ ɔ na fɔ ɔlman?”
42012042	Jizɔs ansa se, “Udat na di bɔy we tru to in masta ɛn we gɛt sɛns? Na di bɔy dat we di masta go mek edman oba di ɔda bɔy dɛn fɔ de gi dɛn it ɛn fɔ de sho dɛn ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ du.
42012043	Ɛni bɔy we in masta go kam bak kam mit de du dɛn tin ya go gɛt blɛsin.
42012044	A de tɛl una fɔ tru se in masta go put am oba ɔl di tin dɛn we i gɛt.
42012045	Bɔt if di bɔy tɔk na in at se, ‘Mi masta nɔ go kam jisnɔ’ dɔn i bigin bit ɔl di ɔda man ɛn uman dɛn we de wok ɛn i jɛs de it, ɛn drink drɔnk,
42012046	in masta go kam de we di bɔy nɔ mekɔp ɛn tɛm we i nɔ no. I go mek dɛn pɔnish di bɔy bad wan mek i sɔfa lɛkɛ dɛn pipul we nɔ biliv Gɔd.
42012047	“Ɛni wokman we no wetin in masta want fɔ mek i du, bɔt i nɔ du am ɛn i nɔ rɛdi sɛf fɔ du am, in masta go mek dɛn wip am gud.
42012048	Bɔt ɛni wokman we nɔ no wetin in masta want fɔ mek i du, we du tin we fɔ mek dɛn bit am, in masta nɔ go mek dɛn bit am tumɔs. Wɛn Gɔd dɔn mek pɔsin gɛt big pos, Gɔd go luk ɔp to am fɔ du big wok. Wɛn Gɔd dɔn mek pɔsin gɛt big pos pas di wan we i bin gɛt, Gɔd go luk ɔp to am fɔ du big big wok pas wetin i bin de du fɔs.
42012049	“A kam fɔ sɛn faya pan dis wɔl ɛn a op se dɛn dɔn layt di faya.
42012050	Bɔt bifo da faya de bigin bɔn, a gɛt fɔ baptayz difrɛn we, dat na di sɔfa we A fɔ sɔfa ɛn mi at nɔ go kol te a dɔn sɔfa dɔn.
42012051	Una min se a kam fɔ bring kol at kam na wɔl? Nɔto so i bi; a de tɛl una se, a kam fɔ mek pipul skata.
42012052	Frɔm naw, fayv pipul go de insay wan os so, dɛn nɔ go gɛt wanwɔd. Tri pipul go fɛt tu pipul ɛn tu pipul go fɛt tri pipul.
42012053	Papa go fɛt in bɔy pikin ɛn di bɔy pikin go fɛt in papa. Mama go fɛt in gyal pikin ɛn di gyal pikin go fɛt in mama. Mɔdɛnlɔ go fɛt dɔtɛnlɔ ɛn dɔtɛnlɔ go fɛt mɔdɛnlɔ.”
42012054	Jizɔs tɔk to di pipul dɛn. I se, “Wɛn una luk da say we di san de go dɔng ɛn si se de dak, una kin tɔk wantɛm se, ‘Ren want kam!’ ɛn ren kin kam fɔ tru.
42012055	Wɛn di dray briz tap fɔ blo, una kin se, ‘Di ples de kam ɔt bad bad!’ ɛn na so i kin bi.
42012056	Una dɛn ipo krit pipul ya, una no wetin dɛn tin we una de si na wɔl ɛn ɔpklawd, min, bɔt wetin mek una nɔ no wetin dɛn tin we de bi na wɔl naw, min?
42012057	“Wetin mek una nɔ ebul fɔ no wetin rayt?
42012058	Bifo yu mek dɛn kɛr yu go kot fɔ ɛni bad tin we yu du, yu fɔ tray fɔ tɔk di kes to unasɛf mek yu nɔ go rich kot, if nɔ so, dɛn go drɛg yu go bifo di jɔj, di jɔj go and yu gi di gyad ɛn di gyad go ib yu na sɛl.
42012059	Ɛn yu nɔ go kɔmɔt insay jel sote yu dɔn pe ɔl di dɛt we yu fɔ pe.”
42013001	Da sem tɛm de, sɔm pipul we bin de wit Jizɔs tɛl am bɔt dɛn pipul we kɔmɔt Galili we Paylet kil wɛn dɛn de mek sakri fays to Gɔd.
42013002	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Una mɛmba se dɛn pipul we Paylet kil day so bikɔs dɛn bin sin pas ɔlman na Galili?
42013003	Nɔto so i bi; a de tɛl una se if una nɔ lɛf fɔ du bad, unasɛf go day lɛkɛ dɛn.
42013004	Ɔ igen una mɛmba se dɛn etin pipul we da tawa na Saylom bin fɔdɔm pan, we day, bin sin pas ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm we mek dɛn day so?
42013005	Nɔto so i bi; a de tɛl una se if una nɔ lɛf fɔ du bad, unasɛf go day lɛkɛ dɛn.”
42013006	Jizɔs pul wan pare bul we se: “Wan man bin plant fig tik na in gadin. Wɛn di man go fɔ pik di fig dɛn natin nɔ bin de na di tik.
42013007	Di man tɛl di man we de luk di tik dɛn se, ‘Dis ia mek tri we a de kam fɔ pik fig, bɔt a nɔ de gɛt natin fɔ pik. Kɔt dis tik! Wetin mek i de mek di grɔn wes?’
42013008	Di man we de luk di tik dɛn se, ‘Masta, lɛf di tik fɔs dis ia. A go dig rawnd am ɛn put maniɔ pan di dɔti.
42013009	If i bia nɛks ia, i go gud fɔ wi, bɔt if i nɔ bia, da tɛm de wi go kɔt am.’ ”
42013010	Wan de fɔ pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs bin de lan di pipul dɛn na wan Ju mitin os.
42013011	Wan uman bin de na di Ju mitin os we bin gɛt dɛbul insay am we mek i sik fɔ etin ia. Di sik bin mek di uman bɛn ɛn i nɔ bin ebul tinap tret igen.
42013012	Wɛn Jizɔs si di uman, i kɔl am ɛn tɛl am se, “Uman, frɔm tide yu dɔn wɛl!”
42013013	Jizɔs tɔch di uman ɛn wantɛm wantɛm so di uman in bak tret ɛn i bigin tɛl Gɔd tɛnki ɛn prez am.
42013014	Bɔt di bigman na di Ju mitin os bin vɛks bikɔs Jizɔs mɛn di sik uman di de we fɔ pre ɛn blo, so i tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin go fɔ pre se, “Na siks de pɔsin fɔ wok, so una fɔ kam wan pan dɛn de ya fɔ mek Jizɔs mɛn una; bɔt una nɔ fɔ kam di de fɔ pre ɛn blo fɔ mek i mɛn una.”
42013015	Jizɔs ansa am se, “Una dɛn ipo krit pipul ya! Una nɔ kin pul una ship ɛn kaw dɛn na do di de fɔ pre ɛn blo ɛn kɛr dɛn go mek dɛn go drink wata?
42013016	Dis uman we Setan dɔn tay dis etin ia, we na wan pan Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn, a nɔ fɔ mɛn am di de fɔ pre ɛn blo?”
42013017	Jɛs Jizɔs tɔk dis wɔd ya, di pipul dɛn we bin go pre gladi fɔ ɔl wetin Jizɔs du, ɛn dɛn wan we nɔ bin lɛk Jizɔs, shem.
42013018	Wɛn dat dɔn, Jizɔs se, “Aw Gɔd in rul tan ɛn wetin a go tek fɔ sho aw i tan?
42013019	Gɔd in rul tan lɛkɛ mɔstad sid we pɔsin plant na in gadin, di sid bɔs fayn ɛn gro te i tɔn to tik, dɔn plɛnti bɔd kam mek nɛst pan di an dɛn.”
42013020	Jizɔs aks igen se, “Wetin a go tek fɔ sho aw Gɔd in rul tan?
42013021	I tan lɛkɛ we uman tek smɔl yist ɛn miks am wit tri kɔp flawa sote di do fɔ mek bred rayz.”
42013022	Wɛn Jizɔs de go Jerusɛlɛm, i bin de lan di pipul dɛn na ɔl dɛn tɔng ɛn dɛn vilej we i bin de pas.
42013023	Sɔmbɔdi aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, dɛn pipul we Gɔd go sev nɔ go plɛnti?” Jizɔs tɛl di pipul dɛn we bin de wit am se,
42013024	“Una tray mek una go pas na di do we smɔl fɔ pas ɛn go insay di ples we Gɔd de rul. A de tɛl una se, plɛnti pipul go tray fɔ go insay de, bɔt dɛn nɔ go ebul.
42013025	Wɛn di pɔsin we gɛt di ples dɔn grap ɛn lɔk di do, una go tinap na do de nak ɛn se, ‘Masta, opin fɔ wi, sa!’ Di masta go ansa una se, ‘A nɔ no usay una kɔmɔt.’
42013026	Dɛn una go se, ‘Masta, na wi ɔl bin de it wan ples ɛn yu bin de lan pipul na trit na wi tɔng.’
42013027	Di masta go se, ‘A de tɛl una se a nɔ no usay una kɔmɔt, una go, una kɔmɔt to mi; a nɔ no una, una dɛn wikɛd pipul ya!’
42013028	Una go si Ebraam, Ayzik, Jekɔb ɛn ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt insay di ples we Gɔd de rul, bɔt una go kray bita wan ɛn bɛt una tɔng bikɔs dɛn lɔk una na do.
42013029	Pipul dɛn go kɔmɔt ɔlsay na wɔl ɛn kam sidɔm fɔ it na di ples we Gɔd de rul.
42013030	Sɔm pipul we de biɛn naw go de bifo ɛn sɔm pipul we de bifo naw go de biɛn.”
42013031	Sɔm Faresi dɛn kam tɔk to Jizɔs, dɛn se, “Duya, sa, kɔmɔt naya naw bikɔs Ɛrɔd dɔn mekɔp fɔ kil yu.”
42013032	Jizɔs se, “Una go tɛl da man de we de mek pipul ful se, ‘A de drɛb dɛbul ɛn mɛn sik pipul fɔ shɔt tɛm fɔs, wɛn da tɛm de dɔn pas, a go dɔn mi wok.’
42013033	Bɔt a de tɛl una se, a mɔs du mi wok dis shɔt tɛm fɔs ɛn wɛn da tɛm de dɔn pas sɛf, bikɔs prɔfɛt nɔ fɔ day nɔ ɔda say pas Jerusɛlɛm!
42013034	“Jerusɛlɛm, Jerusɛlɛm; una dɔn kil dɛn prɔfɛt ɛn una dɔn ston dɛn wan we Gɔd sɛn to una! Ɔmɔs tɛm a dɔn want gɛda una pikin dɛn lɛkɛ aw kombra fɔl de gɛda in pikin dɛn ɔnda in fɛda dɛn, bɔt una nɔ gri mek a du dat!
42013035	Mek a tɛl una, Gɔd dɔn lɛf di ples we una de, gi una. Una nɔ go si mi igen sote unasɛf se, ‘Gɔd blɛs di pɔsin we i dɔn sɛn fɔ kam tinap fɔ am!’ ”
42014001	Wan de we fɔ pre ɛn blo, Jizɔs bin go it na wan dɛn Faresi dɛn bigman in os; di pipul dɛn na di os bin de wach am.
42014002	Wan sikman we in an ɛn fut bin swɛl kam to Jizɔs.
42014003	Jizɔs aks dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn Faresi se, “Di Lɔ se fɔ mɛn pɔsin ɔ nɔ fɔ mɛn pɔsin di de fɔ pre ɛn blo?”
42014004	Bɔt di Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn di Faresi dɛn nɔ se fing! Jizɔs mɛn di sik man ɛn mek i go.
42014005	Jizɔs aks di pipul dɛn se, “Uswan pan una we in bɔy pikin ɔ in kaw fɔdɔm insay wɛl di de fɔ pre ɛn blo nɔ go pul am kɔmɔt insay de wantɛm?”
42014006	Di pipul dɛn nɔ ebul ansa Jizɔs in kwɛshɔn.
42014007	Wɛn Jizɔs si se sɔm pan di pipul dɛn na di os lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn chia we de bifo we dɛn bigman kin sidɔm, i pul pare bul se:
42014008	“Wɛn dɛn kɔl yu na mared, yu nɔ fɔ sidɔm na dɛn chia we de bifo we dɛn bigman fɔ sidɔm pan, bikɔs sɔntɛm dɛn dɔn kɔl pɔsin we impɔtant pas yu na di mared,
42014009	ɛn wɛn da pɔsin de kam, di pɔsin we kɔl yu na di mared go kam mit yu tɛl yu se, ‘Mi padi, grap mek dis man ya sidɔm!’ Da tɛm de na shem yu go tek grap go sidɔm na di chia we de biɛn biɛn.
42014010	Wɛn dɛn kɔl yu na mared, go sidɔm na di chia we de biɛn, so wɛn di pɔsin we kɔl yu kam si usay yu sidɔm, na in go se, ‘Mi padi, grap kam sidɔm bifo ya!’ Da tɛm de ɔl dɛn pipul we de na di mared go si se yu gɛt ɔna.
42014011	Da pɔsin we put insɛf ɔp, Gɔd go put am dɔng; ɛn da pɔsin we put insɛf dɔng, Gɔd go es am ɔp.”
42014012	Jizɔs tɛl di Ju bigman we bin kɔl am fɔ go it na in os se, “Wɛn yu de kɔl pipul fɔ kam it, nɔ kɔl yu padi dɛn, nɔ kɔl yu brɔda dɛn, nɔ kɔl yu fambul dɛn ɔ yu jɛntri neba dɛn, bikɔs dɛnsɛf go kɔl yu fɔ go it bak, so i go bi se dɛnsɛf go pe yu bak.
42014013	Bɔt wɛn yu de kɔl pipul fɔ kam it, kɔl dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin, dɛn wan we nɔ gɛt sɔm pat pan dɛn bɔdi, dɛn wan we nɔ ebul waka, ɛn dɛn wan we blɛn.
42014014	If yu du so, yu go gɛt blɛsin bikɔs dɛn kayn pipul de nɔ go ebul fɔ tɔn di gud we yu du fɔ dɛn gi yu bak. Gɔd go gi yu di pe bak fɔ di gud we yu du, da de we in pipul dɛn go rayz frɔm dɛn grev.”
42014015	Wɛn wan pan dɛn pipul we bin de it wit Jizɔs yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, di pɔsin tɛl Jizɔs se, “Blɛsin de pan da pɔsin we go it bred na di ples we Gɔd de rul!”
42014016	Jizɔs tɛl di pɔsin se, “Wan man bin mek big kuk ɛn kɔl plɛnti pipul fɔ kam it.
42014017	Wɛn di tɛm rich we di it dɔn rɛdi, i sɛn in bɔy fɔ go tɛl dɛn pipul we i bin dɔn kɔl fɔ kam it, se, ‘Una kam, di it dɔn rɛdi!’
42014018	Bɔt ɔlman we di bɔy mit ɛn tɛl fɔ kam it se dɛn nɔ go kam ɛn dɛn tɔk wetin du. Wan se, ‘A dɔn bay grɔn ɛn a jɛs gɛt fɔ go luk am. Go tɛl yu masta se a nɔ go ebul go it to am.’
42014019	Wan ɔda wan se, ‘A dɔn bay tɛn kaw ɛn a want fɔ go luk dɛn fɔ si aw dɛn de wok, so, duya, tɛl yu masta se na dat mek a nɔ go ebul go it to am.’
42014020	Wan ɔda wan se, ‘A jɛs mared, na dat mek a nɔ go ebul go it to am.’
42014021	“Di bɔy tɔn bak go tɛl in masta wetin dɛn ɔl tɔk. In masta vɛks, so i tɛl am se, ‘Rɔn go na dɛn trit ɛn dɛn kɔna na di tɔng ɛn bring dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin, dɛn blɛnyay pipul, dɛn wan we nɔ ebul waka ɛn dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt sɔm pat pan dɛn bɔdi!’
42014022	Wɛn di bɔy kam bak, i tɛl in masta se, ‘Masta, a dɔn du ɔl wetin yu tɛl mi fɔ du, bɔt ples lɛf fɔ mɔ pipul, sa.’
42014023	Di masta se, ‘Go na dɛn big rod ɛn dɛn bush rod na dɛn vilej say ɛn beg di pipul dɛn de fɔ kam, so dat di ples go ful.
42014024	A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, ɔl dɛn pipul we a bin kɔl fɔs fɔ kam it nɔ go tes natin pan di it we dɛn dɔn kuk!’ ”
42014025	Wɛn Jizɔs de go, plɛnti plɛnti pipul fala am. Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se,
42014026	“If ɛnibɔdi want fɔ fala mi, da pɔsin de fɔ lɛk mi pas in papa ɛn in mama, i fɔ lɛk mi pas in pikin dɛn ɛn in brɔda ɛn sista dɛn ɛn i fɔ lɛk mi pas in yon layf sɛf. If nɔ so, i nɔ go bi mi lanin bɔy.
42014027	Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ ebul tot in krɔs, na pɔsin we nɔ ebul fɔ sɔfa ɛn day fɔseka Mi ɛn du ɔl wetin a de du; da pɔsin de nɔ go bi mi lanin bɔy.
42014028	“Uswan pan una go want bil os, we nɔ go sidɔm tink if di kɔpɔ we i gɛt go du fɔ bil di os?
42014029	If di pɔsin jɛs grap ɛn bigin bil, bɔt i nɔ ebul dɔn di os, dɛn pipul we go si di os we nɔ dɔn go laf di man we de bil.
42014030	Pipul dɛn go se, ‘Dis man bin bigin bil os, bɔt i nɔ ebul fɔ dɔn am!’
42014031	“Us king we gɛt tɛn tawzin soja man nɔ go sidɔm mekɔp if i go ebul fɔ fɛt in kɔmpin king we gɛt twɛnti tawzin soja man?
42014032	If i nɔ go ebul fɛt ɛn i dɔn yɛri se in kɔmpin we gɛt soja man pas am de kam fɛt am, bifo dɛn rich klos in kɔntri i go sɛn mɛse nja go beg fɔ mek dɛn go mek agrimɛnt mek wa nɔ go bi.
42014033	Na dat mek, ɛnibɔdi we nɔ lɛf ɔltin na wɔl fɔseka mi, nɔ go bi mi lanin bɔy.
42014034	“Sɔl gud, bɔt if i lɔs in tes, aw fɔ du fɔ mek i gɛt tes bak?
42014035	I nɔ gud fɔ put na grɔn wɛn dɛn de plant ɛn i nɔ gud fɔ maniɔ sɛf, i jɛs bɛtɛ mek dɛn trowe am. Ɛnibɔdi we gɛt yes fɔ yɛri, mek di pɔsin lisin!”
42015001	Dɛn pipul we de gɛda taks ɛn dɛn ɔda pipul we di Ju pipul dɛn nɔba miks wit bikɔs dɛn tink se dɛn nɔ de kip di Ju Lɔ aw dɛn fɔ kip am, bin de kam fɔ yɛri wetin Jizɔs de tɔk.
42015002	Dat mek dɛn Faresi ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha bigin grɔmbul, dɛn se, “Dis man de mek padi wit dɛn bad pipul we wi nɔ de miks wit, ɛn i de it wit dɛn.”
42015003	So Jizɔs pul pare bul. I se:
42015004	“If pɔsin gɛt wan ɔndrɛd ship, wan lɔs, da pɔsin de nɔ go lɛf di ɔda naynti-nayn ship dɛn na fil go luk fɔ di wan we lɔs sote i fɛn am?
42015005	Wɛn i fɛn in ship we bin lɔs, i go tot am, put am pan in sho lda, ɛn i go de gladi.
42015006	Wɛn i rich na in os, i go kɔl in padi dɛn ɛn in neba dɛn kam ɛn tɛl dɛn se, ‘Una kam ɛp mi gladi bikɔs a dɔn fɛn mi ship we bin lɔs!’
42015007	Semwe so, di gladi we go de na ɛvin fɔ wan pɔsin we bin de pan sin we sɔri fɔ di bad we i du ɛn tɔn to Gɔd pas di gladi we de fɔ naynti-nayn pipul we fil se dɛn tret na Gɔd yay.
42015008	“If wan uman gɛt tɛn silva kɔpɔ ɛn wan pan dɛn lɔs, i nɔ go layt lamp, swip ɔl in os, ɛn tek tɛm luk fɔ di silva kɔpɔ we lɔs sote i si am?
42015009	Wɛn i dɔn fɛn am, i go kɔl ɔl in padi dɛn ɛn in neba dɛn kam ɛn tɛl dɛn se, ‘Una kam gladi wit mi bikɔs a dɔn fɛn mi silva kɔpɔ we bin lɔs!’
42015010	Semwe so, Gɔd in enjɛl dɛn go gladi bikɔs wan pɔsin we bin de pan sin sɔri fɔ di bad we i du ɛn tɔn to Gɔd.”
42015011	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wan man bin de we bin gɛt tu bɔy pikin.
42015012	Di smɔl brɔda kam to in papa ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Papa, gi mi mi yon pat pan yu prɔpati we a fɔ gɛt.’ So di papa sheb di prɔpati ɛn gi di tu brɔda dɛn yon pat.
42015013	I nɔ lɔng igen afta dat, di lili brɔda sɛl ɔl in yon pat pan di prɔpati, gɛda di kɔpɔ ɛn go na wan kɔntri we de fawe. Na de i wes ɔl wetin i bin gɛt pan fulish layf.
42015014	Wɛn ɔltin dɔn dɔn na in an, natin nɔ bin de fɔ it na di kɔntri we i de, so i bin angri ɛn i nɔ bin gɛt ɛni tin we i want.
42015015	So i beg wan pan dɛn bigman na di tɔng fɔ mek i fɛn wok fɔ am. Di man sɛn am go na in fam fɔ go luk in ɔg dɛn ɛn gi dɛn it.
42015016	I bin so angri bad dat i bin want it di it sɛf we di ɔg dɛn de it, bɔt nɔbɔdi nɔ gi am pan am.
42015017	Wɛn i si wetin bi, i tɔk na in at se, ‘Mi papa in lebra dɛn de it te dɛn bɛlful, ɛn it kin lɛf, bɔt mi de day wit angri!
42015018	A nɔ go sidɔm igen, a go go to mi papa ɛn tɛl am se, Papa, a dɔn sin to Gɔd ɛn a dɔn sin to yu.
42015019	A nɔ fit fɔ bi yu pikin igen, duya, tek mi lɛkɛ wan pan yu lebra dɛn.’
42015020	I kɔmɔt na di kɔntri we i bin de ɛn go bak to in papa. “Wɛn i de go, i bin stil de fawe wɛn in papa si am. In papa sɔri fɔ am, so i rɔn go mit am, i grip am ɛn kis am.
42015021	Di pikin tɛl in papa se, ‘Papa, a dɔn sin to Gɔd ɛn a dɔn sin to yu. A nɔ fit fɔ mek yu kɔl mi yu pikin igen.’
42015022	Bɔt di papa tɛl in bɔy dɛn se, ‘Una rɔn go bring da klos we fayn pas ɔl dɛn ɔda klos kam wɛr am pan dis mi pikin ya, una put ring na in finga ɛn wɛr sus na in fut.
42015023	Una bring da lili kaw we fat pas ɔl, kam; una kil am, lɛ wi it ɛn gladi!
42015024	Dis mi pikin ya bin dɔn day, bɔt i dɔn gɛt layf bak. I bin lɔs, bɔt a dɔn fɛn am.’ Dɛn bigin sing ɛn dans.
42015025	“Di big brɔda bin de wok na fam ɔl da tɛm de. Wɛn i dɔn kɔmɔt na di fam de kam klos dɛn os, i yɛri dɛn de sing ɛn dans.
42015026	I kɔl wan pan di bɔy dɛn ɛn aks am wetin mek dɛn de sing ɛn dans.
42015027	Di bɔy tɛl am se, ‘Yu smɔl brɔda dɔn kam ɛn yu papa dɔn kil da lili kaw we fat pas ɔl, bikɔs yu brɔda dɔn kam bak wit in layf ɛn i wɛl.’
42015028	“Wɛn di big brɔda yɛri dat, i vɛks ɛn i nɔ gri fɔ go insay di os, so in papa go mit am na do ɛn koks am fɔ go insay.
42015029	I tɛl in papa se, ‘Papa, luk ɔmɔs ia naw we a de wok fɔ yu, wande a nɔ jomp yu wɔd, bɔt yu nɔ wande tek wan lili got sɛf gi mi fɔ mek mi ɛn mi padi dɛn go kam it ɛn mek wi ɔl gladi.
42015030	Wɛn dis yu pikin ya we dɔn go wes yu prɔpati pan dɛn trit uman, kam, yu kil di lili kaw we fat pas ɔl fɔ am!’
42015031	In papa tɛl am se, ‘Bɔbɔ, yu de naya wit mi ɔltɛm ɛn ɔl wetin a gɛt na yu yon.
42015032	Aw wi nɔ fɔ ɛnjɔy wisɛf ɛn gladi, dis yu brɔda bin dɔn day, bɔt i dɔn gɛt layf bak; i bin lɔs, bɔt wi dɔn fɛn am.’ ”
42016001	Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Wan jɛntri man bin gɛt klak we de luk oba ɔl in biznɛs. Pipul kam tɛl di jɛntri man se di klak de wes in prɔpati.
42016002	Di man sɛn kɔl di klak ɛn i aks am se, ‘Wetin a de yɛri bɔt yu so? Gi mi di buk we yu de rayt ɔl wetin yu dɔn yus ɛn wetin lɛf na yu an, bikɔs yu nɔ go du dis wok ya igen.’
42016003	Di klak tɔk na in at se, ‘Wetin a go du naw we mi masta de kam pul mi kɔmɔt na dis wok? A nɔ go ebul mek fam bikɔs a nɔ go gɛt trɛnk fɔ dig. A nɔ go go bigin beg bikɔs a go shem fɔ beg.
42016004	A dɔn no wetin a go du so dat pipul go gladi fɔ mek a go na dɛn os naw we a nɔ de wok igen.’
42016005	“So di klak bigin fɔ kɔl ɔl dɛn pipul we bin gɛt fɔ pe in masta wan bay wan. I aks di fɔs wan se, ‘Ɔmɔs yu gɛt fɔ pe mi masta?’
42016006	Di pɔsin ansa se, ‘A fɔ pe am wan ɔndrɛd galɔn pamayn.’ Di klak tɛl am se, ‘Ya dis pepa we dɛn rayt ɔmɔs yu gɛt fɔ pe; sidɔm kwik ɛn chenj di ɔndrɛd we rayt de to fifti.’
42016007	Dɔn di klak aks wan ɔda wan se, ‘Ɔmɔs yu gɛt fɔ pe mi masta?’ Di pɔsin ansa se, ‘A gɛt fɔ pe am wan ɔndrɛd bag rɛs.’ Di klak tɛl di pɔsin se, ‘Ya di pepa we dɛn rayt ɔmɔs yu fɔ pe; chenj di wan ɔndrɛd we rayt de to eti.’
42016008	“Di masta se di klak we tif du wɛl bikɔs i tink gud bifo i du ɔl wetin i du. Dɛn pipul we tek dɛn tin na wɔl mek gɔd, de tink fa wɛn dɛn de dil wit pipul lɛkɛ dɛnsɛf pas dɛn pipul we de waka na Gɔd in layt.”
42016009	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Una fɔ tek mɔni fɔ du gud ɛn mek padi, so wɛn di mɔni dɔn, Gɔd go gi una ples fɔ tap na di say we go de sote go.
42016010	Da pɔsin we yu kin trɔs pan lili tin na pɔsin we yu kin trɔs pan big tin, ɛn da pɔsin we nɔ tret wit lili tin nɔ go tret wit big tin.
42016011	If pɔsin nɔ kin trɔs una wit mɔni we dɛn nɔ waka tret fɔ gɛt, udat go lɛf di tru jɛntri na una an?
42016012	If dɛn nɔ trɔs una wit ɔda pɔsin prɔpati, udat go gi una prɔpati we go bi una yon?
42016013	“Wan slev nɔ go de wok fɔ tu masta. If i bi so, i go lɛk wan masta, i nɔ go lɛk di ɔda wan. I go wok gud fɔ wan masta, bɔt i nɔ go wok gud fɔ di ɔda wan. Una nɔ go de du Gɔd wok ɛn bi slev to mɔni, di sem tɛm.”
42016014	Wɛn di Faresi dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, dɛn laf am bikɔs dɛn na pipul we lɛk mɔni.
42016015	Bɔt Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Una de mek pipul fil se una nɔ de du bad, bɔt Gɔd no wetin de na una at. Di tin we mɔta lman luk se impɔtant, na in Gɔd nɔ lɛk at ɔl.
42016016	“Pipul bin de tɔk bɔt di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis ɛn wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt sote di tɛm we Jɔn we bin de baptayz pipul, kam. Frɔm da tɛm de te naw dɛn de tɔk di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn ɔlman de fɛt fɔ go insay di ples we Gɔd de rul.
42016017	Bɔt i go izi fɔ mek ɛvin ɛn dis wɔl pwɛl, pas fɔ mek di wɔd we lili pas ɔl na di Lɔ, lɔs in minin.
42016018	“Ɛni man we dɔn kɛr in wɛf go kot ɛn pat wit am dɛn i go mared ɔda uman, dɔn sin lɛkɛ man we go gɛt ɔda uman pan ɔl we in ɛn in wɛf de na os; ɛn ɛni man we go mared uman we in ɛn in man dɔn go kot ɛn pat, dɔn sin lɛkɛ man we go gɛt ɔda uman pan ɔl we in ɛn in wɛf nɔ pat.
42016019	“Wan jɛntri man bin de we kin de wɛr dɛn dia klos lɛkɛ silk ɛn satin. I kin de kuk plɛnti it ɛn kɔl pipul kam it ɛvri de.
42016020	Ɛvri de, wan po man we nem Lazarɔs kin de go ledɔm na di jɛntri man in get. So bin kɔba di po man in bɔdi.
