42016021	I kin want fɔ it dɛn it we lɛf we di jɛntri man in bɔy dɛn de trowe. Pantap dat, dɛn dɔg kin de kam lik di po man in so dɛn.
42016022	“Tɛm kam we di po man day ɛn enjɛl kam kɛr am go put am klos Ebraam na ɛvin. Di jɛntri man insɛf day, dɛn bɛr am.
42016023	Wɛn i de na ɛl de sɔfa pen, i es in yay luk, na de i si Ebraam fawe klos Lazarɔs.
42016024	Di jɛntri man ala se, ‘Papa Ebraam, sɔri fɔ mi! Sɛn Lazarɔs fɔ put in finga na wata ɛn kam tɔch mi tɔng so dat i go kol, bikɔs a de sɔfa bad insay dis faya ya!’
42016025	“Bɔt Ebraam tɛl am se, ‘Mi pikin, mɛmba se yu bin jɛntri ɛn yu ɛnjɔy yusɛf di tɛm we yu bin de na wɔl ɛn da tɛm de Lazarɔs bin po ɛn i bin de sɔfa. Bɔt naw Gɔd de blɛs Lazarɔs bɔt yu de sɔfa.
42016026	Ɛn pantap dat, big big ol divayd di ples we wi de ɛn di ples we una de, so nɔbɔdi nɔ go kɔmɔt ya go to una, ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ go kɔmɔt to una yanda kam to wi.’
42016027	Di jɛntri man se, ‘A beg yu, Papa Ebraam, duya, sɛn Lazarɔs go na mi papa in os bikɔs a gɛt fayv brɔda dɛn de, mek i go wɔn dɛn mek dɛnsɛf nɔ go kam sɔfa na dis ples.’
42016029	“Bɔt Ebraam tɛl am se, ‘Yu brɔda dɛn gɛt Mozis ɛn dɛn prɔfɛt fɔ wɔn dɛn, mek dɛn lisin wetin dɛn de tɔk.’
42016030	Di jɛntri man se, ‘Papa Ebraam, dɛn nɔ go lisin dɛn; bɔt if pɔsin kɔmɔt na di say we dɛn dayman de, go tɔk to dɛn, dɛn go tap fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du.’
42016031	Ebraam tɛl am se, ‘If yu brɔda dɛn nɔ lisin wetin Mozis ɛn dɛn prɔfɛt de tɛl dɛn, dɛn nɔ go fil se dɛn de du bad, if pɔsin we bin dɔn day sɛf go bak na wɔl go tɔk to dɛn.’ ”
42017001	Jizɔs tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn. I se, “Na tru se tin dɛn mɔs bi we go mek pipul want du bad, bɔt waala go mit di pɔsin we go mek dɛn bi.
42017002	I bin go bɛtɛ fɔ da pɔsin de mek dɛn ɛng big ston na in nɛk ɛn trowe am na big wata pas fɔ mek i mek dɛn pipul we jɛs bigin fɔ biliv Gɔd du bad.
42017003	So una tek tɛm aw una de du. “If yu brɔda du yu bad, yu fɔ tɔk pan am; if i sɔri fɔ di bad we i du, yu fɔ padin am.
42017004	If i du yu bad sɛvin tɛm wan de, ɛn i kam mit yu se, ‘A beg, a sɔri fɔ wetin a du,’ ɛnitɛm we i du yu bad, yu fɔ padin am.”
42017005	Jizɔs in apɔsul dɛn tɛl am se, “Masta, duya, ɛp wi, mek wi go biliv Gɔd gud gud.”
42017006	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “If una biliv, ilɛk di biliv we una biliv tan lɛkɛ wan lili sid lɛkɛ mɔstad sid, una kin tɛl ɛni big tik se, ‘Kɔmɔt naya go tinap na wata’ ɛn i go muf go na di wata.
42017007	“Ɛni wan pan una we gɛt lebra we de dig fɔ am na in fam ɔ we de mɛn ship fɔ am, go jɛs go mit di lebra wɛn i kɔmɔt wok ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Kam it wantɛm?’
42017008	I go tɛl di lebra se, ‘Go kuk fɔ mi, wɛr di klos we yu fɔ wɛr fɔ sav, put di it na tebul ɛn wet sote a dɔn it dɔn bifo yusɛf go it.’
42017009	Di masta fɔ tɛl di lebra tɛnki bikɔs i du wetin i tɛl am fɔ du?
42017010	Semwe so, wɛn una dɔn du ɔl wetin una masta tɛl una fɔ du, una fɔ se, ‘Wi nɔto bɛtɛ wokman; wi jɛs du wetin wi bin gɛt fɔ du nɔmɔ.’ ”
42017011	Wɛn Jizɔs bin de go na Jerusɛlɛm, i pas na di sho midul Same ria ɛn Galili.
42017012	As i rich na wan vilej, i mit tɛn pipul we gɛt bad sik na dɛn skin. Dɛn tinap fawe,
42017013	dɛn ala se, “Masta! Jizɔs! Duya, sɔri fɔ wi!”
42017014	Wɛn Jizɔs si dɛn, i se, “Una go to dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin mek dɛn luk una.” Aw dɛn de na rod de go, na in dɛn ɔl wɛl.
42017015	Wan pan dɛn, wɛn i si se in dɔn wɛl, i tɔn bak go mit Jizɔs. I bin de ala big wan de prez Gɔd ɛn tɛl am tɛnki.
42017016	Wɛn i mit Jizɔs, i fɔdɔm na Jizɔs in fut ɛn tɛl am plɛnti tɛnki. Da man de na bin man we kɔmɔt Same ria.
42017017	Jizɔs se, “Nɔto tɛn pipul a mɛn, we di ɔda nayn?
42017018	Nɔbɔdi nɔ kam bak fɔ kam tɛl Gɔd tɛnki pas dis tre nja in wan gren nɔmɔ?”
42017019	Jizɔs tɛl di man se, “Grap, go na yu os; bikɔs yu biliv, yu dɔn wɛl.”
42017020	Di Faresi dɛn aks Jizɔs ustɛm Gɔd go kam fɔ rul di wɔl. Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Wɛn Gɔd de kam fɔ rul di wɔl una nɔ go si sayn fɔ sho una se Gɔd de kam fɔ rul di wɔl.
42017021	Ɛn pipul nɔ go se, ‘Naya Gɔd de rul’ ɔ ‘Na yanda i de rul;’ bikɔs naw, naw Gɔd de rul insay una.”
42017022	Jizɔs tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Di tɛm go kam we una go want si Mɔta lman Pikin bad bad, wan de sɛf wɛn i kam bak na wɔl, bɔt una nɔ go si am.
42017023	Sɔm pipul go tɛl una se, ‘Luk Mɔta lman Pikin naya!’ ɔda pipul go se ‘Luk Mɔta lman Pikin yanda!’ Una nɔ fɔ fala dɛn go de.
42017024	Di tɛm we Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak na wɔl, go kam kwik wan lɛkɛ wɛn laytin kin flash na di klawd frɔm wan pat to di ɔda pat.
42017025	Bɔt bifo ɔl dis bi, Mɔta lman Pikin fɔ sɔfa plɛnti tin ɛn dɛn tide pipul nɔ go want si am.
42017026	Lɛkɛ aw i bin bi wɛn Noa bin de, na so i go bi wɛn Mɔtalman Pikin go kam bak.
42017027	Da tɛm de pipul bin de it, drink, ɛn mared. Dɛn bin de pan dis kayn layf sote Noa go insay di bot we i bil fɔ di ren. Big big ren bin fɔdɔm ɛn ɔlman day na di plɛnti plɛnti wata we kɔba di grɔn.
42017028	Semwe so, di tɛm we Lɔt bin de, pipul bin de it ɛn drink, dɛn bin de bay ɛn sɛl, ɛn dɛn bin de mek fam ɛn bil os.
42017029	Bɔt di de we Lɔt kɔmɔt na Sɔdɔm, Gɔd mek faya ɛn ston we de bɔn lɛkɛ faya fɔdɔm pan Sɔdɔm lɛkɛ ren ɛn kil ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin lib de.
42017030	Na so i go bi di de we Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak na wɔl.
42017031	“Da de de, ɛnibɔdi we de pantap ruf nɔ fɔ kam dɔng ɛn go insay in os fɔ gɛda in prɔpati. Semwe so, ɛnibɔdi we de na fam, nɔ fɔ go bak na in os.
42017032	Una mɛmba wetin bin bi to Lɔt in wɛf.
42017033	Ɛnibɔdi we de tray fɔ sev in layf, go lɔs am; bɔt ɛnibɔdi we lɔs in layf fɔseka mi, go gɛt di tru layf.
42017034	A de tɛl una se, da de we Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak, tu pipul go de slip na wan bed; enjɛl go kam tek wan go ɛn lɛf di ɔda wan.
42017035	Tu uman dɛn go de bit rɛs na wan mataodo; enjɛl go kam tek wan pan dɛn tu ɛn lɛf di ɔda wan. [
42017036	Tu man dɛn go de wok na fam; enjɛl go tek wan go ɛn lɛf di ɔda wan.]”
42017037	Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn aks am se, “Masta, usay dɛn tin ya go bi?” Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Ɛni say we bif we dɔn day de, na de yuba dɛn de go gɛda.”
42018001	Jizɔs pul pare bul fɔ in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ sho dɛn se dɛn fɔ de pre ɔltɛm ɛn dɛn at nɔ fɔ pwɛl.
42018002	Jizɔs se: “Wan jɔj bin de na wan tɔng we nɔ bin fred Gɔd ɔ rɛspɛkt mɔta lman.
42018003	Wan uman we in man bin dɔn day bin de na da sem tɔng de. Dis uman kin go to di jɔj ɔltɛm ɛn tɛl am se, ‘Pa, a kɛr sɔmbɔdi go kot, duya, fɛt mi kes fɔ mi.’
42018004	Plɛnti tɛm di uman kin beg di jɔj, bɔt di jɔj nɔ kin gri fɔ tek in kes. Bɔt wan de, na in di jɔj se, ‘Na tru se, a nɔ de fred Gɔd ɛn a nɔ rɛspɛkt nɔbɔdi,
42018005	bɔt we dis uman dɔn de beg mi plɛnti tɛm, a go tek di kes. If a nɔ du so, i go de kam to mi sote misɛf go taya!’ ”
42018006	Jizɔs se, “Una yɛri wetin dis jɔj we nɔ tret se?
42018007	Una min se Gɔd in pipul dɛn we i dɔn pik ɛn we de kray to am de ɛn nɛt fɔ mek i ɛp dɛn, Gɔd nɔ go tek dɛn kes? Una min se Gɔd go te fɔ ansa in pipul dɛn?
42018008	A de tɛl una se, i nɔ go te, Gɔd go tek in pipul dɛn kes ɛn fɛt fɔ dɛn! Pan ɔl dat, wɛn Mɔta lman Pikin go kam bak, a wɔnda if i go mit pipul na di wɔl we biliv pan am!”
42018009	Jizɔs pul pare bul fɔ dɛn pipul we biliv se dɛn de waka tret wit Gɔd ɛn dɛn luk se di ɔda pipul dɛn nɔ de waka tret. I se:
42018010	“Tu man dɛn bin go pre na Gɔd in Os wan de; wan na bin Faresi, di ɔda wan na pɔsin we bin de gɛda taks.
42018011	“Di Faresi tinap ɛn pre kwayɛt wan se, ‘Gɔd, a tɛl yu tɛnki bikɔs a nɔ tan lɛkɛ dɛn ɔda pipul; dɛn de rog, dɛn nɔ de du rayt, ɛn dɛn de lɛf dɛn mared wɛf ɔ man go fɛn ɔda pɔsin na trit. A tɛl yu tɛnki we a nɔ tan lɛkɛ dis man ya sɛf we de gɛda taks.
42018012	A de fast tu tɛm ɛvri wik, a de sheb ɔltin we a gɛt tɛn ɛn gi yu wan pat.’
42018013	“Bɔt di man we de gɛda taks tinap fawe, i nɔ es in yay ɔp sɛf. I jɛs de nak in chɛst fɔ sho se in at ebi ɛn se, ‘Gɔd, sɔri fɔ mi, mi na pɔsin we de pan sin!’
42018014	A de tɛl una se, bifo dis man we de gɛda taks go bak na in os, Gɔd padin am; bɔt Gɔd nɔ padin di Faresi. Ɛnibɔdi we put insɛf ɔp, Gɔd go put am dɔng, bɔt pɔsin we put insɛf dɔng, Gɔd go es am ɔp.”
42018015	Sɔm pipul bring dɛn lili pikin kam fɔ mek Jizɔs blɛs dɛn. Wɛn Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn si dat, dɛn tɔk pan di pipul dɛn.
42018016	Jizɔs kɔl di pikin dɛn, i tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una mek dɛn pikin kam to mi, una nɔ tap dɛn; na pipul dɛn lɛkɛ dɛn wan ya so go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
42018017	Fɔ tru, a de tɛl una se, ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri fɔ mek Gɔd rul am lɛkɛ lili pikin, nɔ go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
42018018	Wan bigman kam aks Jizɔs se, “Ticha, yu we gud, wetin a fɔ du fɔ mek a gɛt layf we go de sote go?”
42018019	Jizɔs aks am se, “Wetin mek yu se a gud? Nɔbɔdi nɔ de we gud, na Gɔd in wan gren gud.
42018020	Yu sabi di Lɔ we se, ‘mare dman nɔ fɔ lɛf in wɛf ɛn kip ɔda uman ɛn mare du man nɔ fɔ lɛf in man ɛn kip ɔda man, yu nɔ fɔ kil yu kɔmpin mɔta lman, yu nɔ fɔ tif, yu nɔ fɔ lay pan yu kɔmpin ɛn yu fɔ rɛspɛkt yu papa ɛn yu mama.’ ”
42018021	Di bigman se, “A dɔn kip ɔl dɛn lɔ ya frɔm we mi na bin pikin.”
42018022	Wɛn Jizɔs yɛri wetin di man tɔk, Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Na wan tin lɛf we yu nɔ du yet. Go, sɛl ɔl wetin yu gɛt ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi dɛn pipul we nɔ gɛt natin. Wɛn yu dɔn du dat, yu go jɛntri na ɛvin. Afta dat kam bi mi lanin bɔy.”
42018023	Wɛn di bigman yɛri wetin Jizɔs se, in at pwɛl bikɔs na bin jɛntri man.
42018024	Jizɔs si se di man in at pwɛl, so i se, “I tra nga fɔ mek jɛntri pipul kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.
42018025	I tra nga fɔ mek da big bif we nem kamɛl pas insay nidul yay, bɔt i go tra nga pas dat fɔ mek jɛntri pɔsin kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
42018026	Dɛn pipul we yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, aks am se, “Wɛl, udat go sev?”
42018027	Jizɔs se, “Gɔd ebul du wetin mɔta lman nɔ ebul du.”
42018028	Na de Pita se, “Wi dɔn lɛf ɔltin fɔ fala yu.”
42018029	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Mek a tɛl una, ɛnibɔdi we dɔn lɛf os, ɔ wɛf, ɔ brɔda dɛn, ɔ mama, ɔ papa, ɔ pikin dɛn fɔseka Gɔd in rul,
42018030	Gɔd go mek i gɛt bɔku pas wetin i lɛf fɔ fala mi yon we, ɛn i go gi am layf we go de sote go na di wɔl we gɛt fɔ kam.”
42018031	Jizɔs tek in lanin bɔy dɛn go na kɔna ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Wi de go Jerusɛlɛm naw ɛn ɔltin we dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin go bi.
42018032	Dɛn go and Mɔta lman Pikin gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju. Dɛn pipul de go laf am, dɛn go du am tin we go mek i shem, ɛn dɛn go pit pan am.
42018033	Dɛn go bit am, dɔn dɛn go kil am, bɔt Mɔta lman Pikin go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
42018034	Bɔt Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin no wetin Jizɔs de tɔk bɔt bikɔs Gɔd bin ayd di minin.
42018035	Wɛn Jizɔs rich klos Jɛriko, i mit wan blɛnyay man sidɔm klos di rod de beg.
42018036	Wɛn di blɛnyay man yɛri plɛnti pipul de pas, i aks dɛn wetin de bi.
42018037	Dɛn tɛl am se, “Na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt de pas.”
42018038	Wɛn di blɛnyay man yɛri dat, i ala se, “Jizɔs we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi!”
42018039	Dɛn pipul we bin de waka bifo Jizɔs tɔk pan di man, dɛn tɛl am fɔ sɛt in mɔt, bɔt na di mɔ i de ala se, “Jizɔs we na Devid in pikin, sɔri fɔ mi!”
42018040	Jizɔs tinap. I tɛl dɛn fɔ bring di blɛnyay man kam to am; wɛn di man kam klos Jizɔs, Jizɔs aks am se,
42018041	“Wetin yu want mek a du fɔ yu?” Di man ansa se, “Masta, a want mek yu mek a si.”
42018042	Jizɔs tɛl di man se, “A de mek yu si naw, bikɔs yu biliv, yu dɔn wɛl!”
42018043	Di man bigin si wantɛm ɛn fala Jizɔs de prez Gɔd. Wɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn si wetin bi, dɛnsɛf prez Gɔd.
42019001	Wɛn Jizɔs bin pas na Jɛriko, i bin mit wan man we nem Zakiɔs.
42019002	Zakiɔs na bin di edman fɔ dɛn pipul we bin de gɛda taks ɛn na bin jɛntri man.
42019003	I tray fɔ si Jizɔs bɔt i nɔ bin ebul si am bikɔs pipul bin plɛnti rawnd Jizɔs, ɛn i bin shɔt.
42019004	So i rɔn go bifo say na di rod we Jizɔs fɔ pas ɛn klem pan wan big tik.
42019005	Wɛn Jizɔs rich nia di tik we Zakiɔs bin de, i luk ɔp di tik ɛn se, “Zakiɔs, kam dɔng wantɛm bikɔs a mɔs slip na yu os.”
42019006	So Zakiɔs kam dɔng kwik, i gladi fɔ kɛr Jizɔs go na in os.
42019007	Wɛn di pipul dɛn si wetin bi, dɛn bigin grɔmbul se, “Jizɔs dɔn go slip na man we de pan sin, in os.”
42019008	Zakiɔs tɛl Jizɔs bifo ɔlman se, “Masta, a go sheb mi prɔpati tu ɛn gi dɛn po pipul wan pat, ɛn ɛni tin we a bin tek na pɔsin an we a nɔ bin fɔ tek a go gi di pɔsin fo tɛm pas wetin a bin tek na in an.”
42019009	Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Frɔm tide, Gɔd dɔn sev yu ɛn yu fambul dɛn bikɔs yusɛf na wan pan Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.
42019010	Mɔta lman Pikin dɔn kam fɔ luk fɔ dɛn pipul we dɔn lɔs dɛn we, ɛn sev dɛn.”
42019011	As di pipul dɛn de bin de lisin, Jizɔs pul wan ɔda pare bul bikɔs i bin de klos Jerusɛlɛm ɛn di pipul dɛn bin min se Gɔd go kam dɔng kam rul wantɛm.
42019012	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wan man we fambul to sɔm king dɛn bin go na wan fawe kɔntri fɔ mek dɛn go gi am di pawa fɔ bi king na in kɔntri; dɔn i go go bak na in kɔntri.
42019013	Di man kɔl in tɛn wokman dɛn ɛn gi dɛn ɔl wan, wan gold kɔpɔ. I se, ‘Una tek dis kɔpɔ ɛn du biznɛs wit am sote a kam bak.’
42019014	Bɔt di pipul dɛn na di kɔntri nɔ bin lɛk di man, so dɛn sɛn mɛse nja go na di ɔda kɔntri we di man go fɔ go tɛl di wan we de rul de se dɛn nɔ want di man fɔ rul dɛn.
42019015	“Wɛn di man tɔn bak kam na in kɔntri afta dɛn dɔn gi am di pawa fɔ bi king, i sɛn kɔl in wokman dɛn we i bin gi kɔpɔ fɔ mek dɛn kam tɛl am ɔmɔs dɛn dɔn gen.
42019016	Wɛn di fɔs wokman kam, i se, ‘Masta, a dɔn gen tɛn gold kɔpɔ pantap da wan we yu bin gi mi.’
42019017	In masta tɛl am se, ‘Yu du wɛl, yu na gud wokman! Bikɔs a ebul trɔs yu pan smɔl tin, a go mek yu rul oba tɛn tɔng.’
42019018	Wɛn di sɛkɛn wokman kam, i se, ‘Masta, a dɔn gen fayv gold kɔpɔ pantap da wan we yu bin gi mi.’
42019019	In masta tɛl am se, ‘Yu go rul oba fayv tɔng.’
42019020	“Wan ɔda wokman kam tɛl di masta se, ‘Masta, ya da wan gold kɔpɔ we yu bin gi mi, a bin tay am ɛn kip am.
42019021	A bin de fred yu bikɔs yu gɛt na an. Yu lɛk fɔ tek wetin nɔto yu yon ɛn yu lɛk fɔ pik wetin yu nɔ plant!’
42019022	In masta tɛl am se, ‘Yu na bad wokman! Na wetin yu yon mɔt tɔk, na in a de tek jɔj yu! Yu bin no se a gɛt na an; a kin tek wetin nɔto mi yon ɛn a kin pik wetin a nɔ plant,
42019023	wetin du yu nɔ bin go put mi kɔpɔ na bank so dat bay di tɛm we a kam bak dɛn bin fɔ dɔn gi mi intrɛst pan am?’
42019024	“Na in di masta tɛl in savant dɛn we bin tinap de se, ‘Una tek di wan gold kɔpɔ na in an ɛn gi di man we gɛt tɛn gold kɔpɔ.’
42019025	In savant dɛn se, ‘Masta, di man gɛt tɛn gold kɔpɔ, yu de gi am mɔ?’
42019026	I se, ‘A de tɛl una se, pɔsin we gɛt sɔntin, Gɔd go gi am mɔ; bɔt pɔsin we nɔ gɛt, di lili bit sɛf we i gɛt, Gɔd go tek am na in an.
42019027	Dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk mi, we nɔ want fɔ mek a rul dɛn, una bring dɛn kam na ya ɛn kil dɛn bifo mi.’ ”
42019028	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk dɔn, i kɔnti nyu fɔ waka go Jerusɛlɛm.
42019029	Wɛn i rich klos Bɛtfej ɛn Bɛtani, we de na da big il we dɛn kɔl Mawnt Ɔliv, i kɔl tu pan in lanin bɔy dɛn kam fɔ sɛn dɛn;
42019030	i se, “Una go na da vilej we de bifo wi so. Una go mit dɛn tay wan dɔnki pikin na di get, nɔbɔdi nɔ sidɔm pan am yet. Una lus am ɛn bring am kam to mi.
42019031	If ɛnibɔdi aks una wetin mek una de lus am, una jɛs ansa se, ‘Wi Masta want am.’ ”
42019032	Wɛn di lanin bɔy dɛn go na di vilej, dɛn mit ɔltin lɛkɛ aw Jizɔs tɛl dɛn.
42019033	As dɛn de lus di dɔnki pikin, di pɔsin we gɛt am aks dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de lus am?”
42019034	Dɛn ansa se, “Na wi Masta want am.”
42019035	Di lanin bɔy dɛn kɛr di dɔnki pikin go to Jizɔs, dɛn prɛd dɛn klos pan di dɔnki pikin fɔ mek Jizɔs sidɔm pan am.
42019036	As Jizɔs de rayd go Jerusɛlɛm, di pipul dɛn prɛd dɛn klos na di rod we i de pas.
42019037	Wɛn Jizɔs kɔmɔt Mawnt Ɔliv de go dɔng di il, i kam klos Jerusɛlɛm ɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we bin de fala am bigin gladi ɛn ala prez Gɔd fɔ ɔl dɛn big wok we i du we dɛn si.
42019038	Dɛn se, “Gɔd blɛs di King we i dɔn sɛn fɔ kam tinap fɔ am! Kol at de na ɛvin ɛn wi de prez Gɔd!”
42019039	Sɔm pan dɛn Faresi we bin de na di krawd tɛl Jizɔs se, “Ticha, tɛl yu lanin bɔy dɛn mek dɛn sɛt dɛn mɔt.”
42019040	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “A de tɛl una se, if dɛn pipul ya sɛt dɛn mɔt, dɛn ston ya go ala wantɛm!”
42019041	Wɛn Jizɔs rich klos Jerusɛlɛm, as i si di tɔng so, i bigin kray fɔ am.
42019042	I se, “Aya, if una we de na Jerusɛlɛm bin sabi naw sɛf dɛn tin we go gi una kol at bɔt una yay nɔ go si dɛn tin de naw.
42019043	Tɛm de kam we dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk una go bil ston wɔl rawnd una tɔng, ɛn tinap rawnd am so dat una nɔ go gɛt ples fɔ pas kɔmɔt.
42019044	Dɛn go ib una ɛn una pikin dɛn na grɔn ɔlɔbɔt ɛn dɛn nɔ go lɛf wan ston pan in kɔmpin insay una tɔng, bikɔs una nɔ bin no wɛn Gɔd bin kam fɔ sev una.”
42019045	Jizɔs go insay Gɔd in Os ɛn bigin fɔ drɛb dɛn pipul we bin de bay ɛn sɛl insay de.
42019046	I se, “Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, Gɔd se, ‘Mi Os na ples fɔ pre,’ bɔt una dɔn tɔn am to ples we tifman de ayd!”
42019047	Jizɔs bin de tich na Gɔd in Os ɛvri de. Dɛn edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn tray fɔ fɛn we fɔ kil Jizɔs,
42019048	bɔt dɛn nɔ bin no wetin fɔ du bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn bin want yɛri wetin Jizɔs de tich, dɛn nɔ bin want mis wan wɔd sɛf.
42020001	Wan ɔda de, we Jizɔs bin de lan pipul ɛn tɛl dɛn di Gud Nyus na Gɔd in Os, na in dɛn edman fɔ dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn kam mit am
42020002	ɛn se, “Tɛl wi, us rayt yu gɛt fɔ du dɛn tin ya ɛn udat gi yu di rayt fɔ du dɛn?”
42020003	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Mek misɛf aks una wan kwɛshɔn; una tɛl mi,
42020004	udat bin sɛn Jɔn fɔ baptayz pipul, na Gɔd ɔ na mɔta lman?”
42020005	Dɛn se, “If wi ansa se, ‘Na Gɔd sɛn am,’ Jizɔs go se, ‘Wɛl, wetin mek una nɔ bin biliv am?’
42020006	If wi se, ‘Na mɔta lman sɛn am’ ɔl di pipul dɛn go ston wi bikɔs dɛn biliv se Jɔn na bin prɔfɛt.”
42020007	So dɛn ansa Jizɔs se dɛn nɔ no udat sɛn Jɔn fɔ baptayz pipul.
42020008	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wɛl, misɛf nɔ go tɛl una udat gi mi di rayt fɔ du dɛn tin ya.”
42020009	Jizɔs pul pare bul fɔ di pipul dɛn, i se: “Wan man plant gre pvayn na in gadin ɛn rɛnt am gi sɔm pipul, dɔn i go patrol na ɔda kɔntri. I lib de lɔng.
42020010	Wɛn di tɛm rich fɔ pik di greps na in gadin, i sɛn in bɔy to di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin fɔ aks dɛn fɔ gi am sɔm pan di greps, bɔt di pipul dɛn bit di bɔy we i sɛn, dɔn dɛn drɛb am kɔmɔt na di gadin, dɛn nɔ gi am natin.
42020011	Di man sɛn ɔda bɔy; dɛn bit insɛf, disgres am, ɛn drɛb am. Dɛn nɔ gi insɛf natin.
42020012	Di man sɛn ɔda bɔy igen, dɛn wund am ɛn drɛb am kɔmɔt na di gadin.
42020013	Di man we gɛt di gadin se, ‘Wetin a fɔ du naw? A go sɛn mi bɔy pikin we a lɛk, sɔntɛm dɛn go rɛspɛkt am wɛn dɛn si se na mi pikin.’
42020014	Wɛn di pipul dɛn we rɛnt di gadin si di pikin, dɛn se, ‘Na dis pikin dis prɔpati ya go lɛf to. Lɛ wi kil am so dat di prɔpati go kam na wi an.’
42020015	Dɛn drɛb di man in pikin kɔmɔt na di gadin dɔn dɛn kil am.” So Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una tink se di man we gɛt di gadin go du dɛn pipul ya?
42020016	I go kam kil dɛn ɔl ɛn rɛnt di gadin gi ɔda pipul.” Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri wetin Jizɔs tɔk, dɛn se, “Lɛ Gɔd nɔ mek dat bi!”
42020017	Bɔt Jizɔs luk dɛn ɛn aks dɛn se, “Aw una go ɛksplen wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk we se, ‘Da ston we dɛn pipul we de bil nɔ tek mek natin, na in dɔn kam bi di wan we impɔtant pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn.’
42020018	Ɛnibɔdi we fɔdɔm pan dis ston ya go brok in bon dɛn ɛn if di ston fɔdɔm pan ɛnibɔdi, i go gren di pɔsin.”
42020019	Da sem tɛm de, dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ɛn dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin tray fɔ ol Jizɔs bikɔs dɛn kechɔp se na fɔ dɛn Jizɔs pul di pare bul, bɔt dɛn nɔ ol am bikɔs dɛn bin de fred di pipul dɛn we bin lib de.
42020020	So dɛn bigin wach Jizɔs, ɛn dɛn sɛn ɔda pipul fɔ wach am. Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn we dɛn sɛn, fɔ mek lɛkɛ se dɛn na gud pipul, so dat dɛn go tek di wɔd dɛn we Jizɔs de tɔk kech am ɛn dɛn go kɛr am go bifo di bigman we de rul fɔ mek i go jɔj am.
42020021	Di pipul dɛn we go fɔ wach Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Ticha, wi no se ɔl wetin yu de tɔk ɛn lan wi na tru ɛn yu nɔ tek ɛnibɔdi pas in kɔmpin. Wetin Gɔd want mɔta lman fɔ du, na in yu de lan wi, fɔ tru.”
42020022	Dɛn aks am se, “I rayt fɔ mek wi pe taks to di king na Rom ɔ i nɔ rayt?”
42020023	Bɔt Jizɔs bin no se na sɛns dɛn want pul pan am fɔ kech am, so i se,
42020024	“Una go bring wan Roman kɔpɔ kam. Udat in pikchɔ de pan dis kɔpɔ ya ɛn udat in nem rayt de?” Dɛn se, “Na di king na Rom in yon.”
42020025	Jizɔs se, “Una gi di king na Rom wetin blant am ɛn una gi Gɔd wetin blant Gɔd.”
42020026	Dɛn nɔ ebul kech Jizɔs fɔ wetin i tɔk we di pipul dɛn bin de; di wɔd we Jizɔs tɔk mek dɛn wɔnda ɛn dɛn nɔ ebul tɔk natin igen.
42020027	Sɔm Sadyusi dɛn kam mit Jizɔs; di Sadyusi dɛn bin biliv se pɔsin we dɔn day nɔ go rayz frɔm in grev.
42020028	Dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Ticha, Mozis bin rayt se, ‘If pɔsin in brɔda day ɛn lɛf wɛf we nɔ bɔn pikin, di man fɔ mared di uman fɔ mek dɛn bɔn pikin fɔ di brɔda we dɔn day.’
42020029	Sɛvin brɔda bin de, di fɔs wan mared, i day, i nɔ lɛf pikin.
42020030	Di ɔda brɔda mared di wɛf we i day lɛf, insɛf day, i nɔ lɛf pikin.
42020031	Di brɔda we mek tri insɛf mared di uman, insɛf day, na di sem tin bi wit ɔl di sɛvin brɔda dɛn. Dɛn ɔl mared di uman wan afta dɛn kɔmpin, dɛn ɔl day, dɛn nɔ lɛf pikin.
42020032	Di uman insɛf kam day.
42020033	Di tɛm we dɛn pipul we dɔn day go rayz frɔm dɛn grev, udat go gɛt di uman fɔ in wɛf we dɛn ɔl sɛvin bin dɔn mared am?”
42020034	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Dɛn pipul na dis wɔl de mared;
42020035	bɔt dɛn pipul we Gɔd si se fit fɔ rayz frɔm dɛn grev go na ɛvin, nɔ de mared.
42020036	Dɛn nɔ go day igen bikɔs dɛn tan lɛkɛ enjɛl naw ɛn dɛn na Gɔd in pikin dɛn bikɔs dɛn bin dɔn day, bɔt naw dɛn dɔn gɛt layf bak na ɛvin.
42020037	Mozis insɛf sho se dɛn dayman de rayz frɔm dɛn grev go ɛvin bikɔs na da say we rayt na Gɔd in Buk bɔt da tɛm we i bin tinap bifo da smɔl tik we de bɔn, i bin se di Masta we na Gɔd, na Gɔd fɔ Ebraam, fɔ Ayzik, ɛn fɔ Jekɔb.
42020038	If Gɔd na Gɔd fɔ wan pɔsin, dat min se da pɔsin de nɔto pɔsin we day bɔt na pɔsin we gɛt layf, ɛn di layf we wi gɛt we go de sote go na fɔ Gɔd.”
42020039	Sɔm pan di Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn tɛl Jizɔs se, “Masta, yu ansa fayn.”
42020040	Dɛn fred fɔ aks Jizɔs ɔda kwɛshɔn.
42020041	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Aw dɛn pipul ya go se di Mɛsaya na wan pan Devid in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn?
42020042	Devid insɛf rayt na di Sambuk se, ‘Gɔd tɛl mi Masta se: Sidɔm na mi raytan
42020043	sote a mek yu mas dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk yu.’
42020044	If Devid kɔl am Masta, aw i go bi wan pan in gran pi kin-pi kin dɛn?”
42020045	Jizɔs tinap bifo ɔl di pipul dɛn ɛn tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se,
42020046	“Una fɔ tek tɛm wit dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha ya. Dɛn na pipul we lɛk fɔ wɛr dɛn lɔng gawn fɔ mek ɔlman no se dɛn na big man ɛn dɛn lɛk fɔ mek pipul tɛl dɛn adu na dɛn ples we plɛnti pipul gɛda. Wɛn dɛn go na di Ju mitin os, dɛn kin lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn bɛnch we de bifo ɛn wɛn dɛn go pati, dɛn kin lɛk fɔ sidɔm na dɛn ples we dɛn bigman de sidɔm.
42020047	Na dɛn pipul ya kin tek dɛn uman, we dɛn man dɔn day, dɛn prɔpati, ɛn dɛn kin tinap de pre lɔng lɔng lɛkɛ se dɛn na gud pipul. Gɔd go pɔnish dɛn pas aw i go pɔnish ɔda pipul.”
42021001	Jizɔs bin de luk, na de i si dɛn jɛntri pipul de kam put mɔni insay di mɔni bɔks we bin de na Gɔd in Os.
42021002	Jizɔs si wan po mami we in man bin dɔn day, kam put tu kɔpɔ we na lɛkɛ wan sɛnt so insay di mɔni bɔks.
42021003	Na in Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una se, fɔ tru, dis po mami ya put pas wetin ɔl dɛn ɔda pipul ya put insay dis mɔni bɔks.
42021004	Ɔl dɛn pipul we kam put mɔni insay dis bɔks ya jɛs pul kenkeni pan di plɛnti plɛnti mɔni we dɛn gɛt, bɔt dis uman dɔn put ɔl wetin i gɛt fɔ tek manej in layf.”
42021005	Sɔm pan di lanin bɔy dɛn bin de tɔk bɔt aw Gɔd in Os fayn, di fayn ston dɛn we dɛn tek bil am, ɛn ɔl dɛn tin we pipul gi fɔ put insay de.
42021006	Bɔt Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Tɛm de kam we ɔl dɛn tin ya we una de si ɛn tɔk bɔt so nɔ go de igen. Ɔl dɛn ston ya go skata, wan ston sɛf nɔ go lɛf pantap in kɔmpin.”
42021007	Di lanin bɔy dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, ustɛm ɔl dɛn tin ya go bi ɛn wɛn di tɛm fɔ mek dɛn bi dɔn de kam nia, us sayn wi go si?”
42021008	Jizɔs se, “Una tek tɛm mek nɔbɔdi nɔ mek una ful bikɔs plɛnti pipul go tek mi nem kam, dɛn go se dɛn na di Mɛsaya ɔ di tɛm we i go kam bak dɔn de klos. Una nɔ fɔ fala dɛn.
42021009	Una nɔ fɔ fred wɛn una yɛri bɔt wa we de klos una ɛn we de fawe ɛn wɛn una yɛri se pipul de strayk; dɛn tin ya mɔs bi, bɔt dat nɔ min se di wɔl go dɔn wantɛm.”
42021010	Jizɔs se, “Wan kɔntri go fɛt ɔda kɔntri ɛn wan neshɔn go fɛt ɔda neshɔn.
42021011	Di grɔn go de tri mbul bad, bad, bad angri go de ɔlɔbɔt, dɛn sik we de prɛd go de ɔlsay, plɛnti tin dɛn go bi we go mek pipul fred, ɛn Gɔd go sho plɛnti sayn na di klawd we go mek pipul fred.
42021012	Bɔt bifo ɔl dɛn tin ya bi, pipul go ol una ɛn du una plɛnti bad tin. Dɛn go drɛg una go bifo dɛn bigman na di Ju mitin os ɛn dɛn go put una na jel. Dɛn go kɛr una go bifo dɛn king ɛn dɛn gɔvna bikɔs una biliv pan mi.
42021013	Da tɛm de una go gɛt gud chans fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn di tru tin we una no bɔt mi.
42021014	Una fɔ mekɔp una maynd bifo dɛn tin ya bi so una nɔ go wɔri bɔt wetin una go tɔk wɛn dɛn ol una.
42021015	A go mek una ebul ansa dɛn wit sɛns so dat dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk una sɛf go gri wit di ansa dɛn we una de ansa.
42021016	Ivin una mama ɛn papa dɛn, una brɔda ɛn sista dɛn, una fambul dɛn sɛf ɛn una padi dɛn go kɛr una go kot ɛn dɛn go kil sɔm pan una.
42021017	Pipul nɔ go lɛk una bikɔs una biliv pan mi.
42021018	Bɔt pan ɔl dat, natin nɔ go du una, wan ia sɛf na una ed nɔ go lɔs.
42021019	If una bia ɛn tinap tra nga, una go gɛt tru layf.
42021020	“Bɔt di tɛm we una go si soja man dɛn gɛda rawnd Jerusɛlɛm, una fɔ no se di tɛm we da tɔng de go pwɛl dɔn de rich.
42021021	Da tɛm de, mek di pipul dɛn na Judia rɔnawe go na dɛn il, mek dɛn pipul we de na Jerusɛlɛm kɔmɔt de, ɛn mek dɛn wan we de na fam nɔ tɔn bak go insay di tɔng;
42021022	bikɔs na di tɛm dat we Gɔd go pɔnish in pipul dɛn lɛkɛ aw dɛn prɔfɛt bin dɔn rayt.
42021023	Da tɛm de, i go bad fɔ dɛn bɛlɛ-uman ɛn dɛn wan we de gi pikin bɔbi! Di pipul dɛn na dis wɔl go gɛt fɔ sɔfa bad ɛn Gɔd go pɔnish dɛn.
42021024	Dɛn go tek sɔd kil sɔm, dɛn go tek sɔm lɛkɛ prizna kɛr dɛn go ɔlsay. Dɛn pipul we nɔ sabi Gɔd, go pwɛl Jerusɛlɛm ɔltogɛda, te dɛn kɔmɔt na pawa.
42021025	“Una go si sayn pan di san, pan di mun, ɛn pan dɛn sta. Dɛn pipul na dis wɔl nɔ go no wetin fɔ du bikɔs dɛn go fred te dɛn nɔ ebul tɔk we di sɔl wata go rɔf ɛn di swɛlin dɛn de mek nɔys lɛkɛ tɛnda.
42021026	Pipul go fent bikɔs dɛn de fred di bad tin dɛn we de kam bi na wɔl, di pawa dɛn we de na di klawd go muf kɔmɔt na di ples we dɛn bin de.
42021027	Da tɛm de, ɔlman go si we Mɔta lman Pikin de kɔmɔt na klawd ɛn kam na wɔl wit pawa ɛn brayt brayt layt go de shayn rawnd am.
42021028	Wɛn una si dɛn tin ya de bi, una es una ed ɛn luk ɔp to Gɔd bikɔs i nɔ go te igen, Gɔd go sev una.”
42021029	Jizɔs pul wan pare bul fɔ dɛn. I se: “Una luk fig tik ɛn ɔl dɛn ɔda tik.
42021030	Wɛn una si dɛn lif dɔn de kam, una go no se ren sizin dɔn de kam.
42021031	Semwe so, wɛn una si dɛn tin we a dɔn tɔk bɔt so de bi, una go no se di tɛm we Gɔd go rul, de kam.
42021032	“A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, ɔl dɛn tin ya mɔs bi, bifo dɛn pipul we de ya naw, day.
42021033	Natin nɔ go de ɔpklawd igen ɛn di wɔl sɛf nɔ go de igen, bɔt mi wɔd dɛn go de sote go wit ɔl dɛn pawa.
42021034	“Bɔt una fɔ bikya ful, mek una nɔ jɛs sidɔm de ɛnjɔy dɛn pati ɛn drɔnk. Una nɔ fɔ put una at tumɔs pan wetin fɔ wɛr ɛn wetin una fɔ it. Mɔta lman Pikin go kam tɛm we una nɔ rɛdi.
42021035	Lɛkɛ aw trap kin kech bif, na so da de de go kam pan ɔlman ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl.
42021036	Una fɔ wayda wek ɛn una fɔ de pre ɔltɛm so dat una go gɛt trɛnk fɔ bia ɔl dɛn tin we go bi na dis wɔl ɛn una go ebul fɔ tinap bifo Mɔta lman Pikin.”
42021037	Ɛvri de, santɛm, Jizɔs kin de lan di pipul dɛn na Gɔd in Os, ɛn na nɛt i kin go na wan il we dɛn kɔl Mawnt Ɔliv, na de i kin de di ol nɛt.
42021038	Wɛn do klin, ɔl di pipul dɛn we i kin de lan kin go mit am na Gɔd in Os fɔ yɛri wetin i gɛt fɔ lan dɛn da de de.
42022001	Di tɛm fɔ di Pasova bin dɔn kam klos. Pasova na wan Ju ɔlide we dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist.
42022002	Dɛn man dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha bin de fɛn we fɔ kil Jizɔs, bɔt dɛn bin de fred di pipul dɛn.
42022003	Setan go insay Judas we nem Iskariɔt, in at; Iskariɔt na bin wan pan di twɛlv apɔsul dɛn.
42022004	So Judas go ɛng ed wit dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn dɛn soja man fɔ si aw in kin kech Jizɔs ɛn kɛr am go to dɛn.
42022005	Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di soja man dɛn gladi ɛn dɛn prɔmis fɔ gi Judas kɔpɔ.
42022006	Judas gri wit wetin dɛn se, ɛn i bigin fɛn chans fɔ sɛl Jizɔs gi dɛn wɛn di krawd nɔ no.
42022007	Di tɛm rich pan di Ju ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova we dɛn fɔ kil ship fɔ mɛmba di tɛm we Gɔd bin pul in pipul dɛn kɔmɔt na Ijipt.
42022008	So Jizɔs kɔl Pita ɛn Jɔn, ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una go rɛdi di Pasova it fɔ wi, so dat wi kin it am.”
42022009	Dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Usay yu want wi fɔ mek am, sa?”
42022010	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wɛn una go insay Jerusɛlɛm, una go mit wan man we tot wan big jɔg wata. Una fala am go insay di os we i de go.
42022011	Una tɛl di man we gɛt di os se, ‘Wi Ticha se mek wi aks yu dis kwɛshɔn: usay di tre nja rum de we mi ɛn mi lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ it di Pasova it?’
42022012	Di man go sho una wan big rum na di garɛt wit tebul, chia ɛn ɔltin we una want, na de una fɔ rɛdi wi it.”
42022013	Pita ɛn Jɔn go ɛn mit ɔltin lɛkɛ aw Jizɔs tɛl dɛn ɛn dɛn rɛdi di it fɔ mɛmba di Pasova.
42022014	Wɛn di tɛm rich, Jizɔs ɛn in apɔsul dɛn sidɔm fɔ it.
42022015	Na de Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “A want fɔ it di Pasova it wit una bad bad bifo a bigin sɔfa.
42022016	A de tɛl una, a nɔ go it am igen sote di tru Pasova bi, di tɛm we Gɔd go de rul dis wɔl.”
42022017	Wɛn dɛn gi Jizɔs drink, i tek di kɔp, i tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, dɛn i se, “Una tek dis kɔp pas am rawnd, mek ɔlman drink.
42022018	A de tɛl una se, a nɔ go drink wayn igen sote Gɔd bigin rul dis wɔl.”
42022019	Jizɔs tek bred ɛn wɛn i dɔn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, i kɔt, kɔt am gi in apɔsul dɛn ɛn se, “Dis bred na mi bɔdi [we a dɔn sak ri fays fɔseka una. Una fɔ de it am fɔ mɛmba mi.”
42022020	Semwe so, wɛn dɛn dɔn it di Pasova it dɔn, Jizɔs tek di kɔp ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Di wayn we de na dis kɔp na di nyu agrimɛnt bitwin Gɔd ɛn mɔta lman we a mek wit mi blɔd wɛn a gri fɔ mek pipul kil mi.]
42022021	“Bɔt di pɔsin we go sɛl mi gi dɛn pipul we want kil mi, de it wit mi naw.
42022022	Mɔta lman Pikin go day lɛkɛ aw Gɔd dɔn mak, bɔt i go bad fɔ di pɔsin we go mek dɛn kil am!”
42022023	Di apɔsul dɛn bigin fɔ aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Uswan pan wi go du di tin we Jizɔs jɛs tɔk bɔt so?”
42022024	Di lanin bɔy dɛn mek plaba wɛn dɛn de tray fɔ no uswan pan dɛn fɔ bi edman.
42022025	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn king na dis wɔl de kɔntrol dɛn yon pipul, dɛn pipul we de na pawa kin se di pipul dɛn fɔ kɔl dɛn ‘Pipul we de ɛp ɔda pipul.’
42022026	Bɔt nɔto so i fɔ bi wit una, di pɔsin we sinyɔ pas ɔl fɔ bi lɛkɛ di pɔsin we junyɔ pas ɔl ɛn una masta fɔ bi lɛkɛ una savant.
42022027	If yu gɛt tu pɔsin, wan de it, di ɔda pɔsin de sav am, uswan pan dɛn tu impɔtant pas in kɔmpin? Di pɔsin we de it, fɔ tru. Bɔt mi we na una Masta tan lɛkɛ una savant.
42022028	“Na una de wit mi wɛn tin tra nga fɔ mi, ɛn wɛn a de sɔfa, una nɔ lɛf mi.
42022029	Lɛkɛ aw mi Papa dɔn gi mi pawa fɔ rul, na so misɛf gi una pawa fɔ rul.
42022030	Una go it ɛn drink wit mi na di say we a de rul, ɛn we una de rul una go jɔj di twɛlv neshɔn dɛn we de na Izrɛl.
42022031	“Saymɔn, Saymɔn, Setan dɔn gɛt pamishɔn fɔ fana una ɔl lɛkɛ rɛs.
42022032	Bɔt a dɔn pre fɔ yu Saymɔn mek yu nɔ tap fɔ biliv mi. Wɛn yu dɔn biliv mi tra nga wan, tray mek yu brɔda dɛnsɛf biliv mi tra nga wan.”
42022033	Saymɔn ansa Jizɔs se, “Masta, a dɔn rɛdi fɔ go jel wit yu ɛn fɔ day sɛf wit yu.”
42022034	Jizɔs ansa am se, “A de tɛl yu, Pita, tide fɔl nɔ go kro yet, yu go dɔn tɔk tri tɛm se yu nɔ no mi.”
42022035	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wɛn a bin sɛn una ɛn a se mek una nɔ kɛr pɔs, ɔ bag, ɔ sus, ɛnitɛm bin de we una want ɛni tin, una nɔ gɛt am?” Dɛn ansa am se, “Nɔ, sa.”
42022036	I tɛl dɛn se, “Wɛn una de go dis tɛm, udat gɛt pɔs, mek i kɛr am go; ɛn if pɔsin gɛt bag, mek insɛf kɛr am go. If pɔsin nɔ gɛt sɔd, mek i sɛl in kot ɛn tek di kɔpɔ bay wan.
42022037	Di tin we dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt bɔt mi we se, ‘Pipul dɛn min se insɛf na wikɛd man,’ de kam bi tru. Ɔl wetin dɛn prɔfɛt rayt bɔt mi mɔs bi.”
42022038	Di lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Masta, luk, wi gɛt tu sɔd naya, sa.” Jizɔs se, “I du so!”
42022039	Jizɔs kɔmɔt na di tɔng ɛn bigin waka go na Mawnt Ɔliv lɛkɛ aw i kin du ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn fala am go de.
42022040	Wɛn i rich, Jizɔs tɛl di lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una pre so dat Setan nɔ go tray una fɔ mek una sin.”
42022041	Jizɔs kɔmɔt klos in lanin bɔy dɛn, go lili bit, lɛkɛ if yu tinap nia di lanin bɔy dɛn, yu sɛn ston. Wɛn i rich na di ples, i nil dɔng ɛn bigin pre,
42022042	i se, “Papa, if yu gri, duya, nɔ mek a sɔfa dis sɔfa we a fɔ sɔfa, bɔt ɛniwe, nɔ du wetin a want, du wetin yu want.” [
42022043	Wan enjɛl kɔmɔt na ɛvin kam mit Jizɔs fɔ kɔrej am.
42022044	Jizɔs in at bin ebi, bɔt i pre mɔ wit ɔl in at pas aw i bin pre fɔs; in swɛt kam tan lɛkɛ blɔd, we bin de fɔdɔm plɛnti plɛnti na grɔn.]
42022045	Wɛn i dɔn pre dɔn, i grap na di ples we i bin de pre, i go mit in lanin bɔy dɛn, bɔt i si dɛn de slip bikɔs dɛn at bin ebi bad.
42022046	Na in i aks dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de slip? Una grap ɛn pre so dat Setan nɔ go tray una fɔ mek una sin.”
42022047	Aw Jizɔs de tɔk to in lanin bɔy dɛn, na de plɛnti, plɛnti pipul kam mit am. Wan pan Jizɔs in twɛlv lanin bɔy dɛn we nem Judas na in bin de bifo dɛn. Judas kam klos Jizɔs fɔ kis am.
42022048	Jizɔs aks am se, “Judas, na kis yu go tek sɛl Mɔta lman Pikin?”
42022049	Wɛn Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn si wetin want bi, dɛn aks am se, “Masta, mek wi tek wi sɔd fɛt dɛn?”
42022050	Wan pan dɛn tek in sɔd, kɔt di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin in bɔy in rayt yes kɔmɔt.
42022051	Bɔt Jizɔs tɛl am se, “Lɛf! Nɔ du dat igen!” Jizɔs tɔch di say we di yes bin de ɛn mek di yes kam bak.
42022052	Jizɔs aks di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dɛn bigman we bin de gyad Gɔd in Os, ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn we bin kam fɔ ol am se, “Una kam mit mi naya wit sɔd ɛn dɛn ɔda tin fɔ tek fɛt fɔ ol mi lɛkɛ se mi na tifman?
42022053	Ɔl di tɛm we a bin de wit una na Gɔd in Os una nɔ bin ol mi. Bɔt na di tɛm dis we Gɔd gri mek una ol mi ɛn na di tɛm dis we Setan we de rul na dak gɛt pawa.”
42022054	Di bigman dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn mek di pipul dɛn ol Jizɔs ɛn kɛr am go na di edman fɔ ɔl dɛn man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, in os. Pita fala dɛn go, bɔt i nɔ bin de klos dɛn.
42022055	Wɛn dɛn mek faya na di edman fɔ dɛn man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin in yad, ɔlman go gɛda rawnd di faya; Pita insɛf go nia di faya.
42022056	Wan savant-gyal we bin de wok na di ples si Pita na di faya in layt we bin de shayn pan am, di savant-gyal luk am gud, na in i se, “Dis man ya insɛf bin de wit Jizɔs.”
42022057	Pita dinay, i se, “Ledi, a nɔ sabi da man de sɛf!”
42022058	I nɔ te igen, ɔda pɔsin we si Pita, se, “Yusɛf na wan pan in lanin bɔy dɛn.” Bɔt Pita dinay. I se, “Padi, mi nɔto da man de in lanin bɔy.”
42022059	Afta lɛkɛ wan awa so dɔn pas, na in wan ɔda pɔsin igen se, “A nɔ mis, a shɔ se dis man ya na Jizɔs in lanin bɔy bikɔs na Galili i kɔmɔt.”
42022060	Bɔt Pita ala se, “Padi, na lay yu de lay pan mi, a nɔ sabi wetin yu de tɔk bɔt sɛf.” As Pita de tɔk so, fɔl kro.
42022061	Jizɔs tɔn to Pita ɛn luk am. Wantɛm Pita mɛmba wetin Jizɔs bin dɔn tɛl am we i se, “Pita, bifo fɔl kro tide, yu go dɔn tɔk tri tɛm se yu nɔ no mi.”
42022062	Pita kɔmɔt insay di yad go na do; i bɔs kray bita wan.
42022063	Di soja man dɛn we bin ol Jizɔs bin de laf am ɛn bit am.
42022064	Dɛn kɔba in yay, dɛn slap am, dɔn dɛn aks am se, “If yu na prɔfɛt, tɛl wi udat slap yu?”
42022065	Di pipul dɛn fityay Jizɔs ɛn tɛl am plɛnti wɔd fɔ sho se dɛn nɔ rɛspɛkt am.
42022066	Wɛn do klin, dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, di ɔda Ju bigman dɛn, ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha mit fɔ jɔj kes. Di soja man dɛn kɛr Jizɔs go bifo dɛn,
42022067	di pipul dɛn aks am se, “Tɛl wi if yu na di Mɛsaya?” Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “If a tɛl una, una nɔ go biliv mi,
42022068	ɛn if a aks una kwɛshɔn, una nɔ go ansa mi.
42022069	Bɔt frɔm naw sote go, Mɔta lman Pikin go sidɔm na Gɔd we gɛt pawa, in raytan.”
42022070	Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de jɔj aks am se, “Wɛl, yu na Gɔd in Pikin?” Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Na so una dɔn tɔk.”
42022071	Di pipul dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot bigin fɔ se, “Wetin du wi fɔ lisin to ɔda witnɛs dɛn igen? Wi dɔn yɛri wetin insɛf dɔn tɔk.”
42023001	Na de ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot grap ɛn kɛr Jizɔs go bifo Paylet.
42023002	Dɛn tɛl Paylet se, “Wi mit dis man de put wɔd na di pipul dɛn yes fɔ mek dɛn strayk ɛn i se wi nɔ fɔ pe taks to di king na Rom. I tɔk se in na di Mɛsaya ɛn dat min se in na king.”
42023003	Paylet aks Jizɔs se, “Yu na dɛn Ju pipul dɛn king?” Jizɔs ansa am se, “Na so yu dɔn tɔk.”
42023004	Paylet tɛl di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin lib de se, “A nɔ si ɛni bad tin we dis man du.”
42023005	Di pipul dɛn we kɛr Jizɔs go to Paylet se, “Jizɔs mek di pipul dɛn strayk bay di tin dɛn we i de lan pipul na Judia. I bigin na Galili ɛn naw i dɔn rich Jerusɛlɛm.” Dɛn pin.
42023006	Wɛn Paylet yɛri wetin di pipul dɛn tɔk, i aks if na Galili Jizɔs kɔmɔt.
42023007	Wɛn dɛn tɛl am se na di kɔntri we Ɛrɔd de rul Jizɔs kɔmɔt, Paylet sɛn Jizɔs go to Ɛrɔd mek i jɔj am; Ɛrɔd insɛf bin de na Jerusɛlɛm da sem tɛm de.
42023008	Ɛrɔd gladi bad wɛn i si Jizɔs bikɔs i bin dɔn yɛri bɔt am ɛn insɛf bin dɔn want si am bad, ɛn i bin want si am we i de du sɔm wɔnda ful wok.
42023009	Ɛrɔd aks Jizɔs plɛnti kwɛshɔn, bɔt Jizɔs nɔ ansa am.
42023010	Na in dɛn bigman we de mek sak ri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha kam bifo ɛn bigin tɔk tra nga wan to Ɛrɔd de tɛl am wetin Jizɔs du.
42023011	Ɛrɔd ɛn in soja man dɛn bigin du Jizɔs tin we go mek i fil smɔl ɛn dɛn bigin tek am tɔn an. Dɔn Ɛrɔd mek dɛn wɛr fayn klos pan Jizɔs, ɛn mek dɛn kɛr am go bak to Paylet.
42023012	Ɛrɔd ɛn Paylet nɔ bin lɛk dɛnsɛf, bɔt frɔm da tɛm de we Ɛrɔd sɛn Jizɔs go to Paylet bak, dɛn tu kam bi padi.
42023013	Paylet kɔl dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dɛn pipul we de rul, ɛn di pipul dɛn na di kɔntri, na wan mitin.
42023014	I tɛl dɛn se, “Una dɔn bring dis man ya kam to mi ɛn una tɛl mi se i de mek pipul dɛn strayk, bɔt wɛn a kwɛshɔn am bifo una, a si se i nɔ du nɔn pan di tin dɛn we una se i du.
42023015	Ɛrɔd insɛf nɔ si ɛni tin bad we i du, so i dɔn sɛn am kam bak to wi. Jizɔs nɔ du natin fɔ mek dɛn kil am.
42023016	A go jɛs mek dɛn bit am nɔmɔ, ɛn lɛf am lɛ i go.” [
42023017	Paylet kin gɛt fɔ mek dɛn fri wan jelman we di Ju pipul dɛn want wɛn dɛn de pan di Ju ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova.]
42023018	So ɔl di pipul dɛn ala se, “Kil dis man ɛn fri Bara bas.”
42023019	Bara bas na man we dɛn bin jel bikɔs i bin mek pipul dɛn strayk na di tɔng ɛn i bin kil pɔsin wɛn dɛn de strayk.
42023020	Paylet bin want fri Jizɔs so i tɔk to di pipul dɛn bak,
42023021	bɔt di pipul dɛn ala big wan se, “Nel am pan di krɔs! Nel am pan di krɔs!”
42023022	Paylet tɔk to dɛn wan tɛm mɔ mek tri ɛn aks dɛn se, “Wetin du, us bad tin dis man du? A nɔ si se dis man du bad tin we fɔ mek dɛn nel am pan di krɔs; a go jɛs mek dɛn bit am nɔmɔ ɛn lɛf am.”
42023023	Bɔt di pipul dɛn ala ɛn pin se dɛn fɔ kil Jizɔs pan di krɔs. So na wetin di pipul dɛn tɔk, na in Paylet bin gɛt fɔ du.
42023024	So Paylet pas sɛntɛns se in go du wetin dɛn tɛl am fɔ du.
42023025	I fri Bara bas, di man we dɛn bin jel fɔ di strayk ɛn fɔ di pɔsin we i kil, we di Ju pipul dɛn se i fɔ fri, dɔn i tɛl in soja man dɛn fɔ kil Jizɔs lɛkɛ aw di Ju pipul dɛn bin want am fɔ du.
42023026	Wɛn dɛn bin de kɛr Jizɔs go, dɛn ol wan man na rod we nem Saymɔn we bin bɔn na Sayrini; i bin kɔmɔt wan vilej de go Jerusɛlɛm. Di soja man dɛn fos am fɔ mek i tot Jizɔs in krɔs fala am.
42023027	Plɛnti plɛnti pipul fala Jizɔs go, sɔm uman dɛn we fala am bin de kray bita wan fɔ am.
42023028	Jizɔs tɔn to dɛn ɛn se, “Una dɛn uman na Jerusɛlɛm, una nɔ kray fɔ mi, una kray fɔ unasɛf ɛn fɔ una pikin dɛn.
42023029	Di tɛm de kam we dɛn go se, ‘I bɛtɛ fɔ dɛn uman we nɔ de bɔn pikin ɛn dɛn uman we nɔ bɔn pikin yet ɛn dɛn uman we nɔ gi pikin bɔbi wan de!’
42023030	Pipul go tɛl dɛn big il se, ‘Una fɔdɔm pan wi!’ ɛn dɛn go tɛl dɛn smɔl il se, ‘Una kɔba wi!’
42023031	If dɛn du dis to di rɔ tik, dat na mi; wetin dɛn go du to di dray wan, dat na una?”
42023032	Wɛn dɛn de kɛr Jizɔs go fɔ go kil am, dɛn bin kɛr tu wikɛd man dɛn go wit am fɔ kil dɛn ɔl tri.
42023033	Wɛn dɛn rich na di ples we dɛn kɔl “Di ples we tan lɛkɛ mɔta lman ed,” na de dɛn nel dɛn tri, ɔlman pan in yon krɔs. Dɛn put wan wikɛd man na Jizɔs in raytan, dɛn put di ɔda man na Jizɔs in lɛfan.
42023034	Jizɔs se, “Papa, padin dɛn pipul ya bikɔs dɛn nɔ no wetin dɛn de du.” Di soja man dɛn ib days fɔ pik di pɔsin we go gɛt Jizɔs in klos.
42023035	Pipul dɛn bin tinap de luk, bɔt dɛn bigman we bin de rul na di kɔntri bin de laf Jizɔs, de se, “I kin sev ɔda pipul, mek i sev insɛf if in na di Mɛsaya, di pɔsin we Gɔd dɔn pik, fɔ tru!”
42023036	Di sojaman dɛnsɛf laf am, dɛn gi am viniga fɔ drink
42023037	ɛn se, “If yu na di Ju pipul dɛn king, sev yusɛf.”
42023038	Dɛn rayt sɔntin ɛn nel am pan di krɔs oba in ed. Na di tin dis we dɛn rayt: “DIS NA DI JU PIPUL DƐN KING.”
42023039	Wan pan di tu wikɛd man dɛn we bin ɛng pan krɔs tɔk bad bɔt Jizɔs, i se, “Yu na di Mɛsaya, nɔto so? Wɛl, sev yusɛf ɛn sev wi!”
42023040	Bɔt di ɔda wikɛd man we insɛf bin ɛng pan krɔs, tɔk pan in kɔmpin. I se, “Yu nɔ de fred Gɔd? Dɛn dɔn kɔndɛm yusɛf fɔ day lɛkɛ dis man ya.
42023041	Dɛn kɔndɛm mi ɛn yu naya fɔ wetin wi du ɛn wi de gɛt wi pe fɔ ɔl dɛn bad tin we wi du, bɔt dis man ya nɔ du ɛni bad tin.”
42023042	Dɛn i tɔn to Jizɔs ɛn se, “Jizɔs, duya, mɛmba mi, sa, wɛn yu kam wit pawa fɔ rul lɛkɛ King!”
42023043	Jizɔs ansa am se, “A de tɛl yu se, fɔ tru, tide yu go de wit mi na ɛvin.”
42023044	Na bin lɛkɛ twɛlv oklɔk santɛm so, di san tap fɔ shayn, ɔl di kɔntri dak sote tri oklɔk.
42023045	Di tik, tik kɔtin we bin ɛng insay Gɔd in Os chɛr midul kam dɔng.
42023046	Jizɔs ala se, “Papa, na day a de day so, tek mi spirit!” As i tɔk dɔn so, na in i day.
42023047	Wɛn di bigman fɔ dɛn soja man si wetin bi, i tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, i se, “Fɔ tru, dis man ya nɔ bin du ɛni tin bad.”
42023048	Wɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin go luk si wetin bi, dɛn ɔl kɔmɔt de saful go na dɛn os, ɛn wɛn dɛn de go dɛn bin de nak dɛn chɛst fɔ sho se dɛn at ebi.
42023049	Ɔl Jizɔs in padi dɛn ɛn dɛn uman we fala am kɔmɔt Galili, bin tinap fawe de luk ɔltin we bi.
42023050	Wan Ju man bin de we bin nem Josɛf. I bin kɔmɔt na wan tɔng we nem Ari ma tia we de na Judia; na bin mɛmba na di Ju gran kot. I bin gud ɛn i bin de waka tret,
42023051	i nɔ bin gri wit di tin we in kɔmpin dɛn bin mekɔp fɔ du ɛn we dɛn du. I bin de wet fɔ di tɛm we Gɔd go rul dis wɔl.
42023052	Josɛf go to Paylet ɛn aks am fɔ mek dɛn gi am Jizɔs in bɔdi fɔ mek i bɛr am.
42023053	I pul Jizɔs in bɔdi kɔmɔt na di krɔs, i rap am wit nyu linin klos ɛn bɛr am insay big ston grev we dɛn nɔ bin bɛr pɔsin yet.
42023054	Dat bi di de we dɛn de rɛdi fɔ di de fɔ pre ɛn blo.
42023055	Dɛn uman we bin kɔmɔt Galili wit Jizɔs, fala Josɛf go, dɛn si di grev ɛn aw i le Jizɔs in bɔdi,
42023056	dɛn tɔn bak fɔ go tek spays ɛn sɛnt fɔ kam put dɛn pan di bɔdi. Na bin di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, so dɛn du lɛkɛ aw di Ju Lɔ se, dɛn blo.
42024001	Ali Sɔnde mɔnin bifo do klin, di uman dɛn bin dɔn rich na di grev. Dɛn kɛr di spays we dɛn bin dɔn miks rɛdi.
42024002	Wɛn dɛn rich na di grev, dɛn si se di ston we bin kɔba di grev domɔt nɔ kɔba am igen.
42024003	Wɛn dɛn go insay di grev, dɛn nɔ si Masta Jizɔs in bɔdi.
42024004	Aw dɛn de wɔndrin bɔt wetin bi, wantɛm dɛn si tu man dɛn we wɛr brayt brayt klos kam tinap klos dɛn.
42024005	Dɛn fred ɛn butu dɛn fes na grɔn. Di man dɛn aks dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de luk fɔ pɔsin we gɛt layf pan dɛn wan we dɔn day?
42024006	Jizɔs nɔ de naya, i dɔn rayz frɔm di grev. Una mɛmba wetin i bin dɔn tɛl una wɛn i bin de wit una na Galili?
42024007	I bin se dɛn go ol Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn and am gi dɛn wikɛd pipul we go kil am, ɛn bɛr am, bɔt i go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.”
42024008	Da sem tɛm de, dɛn mɛmba wetin Jizɔs bin tɛl dɛn,
42024009	dɛn kɔmɔt na di grev, go bak na tɔng ɛn tɛl Jizɔs in ilɛvin lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn ɔl di ɔda pipul dɛn we bin de wit Jizɔs, wetin bi.
42024010	Na Meri we kɔmɔt Magdala, Joana, Meri we na Jems in mama, ɛn di ɔda uman dɛn we bin de wit Jizɔs; na dɛn bin tɛl Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn wetin bi.
42024011	Bɔt di lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin biliv bikɔs dɛn bin min se na nɔnsɛns di uman dɛn de tɔk. [
42024012	Bɔt Pita rɔn go na di bɛri ngrɔn, i tinap ɛn luk insay di grev. I si di klos we dɛn bin tek rap Jizɔs in bɔdi insay di grev, bɔt i nɔ si Jizɔs in bɔdi. I tɔn bak go na in os de wɔndrin wetin bi.]
42024013	Di sem de, tu man dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de go na wan vilej we nem Ɛmeɔs. Frɔm Jerusɛlɛm to dis vilej ya na sɛvin mayl.
42024014	Di tu man dɛn bin de tɔk bɔt ɔl wetin bin jɛs bi na Jerusɛlɛm.
42024015	Wɛn dɛn tu de tɔk, Jizɔs go nia dɛn ɛn bigin waka wit dɛn.
42024016	Di tu man dɛn si Jizɔs, bɔt i tan lɛkɛ se sɔntin nɔ mek dɛn no se na in.
42024017	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin una de tɔk bɔt naw we una de waka go?” Di tu man dɛn jɛs tinap saful, dɛn at pwɛl.
42024018	Wan pan dɛn tu we bin nem Klio pas se, “Tinkya, na yu wan gren na tre nja we nɔ no wetin dɔn bi na Jerusɛlɛm, dɛn de ya we jɛs pas?”
42024019	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin bi?” Dɛn se, “Dɛn tin we bi to Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt. Na bin prɔfɛt we sho pipul Gɔd in pawa bay aw i bin de tɔk ɛn di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we i bin de du.
42024020	Wi bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn wi bigman dɛn we de rul na di tɔng kɛr am go bifo Paylet mek i sɛntɛns am fɔ mek dɛn kil am; dɛn mek dɛn nel am pan di krɔs ɛn kil am.
42024021	Wi bin abop se na dis man we nem Jizɔs, Gɔd dɔn sɛn fɔ kam fri Izrɛl. Ɛn pan tap ɔl dat, tide mek tri de sins we ɔl dɛn tin ya bi.
42024022	Pantap dat igen, sɔm pan dɛn uman we de wit wi mek wi wɔnda. Dɛn go na di bɛri ngrɔn dis mɔnin,
42024023	bɔt dɛn nɔ si Jizɔs in bɔdi na di grev. Wɛn dɛn kam bak, dɛn tɛl wi se i bin tan lɛkɛ dɛn de drim, na in dɛn si enjɛl dɛn de, di enjɛl dɛn tɛl dɛn se Jizɔs nɔ day, i gɛt layf.
42024024	Sɔm pan wi kɔmpin dɛnsɛf go na di grev ɛn dɛn mit am lɛkɛ aw di uman dɛn kam tɔk, bɔt dɛn nɔ si Jizɔs.”
42024025	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Una nɔ gɛt sɛns, una at fɔ biliv ɔl wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin dɔn tɔk!
42024026	Una nɔ no se di Mɛsaya bin fɔ sɔfa dɛn tin ya fɔ mek i go ɛvin go gɛt ɔna?”
42024027	Jizɔs bigin wit Mozis ɛn dɛn ɔda prɔfɛt ɛn ɛksplen ɔl wetin dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk bɔt am.
42024028	Wɛn di tu man dɛn bin dɔn de rich klos di vilej we dɛn bin de go, Jizɔs mek lɛkɛ se in de pas di vilej,
42024029	so di tu man dɛn beg am fɔ slip na di sem os wit dɛn. Dɛn se, “Lɛ wi ɔl slip naya bikɔs di tɛm dɔn let.” So Jizɔs go wit dɛn.
42024030	Wɛn dɛn sidɔm fɔ it, Jizɔs tek di bred ɛn pre pan am, i kɔt kɔt am, dɔn i sheb am gi dɛn.
42024031	Wɛn Jizɔs du dat, wantɛm i tan lɛkɛ dɛn yay opin, dɛn no se na Jizɔs insɛf de wit dɛn, bɔt da sem tɛm de, Jizɔs jɛs lɔs pan dɛn.
42024032	Dɛn bigin tɔk se, “Nɔto dat mek sɔntin tɔch wi at wɛn i bin de tɔk ɛn wɛn i bin de ɛksplen wetin dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk, wɛn wi de kam?”
42024033	Dɛn grap wantɛm ɛn go bak na Jerusɛlɛm, dɛn mit di ilɛvin lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn sɔm ɔda pipul gɛda wan ples.
42024034	Dɛn tɛl di tu man dɛn se, “Wi Masta dɔn rayz frɔm di grev ɛn i dɔn sho insɛf to Saymɔn!”
42024035	Na de di tu man dɛn tɔk wetin bi to dɛn na rod wɛn dɛn bin de go Ɛmeɔs ɛn aw dɛnsɛf no se na Jizɔs wɛn i sheb di bred gi dɛn.
42024036	Da sem tɛm de we dɛn de tɔk, Jizɔs jɛs tinap midul dɛn ɛn se, “Mek una gɛt kol at!”
42024037	Dɛn skyad ɛn fred, dɛn min se na gost dɛn si.
42024038	Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Wetin mek una de fred ɛn una de wɔnda udat dis?
42024039	Una luk mi an ɛn mi fut, na mi sɛf sɛf dis. Una tɔch mi ɛn luk mi gud fashin bikɔs gost nɔ gɛt bɔdi ɛn bon lɛkɛ mi.”
42024040	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn tɔk to dɛn, i sho dɛn in an ɛn in fut.
42024041	Wetin dɛn yɛri ɛn wetin dɛn si mek dɛn gladi sote dɛn wɔnda if na tru. Jizɔs aks dɛn se, “Una gɛt ɛni tin fɔ it naya?”
42024042	Di lanin bɔy dɛn gi am ros fish.
42024043	I tek di fish ɛn it am bifo dɛn ɔl yay.
42024044	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Wɛn a bin de wit una, a bin dɔn tɛl una se ɔltin we Mozis ɛn dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt ɛn ɔl wetin dɛn rayt na di Sambuk bɔt mi, mɔs bi.”
42024045	Jizɔs opin dɛn ed fɔ mek dɛn ɔnda stand wetin dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk.
42024046	I tɛl dɛn se, “Dɛn rayt se di Mɛsaya gɛt fɔ sɔfa ɛn i go rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri.
42024047	Fɔseka di tin we i du ɛn se, una fɔ go na Jerusɛlɛm fɔs, dɛn ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl, go tɛl pipul fɔ lɛf fɔ sin ɛn da tɛm de Gɔd go padin dɛn sin.
42024048	Unasɛf dɔn si ɔl dɛn tin ya ɛn una fɔ tɛl ɔda pipul bɔt dɛn.
42024049	A go sɛn wetin mi Papa dɔn prɔmis to una. Bɔt una wet na Jerusɛlɛm sote una gɛt pawa we kɔmɔt ɛvin ɛn kɔba una lɛkɛ kɔba klos, bifo una go.”
42024050	Jizɔs waka wit in lanin bɔy dɛn kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm ɛn i de bifo dɛn sote dɛn rich Bɛtani. Wɛn dɛn rich de, i es in an ɔp ɛn blɛs dɛn.
42024051	As i de blɛs dɛn so, i go ɔp na ɛvin.
42024052	Di lanin bɔy dɛn nil dɔng bifo am fɔ wɔship am, dɔn dɛn go bak na Jerusɛlɛm wit gladi.
42024053	Dɛn bin de go na Gɔd in Os ɔltɛm go prez Gɔd.
43001001	Bifo Gɔd mek di wɔl, di wan we dɛn kɔl di Wɔd bin dɔn de, i bin de wit Gɔd, in ɛn Gɔd na wan.
43001002	Bifo Gɔd mek di wɔl, di Wɔd bin de wit Gɔd.
43001003	Tru di Wɔd, Gɔd mek ɔltin; natin nɔ de na wɔl we Gɔd mek we in an nɔ de pan.
43001004	Na in de gi ɔlman layf ɛn dis layf ya na di layt we de mek ɔlman si layt.
43001005	Di layt de shayn na dak, bɔt wande di daknɛs nɔ kɔba di layt.
43001006	Gɔd sɛn wan man we dɛn kɔl Jɔn kam na wɔl fɔ
43001007	kam tɛl pipul bɔt di layt, so dat ɔlman go biliv wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin i se.
43001008	Jɔn insɛf nɔto bin di layt, i bin jɛs kam fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt di layt nɔmɔ.
43001009	Di layt we i tɔk bɔt na di tru layt we kam na di wɔl, ɛn shayn pan ɔlman ɛn mek ɔlman si am.
43001010	Di Wɔd bin de na di wɔl, ɛn tru am Gɔd mek ɔltin na di wɔl, bɔt pan ɔl dat, di pipul dɛn na di wɔl nɔ bin no udat i bi.
43001011	I go to in yon pipul dɛn, bɔt ivin dɛnsɛf nɔ bin want gɛt ɛni tin fɔ du wit am.
43001012	Bɔt ɛnibɔdi we gladi fɔ mek i kam na dɛn layf ɛn biliv pan am, i gi dɛn di rayt fɔ bi Gɔd in pikin dɛn.
43001013	Dɛn nɔ bi Gɔd in pikin dɛn lɛkɛ aw dɛn pikin de bɔn na wɔl, dɛn nɔ bi Gɔd in pikin dɛn bikɔs na dat dɛn want ɔ bikɔs na dat ɔda pipul want, bɔt na Gɔd insɛf mek dɛn bi in pikin dɛn bikɔs na dat i want.
43001014	Di Wɔd kam bi mɔta lman ɛn tap wit wi, i mek wi no ɔltin we tru bɔt Gɔd, ɛn i du wi gud ɔltɛm. Wi si di wɔnda ful ɔna ɛn pawa we i gɛt, ɛn na Gɔd gi am da wɔnda ful ɔna ɛn pawa de, bikɔs in na di Papa in wan gren Pikin.
43001015	Jɔn bin de tɛl pipul bɔt am. I bin de ala se, “Na di pɔsin dis we a bin de tɔk bɔt, wɛn a bin de se, ‘I go kam wɛn a dɔn du di wok we Gɔd sɛn mi fɔ kam du, bɔt i pas mi fawe, bikɔs i bin dɔn de bifo a bɔn.’ ”
43001016	Bikɔs i lɛk wi bad, i dɔn blɛs wi ɔl ɛn i de blɛs wi mɔ ɛn mɔ
43001017	Gɔd mek Mozis gi wi di Lɔ, bɔt i mek Jizɔs Krays sho wi aw i lɛk wi ɛn tɛl wi ɔl di tru tin dɛn bɔt insɛf.
43001018	Nɔbɔdi nɔ si Gɔd wande. Gɔd in wan gren Pikin, we in ɛn in Papa gɛt wan at, na in mek pipul no udat na Gɔd.
43001019	Di Ju bigman dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm sɛn sɔm pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn sɔm pan di wan dɛn we de ɛp dɛn fɔ go aks Jɔn udat i bi.
43001020	Jɔn nɔ twis ɛn tɔn fɔ ansa dɛn, i tɛl dɛn plen wan se in nɔto di Mɛsaya.
43001021	Wɛn Jɔn ansa dɛn, dɛn se, “Udat na yu? Yu na Ila yja?” Jɔn ansa se, “Nɔ, mi nɔto Ila yja.” Dɛn aks am igen se, “Yu na da prɔfɛt we wi bin de luk rod fɔ?” Jɔn se, “Nɔ.”
43001022	Dɛn se, “Wɛl, tɛl wi udat yu bi? Di pipul dɛn we sɛn wi kam to yu go aks wi ɛn wi fɔ gɛt ansa fɔ gi dɛn. Wetin yu kin tɛl wi bɔt yusɛf?”
43001023	Wɛn Jɔn de ansa dɛn, i tɔk wetin di prɔfɛt we nem Ayzaya bin dɔn tɔk. I se: “ ‘A de tɔk lawd wan, lɛkɛ we sɔmbɔdi de tɔk lawd wan na di dɛzat se: Una klia di rod we di Masta fɔ pas ɛn mek i tret!’ ”
43001024	Di mɛse nja dɛn we di Faresi dɛn sɛn,
43001025	aks Jɔn se, “If yu nɔto di Mɛsaya, ɛn yu nɔto Ila yja, ɛn yu nɔto di prɔfɛt we wi de luk fɔ, wetin du yu de baptayz pipul?”
43001026	Jɔn ansa se, “Mi de baptayz pipul wit wata, bɔt sɔmbɔdi de wit una, we una nɔ no.
43001027	I go kam wɛn a dɔn du di wok we Gɔd sɛn mi fɔ kam du, a nɔ fit sɛf fɔ lus di les na in sus.”
43001028	Ɔl dɛn tin ya bi na Bɛtani we de na di istɛn pat na Riva Jɔdan. Jɔn bin de baptayz pipul na Riva Jɔdan.
43001029	Di ɔda de Jɔn si Jizɔs de kam, na in i se, “Luk di Pɔsin we Gɔd sɛn fɔ padin mɔta lman sin!
43001030	Na in a bin de tɔk bɔt wɛn a se, ‘Wan man de kam afta a dɔn du di wok we Gɔd sɛn mi fɔ kam du, i pas mi fawe bikɔs i bin dɔn de bifo a bɔn.’
43001031	A nɔ bin no udat da pɔsin de go bi, bɔt wɛn a kam a bigin baptayz pipul wit wata, so dat di Izrɛl pipul dɛn go kam gɛt fɔ no udat i bi bambay.”
43001032	Dɛn Jɔn tɔk bɔt wetin i bin si, i se: “A si Gɔd in Spirit de kɔmɔt ɔp na ɛvin kam dɔng lɛkɛ dɔv kin kam dɔng. I kam pan am ɛn de wit am.
43001033	A nɔ bin no yet se na in na di Pɔsin we a de wet, bɔt Gɔd we sɛn mi fɔ baptayz pipul wit wata bin dɔn tɛl mi bɔt am. I bin se, ‘Yu go si di Spirit kam dɔng pan wan pɔsin ɛn de wit am; na di pɔsin dat we go baptayz pipul wit Gɔd in Spirit.’ ”
43001034	Jɔn se, “A dɔn si wetin bi, ɛn a de tɛl una se dis man na Gɔd in Pikin.”
43001035	Di ɔda de Jɔn bin tinap na di sem ples we i de baptayz pipul wit tu pan in lanin bɔy dɛn.
43001036	Wɛn Jɔn si Jizɔs de pas, i se, “Una luk di pɔsin we go padin pipul dɛn sin!”
43001037	Wɛn Jɔn in tu lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri wetin Jɔn tɔk, dɛn bigin fala Jizɔs.
43001038	Wɛn Jizɔs tɔn, i si dɛn de fala am, na in i aks dɛn se, “Wetin una de luk fɔ?” Dɛn aks am se, “Rabay, usay yu tap?” (Rabay min Ticha.)
43001039	Jizɔs se, “Una kam luk!” So dɛn fala am go luk usay i tap; na bin santɛm, bay dɛn fo oklɔk, so dɛn de wit am sote ivintɛm.
43001040	Wan pan di pipul dɛn we bin fala Jizɔs go na bin Andru we na bin Saymɔn Pita in brɔda.
43001041	Andru go fɛn in brɔda Pita wantɛm ɛn tɛl am se, “Wi dɔn si di pɔsin we Gɔd sɛn fɔ sev ɔlman, di wan we dɛn kɔl Mɛsaya.” (Mɛsaya min “Krays” na Grik.)
43001042	Andru kɛr Saymɔn go to Jizɔs. Jizɔs luk Saymɔn ɛn se, “Yu nem na Saymɔn ɛn yu na Jɔn in pikin, bɔt yu nem go bi Sifas.” (Sifas ɛn Pita gɛt di sem minin, dat na “Rɔk”.)
43001043	Di ɔda de Jizɔs mekɔp fɔ go na Galili. Wɛn i de go, na in i mit Filip, i tɛl am se, “Kam bi wan pan mi lanin bɔy dɛn!”
43001044	Na Bɛtsa yda, di tɔng we Andru ɛn Pita bin de, Filip kɔmɔt.
43001045	Filip go luk fɔ Natanyɛl ɛn tɛl am se, “Wi dɔn si di man we Mozis bin rayt bɔt na di Lɔ buk, ɛn we di prɔfɛt dɛnsɛf bin rayt bɔt. Na Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt we na Josɛf in pikin.”
43001046	Natanyɛl aks Filip se, “Ɛni tin gud kin kɔmɔt Nazarɛt?” Filip ansa am se, “Kam luk!”
43001047	Wɛn Jizɔs si Natanyɛl de kam, i se, “Luk man we kɔmɔt Izrɛl fɔ tru, i nɔ gɛt nɔ bɛnbɛn, i nɔ de mek pɔsin ful.”
43001048	Natanyɛl aks Jizɔs se, “Aw yu du no mi?” Jizɔs ansa am se, “A bin si yu wɛn yu bin de ɔnda da fig tik bifo Filip kɔl yu.”
43001049	Natanyɛl se, “Ticha, yu na Gɔd in Pikin! Yu na di King na Izrɛl!”
43001050	Jizɔs aks am se, “Na bikɔs a tɛl yu nɔmɔ se a bin dɔn si yu wɛn yu bin de ɔnda di fig tik, mek yu biliv pan mi? Yu go si tin dɛn we pas dis fawe.”
43001051	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn igen se, “A de tɛl una fɔ tru se: una go si ɛvin opin, una go si Gɔd in enjɛl dɛn de kɔmɔt ɛvin kam dɔng to Mɔta lman Pikin ɛn go ɔp bak, dɛn go de go ɔp ɛn dɔng.”
43002001	Afta tu de, dɛn bin gɛt mared na wan tɔng we dɛn kɔl Kena we de na Galili. Jizɔs in mama bin go di mared.
43002002	Dɛn bin kɔl Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn fɔ go di mared, so dɛnsɛf bin lib de.
43002003	Wɛn di wayn dɔn, Jizɔs in mama tɛl Jizɔs se di wayn dɔn dɔn.
43002004	Jizɔs tɛl in mama se, “Nɔ tɛl mi dɛn tin ya naw. Di tɛm we a fɔ du dɛn tin ya nɔ rich yet.”
43002005	Jizɔs in mama tɛl di savant dɛn se mek dɛn du ɛni tin we i tɛl dɛn fɔ du.
43002006	Di Ju dɛn gɛt lɔ dɛn we se, dɛn fɔ was dɛn bɔdi ɛn ɔltin we dɛn de yus gud gud, if dɛn want mek Gɔd yɛri di pre we dɛn de pre; ɛn fɔseka dat, siks big kɔntri pɔt bin de klos dɛn na di ples de; di kɔntri pɔt dɛn bin so big, dat wan kin ol twɛnti to tati galɔn wata.
43002007	Jizɔs tɛl di savant dɛn se, “Una ful dɛn kɔntri pɔt ya wit wata.” Di savant dɛn ful di pɔt dɛn pim.
43002008	Na in Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Una tek sɔm pan di wata, kɛr am go to di pɔsin we de fɔ si se ɔltin de go fayn na di mared.” Di savant dɛn kɛr di wata we Jizɔs dɔn tɔn to wayn go to di pɔsin we i sɛn dɛn to; di man tes am. I nɔ bin no usay di wayn kɔmɔt, bɔt di savant dɛn we bin go gɛt di wata we bin de na di kɔntri pɔt bin no; so di man kɔl di ɔkɔ,
43002010	ɛn tɛl am se, “Ɔlman kin sheb di gud wayn fɔs, ɛn afta di pipul dɛn dɔn drink am te dɛn sati sfay, na da tɛm de dɛn kin sheb di chip wayn. Bɔt yu bin kip di gud wayn, na naw yu de pul am!”
43002011	Na Kena we de na Galili, Jizɔs du dis fɔs wɔnda ful wok, ɛn dat sho aw i wɔnda ful, ɛn mek in lanin bɔy dɛn biliv pan am.
43002012	Wɛn dat pas, Jizɔs ɛn in mama, in brɔda dɛn, ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go Kepanyɔm, bɔt dɛn nɔ te de, dɛn jɛs lib de tu, tri de.
43002013	Di tɛm bin dɔn de klos fɔ di Ju ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova, so Jizɔs go na Jerusɛlɛm.
43002014	Wɛn Jizɔs go na Gɔd in Os, i mit pipul de sɛl got ɛn kaw, ship ɛn pijin, ɛn dɛn pipul we de chenj kɔpɔ, bin de du dɛn wok.
43002015	So Jizɔs tek rop mek wip ɛn drɛb ɔl di got, kaw ɛn ship dɛn kɔmɔt na Gɔd in Os; dɔn i kapsay di tebul dɛn we pipul bin de chenj kɔpɔ pan, di kɔpɔ skata.
43002016	I ala pan di pipul dɛn we bin de sɛl pijin. I se, “Una pul una pijin dɛn kɔmɔt naya! Una lɛf fɔ tɔn mi Papa in Os to makit!”
43002017	Di lanin bɔy dɛn mɛmba wetin Gɔd in Buk se, “O Gɔd, a de day wit di lɛk we a lɛk yu os, i dɔn so grip mi dat i nɔ go lɛf mi igen.”
43002018	Di Ju bigman dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Wetin na di wɔnda ful tin we yu kin du, we go sho se yu gɛt rayt fɔ du wetin yu dɔn du so?”
43002019	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “If una ib Gɔd in Os we de naya dɔng, a go tek tri de fɔ bil am bak.”
43002020	Dɛn se, “Na fɔti-siks ia i tek fɔ bil dis os, yu min se yu go tek tri de fɔ bil am bak?”
43002021	Bɔt we Jizɔs tɔk bɔt Gɔd in Os, na in bɔdi i bin de tɔk bɔt.
43002022	So wɛn Gɔd mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev, in lanin bɔy dɛn mɛmba wetin Jizɔs bin dɔn tɔk, ɛn di rayz we Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev mek dɛn biliv wetin rayt na Gɔd in Buk, ɛn wetin Jizɔs bin dɔn tɔk.
43002023	Di tɛm fɔ di Pasova ɔlide Jizɔs bin stil de na Jerusɛlɛm, plɛnti pipul biliv pan am wɛn dɛn si di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we i bin de du.
43002024	Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ lɛf insɛf na dɛn an bikɔs i bin no mɔta lman gud gud wan.
43002025	Nid nɔ bin de fɔ mek pipul tɛl Jizɔs wetin de na dɛn at, bikɔs Jizɔs insɛf sɛf bin no wetin de na dɛn at.
43003001	Wan Ju bigman we bin nem Niko dimɔs na bin wan pan dɛn Ju pipul we dɛn kɔl Faresi.
43003002	Wan nɛt, Niko dimɔs go fɛn Jizɔs. I se, “Ticha, wi no se yu na ticha we Gɔd sɛn. Nɔbɔdi nɔ go ebul du dɛn wɔnda ful wok we yu de du, pas Gɔd de wit di pɔsin.”
43003003	Jizɔs tɛl am se, “A de tɛl yu fɔ tru se, nɔbɔdi nɔ go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul pas i bɔn sɛkɛn tɛm.”
43003004	Niko dimɔs aks Jizɔs se, “Aw pɔsin we dɔn big go kam bɔn bak? Di pɔsin nɔ go go insay in mami bɛlɛ bak, ɛn kam bɔn bak lɛkɛ lili bebi!”
43003005	Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl yu se, nɔbɔdi nɔ go kam ɔnda Gɔd in rul pas di pɔsin bɔn wit wata ɛn wit Gɔd in Spirit.
43003006	Na mami ɛn dadi de bɔn pikin, bɔt na Gɔd in Spirit de mek pɔsin gɛt nyu layf lɛkɛ se i jɛs bɔn.
43003007	Nɔ wɔnda we a tɛl yu se, una ɔl fɔ bɔn sɛkɛn tɛm.
43003008	Briz de blo ɛni say we i lɛk; yu de yɛri di sawnd we i de mek, bɔt yu nɔ no usay i kɔmɔt, yu nɔ no usay i de go. Na di sem tin de bi wɛn Gɔd in Spirit gi pɔsin nyu layf.”
43003009	Niko dimɔs aks Jizɔs se, “Aw dat kin bi?”
43003010	Jizɔs aks am se, “Yu we na big ticha na Izrɛl, yu nɔ ɔnda stand wetin a tɔk?
43003011	A de tɛl yu se, na wetin wi no, wi de tɛl una bɔt, na wetin wi dɔn si, wi de tɛl una bɔt, bɔt pan ɔl dat, una nɔn nɔ gri biliv wetin wi de tɛl una.
43003012	If una nɔ biliv mi wɛn a tɛl una bɔt dɛn tin we de bi na dis wɔl, aw una go biliv mi wɛn a tɛl una bɔt dɛn tin we de bi na ɛvin?
43003013	Ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ go na ɛvin wande pas Mɔta lman Pikin we kɔmɔt ɔp na ɛvin, kam dɔng na dis wɔl.”
43003014	Lɛkɛ aw Mozis bin es da ayɛn snek ɔp pan tik na di dɛzat, na semwe so dɛn go gɛt fɔ es Mɔta lman Pikin ɔp.
43003015	So dat ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan am go gɛt layf we go de sote go.
43003016	Gɔd so lɛk mɔta lman dat i gi in wan gren Pikin we i lɛk; so dat ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan am nɔ go day, bɔt i go gɛt layf we go de sote go.
43003017	Gɔd nɔ sɛn in Pikin kam na wɔl fɔ kam jɔj mɔta lman, i sɛn am kam fɔ kam sev ɔlman.
43003018	If ɛnibɔdi biliv pan Gɔd in Pikin, Gɔd nɔ go kɔndɛm da pɔsin de. Bɔt Gɔd go kɔndɛm ɛnibɔdi we nɔ gri biliv pan in Pikin; we i nɔ biliv pan Gɔd in Pikin na di rizin dat nɔmɔ we go mek Gɔd kɔndɛm di pɔsin.
43003019	Na di we dis we Gɔd de jɔj mɔta lman: Gɔd mek di layt kam na di wɔl, bɔt di pipul dɛn lɛk daknɛs pas di layt, bikɔs dɛn de du bad ɔltɛm.
43003020	Ɛnibɔdi we de du bad, nɔ lɛk di layt ɛn i nɔ go kam na di layt, bikɔs i nɔ go want mek di layt mek pipul no di bad tin dɛn we i de du.
43003021	Bɔt ɛnibɔdi we de du wetin Gɔd se na di rayt tin go kam na di layt, so dat di layt go mek pipul no se na wetin Gɔd tɛl am fɔ du, na in i de du.
43003022	Wɛn dat pas, Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go Judia. I te lɔng lili bit wit dɛn na Judia. Wɛn i lib de, i bin de baptayz pipul.
43003023	Jɔn insɛf bin de baptayz pipul na Inɔn we bin de klos Selin, bikɔs plɛnti wata bin lib de. Plɛnti pipul bin de go mit Jɔn de ɛn i bin de baptayz dɛn.
43003024	Di tɛm we ɔl dis bin de bi, Jɔn nɔ bin go jel yet.
43003025	Sɔm pan Jɔn in lanin bɔy dɛn ɛn wan Ju man bigin mek plaba bikɔs di Ju Lɔ se pɔsin fɔ was spɛshal was if i want klin na Gɔd yay.
43003026	So di lanin bɔy dɛn go tɛl Jɔn se, “Ticha, yu mɛmba da man we bin de wit yu wɛn yu bin de na di istɛn pat na Riva Jɔdan, da man we yu bin de tɔk bɔt? Wɛl, insɛf de baptayz pipul naw na Riva Jɔdan, ɛn plɛnti plɛnti pipul de go to am fɔ mek i baptayz dɛn!”
43003027	Jɔn tɛl dɛn se, “Natin lɛkɛ dis nɔ de bi to pɔsin pas Gɔd mek i bi.
43003028	Unasɛf bin yɛri wɛn a se, ‘Mi nɔto di Mɛsaya, bɔt Gɔd sɛn mi fɔ kam bifo di Mɛsaya kam fɔ mek we fɔ am.’
43003029	Na di ɔkɔ gɛt di yawo, bɔt di ɔkɔ in padi we tinap klos dɛn go gladi wɛn i yɛri di ɔkɔ de tɔk. Na dat mek a gladi bad.
43003030	Mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul go de fala di Mɛsaya, bɔt di pipul dɛn we de fala mi go de lɛf fɔ fala mi smɔl smɔl. Na so i fɔ bi.”
43003031	Di pɔsin we kɔmɔt ɛvin, pas ɔlman. Di pɔsin we de na dis wɔl blant dis wɔl, ɛn i de tɔk bɔt dis wɔl yon biznɛs, bɔt di wan we kɔmɔt na ɛvin pas ɔlman.
43003032	Di wan we kɔmɔt ɛvin de tɔk bɔt wetin i dɔn si ɛn yɛri; pan ɔl dat nɔbɔdi nɔ de put at pan wetin i de tɔk.
43003033	Ɛnibɔdi we put at pan wetin i se, dɔn sho se na tru Gɔd tɔk.
43003034	Di wan we Gɔd dɔn sɛn de tɛl pipul di mɛsej we Gɔd gi am, bikɔs Gɔd mek ɔl di pawa we in Spirit gɛt de wit am.
43003035	Gɔd we na wi Papa lɛk in Pikin ɛn i mek in Pikin rul oba ɔltin.
43003036	Ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan Gɔd in Pikin go gɛt layf we go de sote go; bɔt ɛnibɔdi we nɔ du wetin Gɔd in Pikin se, nɔ go gɛt di tru layf we de sote go, ɛn Gɔd go stil de pɔnish am.
43004001	Di Faresi dɛn yɛri se Jizɔs bin de gɛt ɛn baptayz mɔ lanin bɔy dɛn pas Jɔn.
43004002	Bɔt Jizɔs insɛf nɔ bin de baptayz pipul, na in lanin bɔy dɛn nɔmɔ bin de baptayz dɛn.
43004003	Wɛn Jizɔs yɛri wetin dɛn bin de tɔk, i kɔmɔt Judia go bak na Galili.
43004004	Wɛn i de go, i bin gɛt fɔ pas tru Same ria.
43004005	I rich na wan tɔng we nem Sayka we de na Same ria, di tɔng bin de klos di fam we Jekɔb bin gi in pikin we nem Josɛf.
43004006	Di wɛl we Jekɔb bin gɛt bin lib de; we Jizɔs bin dɔn taya fɔ waka, i go sidɔm klos di wɛl. Na bin santɛm, bay dɛn twɛlv oklɔk.
43004007	Wan Same ria uman bin go gɛt wata na di wɛl, Jizɔs tɔk to am, i se, “Duya, gi mi wata mek a drink.”
43004008	Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn bin dɔn go na di tɔng fɔ bay tin fɔ it.
43004009	Di Same ria uman aks Jizɔs se, “Yu na Ju ɛn mi na uman we kɔmɔt Same ria. Wetin du yu de aks mi fɔ gi yu wata?” Di uman tɔk dat bikɔs di Ju ɛn di Same ria pipul dɛn nɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit dɛn kɔmpin.
43004010	Jizɔs se, “If yu bin no wetin Gɔd de gi pipul, ɛn if yu no udat de aks yu fɔ gi am wata fɔ drink, yu bin fɔ aks am ɛn i bin fɔ gi yu da wata we de mek pipul gɛt layf.”
43004011	Di uman se, “Yu nɔ gɛt kitul ɛn di wɛl dip; usay yu go gɛt di wata we go mek pipul gɛt layf?
43004012	Na wi gra npapa-papa Jekɔb bin gi wi dis wɛl. Na dis wɛl Jekɔb insɛf, in bɔy pikin dɛn, ɛn di ship ɛn got dɛn we i bin de mɛn bin de kam drink wata. Yu want tɛl mi se yu big pas Jekɔb?”
43004013	Jizɔs se, “Ɛnibɔdi we drink di wata we de na dis wɛl go tɔsti bak;
43004014	bɔt ɛnibɔdi we drink di wata we a go gi am nɔ go tɔsti igen. Di wata we a go gi di pɔsin go tan lɛkɛ wata we bɔs na grɔn, i go gi am layf we go de sote go.”
43004015	Di uman se, “Duya, sa, gi mi da wata de; mek a nɔ tɔsti igen, ɛn a nɔ go kam na dis wɛl igen fɔ kam gɛt wata.”
43004016	Jizɔs se, “Go kɔl di man we mared yu kam.”
43004017	Di uman se, “A nɔ mared.” Jizɔs se, “Yu tɔk tru we yu se yu nɔ mared.
43004018	Fayv difrɛn man dɛn dɔn mared yu, ɛn di man we yu tap to naw sɛf, nɔto yu man, so na tru yu de tɔk.”
43004019	Di uman se, “Masta, a si se yu na prɔfɛt we Gɔd sɛn.
43004020	Wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin se na dis big il pipul fɔ de go pre to Gɔd, bɔt una di Ju dɛn se na Jerusɛlɛm wi fɔ go wɛn wi want pre to Gɔd.”
43004021	Jizɔs tɛl di uman se, “Biliv wetin a de tɛl yu. Di tɛm dɔn rich we pipul nɔ go go na big il ɔ na Jerusɛlɛm wɛn dɛn want pre to Gɔd we na di Papa.
43004022	Una di Same ria pipul dɛn nɔ no di wan we una de nil dɔng fɔ pre to, una nɔ no am gud, bɔt wi di Ju pipul dɛn no di wan we wi de nil dɔng fɔ pre to, wi no am gud bikɔs na bay di Ju pipul dɛn Gɔd de sev pipul.
43004023	Bɔt di tɛm de kam ɛn i dɔn kam sɛf naw we Gɔd in Spirit go mek pipul ebul pre to Gɔd we na di Papa di rayt we, ɛn wɛn dɛn de pre dɛn go de mɛmba udat dɛn de pre to, fɔ tru.
43004024	Gɔd na Spirit, ɛn na in Spirit nɔmɔ de mek wi ebul pre to am di rayt we, ɛn mɛmba se na Gɔd wi de pre to, fɔ tru.”
43004025	Di uman se, “A no se di Mɛsaya, dat na da pɔsin we dɛn kɔl Krays, gɛt fɔ kam; ɛn wɛn i kam, i go tɛl wi ɔltin.”
43004026	Jizɔs ansa se, “Na mi dis, mi we de tɔk to yu.”
43004027	Wɛn di lanin bɔy dɛn kam bak, dɛn mit Jizɔs ɛn di uman de tɔk. Dɛn wɔnda fɔ si se Jizɔs de tɔk to di uman. Bɔt dɛn nɔn nɔ aks di uman wetin i want mek Jizɔs du fɔ am, ɛn dɛn nɔn nɔ aks Jizɔs wetin du i de tɔk to di uman.
43004028	Di uman lɛf in kitul ɛn go kɔl di pipul dɛn na di tɔng kam. I se,
43004029	“Una kam luk di man we tɛl mi ɔl wetin a dɔn du; fɔ se na in na di Mɛsaya?”
43004030	So ɔlman na di tɔng kɔmɔt na di tɔng rɔn go luk Jizɔs.
43004031	Da sem tɛm de Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn bin de tɛl Jizɔs mek i it sɔntin, dɛn se, “Ticha, duya, tray it sɔntin!”
43004032	Bɔt Jizɔs se, “A gɛt tin fɔ it we una nɔ no se a gɛt.”
43004033	Di lanin bɔy dɛn wɔnda, so dɛn bin bigin tɔk to dɛn kɔmpin, dɛn se, “Tinkya, pɔsin dɔn bring it fɔ am?”
43004034	Jizɔs se, “Mi yon it na fɔ dɔn di wok we di wan we sɛn mi gi mi fɔ du, ɛn fɔ du ɔl wetin i want.
43004035	Una kin de tɔk se: ‘I lɛf fo mɔnt fɔ mek di tin dɛn we wi plant du fɔ kɔt.’ Bɔt a de tɛl una se, una fɔ luk di fam dɛn gud, una go si se di tin dɛn we de gro dɔn du fɔ kɔt!
43004036	Di pɔsin we de kɔt dɛn tin we dɔn du fɔ kɔt de gɛt in pe, i de gɛda dɛn fɔ mek dɛn de sote go na ɛvin. So di pɔsin we plant ɛn di wan we gɛda di tin dɛn we dɔn du fɔ kɔt, ɔl tu go gladi.
43004037	Na tru dɛn kin tɔk, we dɛn kin se, ‘Wan pɔsin de plant, ɛn di ɔda pɔsin de kɔt ɛn gɛda di tin dɛn we dɔn du fɔ kɔt.’
43004038	A dɔn sɛn una fɔ go kɔt ɛn gɛda dɛn tin we dɔn du fɔ kɔt na fam we una nɔ wok pan; na ɔda pipul dɛn wok pan am, bɔt una de ɛnjɔy dɛn lebɔ.”
43004039	Plɛnti pan dɛn pipul we kɔmɔt Same ria we bin de na da tɔng de biliv pan Jizɔs, bikɔs di uman se, “I dɔn tɛl mi ɔl wetin a dɔn du.”
43004040	So di Same ria pipul dɛn go beg Jizɔs mek i de wit dɛn; Jizɔs gri. I de na di tɔng tu de.
43004041	Mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Jizɔs fɔseka di wɔd we Jizɔs insɛf tɔk.
43004042	Dɛn tɔn to di uman ɛn se, “Nɔto wetin yu tɔk mek wi biliv dis tɛm ya; wi biliv bikɔs wisɛf sɛf dɔn yɛri wetin i tɔk, ɛn wi no se na in de sev di pipul dɛn na di wɔl, fɔ tru.”
43004043	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn de wit di pipul dɛn tu de, i lɛf dɛn ɛn go bak na Galili.
43004044	Jizɔs insɛf tɔk se, “Prɔfɛt nɔ gɛt rɛspɛkt na in yon kɔntri.”
43004045	Wɛn Jizɔs rich na Galili, di pipul dɛn we bin lib de gladi fɔ am, bikɔs dɛn bin de fɔ di Pasova ɔlide ɛn dɛn bin dɔn si ɔl wetin i du da tɛm de.
43004046	Afta dat, Jizɔs go bak na wan tɔng na Galili we nem Kena, na de i bin tɔn wata to wayn. Wan gɔvmɛnt ɔfisa na Kena bin gɛt wan bɔy pikin na Kepanyɔm we bin sik.
43004047	Wɛn di ɔfisa yɛri se Jizɔs dɔn kɔmɔt Judia kam na Galili, i go mit Jizɔs ɛn beg am fɔ go mɛn in pikin we bin dɔn niali day na Kepanyɔm.
43004048	Jizɔs tɛl di ɔfisa se, “Una nɔn nɔ go biliv mi pas nɔmɔ una si di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we a de du.”
43004049	Di ɔfisa ansa se, “Masta, duya, kam lɛ wi go bifo mi pikin day.”
43004050	Jizɔs se, “Yu go nɔmɔ, yu pikin go wɛl!” Di ɔfisa biliv wetin Jizɔs tɛl am. I go.
43004051	Wɛn di ɔfisa de go, in bɔy dɛn mit am na rod. Dɛn se, “Yu bɔy pikin nɔ go day!”
43004052	Di ɔfisa aks in bɔy dɛn ustɛm di pikin bɛtɛ, dɛn se, “Na wan oklɔk santɛm yɛstade di fiva lɛf am.”
43004053	Di pikin in papa mɛmba se na da sem tɛm de Jizɔs bin tɛl am se in pikin go wɛl. So di ɔfisa ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn na in os biliv pan Jizɔs.
43004054	Na di sɛkɛn wɔnda ful wok dat we Jizɔs du wɛn i kɔmɔt Judia go Galili.
43005001	Wɛn dat dɔn, Jizɔs go na Jerusɛlɛm wan Ju ɔlide.
43005002	Wata bin de klos di ples we dɛn kɔl di Ship Get na Jerusɛlɛm. Fayv ples we tan lɛkɛ pɔch bin de rawnd di wata. Di Ju pipul dɛn bin de kɔl di ples Bɛtzata.
43005003	Plɛnti sik pipul bin de go ledɔm na di fayv pɔch dɛn. Sɔm pan dɛn sik pipul ya bin blɛn; sɔm nɔ bin ebul waka; ɛn sɔm bin jɛs de wan ples, dɛn nɔ ebul muf ɛni pat pan dɛn bɔdi. [Di sik pipul dɛn bin de wet fɔ mek di wata shek, bikɔs tɛm de we Gɔd we na di Masta in enjɛl kin kam shek di wata. Wɛn di wata de shek, di fɔs pɔsin we go insay di wata kin wɛl, ilɛk uskayn sik i gɛt.]
43005005	Wan man we bin dɔn sik tati-et ia bin de na di ples.
43005006	Wɛn Jizɔs si di man ledɔm de, i no se i bin dɔn sik ɔl da tɛm de. So Jizɔs aks am if i want wɛl.
43005007	Di sik man ansa se, “Masta, a nɔ gɛt nɔbɔdi fɔ put mi insay di wata wɛn i de shek. Wɛn a kin de tray fɔ go insay, ɔda pɔsin kin dɔn go insay de bifo mi.”
43005008	Jizɔs se, “Grap, tek yu mata ɛn waka!”
43005009	Di man wɛl wantɛm, i grap, tek in mata ɛn bigin waka. Dis tin ya bi di de we di Ju pipul dɛn kin pre ɛn blo.
43005010	So di Ju bigman dɛn bigin tɔk pan di man we Jizɔs mɛn. Dɛn se, “Tide na di de we fɔ pre ɛn blo, ɛn wi Ju Lɔ se pɔsin nɔ fɔ waka wit mata.”
43005011	Di man se, “Na di man we mɛn mi tɛl mi fɔ mek a tek mi mata ɛn waka.”
43005012	Di Ju bigman dɛn aks am se, “Udat na di man we tɛl yu fɔ du dat?”
43005013	Di man nɔ bin no udat na Jizɔs, bikɔs di pipul dɛn bin bɔku ɛn Jizɔs bin dɔn go wɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ bin de luk.
43005014	Wɛn dat pas, Jizɔs mit di man insay Gɔd in Os, i se, “Luk, yu dɔn wɛl naw, so yu fɔ lɛf fɔ sin, if nɔ so, wɔs tin go bi to yu pas wetin dɔn bi.”
43005015	Dɛn di man lɛf Jizɔs ɛn go mit di Ju bigman dɛn, ɛn i tɛl dɛn se na Jizɔs mɛn am.
43005016	So di Ju bigman dɛn bigin fɛn Jizɔs ɔlɔbɔt fɔ du am bad bikɔs i mɛn di man di de we fɔ pre ɛn blo.
43005017	Jizɔs se, “Mi Papa de wok ɔltɛm, ɛn misɛf fɔ wok.”
43005018	Bikɔs Jizɔs tɔk dat, di Ju bigman dɛn mekɔp fɔ kil am ɛn dis tɛm dɛn maynd bin mekɔp mɔ. Di tin we mek dɛn bin want kil am nɔto fɔ we i brok di Ju Lɔ we tɔk bɔt di de fɔ pre ɛn blo nɔmɔ, bɔt pantap dat, i se Gɔd na in Papa, so i mek insɛf ikwal wit Gɔd.
43005019	Jizɔs tɔn to di Ju bigman dɛn. I se, “A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, di Pikin nɔ kin du ɛni tin bay insɛf, na wetin i si in Papa de du nɔmɔ, na in insɛf de du. Wetin di Papa de du, na in di Pikin insɛf de du.
43005020	Di Papa lɛk in Pikin, ɛn i de sho am ɔl wetin i de du; i go sho in Pikin tin dɛn we i fɔ du we wɔnda ful pas dis wan ya we go mek una ɔl wɔnda.
43005021	Jɛs lɛkɛ aw di Papa de mek dɛn pipul we dɔn day rayz frɔm dɛn grev ɛn mek dɛn gɛt layf, na semwe so, di Pikin de gi layf to dɛn pipul we i want gi layf.
43005022	Di Papa nɔ de jɔj ɛnibɔdi, i dɔn gi in Pikin pawa fɔ jɔj pipul,
43005023	so dat ɔlman go ɔna ɛn rɛspɛkt di Pikin lɛkɛ aw dɛn ɔna ɛn rɛspɛkt di Papa. Ɛnibɔdi we nɔ ɔna ɛn rɛspɛkt di Pikin, na di Papa we sɛn di Pikin kam na wɔl di pɔsin nɔ ɔna ɛn rɛspɛkt.
43005024	“A de tɛl una se, ɛnibɔdi we yɛri mi wɔd ɛn biliv pan di wan we sɛn mi kam na wɔl, dɔn bigin liv di tru layf we go de sote go. Gɔd nɔ go jɔj am, i tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we bin dɔn day, bɔt i dɔn gɛt tru layf naw.
43005025	A de tɛl una se, di tɛm de kam ɛn i dɔn kam we dɛn pipul we dɔn day bikɔs dɛn nɔ gɛt di tru layf, go yɛri dɛn tin we Gɔd in Pikin de tɔk, ɛn ɔl dɛn wan we yɛri wetin i se ɛn du am go gɛt tru layf.
43005026	Jɛs lɛkɛ aw di Papa gɛt pawa fɔ gi layf, semwe so, i gi in Pikin insɛf pawa fɔ gi layf.
43005027	Ɛn di Papa dɔn gi in Pikin di pawa fɔ jɔj mɔta lman bikɔs in Pikin na Mɔta lman Pikin.
43005028	Wetin a jɛs tɛl una so nɔ fɔ mek una wɔnda, di tɛm de kam we ɔl dɛn pipul we dɔn day go yɛri wetin di Pikin de tɔk,
43005029	ɛn dɛn go rayz frɔm dɛn grev: di wan dɛn we bin du gud, go rayz frɔm dɛn grev ɛn dɛn go gɛt layf we go de sote go; bɔt dɛn wan we bin du bad, go rayz frɔm dɛn grev, ɛn a go kɔndɛm dɛn.
43005030	“A nɔ gɛt di pawa fɔ du ɛni tin bay misɛf; a jɛs de jɔj pipul lɛkɛ aw Gɔd tɛl mi fɔ jɔj dɛn, so na di rayt we a de jɔj pipul bikɔs a nɔ de tray fɔ du wetin a want, na wetin di wan we sɛn mi want, na dat nɔmɔ a de du.
43005031	“If na mi wan gren tɔk bɔt misɛf, nɔbɔdi nɔ go biliv wetin a tɔk.
43005032	Bɔt ɔda pɔsin de we de tɔk bɔt mi, ɛn a no se na tru i de tɔk bɔt mi.
43005033	Una bin sɛn sɔm mɛsenja dɛn go aks Jɔn bɔt mi, ɛn wetin Jɔn tɔk bɔt mi na tru.
43005034	Nɔto fɔ se a nɔ de abop pan wetin ɔda pɔsin de tɔk bɔt mi, we na tru, a jɛs tɛl una se wetin Jɔn tɔk bɔt mi na tru, fɔ mek Gɔd sev una.
43005035	Wetin Jɔn bin de tɔk bin tan lɛkɛ lamp we layt ɛn di layt brayt fɔ mek ɔlman si. Una bin gri fɔ mek di layt shayn pan una fɔs ɛn mek una at gladi.
43005036	Bɔt wetin a de du sho wetin a bi fɔ tru pas aw wetin Jɔn sɛf tɔk, sho wetin a bi; wetin a de du na wetin nɔmɔ mi Papa tɛl mi fɔ du. Na dɛn wok ya we a de du de mek pipul no udat a bi ɛn sho se na mi Papa sɛn mi kam na wɔl.
43005037	Ɛn mi Papa we sɛn mi insɛf de tɔk udat a bi. Una nɔ yɛri in vɔys wande ɛn una nɔ si in fes wande.
43005038	Ɛn una nɔ de kip in wɔd na una at bikɔs una nɔ biliv pan di wan we i sɛn kam na wɔl.
43005039	Una de luk gud insay di wɔd dɛn we rayt na Gɔd in Buk, bikɔs una min se una go gɛt layf we go de sote go insay dɛn buk de. Bɔt na mi dɛn de tɔk bɔt na Gɔd in Buk.
43005040	Pan ɔl dat, una nɔ gri fɔ kam to mi, so dat una go gɛt di tru layf we go de sote go.
43005041	“A nɔ de wok fɔ mek mɔta lman prez mi.
43005042	A no una, a no se una nɔ lɛk Gɔd at ɔl.
43005043	Na mi Papa sɛn mi, na in mek i kam, bɔt una nɔ gri lisin to mi; bɔt wɛn ɔda pɔsin kam fɔ insɛf, nɔbɔdi nɔ sɛn am, una go lisin to am.
43005044	Una lɛk di prez we una kɔmpin dɛn de prez una, bɔt una nɔ de tray fɔ mek di wan Gɔd prez una, so aw una go biliv mi?
43005045	Una nɔ fɔ fil se na mi go tɛl mi Papa se una dɔn du bad. Na Mozis we una bin de abop pan fɔ ɛp una go tɛl Gɔd se una dɔn du bad.
43005046	If una bin biliv Mozis fɔ tru, una bin fɔ biliv mi, bikɔs Mozis rayt bɔt mi.
43005047	Bɔt we una nɔ biliv wetin i rayt bɔt mi, aw una go biliv wetin a de tɔk?”
43006001	Wɛn dat dɔn, Jizɔs krɔs oba Lek Galili (sɔm pipul kin kɔl am Lek Taybiryɔs).
43006002	Plɛnti plɛnti pipul fala am, bikɔs dɛn si di wɔnda ful wok we i du we i mɛn dɛn sik pipul.
43006003	Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn go sidɔm ɔp wan il.
43006004	Di tɛm fɔ di Pasova ɔlide bin dɔn de rich.
43006005	Wɛn Jizɔs luk rawnd, i si se plɛnti plɛnti pipul de kam to am, so i aks Filip se, “Usay wi go bay bred we go du fɔ fid ɔl dɛn pipul ya?”
43006006	Jizɔs jɛs tɔk dat nɔmɔ fɔ si wetin Filip go du, bikɔs i bin dɔn no wetin in go du.
43006007	Filip ansa Jizɔs se, “Fɔ mek ɔlman gɛt lili lili bit, wi fɔ pul pas tu ɔndrɛd silva kɔpɔ fɔ bay di bred.”
43006008	Wan pan Jizɔs in ɔda lanin bɔy dɛn, dat na Andru we na Saymɔn Pita in brɔda se,
43006009	“Wan lili bɔbɔ de ya; i gɛt fayv bali bred ɛn tu fish. Bɔt dɛn nɔ go du fɔ ɔl dɛn pipul ya.”
43006010	Jizɔs tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una tɛl di pipul dɛn fɔ sidɔm.” Plɛnti gras bin de na di grɔn, so ɔl di pipul dɛn sidɔm. Di man dɛn we bin lib de na bin lɛkɛ fayv tawzin so.
43006011	Jizɔs tek di bred, i tɛl Gɔd tɛnki, dɔn i sheb am gi di pipul dɛn we bin sidɔm. I du di sem tin wit di fish, ɛn ɔlman gɛt ɔl wetin i want.
43006012	Wɛn dɛn ɔl dɔn bɛlful, Jizɔs tɛl in lanin bɔy dɛn se, “Una gɛda ɔl di af af we lɛf, mek natin nɔ wes.”
43006013	So di lanin bɔy dɛn gɛda ɔl di af af bred dɛn we bin lɛf pan di fayv bali bred, afta di pipul dɛn dɔn it. Di af af we dɛn gɛda ful twɛlv blay.
43006014	Wɛn di pipul dɛn we bin lib de si di wɔnda ful wok we Jizɔs du, dɛn se, “Fɔ tru, dis man na da prɔfɛt we Mozis bin se go kam na wɔl.”
43006015	Jizɔs no se di pipul dɛn bin want kam kapu am ɛn fos am fɔ bi king, so i kɔmɔt to dɛn, in wan gren go ɔp di il.
43006016	Wɛn ivintɛm rich, Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn go na Lek Galili.
43006017	Dɛn tek bot krɔs oba, dɛn bin put ed fɔ go Kepanyɔm. Dɛn lib de sote nɛt kam, bɔt Jizɔs nɔ bin dɔn go mit dɛn yet.
43006018	Bay da tɛm de tra nga briz bin de blo we mek di wata rɔf.
43006019	Di lanin bɔy dɛn bin dɔn padul go lɛkɛ tri to fo mayl midul di wata we dɛn si Jizɔs de waka pantap di wata de kam klos di bot. Di lanin bɔy dɛn dɛn fred.
43006020	Jizɔs tɛl dɛn se, “Una nɔ fred, na mi dis!”
43006021	Na wit gladi dɛn mek Jizɔs go insay di bot, di bot rich di ples we dɛn bin de go na sho wantɛm.
43006022	Di ɔda de, dɛn pipul we bin dɔn lɛf na di ɔda sho klos Lek Galili notis se na wan gren bot bin lib de. Dɛn bin no se Jizɔs nɔ bin go insay di bot wit in lanin bɔy dɛn, wɛn dɛn bin de lɛf fɔ go Kepanyɔm.
43006023	Bɔt sɔm ɔda bot dɛn we kɔmɔt Taybiryɔs, kam nia di ples we di pipul dɛn it di bred afta di Masta dɔn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki.
43006024	Wɛn di pipul dɛn nɔ si Jizɔs ɛn in lanin bɔy dɛn, dɛn go insay di bot dɛn ɛn go luk fɔ Jizɔs na Kepanyɔm.
43006025	Wɛn di pipul dɛn krɔs di Lek dɛn si Jizɔs, na in dɛn aks am se, “Ticha, ustɛm yu rich ya?”
43006026	Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una se, na fɔseka di bred we a bin gi una we una it te una bɛlful, mek una de luk fɔ mi, nɔto bikɔs una ɔnda stand wetin di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we a de du, min.
43006027	Una nɔ fɔ wok fɔ di it we go pwɛl, bɔt una fɔ wok fɔ di it we de gi layf we go de sote go. Na di it dat we Mɔta lman Pikin go gi una fɔ it, bikɔs na Mɔta lman Pikin, Gɔd we na di Papa dɔn sho se in gri fɔ.”
43006028	So di pipul dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Wetin wi fɔ du, so dat wi go du wetin Gɔd want wi fɔ du?”
43006029	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Di tin we Gɔd want una fɔ du na in dis: una fɔ biliv pan di wan we Gɔd sɛn kam na wɔl.”
43006030	Dɛn aks am bak se, “Us wɔnda ful wok yu go du fɔ mek wi si, so dat wi go biliv Yu? Wetin yu go du?
43006031	Wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin it da tin we dɛn kɔl mana wɛn dɛn bin de na di dɛzat, ɛn na bɔt dat dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk we dɛn se, ‘I gi dɛn bred we kɔmɔt ɛvin fɔ it.’ ”
43006032	Jizɔs se, “A de tɛl una fɔ tru se, di tin we Mozis bin gi una nɔto di bred we kɔmɔt ɛvin; na mi Papa de gi una di tru bred we kɔmɔt ɛvin.
43006033	Di bred we Gɔd de gi na di wan we kɔmɔt ɛvin kam dɔng we de gi mɔta lman di tru layf.”
43006034	Dɛn se, “Masta, duya, gi wi da bred de ɔltɛm.”
43006035	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Mi na di bred we de gi layf, ɛnibɔdi we kam to mi ɛn biliv pan mi nɔ go angri, ɛn i nɔ go tɔsti igen.
43006036	Bɔt a de tɛl una se una dɔn si mi, bɔt una nɔ biliv pan mi.
43006037	Ɔl dɛn wan we mi Papa dɔn gi mi go kam to mi. A nɔ go drɛb ɛnibɔdi we kam to mi,
