44001006	Wɛn di apɔsul dɛn bin gɛda na wan mitin, dɛn aks Jizɔs se, “Masta, na naw yu go mek di Izrɛl pipul dɛn rul bak?”
44001007	Jizɔs ansa dɛn se, “Na mi Papa nɔmɔ gɛt rayt fɔ tɔk ustɛm ɔl dɛn tin de go bi, nɔto una.
44001008	Wɛn Gɔd in Spirit kam pan una, i go gi una pawa fɔ mek una tɔk bɔt mi na Jerusɛlɛm, na Judia, na Same ria ɛn ɔlɔbɔt na wɔl.”
44001009	Wɛn Jizɔs tɔk dɔn, aw di apɔsul dɛn de luk am, na in Gɔd tek am go ɔp na ɛvin. Di apɔsul dɛn luk Jizɔs sote i lɔs na di klawd.
44001010	We di apɔsul dɛn bin de luk fɔ Jizɔs na di klawd, na de dɛn si tu man we wɛr wayt kam tinap klos dɛn.
44001011	Di tu man dɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una we kɔmɔt Galili, wetin du una de luk na di klawd? Dis sem Jizɔs ya we Gɔd tek go ɔp na ɛvin go kam bak na wɔl lɛkɛ aw una si am de go ɔp na ɛvin.”
44001012	Di apɔsul dɛn kɔmɔt na di ay il we nem Mawnt Ɔliv, go bak na Jerusɛlɛm. (Na af mayl frɔm Mawnt Ɔliv to Jerusɛlɛm. Di Ju Lɔ se pɔsin nɔ fɔ waka pas af mayl di de we fɔ pre ɛn blo.)
44001013	Wɛn dɛn rich na Jerusɛlɛm, dɛn go na wan rum ɔp di garɛt na di os we dɛn bin tap. Di pipul dɛn we bin tap de na Pita, Jɔn, Jems, Andru, Filip, Tɔmɔs, Bata lo myu, Matyu, Jems we na Alfiɔs in pikin, Saymɔn we bin de fɛt fɔ fri in kɔntri, Judas we na bin Jems in pikin.
44001014	Dɛn apɔsul ya, Jizɔs in brɔda dɛn, sɔm uman dɛn, ɛn Meri we na Jizɔs in mama, dɛn ɔl bin de mit de ɛn pre wit wan at.
44001015	Wan de, dɛn wan we biliv pan Jizɔs bin gɛt mitin; na bɔt wan ɔndrɛd ɛn twɛnti pipul bin go di mitin. Pita tinap midul di pipul dɛn
44001016	ɛn bigin tɔk to dɛn se, “Mi pipul dɛn, Gɔd in Spirit bin mek Devid rayt lɔntɛm na Gɔd in Buk bɔt Judas, da man we bin de bifo dɛn pipul we go ol Jizɔs; ɔl wetin i bin dɔn rayt bin jɛs gɛt fɔ bi.
44001017	Judas na bin wan pan wi ɛn na wi ɔl bin de wok fɔ Gɔd.”
44001018	(Wɛn Judas sɛl Jizɔs, i tek di kɔpɔ go bay grɔn. Na da grɔn de Judas fɔdɔm kam dɔng, in bɛlɛ plit ɛn in gɔt kɔmɔt na do.
44001019	Ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm bin yɛri bɔt wetin bi to Judas ɛn dɛn kɔl di ples we Judas day, Akɛldama, we min “Grɔn we Pɔsin Blɔd Wes”.)
44001020	“Dɛn rayt na di Sambuk se, ‘Mek natin nɔ lɛf na in os ɛn mek nɔbɔdi nɔ sidɔm de.’ Dɛn rayt igen se, ‘Mek ɔda pɔsin du di wok we i bin de du.’
44001021	“Na dat mek wi fɔ pik wan man we fɔ tɛl ɔda pipul se Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev. Di pɔsin we wi go pik fɔ dɔn de wit wi frɔm di tɛm we Jɔn bin de baptayz pipul sote di tɛm we Gɔd tek Jizɔs go ɛvin.”
44001023	Dɛn pik tu pɔsin: Josɛf Basa bas (we nem Jɔstɔs) ɛn Mata yas.
44001024	Dɛn pre se, “Masta, yu we sabi ɔlman at, duya, sho wi pan dɛn tu man ya, di pɔsin we yu dɔn pik
44001025	fɔ du di wok we Judas dɔn lɛf. Judas dɔn go na di say we i fɔ go.”
44001026	Dɛn Ju pipul gɛt we fɔ no wetin Gɔd want, so di ilɛvin apɔsul dɛn trowe sɔntin na grɔn fɔ pik di wan pɔsin. Na Mata yas nem kɔmɔt so dɛn mek i bi wan pan di apɔsul dɛn.
44002001	Di de we dɛn kɔl Pɛntikɔst, we na di de we mek fifti frɔm di tɛm we dɛn mek di Ju ɔlide we dɛn kɔl Pasova, ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin gɛda wan ples fɔ pre.
44002002	Wantɛm, dɛn yɛri nɔys lɛkɛ big briz de blo ɛn di nɔys bin de ɔlɔbɔt insay di os we dɛn bin de.
44002003	Dɛn si tin dɛn lɛkɛ lili lili faya na di ples we dɛn bin de, ɛn di lili lili faya dɛn kam pan dɛn ɔl.
44002004	Gɔd in Spirit kam insay dɛn ɔl we bin lib de ɛn mek dɛn ɔl bigin tɔk langwej we dɛn nɔ lan; ɛni tin we Gɔd in Spirit want mek dɛn tɔk, na in dɛn tɔk.
44002005	Ɔl dɛn Ju pipul we fred Gɔd, we kɔmɔt ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn ɔda kɔntri, bin de na Jerusɛlɛm da tɛm de.
44002006	Wɛn dɛn yɛri di briz de blo na di os, big big krawd kam gɛda de luk; dɛn mɔt ful wɛn dɛn ɔl yɛri dɛn pipul we biliv Jizɔs de tɔk dɛn difrɛn difrɛn langwej. Ɔlman yɛri pipul de tɔk in yon langwej.
44002007	Di pipul dɛn ɔl wɔnda, dɛn mɔt ful; dɛn se, “Dɛn man ya we wi de yɛri so, nɔto Galili dɛn kɔmɔt?
44002008	Aw wi yɛri dɛn de tɔk dɛn difrɛn difrɛn langwej we wi de tɔk sins wi bɔn?
44002009	Sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Patia, Midya, Ilam, Mɛso po te mya, Judia, Kapa do shya, Pɔntɔs, ɛn Eshya.
44002010	Sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Fri jya, Pamfi lya, Ijipt ɛn ɔlsay na Libya we de klos Sayrini; sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Rom.
44002011	Wi ɔl miks: Ju pipul ɛn dɛn pipul we gri fɔ tɔn to Ju, ɛn sɔm pan wi kɔmɔt Krit ɛn Are bia; bɔt pan ɔl dat wi ɔl de yɛri dɛn pipul ya we kɔmɔt Galili de tɔk na wi yon difrɛn langwej dɛn bɔt dɛn big wok we Gɔd de du.”
44002012	Di pipul dɛn bin wɔnda, dɛn nɔ bin no wetin de bi, so dɛn bigin fɔ aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Wetin dis min?”
44002013	Bɔt sɔm pan dɛn bin de laf, de tɔk se, “Dɛn man ya dɔn drɔnk!”
44002014	Wɛn dɛn tɔk so, na in Pita ɛn di ɔda ilɛvin apɔsul dɛn tinap; Pita bigin fɔ tɔk to di pipul dɛn lawd wan. I se, “Mi Ju pipul dɛn ɛn una ɔl we de na Jerusɛlɛm, una lisin wetin a de kam tɛl una.
44002015	Una de tɔk se dɛn man ya drɔnk, bɔt dɛn nɔ drɔnk, i jɛs nayn oklɔk na mɔnin.
44002016	Na di tin dis we da prɔfɛt we nem Joɛl bin de tɔk bɔt wɛn i se:
44002017	‘Gɔd se, “Na di tin dis we a go du wɛn di wɔl want dɔn, a go gi ɔlman mi Spirit. Una gyal pikin ɛn una bɔy pikin dɛn go tɛl pipul mi mɛsej; una yɔng man dɛn go si tin we a sho dɛn, ɛn una ol man dɛn go drim plɛnti tin.
44002018	Yɛs, wɛn di wɔl want dɔn, a go gi ɔl dɛn wan we de du mi wok mi Spirit, ɛn dɛn go tɔk wetin go bi.
44002019	A go sho sayn na di klawd ɛn ɔlsay na wɔl. Una go si blɔd, faya, ɛn plɛnti smok.
44002020	Bifo di big de we di Masta go kam bak, di san go dak lɛkɛ nɛt ɛn di mun go rɛd lɛkɛ blɔd.
44002021	Ɛn ɛnibɔdi we go kɔl di Masta go sev.” ’
44002022	“Una dɛn pipul na Izrɛl, una opin una yes gud ɛn lisin wetin a de tɔk. Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt na Man we Gɔd sɛn to wi.Unasɛf no bɔt ɔl dɛn tin ya bikɔs naya dɛn bi.
44002023	Una sɛl Jizɔs gi dɛn wikɛd pipul. Gɔd bin dɔn no bɔt dat ɛn i bin dɔn gri fɔ mek dat bi. Una gi dɛn wikɛd pipul pawa fɔ nel Jizɔs na di krɔs.
44002024	Bɔt Gɔd wek Jizɔs we bin dɔn day ɛn mek am rayz frɔm di grev; i nɔ mek day mek i sɔfa igen bikɔs day nɔ bin gɛt pawa fɔ mek i nɔ rayz igen.
44002025	Devid bin tɔk bɔt Jizɔs se, ‘A de si mi Masta bifo mi ɔltɛm; i de wit mi, so a nɔ go wɔri.
44002026	Na dat mek mi at gladi, ɛn a prez am wit mi mɔt. Pan ɔl we mi na mɔtalman, a de abop pan wetin Gɔd dɔn prɔmis.
44002027	Yu nɔ go lɛf mi na grev; Yu nɔ go gri fɔ mek di wan we na yu yon ɛn we de wok fɔ yu rɔtin na di grev.
44002028	Yu dɔn sho mi aw a go gɛt layf. We yu de wit mi, yu go mek a gladi.’
44002029	“Mi pipul dɛn, a de tɛl una tru wɔd bɔt Devid, we na wan pan wi gra npapa-papa dɛn. I day, dɛn bɛr am ɛn in grev de sote tide.
44002030	We Devid na bin prɔfɛt, i bin no se Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis am siryɔs wan se in go mek wan pan in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn bi king lɛkɛ insɛf, ɛn dat na Krays.
44002031	Devid bin dɔn no bifo di tin bi, na dat mek i tɔk bɔt aw di Mɛsaya go rayz frɔm di grev, i se, ‘Dɛn bɛr am, bɔt in bɔdi nɔ rɔtin.’
44002032	Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev ɛn wi, we na in apɔsul dɛn de tɛl una bɔt wetin bin bi we wisɛf si.
44002033	Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev ɛn mek i sidɔm na in raytan. Papa Gɔd dɔn gi Jizɔs in Spirit we i bin prɔmis ɛn ɔl wetin una de si ɛn wetin una de yɛri, na Jizɔs de mek dɛn bi.
44002034	Devid nɔ bin go ɔp na ɛvin, bɔt i tɔk se, ‘Gɔd tɛl mi Masta se, Kam sidɔm na mi raytan
44002035	wet sote a mek dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk yu kam ɔnda yu fut mek yu go mas dɛn.’
44002036	“Mek ɔlman na Izrɛl no se Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs we una bin nel na di krɔs, rayz frɔm di grev. Gɔd dɔn kɔl am di Masta ɛn di Mɛsaya!”
44002037	Wɛn di pipul dɛn yɛri ɔl wetin Pita tɔk, dɛn at kɔt; dɛn aks Pita ɛn di ɔda apɔsul dɛn se, “Wi brɔda dɛn, wetin wi fɔ du?”
44002038	Pita ansa dɛn se, “Una ɔl fɔ lɛf dɛn bad tin we una de du ɛn kam to Gɔd. Mek dɛn baptayz una wit Jizɔs Krays in nem; Gɔd go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una de du ɛn i go gi una in Spirit.
44002039	Di prɔmis we Gɔd bin prɔmis, na fɔ una, fɔ una pikin dɛn, fɔ ɔl dɛn wan we nɔ bɔn yet, ɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we Gɔd dɔn kɔl fɔ kam to am.”
44002040	Pita tɔk to dɛn ɛn wɔn dɛn se, “Una du dɛn tin we go mek una nɔ sɔfa, lɛkɛ aw dɛn wikɛd pipul na dis neshɔn go sɔfa.”
44002041	Plɛnti pipul we yɛri wetin Pita tɔk biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn di apɔsul dɛn baptayz tri tawzin pipul.
44002042	Di apɔsul dɛn bin de lan dɛn Gɔd in wɔd. Dɛn bin de lɛkɛ brɔda ɛn sista ɛn dɛn bin de it ɛn pre na wan ples.
44002043	Wit Gɔd in pawa di apɔsul dɛn bin de du big ɛn wɔnda ful tin dɛn we bin de mek ɔlman wɔnda.
44002044	Ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de na wan ples wit wan at ɛn ɔlman bin de bring wetin i gɛt fɔ sheb am.
44002045	Sɔm pipul sɛl dɛn prɔpati ɛn sheb di kɔpɔ mek ɔlman gɛt wetin i want.
44002046	Di pipul dɛn kin mit na Gɔd in Os ɔltɛm fɔ pre ɛn wɛn dɛn dɔn, dɛn kin go na dɛn kɔmpin os fɔ it, ɛn ɔlman kin gladi fɔ sheb in it wit in kɔmpin.
44002047	Dɛn kin de prez Gɔd, ɛn pipul bin rɛspɛkt dɛn. Masta Jizɔs mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul we fɔ sev, biliv pan am.
44003001	Wan de, bay tri oklɔk santɛm, di tɛm we dɛn Ju pipul kin go pre, Pita ɛn Jɔn bin go na Gɔd in Os fɔ go pre.
44003002	Pipul bin de kɛr wan man we nɔ bin ebul waka frɔm we in mama bɔn am, go lɛf am na di get we dɛn kɔl Fayn Get, fɔ mek i beg to dɛn pipul we bin de go pre na Gɔd in Os.
44003003	Wɛn di man si Pita ɛn Jɔn de go insay Gɔd in Os fɔ go pre, i bigin beg dɛn fɔ mek dɛn gi am mɔni.
44003004	Pita ɛn Jɔn luk gud insay di man in yay, na de Pita tɛl am se, “Es yay, luk wi!”
44003005	So di man luk dɛn bikɔs i bin min se dɛn go gi am sɔntin.
44003006	Na de Pita tɛl am se, “A nɔ gɛt kɔpɔ, bɔt a go gi yu wetin a gɛt. Bay Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt in pawa, grap, waka!”
44003007	Pita ol di man in raytan ɛn ɛp am fɔ tinap. Di man in fut dɛn tra nga wantɛm.
44003008	I grap ɛn bigin fɔ waka go insay Gɔd in Os. I bigin de waka, de jomp, de prez Gɔd.
44003009	Ɔlman si am we i de waka, de prez Gɔd.
44003010	Wɛn di pipul dɛn no se na di man dat we bin de sidɔm klos Fayn Get na Gɔd in Os fɔ beg, dɛn wɔnda, dɛn mɔt ful we dɛn si wetin bi to di man.
44003011	Di man we bin jɛs wɛl go grip Pita ɛn Jɔn; ɔl di pipul dɛn wɔnda, dɛn rɔn go na di ples we dɛn kɔl Sɔlɔmɔn in Vira nda.
44003012	Wɛn Pita si di pipul dɛn, i se, “Mi kɔntri man dɛn, wetin mek una de wɔnda fɔseka wetin dɔn bi ɛn wetin mek una de luk wi so? Una min se na wi yon pawa ɔ na bikɔs wi gud mek dis man wɛl?
44003013	Na di Gɔd we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn, Ebraam, Ayzik, ɛn Jekɔb bin de pre to, na dis sem Gɔd dɔn gi Jizɔs we na in savant, di pawa fɔ mɛn dis man. Wɛn una bin kɛr Jizɔs go bifo Paylet ɛn Paylet bin want mek Jizɔs fri, una bin tɔk bad bɔt am.
44003014	Jizɔs na bin man we tret ɛn i bin gi insɛf to Gɔd. Una bin tɔk bad bɔt Jizɔs ɛn una beg Paylet se mek i kil Jizɔs ɛn lɛf wan man we kil pɔsin.
44003015	So, una kil Jizɔs we gɛt pawa fɔ gi tru layf, bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev. Wi, we na in apɔsul dɛn, si Jizɔs wit wi yon yay afta i rayz frɔm di grev.
44003016	Na Jizɔs in pawa ɛn we wi biliv pan am mek dis man wɛl gud gud wan.
44003017	“Mi pipul dɛn, a no se una ɛn una bigman dɛn nɔ bin no wetin una bin de du wɛn una kil Jizɔs.
44003018	Bɔt na so Gɔd mek ɔl wetin i bin mek dɛn prɔfɛt tɔk lɔntɛm bɔt di Mɛsaya, kam bi tru.
44003019	Una fɔ lɛf fɔ du bad ɛn kam to Gɔd, ɛn Gɔd go padin una fɔ ɔl una sin.
44003020	Da tɛm de, Gɔd we na wi Masta go mek in Spirit wok insay una at fɔ mek una tinap tra nga, ɛn i go sɛn Jizɔs we na di Mɛsaya we i dɔn pik fɔ sev una.
44003021	Jizɔs fɔ de na ɛvin sote Gɔd dɔn du ɔltin lɛkɛ aw in prɔfɛt dɛn bin dɔn tɔk lɔntɛm.
44003022	Mozis bin tɔk se, ‘Gɔd we na una Masta go sɛn prɔfɛt to una lɛkɛ aw i sɛn mi ɛn da prɔfɛt de go kɔmɔt na una yon neshɔn. Una fɔ lisin ɛn du ɔl wetin i tɛl una fɔ du.
44003023	Ɛnibɛdi we nɔ tek wetin di prɔfɛt tɔk, Gɔd go pul am kɔmɔt to in pipul dɛn ɛn kil am!’
44003024	Na so ɔl di prɔfɛt dɛn, frɔm Samyɛl sote rich dɛn prɔfɛt we de naw, bin tɔk.
44003025	Di tin we Gɔd prɔmis wi we dɛn prɔfɛt tɔk bɔt na fɔ wi ɔl, ɛn una gɛt pan da blɛsin we Gɔd bin prɔmis wi gra npapa-papa dɛn, wɛn i tɛl Ebraam se, ‘Na yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn a go tek fɔ blɛs ɔl di pipul dɛn na di wɔl.’
44003026	Wɛn Gɔd sɛn Jizɔs lɛkɛ savant kam na wɔl, Gɔd mek i kam to una we na Izrɛl pipul fɔs, kam tɔk bɔt Gɔd fɔ mek bɛtɛ go fala una ɛn mek una go lɛf fɔ du bad.”
44004001	Wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn bin de tɔk to di pipul dɛn, dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin wit di bigman fɔ dɛn wan we bin de gyad Gɔd in Os, ɛn dɛn Sadyusi, kam mit dɛn.
44004002	Dɛn pipul ya bin vɛks bad bad bikɔs Pita ɛn Jɔn bin de tɛl di pipul dɛn se we pɔsin day, i go rayz bak. Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn se Jizɔs bin rayz frɔm di grev, so wɛn ɛnibɔdi day, di pɔsin go rayz frɔm in grev.
44004003	Dɛn ol Pita ɛn Jɔn, bɔt we ivintɛm bin dɔn kam, dɛn go kip dɛn na jel sote do klin.
44004004	Plɛnti pipul we yɛri wetin Pita ɛn Jɔn bin de tɔk biliv wetin dɛn yɛri, ɛn ɔl di man dɛn bin rich bɔt fayv tawzin.
44004005	Di ɔda de, ɔl dɛn bigman we de rul na di kɔntri wit ɔl di ɔda bigman dɛn, ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha go mit na wan ples na Jerusɛlɛm.
44004006	Dɛn mit Anas we na bin di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, ɛn Kaye fas, wit Jɔn, Alɛgza nda, ɛn di ɔda man dɛn we fambul to Anas.
44004007	Dɛn pul Pita ɛn Jɔn kɔmɔt na jel, kɛr dɛn go bifo ɔl di man dɛn we bin dɔn gɛda de. Di man dɛn aks Pita ɛn Jɔn se, “Usay una gɛt di pawa fɔ mek dis man ya waka? Udat gi una?”
44004008	Gɔd in Spirit bin de pan Pita, so Pita tɛl dɛn se, “Una we de rul ɛn una dɛn bigman we de naya!
44004009	Una bring wi kam naya tide ɛn aks wi bɔt di gud we wi du fɔ da man we nɔ bin ebul waka ɛn udat in pawa wi tek mɛn am;
44004010	wɛl, a gladi fɔ tɛl una ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl se una bin kil Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt ɛn una nel am na di krɔs, bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev. Na in pawa mek dis man ya we nɔ bin ebul waka, wɛl gud fashin.
44004011	Na bɔt Jizɔs, Gɔd bin tɔk se, ‘Da ston we una we de bil bin se nɔ bɛtɛ, na in dɔn kam bi di ston we bɛtɛ pas ɔl di ɔda ston dɛn na di os.’
44004012	Nɔbɔdi nɔ de na wɔl we ebul sev pɔsin; na Jizɔs nɔmɔ ebul sev pɔsin.”
44004013	Di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot si se Pita ɛn Jɔn nɔ bin sabi rid ɛn rayt, ɛn dɛn na bin ɔdi nari pipul, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin de fred fɔ tɔk. Na dat mek dɛn wɔnda; ɛn dɛn kam gɛt fɔ no se dɛn bin de wit Jizɔs.
44004014	Di bigman dɛn nɔ bin ebul fɔ tɔk bad bɔt Pita ɛn Jɔn bikɔs di man we dɛn mɛn bin tinap klos dɛn.
44004015	Di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot bin want ɛng ed so dɛn tɛl Pita ɛn Jɔn fɔ go na do.
44004016	Dɛn aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Wetin wi fɔ du wit Pita ɛn Jɔn? Ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm dɔn si se na dɛn dɔn mɛn da man we nɔ bin ebul waka; nɔto kɔna dis tin bi ɛn wi nɔ go se na lay.
44004017	Wɛl, fɔ mek dis kayn nyus nɔ prɛd, una lɛ wi kɔl dɛn ɛn wɔn dɛn tra nga wan mek dɛn nɔ tɛl nɔbɔdi igen bɔt Jizɔs.”
44004018	So dɛn kɔl Pita ɛn Jɔn kam insay di ples bak. Dɛn wɔn dɛn tra nga wan se dɛn nɔ fɔ tɔk to ɛnibɔdi bɔt Jizɔs igen ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ tich ɛnibɔdi bɔt Jizɔs in wok.
44004019	Pita ɛn Jɔn aks dɛn se, “Una tɛl wi, wetin na di rayt tin we Gɔd want: wi fɔ gri fɔ du wetin mɔta lman want ɔ wi fɔ du wetin Gɔd want?
44004020	Wi nɔ go ebul sɛt mɔt ɛn nɔ tɔk bɔt wetin wi dɔn si ɛn yɛri.”
44004021	Di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot wɔn dɛn tra nga wan bak ɛn lɛf dɛn fɔ go. Dɛn nɔ du dɛn natin, bikɔs ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin lib de bin de tɛl Gɔd tɛnki fɔ wetin bin jɛs bi.
44004022	Di man we Gɔd mɛn bin dɔn ol pas fɔti ia.
44004023	Wɛn dɛn fri Pita ɛn Jɔn, dɛn go mit di ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin bi to dɛn ɛn wetin di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn ɔl di ɔda bigman dɛn tɛl dɛn.
44004024	Wɛn di Kristiɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Pita ɛn Jɔn tɔk, dɛn ɔl pre to Gɔd se, “Yu we na Masta, na yu mek ɔl dis wɔl ɛn ɔltin we lib de.
44004025	Na yu Spirit tɛl yu savant Devid we na wan pan wi gra npapa-papa dɛn se, ‘Wetin mek dɛn neshɔn we nɔto Ju de vɛks bad wan? Wetin du dɛn mekɔp fɔ du wetin di Masta nɔ want ɛn dɛn nɔ go ebul du am?
44004026	Dɛn pipul we de rul na dis wɔl want fɔ fɛt Gɔd we na di Masta ɛn di pɔsin we Gɔd dɔn pik, dat na di Mɛsaya.’
44004027	Fɔ tru, Ɛrɔd ɛn Pɔnchɔs Paylet ɛng ed na Jerusɛlɛm wit dɛn Roman pipul ɛn dɛn pipul na Izrɛl fɔ bagin fɔ du Jizɔs bad. Dis Jizɔs ya gi insɛf fɔ wok fɔ yu ɛn na in yu dɔn mek bi di Mɛsaya.
44004028	Dɛn bigman bin gɛda fɔ du ɔltin we yu bin dɔn mekɔp se fɔ bi. Na dat yu bin ebul du bikɔs yu gɛt pawa ɛn na dat yu bin want mek bi.
44004029	So, Masta, yu dɔn yɛri ɔl wetin dɛn bigman na di Ju gran kot tɛl wi, bɔt wi de beg yu fɔ ɛp wi we na yu savant dɛn lɛ wi nɔ fred fɔ tɔk yu mɛsej.
44004030	Sho yu pawa ɛn mɛn dɛn sik pipul. Gi wi pawa so dat wi go du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok wɛn wi kɔl yu Savant Jizɔs, we nɔ gɛt sin, in nem.”
44004031	Wɛn dɛn dɔn pre dɔn, di ples we dɛn bin de, shek. Gɔd in Spirit kam pan dɛn ɛn dat mek dɛn nɔ fred fɔ tɔk Gɔd in mɛsej.
44004032	Ɔl dɛn wan we bin biliv Jizɔs bin gɛt wanwɔd ɛn wan at. Nɔbɔdi nɔ bin de se, “Na mi wan gren gɛt mi prɔpati”, bɔt ɔlman bin de sheb wetin i gɛt wit di ɔda pipul dɛn.
44004033	Di apɔsul dɛn bin de sho se Gɔd in pawa de wit dɛn wɛn dɛn de tɛl ɔda pipul se Jizɔs bin rayz frɔm di grev. Gɔd bin de blɛs dɛn ɔl.
44004034	Dɛn nɔn nɔ bin de krach ed fɔ ɛni tin. Wɛn ɛni wan pan dɛn sɛl in prɔpati, i kin bring di kɔpɔ kam
44004035	gi di apɔsul dɛn fɔ sheb am. Di apɔsul dɛn sheb di kɔpɔ gi di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn ɔlman gɛt wetin du fɔ am.
44004036	Na so Josɛf, da Livayt we kɔmɔt Sayprɔs, bin du. Di apɔsul dɛn bin de kɔl am Banabas, dat min “Pɔsin we de kɔrej ɔda pipul”.
44004037	I sɛl in grɔn ɛn bring am gi di apɔsul dɛn.
44005001	Wan man bin de we bin nem Ana na yas ɛn in wɛf bin nem Safa yra. Dɛn bin sɛl pan dɛn grɔn.
44005002	Ana na yas kip sɔm pan di kɔpɔ fɔ insɛf, dɛn i kɛr di ɔda pat go gi di apɔsul dɛn. Safa yra bin no se in man dɔn kip sɔm pan di kɔpɔ.
44005003	Pita aks Ana na yas se, “Ana na yas, wetin mek yu gri mek Setan go insay yu at fɔ mek yu lay gi Gɔd in Spirit? Yu dɔn kip sɔm pan di kɔpɔ we dɛn pe yu fɔ di grɔn!
44005004	Wɛn yu nɔ bin sɛl di grɔn yet, nɔto yu bin gɛt am, ɛn we yu dɔn sɛl am, nɔto yu gɛt di kɔpɔ? If na so i bi, wetin mek yu du dat? Yu nɔ lay gi mɔta lman, na Gɔd yu lay gi!”
44005005	Wɛn Ana na yas yɛri wetin Pita tɔk, i fɔdɔm ɛn day. Ɔl dɛn wan we yɛri wetin bi, fred.
44005006	Di man dɛn rap di dedebɔdi, dɔn dɛn go bɛr am.
44005007	Wɛn lɛkɛ tri awa so dɔn pas afta dɛn bɛr Ana na yas, in wɛf Safa yra kam na di rum we di apɔsul dɛn bin de, bɔt Safa yra nɔ bin no wetin dɔn bi.
44005008	Pita aks Safa yra se, “Na ɔl di kɔpɔ dis we dɛn bin pe una fɔ da grɔn we una sɛl?” Safa yra ansa se, “Yɛs, sa, na ɔl di kɔpɔ dat, sa.”
44005009	Pita tɛl am se, “Wetin mek yu ɛn yu man mekɔp fɔ tɛst Gɔd in Spirit? Luk di pipul dɛn we go bɛr yu man tinap na do, na dɛn go bɛr yusɛf!”
44005010	Safa yra fɔdɔm wantɛm ɛn day. Di man dɛn kam tek Safa yra go bɛr am klos in man.
44005011	Wɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays ɛn dɛn wan we nɔ bin biliv pan am, yɛri bɔt wetin bi to Ana na yas ɛn Safa yra, dɛn fred bad.
44005012	Di apɔsul dɛn bin de du plɛnti wɔnda ful tin fɔ di pipul dɛn. Ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays kin mit lɛkɛ fambul na di ples we dɛn kɔl Sɔlɔmɔn in Vira nda.
44005013	Dɛn pipul we nɔ bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin fred fɔ de wit dɛn, bɔt dɛn bin de tɔk gud bɔt dɛn.
44005014	Ɛn mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul bin de kam jɔyn to di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays.
44005015	Wɛn dɛn si di wɔnda ful tin dɛn we di apɔsul dɛn bin de du, pipul kɛr dɛn sik pipul go na trit ɛn mek dɛn ledɔm na dɛn bed, so dat we Pita de pas, in shado go go pan sɔm di sik pipul dɛn ɛn mek dɛn wɛl.
44005016	Plɛnti pipul kɔmɔt ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn tɔng we de klos Jerusɛlɛm, dɛn bring sik pipul ɛn dɛn pipul we gɛt dɛbul kam to di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di apɔsul dɛn mɛn dɛn ɔl.
44005017	Di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, ɛn in kɔmpin Sadyusi dɛn, jɛlɔs di apɔsul dɛn bad wan.
44005018	So dɛn ol di apɔsul dɛn ɛn put dɛn na jel.
44005019	Bɔt di Masta in enjɛl kam na nɛt ɛn opin di get na di jel we di apɔsul dɛn bin de, dɛn di enjɛl pul di apɔsul dɛn kɔmɔt na di jel ɛn tɛl dɛn se,
44005020	“Una go bak na Gɔd in Os go tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt di nyu layf we una dɔn gɛt.”
44005021	Di apɔsul dɛn du wetin di enjɛl tɛl dɛn fɔ du. Wɛn do klin di apɔsul dɛn go na Gɔd in Os ɛn bigin tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt Gɔd. Di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn kɔl mitin wit di Ju bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot; dɛn sɛn go na di jel fɔ mek dɛn bring di apɔsul dɛn kam mit dɛn.
44005022	Bɔt wɛn di gyad dɛn rich na di jel, dɛn nɔ mit di apɔsul dɛn de. So di gyad dɛn tɔn bak go ɛn tɛl di bigman dɛn se,
44005023	“Wɛn wi rich na di jel, wi mit di sɛl lɔk gud ɛn di wɔda dɛn tinap de gyad di get dɛn; bɔt wɛn wi opin di get dɛn ɛn luk insay, wi nɔ si wan gren pɔsin sɛf de!”
44005024	Wɛn di bigman pan dɛn wan we bin de gyad Gɔd in Os ɛn di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin yɛri wetin bi, dɛn kɔnfyus ɛn bigin wɔndrin wetin bi to di apɔsul dɛn.
44005025	Na in wan man kam tɛl dɛn se, “Una luk ya! Dɛn pipul we una bin put na jel, de na Gɔd in Os de tɔk bɔt Gɔd.”
44005026	So di bigman dɛn go mit di apɔsul dɛn na Gɔd in Os ɛn bring dɛn kam bak, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin fos dɛn fɔ kam bikɔs dɛn bin de fred se di pipul dɛn we di apɔsul dɛn de tɔk to bɔt Gɔd, go ston dɛn.
44005027	Dɛn kɛr di apɔsul dɛn go mek dɛn tinap bifo di Ju gran kot, dɔn di edman pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin aks dɛn kwɛshɔn.
44005028	I se, “Wi nɔ bin dɔn wɔn una se una nɔ fɔ tɔk to ɛnibɔdi bɔt dis man? Una dɔn mek ɔlman na Jerusɛlɛm yɛri bɔt am ɛn una want mek pipul blem wi fɔ we dɛn kil am.”
44005029	Pita ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn ansa dɛn se, “Wi fɔ du wetin Gɔd tɛl wi fɔ du, wi nɔ gɛt fɔ du wetin mɔta lman tɛl wi fɔ du.
44005030	Wɛn una bin nel Jizɔs na di krɔs ɛn kil am, da Gɔd we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de pre to, bin mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev.
44005031	Gɔd dɔn mek Jizɔs sidɔm na in raytan fɔ bi wi Masta ɛn wi Sevyɔ, so dat i go gi di Izrɛl pipul dɛn chans fɔ chenj ɛn Gɔd go padin dɛn fɔ dɛn sin.
44005032	Wi, we na in apɔsul dɛn, ɛn Gɔd in Spirit, de mek pipul no bɔt dɛn tin ya. Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul we de du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du, in Spirit.”
44005033	Wɛn di bigman dɛn na di Ju gran kot yɛri wetin di apɔsul dɛn tɔk, dɛn vɛks sote dɛn bin want mek dɛn kil di apɔsul dɛn.
44005034	Gameliɛl, wan Faresi we bin de lan pipul di Ju Lɔ, na bin bigman na di Ju gran kot ɛn pipul bin rɛspɛkt am. I tinap na di kot ɛn tɛl di ɔda bigman dɛn mek dɛn pul di apɔsul dɛn na sɛl fɔs.
44005035	Dɔn i bigin tɔk to di pipul dɛn na di Ju gran kot. I se, “Mi pipul dɛn na Izrɛl, una tink gud bifo una du ɛni tin to dɛn man ya.
44005036	Una mɛmba wan man we bin nem Tiudɔs we bin kam se in na bigman ɛn we bin gɛt lɛkɛ fo ɔndrɛd pipul we de ɛp am. Dɛn kil am, dɔn dɛn pipul we bin de fala am rɔnawe; so Tiudɔs in wok nɔ go bifo.
44005037	Wɛn dat dɔn, wan Judas, we bin kɔmɔt Galili, bin de da tɛm we dɛn bin de rayt ɔl di pipul dɛn nem dɔng. Insɛf bin gɛt bɔku pipul biɛn am. Dɛn kil insɛf ɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we bin de biɛn am, rɔnawe.
44005038	Na ɔl dis mek a de wɔn una naw mek una nɔ ambɔg dɛn man ya, una lɛf dɛn, bikɔs ɔl wetin dɛn mekɔp ɛn di wok we dɛn de du, go pwɛl, if nɔto Gɔd sɛn dɛn.
44005039	Bɔt if dɛn de du wetin Gɔd want, una nɔ go ebul pwɛl di wok we dɛn de du, na Gɔd una go de fɛt!”
44005040	Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de jɔj na di Ju gran kot tek Gameliɛl in wɔd. Dɛn mek di gyad dɛn bit di apɔsul dɛn ɛn wɔn dɛn nɔ fɔ tɔk bɔt Jizɔs wɛn dɛn de tɔk to di pipul dɛn, dɔn dɛn lɛf dɛn, mek dɛn go.
44005041	Di apɔsul dɛn bin gladi bad wɛn dɛn de kɔmɔt na di Ju gran kot bikɔs dɛn bin no se Gɔd pik dɛn fɔ sɔfa fɔseka Jizɔs.
44005042	Dɛn kin de go na Gɔd in Os ɛn dɛn kin de go na pipul dɛn os fɔ lan dɛn Gɔd in wɔd ɛn fɔ tɛl dɛn di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs Krays.
44006001	Da tɛm de, as mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul de biliv pan Jizɔs Krays, sɔm cham-mɔt bin kam. Dɛn Ju pipul we kɔmɔt Gris bin de grɔmbul se dɛn Ju pipul we bɔn na Jerusɛlɛm nɔ de gi dɛn Ju uman we kɔmɔt Gris we dɛn man dɔn day, wetin dɛn fɔ gi dɛn ɛvri de.
44006002	So, di twɛlv apɔsul dɛn kɔl mitin wit ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn se, “I nɔ go gud fɔ mek wi, we na Jizɔs in apɔsul dɛn, lɛf fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt Gɔd ɛn kam bigin gi dɛn uman we dɛn man dɔn day ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ gɛt.
44006003	Na dat mek wi want una fɔ pik sɛvin pipul pan unasɛf, we wi go mek du dis wok. Una fɔ pik pipul we una ɔl rɛspɛkt, dɛn fɔ gɛt Gɔd in Spirit ɛn dɛn fɔ sabi bɔt tin dɛn gud.
44006004	Wi, we na di apɔsul dɛn, go jɛs de fɔ pre ɛn fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt Gɔd.”
44006005	Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin go dis mitin gri wit wetin di apɔsul dɛn tɔk. So dɛn pik Sti vin, we na man we bin biliv Gɔd ɛn Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am. Dɛn pik Filip, Prɔkorɔs, Nikenɔ, Taymɔn, Pami nas, ɛn Nikolɔs we bin kɔmɔt Antiɔk ɛn bin gri fɔ bi Ju.
44006006	Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de na di mitin kɛr di sɛvin man dɛn we dɛn pik go sho di apɔsul dɛn. Di apɔsul dɛn put dɛn an pan di sɛvin man dɛn ed, dɛn pre fɔ dɛn ɛn blɛs dɛn.
44006007	Na dat mek Gɔd in wɔd go ɔlsay ɛn mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Jizɔs na Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn plɛnti pan dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin gri fɔ biliv pan Jizɔs Krays.
44006008	Sti vin na bin man we gɛt Gɔd in blɛsin ɛn Gɔd in pawa we mek i ebul du plɛnti big wok we ɔlman si.
44006009	Bɔt sɔm pipul na di Ju mitin os we dɛn bin de kɔl “fri pipul” nɔ bin gri wit Sti vin. Dɛn na bin Ju pipul we kɔmɔt Sayrini ɛn Alɛgza ndria, ɛn sɔm ɔda Ju pipul dɛn we kɔmɔt Sili shya ɛn wan smɔl ples we dɛn kɔl Eshya.
44006010	Bɔt Gɔd in Spirit gi Sti vin plɛnti sɛns, so dat wɛn i tɔk nɔbɔdi nɔba gɛt natin fɔ se.
44006011	Di Ju pipul dɛn pe sɔm pipul fɔ lay pan Sti vin. Dɛn se, “Wi yɛri dis man de tɔk kyalɛs tɔk bɔt Mozis ɛn Gɔd.”
44006012	Dɛn sem Ju pipul ya put wɔd na di pipul dɛn yes, dɔn dɛn put wɔd na dɛn bigman ɛn dɛn Ju Lɔ ticha dɛn yes, fɔ mek dɛn ol Sti vin. Dɛn go grip Sti vin, drɛg am go na di Ju gran kot.
44006013	Dɛn fɛn pipul fɔ lay pan am; di pipul dɛn se, “Dis man kin tɔk bad bɔt Gɔd in Os ɛn di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis.
44006014	Wi dɔn yɛri i de tɔk se Jizɔs, da man we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt, go brok Gɔd in Os kam dɔng ɛn i go chenj ɔl wetin Mozis bin lan wi gra npapa-papa dɛn we wi de du tide.”
44006015	Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin sidɔm na di Ju gran kot bin de luk Sti vin insay in yay, ɛn dɛn si se in fes bin tan lɛkɛ enjɛl fes.
44007001	Di bigman dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin aks Sti vin se, “Ɔl wetin dɛn pipul ya dɔn tɔk, na tru?”
44007002	Sti vin ansa se, “Mi papa dɛn ɛn mi brɔda dɛn, a want mek una lisin mi! Gɔd we gɛt pawa pas ɔl bin sho insɛf to Ebraam wɛn Ebraam bin tap na Mɛso po te mya. Dat bin bi bifo Ebraam go tap na Aran.
44007003	Gɔd tɛl Ebraam se, ‘Ebraam, lɛf yu fambul dɛn ɛn kɔmɔt na yu kɔntri, go na wan kɔntri we a go tɛl yu fɔ go tap.’
44007004	So Ebraam kɔmɔt Kaldia go tap na Aran. Afta Ebraam in papa day, Gɔd tɛl Ebraam fɔ kɔmɔt Aran, kam na dis kɔntri we una de naw.
44007005	Gɔd nɔ bin gi Ebraam ples fɔ de we go bi in yon; i nɔ gi am lili ples sɛf, bɔt i prɔmis am se in go gi am ples, ɛn da ples de go bi Ebraam in yon prɔpati ɛn da prɔpati de go bi Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn yon, wɛn Ebraam dɔn day. Ebraam nɔ bin bɔn pikin yet wɛn Gɔd tɛl am dat.
44007006	Gɔd bin tɛl Ebraam se, ‘Ebraam, dɛn go tek yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn mek slev, ɛn dɛn go kɛr dɛn go na ɔda kɔntri ɛn di pipul dɛn na di ɔda kɔntri go du yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn bad. Yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn go bi slev fɔ fo ɔndrɛd ia.
44007007	Bɔt a go jɔj di pipul dɛn we tek dɛn mek slev. Da tɛm de yu gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn go kɔmɔt pan slev layf ɛn dɛn go kam na Jerusɛlɛm fɔ kam pre to mi.’
44007008	Gɔd tɛl Ebraam se Ebraam fɔ sakɔmsayz in bɔy pikin di de we mek et de afta i bɔn. Di sakɔmsayz we Ebraam go sakɔmsayz am go sho se Gɔd bin dɔn mek agrimɛnt wit Ebraam. So di de we mek et afta Ayzik bɔn, Ebraam sakɔmsayz am; ɛn di de we mek et afta Jekɔb bɔn, Ayzik sakɔmsayz am; ɛn Jekɔb insɛf sakɔmsayz in twɛlv pikin dɛn we na wi gra npapa-papa dɛn, we bigin di twɛlv trayb na di Ju neshɔn.
44007009	“Wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin jɛlɔs Josɛf, dɛn brɔda, ɛn dat mek dɛn sɛl am fɔ mek i go bi slev na Ijipt; bɔt Gɔd bin de wit Josɛf.
44007010	Gɔd bin de ɛp Josɛf ɔltɛm we i de pan trɔbul. Wɛn dɛn kɛr Josɛf go bifo di king na Ijipt, Gɔd blɛs Josɛf ɛn gi am sɛns; so di king mek Josɛf bi gɔvna na Ijipt ɛn i mek am di edman fɔ in os.
44007011	Tɛm bin de we bad bad angri kam na Ijipt ɛn Kenyan. Di angri mek plɛnti pipul dɛn sɔfa ɛn wi gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ bin ebul fɛn tin fɔ it.
44007012	So wɛn Jekɔb yɛri se it de na Ijipt i sɛn in pikin dɛn we na wi gra npapa-papa dɛn go de fɔ go fɛn it, dat na bin di fɔs tɛm we dɛn go de.
44007013	Di sɛkɛn tɛm we dɛn go na Ijipt, Josɛf mek in brɔda dɛn no udat i bi, ɛn di king kam sabi Josɛf in brɔda dɛn.
44007014	Josɛf sɛn mɛsej to in papa, Jekɔb, fɔ mek i kam mit am ɛn i sɛn se Jekɔb fɔ bring ɔl in fambul dɛn we na bin sɛvi nti fayv pipul.
44007015	Jekɔb go na Ijipt, ɛn na de in ɛn ɔl in pikin dɛn de sote dɛn ɔl day.
44007016	Dɛn kɛr dɛn dedebɔdi go bɛr dɛn na Shɛkɛm na di grev we Ebraam bin bay to Amɔ in bɔy pikin dɛn.
44007017	“Wɛn di tɛm bin dɔn de rich fɔ mek Gɔd du wetin i bin dɔn prɔmis Ebraam, di pipul dɛn na Ijipt bin de plɛnti mɔ ɛn mɔ.
44007018	Ɔda king we nɔ bin sabi Josɛf, bigin rul na Ijipt.
44007019	Dis nyu king ya tek adva ntej pan wi pipul dɛn ɛn i mek wi pipul dɛn sɔfa bad. I fos wi gra npapa-papa dɛn fɔ trowe dɛn pikin na do, mek di pikin dɛn go day.
44007020	Da sem tɛm de, na in Mozis bɔn; na bin fayn pikin. Wɛn Mozis bin jɛs bɔn, in mama ɛn papa bin ayd am na os tri mɔnt.
44007021	Wɛn dɛn go lɛf Mozis na do, di king in gyal pikin tek Mozis ɛn mɛn am lɛkɛ in bɛlɛ-bɔn pikin.
44007022	Dɛn tren Mozis lɛkɛ dɛn Ijipt pikin; na man we bin sabi tɔk ɛn we bin sabi wok.
44007023	“Wɛn Mozis bin dɔn ol fɔti ia, i mekɔp fɔ go luk in pipul dɛn na Izrɛl.
44007024	Wɛn i de go, i mit wan Ijipt man de bit wan Izrɛl man, so i go fɛt fɔ di Izrɛl man ɛn i kil di Ijipt man.
44007025	Mozis bin min se in pipul dɛn go no se Gɔd sɛn am fɔ kam ɛp dɛn ɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt pan slev layf, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin no dat.
44007026	Wan ɔda de Mozis mit tu Izrɛl man dɛn de fɛt. Wɛn i go fɔ pat dɛn tu, i tɛl dɛn se, ‘Mi pipul dɛn, una lɛf fɔ fɛt bikɔs una tu na brɔda. Wetin mek una de fɛt una kɔmpin?’
44007027	Bɔt di man we bin de bit in kɔmpin tɛl Mozis se, ‘Udat aks yu fɔ rul wi?
44007028	Yu want fɔ kil mi lɛkɛ aw yu kil da Ijipt man trade?’
44007029	Wɛn Mozis yɛri wetin di man tɔk, i rɔnawe kɔmɔt Ijipt go sidɔm na wan kɔntri we nem Midian. Mozis bɔn tu bɔy pikin de.
44007030	“Wɛn fɔti ia bin dɔn pas, wan enjɛl go mit Mozis na da ay il we nem Mawnt Saynay. Di enjɛl bin de insay di faya we bin de kɔmɔt pan wan smɔl tik.
44007031	Wɛn Mozis si dat, i wɔnda; i go klos fɔ go luk gud, na de i yɛri Gɔd, di Masta in vɔys de tɔk to am se,
44007032	‘Na mi na da Gɔd we yu gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de pre to, na mi na di Gɔd we Ebraam bin de pre to, na mi na di Gɔd we Ayzik bin de pre to, ɛn we Jekɔb bin de pre to.’ Wɛn Mozis yɛri dat, i tri mbul, i fred fɔ es in yay ɔp, luk.
44007033	Gɔd, di Masta tɛl am se, ‘Pul yu sus kɔmɔt na yu fut, bikɔs da ples de we yu tinap na ples we dɛn dɔn put wansay fɔ mi.
44007034	A dɔn si di waala we mi pipul dɛn de pan na Ijipt. A dɔn yɛri we dɛn de pini bikɔs dɛn de sɔfa ɛn a dɔn kam dɔng naw fɔ kam pul dɛn pan dɛn waala. So kam, mek a sɛn yu go Ijipt.’
44007035	“Di sem Mozis we dɛn nɔ bin want, we dɛn aks se, ‘Udat mek yu rula ɛn jɔj?’ Na in Gɔd sɛn fɔ bi rula ɛn fɔ go pul pipul dɛn pan waala, ɛn na di enjɛl we go mit Mozis na di faya we bin de kɔmɔt pan di smɔl tik, na in Gɔd yus fɔ ɛp Mozis.
44007036	Mozis du plɛnti wɔnda ful tin dɛn we mek i ebul pul in pipul dɛn kɔmɔt na Ijipt, insay di wata we nem Rɛd Si, ɛn pul dɛn kɔmɔt na di dɛzat we dɛn bin de fɔti ia.
44007037	Na da sem Mozis de tɛl di Izrɛl pipul dɛn se, ‘Gɔd go tek wan pan una mek prɔfɛt lɛkɛ aw i du mi ɛn una go lisin to da prɔfɛt de.’
44007038	Na Mozis bin de wit di Izrɛl pipul dɛn we bin de gɛda na di dɛzat; ɛn na in bin de wit di enjɛl we tɔk to am pantap da ay il we nem Mawnt Saynay, ɛn na in bin de wit wi gra npapa-papa dɛn. Na in Gɔd gi in mɛsej, we go de sote go, fɔ gi wi.
44007039	“Bɔt wi gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ bin du wetin Mozis tɛl dɛn fɔ du, dɛn bin tɔn dɛn bak pan am ɛn dɛn bin want go Ijipt bak,
44007040	dɛn tɛl Erɔn se, ‘Duya, mek sɔm gɔd dɛn fɔ wi we go de bifo wi wɛn wi de go; as fɔ Mozis we bring wi kɔmɔt Ijipt wi nɔ no wetin dɔn apin to am.’
44007041	Dɛn mek kaw pikin fɔ de pre to ɛn sakri fays tin to am; dɛn kin ɔltɛm gladi fɔ di tin we dɛn mek.
44007042	Dɛn, Gɔd tɔn in bak pan di Izrɛl pipul dɛn; i lɛf dɛn mek dɛn de pre to dɛn tin we de na ɛvin, lɛkɛ sta ɛn mun so, lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na da buk we dɛn prɔfɛt rayt, se ‘Una, dɛn Izrɛl pipul ya, di fɔti ia we una bin de na di dɛzat nɔto fɔ mi una kil dɛn bif ɛn sakrifays dɛn.
44007043	Una bin tot di bafa we dɛn kip da gɔd we nem Mɔlɔk ɛn di sta we una mek we fiba una gɔd, Refan in sta; una mek dɛn tin ya fɔ pre to dɛn; a go mek dɛn kɛr una go fawe pas Babilɔn sɛf.’
44007044	“Wɛn wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de na di dɛzat dɛn bin gɛt da bafa we sho se Gɔd bin de wit dɛn. Na da bafa de Gɔd bin dɔn tɛl Mozis fɔ mek, ɛn Mozis fala di patan we Gɔd bin dɔn sho am.
44007045	Wi gra npapa-papa dɛn we bin de fɔs, day lɛf di bafa gi dɛn ɔda wan we tot am wɛn dɛn bin de go wit Jɔshwa, ɛn dɛn tek di kɔntri na dɛn ɔda neshɔn dɛn an we Gɔd bin drɛb go ɔda say bifo Jɔshwa ɛn di pipul dɛn bin rich de. Di bafa bin de na da kɔntri de, te di tɛm we Devid bin de rul.
44007046	Gɔd bin sati sfay wit Devid fɔ wetin i du, so Devid beg Gɔd fɔ alaw am fɔ bil os fɔ am; in we Jekɔb bin de pre to.
44007047	Bɔt na King Sɔlɔmɔn bil di os fɔ Gɔd.
44007048	“Bɔt Gɔd we de oba ɔl di wɔl, ɛn we gɛt pawa pas ɔl nɔ tap insay dɛn os we mɔta lman mek; lɛkɛ aw di prɔfɛt bin rayt, wɛn i se,
44007049	‘Gɔd di Masta se, “Na ɛvin a sidɔm de rul, na pan di wɔl we mɔtalman de, a put mi fut. So uskayn os yu want bil fɔ mi? We di ples we a go blo?
44007050	Nɔto mi mek ɔl dɛn tin ya?” ’
44007051	“Una na tra nga yes pipul! Gɔd nɔ de na una at, una nɔ de lisin to Gɔd in mɛsej! Una jɛs tan lɛkɛ una gra npapa-papa dɛn: unasɛf nɔba gri fɔ du ɛni tin we Gɔd in Spirit tɛl una fɔ du.
44007052	Ɛni prɔfɛt bin de we una gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ mek sɔfa? Dɛn kil ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt we Gɔd sɛn to in pipul dɛn. Dɛn prɔfɛt ya bin de tɔk se Gɔd in Savant we de du wetin rayt ɔltɛm, go kam. Naw, una dɔn sɛl am ɛn una dɔn kil am.
44007053	Na una Gɔd gi in Lɔ we enjɛl dɛn bring kam gi una bɔt una nɔ du wetin di Lɔ se!”
44007054	Wɛn dɛn bigman na di Ju gran kot yɛri wetin Sti vin tɔk, dɛn vɛks bad.
44007055	Bɔt Gɔd in Spirit bin de wit Sti vin, i luk ɔp na ɛvin, i si Gɔd in layt de shayn ɛn i si Jizɔs tinap na Gɔd in raytan.
44007056	Sti vin tɛl di pipul dɛn se, “A si di klawd opin ɛn a si Mɔta lman Pikin tinap na Gɔd in raytan!”
44007057	Di pipul dɛn bigin ala; dɛn tek dɛn an sɛt dɛn yes. Dɛn ɔl grap rɔn go mit am.
44007058	Dɛn pul Sti vin kɔmɔt na di big tɔng, dɔn dɛn bigin ston am. Dɛn pul dɛn klos we dɛn wɛr pantap gi wan man we nem Sɔl fɔ ol.
44007059	Wɛn dɛn bin de ston am, Sti vin pre se, “Masta Jizɔs, tek mi layf!”
44007060	I nil dɔng na grɔn ɛn pre lawd wan se, “Papa Gɔd, padin dɛn pipul ya fɔ wetin dɛn dɔn du!” Wɛn i pre dɔn, na in i day.
44008001	Sɔl gladi we dɛn kil Sti vin. Frɔm di de we dɛn kil Sti vin, na in dɛn Ju bigman dɛn bigin mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv Jizɔs Krays, sɔfa bad wan. Dɛn ɔl rɔnawe kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm. Sɔm go Judia, sɔm go Same ria. Na di apɔsul dɛn nɔmɔ bin lɛf na di tɔng.
44008002	Na sɔm pipul we bin biliv Gɔd, bɛr Sti vin; dɛn kray fɔ am bita wan.
44008003	Sɔl bigin fɔ mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv Jizɔs, sɔfa. I kin go frɔm os to os go fɛn dɛn, man ɛn uman, ɛn drɛg dɛn go na jel.
44008004	Dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs we bin rɔnawe kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm, go ɔlsay de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs.
44008005	Filip go tɛl di pipul dɛn na Same ria bɔt di Mɛsaya.
44008006	Di pipul dɛn bin gladi fɔ yɛri wetin Filip tɛl dɛn ɛn si di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we i du.
44008007	Dɛn dɛbul kin ala lawd wan we dɛn de kɔmɔt insay pipul. Plɛnti pipul we nɔ bin ebul waka, bigin waka.
44008008	So di pipul dɛn na Same ria gladi bad.
44008009	Wan man bin de na Same ria we bin nem Saymɔn we bin de ple majik, ɛn mek di pipul dɛn wɔnda. I tɛl dɛn se in na pɔsin we kin du ɔltin.
44008010	Dat bin mek ɔlman na di tɔng rɛspɛkt am jɛntri man, po man, bigman, lili pikin dɛn ɔl bin rɛspɛkt am. Di pipul dɛn se, “Saymɔn dɔn tɔn to da gɔd we dɛn kɔl ‘Big Pawa.’ ”
44008011	I bin dɔn te we Saymɔn de mek pipul wɔnda pan di majik we i de ple.
44008012	Bɔt wɛn di pipul dɛn, man ɛn uman, biliv wetin Pita tɛl dɛn bɔt Gɔd in rul ɛn bɔt Jizɔs Krays, dɛn mek Filip baptayz dɛn.
44008013	Saymɔn, insɛf, we bin de ple majik, biliv pan Jizɔs Krays. Wɛn Filip dɔn baptayz am, i bigin fala Filip go ɔlɔbɔt. Di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we Filip bin de du mek Saymɔn wɔnda.
44008014	Wɛn di apɔsul dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm yɛri se dɛn pipul we de na Same ria dɔn biliv Gɔd in wɔd, dɛn sɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn go to dɛn.
44008015	Wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn rich Same ria, dɛn pre fɔ di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs fɔ mek Gɔd in Spirit kam insay dɛn,
44008016	bikɔs Gɔd in Spirit nɔ bin dɔn kam insay dɛn yet. Filip bin jɛs baptayz dɛn na Masta Jizɔs in nem nɔmɔ.
44008017	Pita ɛn Jɔn put dɛn an pan di pipul dɛn ed ɛn pre fɔ dɛn, ɛn Gɔd in Spirit kam pan dɛn.
44008018	Wɛn Saymɔn si se Gɔd in Spirit kam pan di pipul dɛn we biliv Jizɔs wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn put dɛn an pan dɛn ed, i pul kɔpɔ fɔ pe Pita ɛn Jɔn
44008019	ɛn tɛl dɛn se, “Una gi mi dis kayn pawa ya so dat wɛn a put mi an pan ɛnibɔdi in ed, Gɔd in Spirit go kam pan da pɔsin de.”
44008020	Pita ansa am se, “Yu ɛn yu kɔpɔ go go na ɛl, bikɔs yu tink se yu kin bay wetin Gɔd dɔn gi wi.
44008021	Yu nɔto wan pan wi ɛn Gɔd si se yu at nɔ de fɔ am.
44008022	Lɛf fɔ du di bad we yu de du ɛn pre mek Gɔd padin yu fɔ wetin yu dɔn mekɔp.
44008023	A si se yu gɛt bad at ɛn sin dɔn tɔn yu to slev.”
44008024	Saymɔn tɛl Pita ɛn Jɔn se, “Duya, una beg Gɔd fɔ mi, mek wetin una tɔk nɔ bi to mi.”
44008025	Wɛn Pita ɛn Jɔn dɔn tɛl pipul wetin Gɔd dɔn du ɛn wetin i bin stil de du fɔ dɛn, ɛn wetin Gɔd in wɔd se, dɛn tɔn bak de go Jerusɛlɛm; dɛn bin de tɛl di pipul dɛn we dɛn de mit na dɛn vilej na Same ria di Gud Nyus.
44008026	Gɔd sɛn in enjɛl to Filip, di enjɛl tɛl Filip se, “Filip, grap, fala da rod na di dɛzat we go frɔm Jerusɛlɛm te rich Geza.”
44008027	So Filip grap ɛn go na di ples we Gɔd tɛl am fɔ go. Da sem tɛm de, wan bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia bin de pas na di sem rod, i bin de go na in os. Di Itio pia man na bin di bigman fɔ dɛn pipul we de luk di Itio pia kwin in prɔpati dɛn. I bin kɔmɔt pre na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn i bin de go Itio pia bak; i bin sidɔm na in chariɔt.
44008029	Gɔd in Spirit tɛl Filip se, “Filip, go klos da man we de na in chariɔt.”
44008030	Filip go mit di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia, i yɛri di man de rid wan say pan wetin di prɔfɛt Ayzaya bin rayt. So Filip aks am se, “Yu ɔnda stand wetin yu de rid?”
44008031	Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia ansa am se, “Aw a go ɔnda stand wetin a de rid wɛn pɔsin nɔ de fɔ ɛksplen am to mi?” I tɛl Filip fɔ kam sidɔm na in chariɔt.
44008032	Di say we i bin de rid na in dis: “I bin tan lɛkɛ ship we dɛn de kɛr go fɔ go kil. I bin tan lɛkɛ ship pikin we nɔ kin kray wɛn dɛn de kɔt in ia. I nɔ bin se fing.
44008033	Dɛn bin du am tin we mek i shem ɛn i nɔ bin gɛt pɔsin fɔ tɔk fɔ am. Nɔbɔdi nɔ go ebul fɔ tɔk bɔt in granpikin-pikin dɛn, bikɔs dɛn dɔn pul am kɔmɔt na dis wɔl.”
44008034	Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia aks Filip se, “Duya udat di prɔfɛt Ayzaya bin de tɔk bɔt? Na bɔt insɛf ɔ bɔt ɔda pɔsin?”
44008035	Na in Filip tɛl am udat di prɔfɛt bin rayt bɔt, i tɛl am di Gud Nyus bɔt Jizɔs.
44008036	As dɛn de go, dɛn rich wan ples we gɛt wata. Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia tɛl Filip se, “Luk wata naya, wetin mek yu nɔ go baptayz mi?” [
44008037	Filip ansa am se, “A go baptayz yu if yu biliv pan Jizɔs wit ɔl yu at.” Di bigman ansa am se, “A biliv; a biliv se Jizɔs Krays na Gɔd in Pikin.”]
44008038	Di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia mek in chariɔt tinap. Dɛn tu go insay di wata ɛn Filip baptayz am.
44008039	Wɛn dɛn kɔmɔt insay di wata, di Masta in Spirit kɛr Filip go, di bigman we kɔmɔt Itio pia nɔ si Filip igen. Di bigman gladi wɛn i de go na in os.
44008040	Wɛn dat dɔn, Filip fɛn insɛf na wan tɔng we nem Ezotɔs; wɛn i kɔmɔt de i bigin tɛl ɔl dɛn pipul na ɔl dɛn tɔng di Gud Nyus te i rich Siza ria.
44009001	Da sem tɛm de, Sɔl bin stil de mek Jizɔs in apɔsul dɛn sɔfa, ɛn i bin want kil dɛn. I go to di bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin
44009002	go aks am fɔ gi am pepa we go sho se i gɛt pawa fɔ go insay di Ju mitin os na Damaskɔs, so dat if i mit ɛnibɔdi we de waka aw di Masta se pipul fɔ waka, i go ol di pɔsin, man ɔ uman, kɛr am go bak na Jerusɛlɛm.
44009003	Sɔl bin de na rod de go Damaskɔs; as i de rich klos di tɔng, wantɛm, na in brayt layt lɛkɛ laytin we kɔmɔt na di klawd shayn pan am.
44009004	I fɔdɔm na grɔn, i yɛri vɔys de tɛl am se, “Sɔl, Sɔl, wetin mek yu de fɛt mi?”
44009005	Sɔl se, “Udat na yu, sa?” I yɛri we di vɔys ansa am se, “Mi na Jizɔs, na mi yu de fɛt.
44009006	Grap na grɔn ɛn go insay di tɔng, pɔsin go mit yu de ɛn tɛl yu wetin yu fɔ du.”
44009007	Di man dɛn we bin de go wit Sɔl tinap, dɛn nɔ tɔk wan wɔd. Dɛn yɛri di vɔys we bin de tɔk, bɔt dɛn nɔ si nɔbɔdi.
44009008	Sɔl grap ɛn opin in yay, bɔt i nɔ ebul si natin. So di man dɛn we bin de wit am go ol in an ɛn kɛr am go Damaskɔs.
44009009	Sɔl de tri de, i nɔ de si, i nɔ de it, ɛn i nɔ de drink wata.
44009010	Wan man bin de na Damaskɔs we na bin Jizɔs in lanin bɔy, i bin nem Ana na yas; Gɔd sho am sɔntin. I si di Masta ɛn i yɛri di Masta de kɔl am, “Ana na yas!” I ansa se, “Masta, luk mi naya, sa.”
44009011	Di Masta tɛl am se, “Rɛdi, go na da trit we dɛn kɔl Tret Trit; go insay wan man we nem Judas in os ɛn aks fɔ Sɔl we kɔmɔt na wan tɔng we nem Tasɔs. Yu go mit i de pre ɛn
44009012	a dɔn sho am wan man we nem Ana na yas we kam insay in os ɛn put in an pan in ed ɛn pre fɔ mek i go bigin si bak.”
44009013	Ana na yas tɔk se, “Masta, plɛnti pipul dɔn tɛl mi bɔt dis man ɛn bɔt di bad we i dɔn du yu pipul dɛn we de na Jerusɛlɛm.
44009014	Naw di bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin dɔn gi Sɔl pepa we gi am pawa fɔ kam na Damaskɔs ɛn ol ɛnibɔdi we de pre to yu.”
44009015	Di Masta tɛl Ana na yas se, “Go, a dɔn pik Sɔl fɔ mek i wok fɔ mi. I go mek dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju ɛn dɛn king ɛn dɛn pipul na Izrɛl sabi mi.
44009016	Misɛf go sho Sɔl plɛnti tin we i go sɔfa fɔ mek ɔda pipul sabi mi.”
44009017	So Ana na yas go; i go insay di os ɛn put in an pan Sɔl in ed ɛn pre fɔ am. I se, “Mi brɔda Sɔl, di Masta, Jizɔs we tɔk to yu wɛn yu bin de na rod de kam naya, sɛn mi to yu. I sɛn mi fɔ kam pre fɔ yu mek yu go si bak ɛn fɔ mek Gɔd in Spirit kam insay yu.”
44009018	Wantɛm, sɔntin we tan lɛkɛ fish skel fɔdɔm kɔmɔt pan Sɔl in yay. Sɔl ebul fɔ si bak, i tinap. I nɔ te igen, na in dɛn baptayz am.
44009019	Sɔl it ɛn i gɛt trɛnk bak. Sɔl bin tap wit Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn na Damaskɔs bɔt i nɔ bin te de.
44009020	I go na di Ju mitin os ɛn bigin fɔ tɔk bɔt Jizɔs. I se, “Jizɔs na Gɔd in Pikin.”
44009021	Ɔl dɛn pipul we bin yɛri wetin Sɔl de tɔk, wɔnda; dɛn se, “Nɔto dis man bin de kil dɛn pipul na Jerusɛlɛm we bin de kɔl Jizɔs in nem? I nɔ bin kam naya fɔ ol dɛn pipul we de kɔl Jizɔs in nem ɛn kɛr dɛn go bak to dɛn bigman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin?”
44009022	Aw Sɔl bin de tɔk bɔt Jizɔs mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Jizɔs. Wɛn i pruv se Jizɔs na di Mɛsaya, di Ju pipul dɛn na Damaskɔs kɔnfyus.
44009023	I nɔ tu te, di Ju pipul dɛn mek mitin ɛn dɛn mekɔp fɔ kil Sɔl.
44009024	Pipul tɛl Sɔl wetin di Ju pipul dɛn mekɔp fɔ du am. De ɛn nɛt di Ju pipul dɛn kin de wet na di tɔng dɛn get fɔ kil Sɔl.
44009025	Bɔt wan nɛt, dɛn pipul we bin biliv wetin Sɔl bin de tɔk bɔt Jizɔs, put Sɔl na blay ɛn pas am oba di wɔl we de rawnd di tɔng.
44009026	Sɔl go na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn tray fɔ miks wit Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn. Di lanin bɔy dɛn nɔ bin biliv se Sɔl insɛf bin dɔn bi Jizɔs in lanin bɔy. Dɛn bin stil de fred am.
44009027	Banabas ɛp Sɔl, i kɛr am go to di apɔsul dɛn. I tɛl dɛn se Sɔl si di Masta na rod ɛn di Masta tɔk to am. Banabas tɛl dɛn se Sɔl nɔ bin fred fɔ tɔk bɔt Jizɔs wɛn i de tɔk to di pipul dɛn na Damaskɔs.
44009028	Sɔl bin de wit di apɔsul dɛn ɛn i fala dɛn go ɔlsay na Jerusɛlɛm; i nɔ bin de fred fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt di Masta.
44009029	Sɔl bin de tɔk ɛn agyu ɔltɛm wit dɛn Ju pipul we de tɔk Grik langwej ɛn dɛn pipul ya bin de tray fɔ kil am.
44009030	Wɛn di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs yɛri se dɛn want kil Sɔl, dɛn kɛr am go Siza ria ɛn frɔm de, dɛn mek i go Tasɔs.
44009031	Da tɛm de, nɔbɔdi nɔ mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays na Judia, Galili, ɛn Same ria sɔfa igen. Gɔd in Spirit bin de ɛp dɛn fɔ mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Jizɔs. Ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de du wetin Gɔd want ɛn dɛn bin rɛspɛkt di Masta.
44009032	Pita bin de go ɔlsay go fɛn Gɔd in pipul dɛn, ɛn wan de i go luk Gɔd In pipul dɛn we bin de na Lida.
44009033	Wɛn Pita bin de na Lida, i mit wan man we nem Inias we nɔ bin ebul waka, i bin dɔn ledɔm na bed et ia.
44009034	Pita go to Inias ɛn tɛl am se, “Inias, Jizɔs Krays dɔn mɛn yu. Grap ɛn mek yu bed.” Inias grap wantɛm.
44009035	Ɔl dɛn pipul we de Lida ɛn Sherɔn si we Inias grap, so dɛn biliv pan di Masta.
44009036	Wan uman bin de na Jɔpa we bin nem Tabita. (Dɛn Grik pipul de kɔl am Dɔkas we min, bif we dɛn kɔl dia.) Dis uman ya bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn ɔltɛm i kin de du gud ɛn i kin de ɛp dɛn po pipul.
44009037	Di tɛm we Pita bin de na Jɔpa, Tabita bin sik, dɛn i day. Dɛn was in bɔdi ɛn dɛn le am na rum na wan garɛt.
44009038	Jɔpa bin de klos Lida. Wɛn di lanin bɔy dɛn yɛri se Pita de na Lida, dɛn sɛn tu man dɛn go kɔl am, mek i kam wit dɛn wantɛm.
44009039	So Pita rɛdi go mit dɛn. Wɛn i rich, dɛn kɛr am go na di rum. Ɔl dɛn uman we dɛn man dɔn day, bin gɛda na di os. Dɛn bin de kray ɛn dɛn bin de sho Pita di klos dɛn we Dɔkas bin dɔn so.
44009040	Pita mek ɔl di pipul dɛn go na do, dɔn i nil dɔng ɛn pre. I tɔn to di dedebɔdi ɛn se, “Tabita, grap!” Tabita opin in yay, grap ɛn sidɔm wɛn i si Pita.
44009041	Pita ol in an ɛn es am ɔp mek i tinap. Pita kɔl ɔl dɛn pipul we bin biliv Gɔd ɛn dɛn wan we dɛn man bin dɔn day; i sho dɛn Tabita layf wan.
44009042	Di nyus bɔt wetin bi prɛd ɔlsay na Jɔpa. Dat mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan di Masta.
44009043	Pita bin tap na Jɔpa fɔ sɔm tɛm wit wan man we de wok pan bif kanda, i bin nem Saymɔn.
44010001	Wan man bin de na Siza ria we bin nem Kɔnilyɔs, na bin kapten fɔ dɛn soja man na Rom. Dɛn bin de kɔl dɛn soja man ya “Itali Soja man Dɛn”.
44010002	Kɔnilyɔs ɛn di pipul dɛn na in os bin fred Gɔd. I bin de du plɛnti gud fɔ ɛp dɛn Ju pipul we po ɛn i kin de pre to Gɔd ɔltɛm.
44010003	Wan santɛm, bay dɛn tri oklɔk, Gɔd sho Kɔnilyɔs sɔntin. I si Gɔd in enjɛl gud gud wan; di enjɛl kɔl am, i se, “Kɔnilyɔs!”
44010004	Kɔnilyɔs skyad ɛn luk di enjɛl ɛn se, “Wetin yu want, sa?” Di enjɛl se, “Gɔd dɔn yɛri dɛn pre we yu kin de pre, i dɔn si di gud wok we yu dɔn du fɔ dɛn po pipul, ɛn i dɔn ansa yu.
44010005	Sɛn go Jɔpa naw fɔ wan man we nem Saymɔn Pita.
44010006	Saymɔn Pita de to Saymɔn we de wok dɛn bif kanda we in os de klos di waf.”
44010007	Wɛn Gɔd in enjɛl we bin de tɔk to Kɔnilyɔs dɔn go, Kɔnilyɔs kɔl tu pan in bɔy dɛn, wan soja man, ɛn in raytan man we kin pre to Gɔd.
44010008	I tɛl dɛn wetin bi, dɔn i sɛn dɛn go Jɔpa.
44010009	Di ɔda de wɛn dɛn pipul ya bin de na rod de go ɛn dɛn bin dɔn rich klos Jɔpa, Saymɔn Pita go pantap di os we flat fɔ pre lɛkɛ aw dɛn Ju pipul kin du. Na bin santɛm.
44010010	Pita bin angri ɛn i bin jɛs want it. Wɛn di pipul dɛn na di os de rɛdi di it, i tan lɛkɛ slip kech Pita.
44010011	Aw Pita sɛt in yay, na de i si ɛvin opin ɛn sɔntin we fiba big bedshit de kam dɔng te i rich na grɔn.
44010012	Ɔl kayn fofut tin, ɔl kayn snek ɛn ɔl kayn bɔd bin de na di bedshit.
44010013	Pita yɛri vɔys de tɛl am se, “Pita, grap; kil ɛni tin ɛn it am!”
44010014	Pita ansa se, “Masta, nɔ, sa; wan de a nɔ it tin we wi Ju pipul dɛn tink se dɔti ɛn we nɔ fayn fɔ it.”
44010015	Di vɔys tɔk igen se, “Ɛni tin we Gɔd se klin, yu nɔ fɔ se i dɔti.”
44010016	Pita yɛri di vɔys tri difrɛn tɛm, na in di big bedshit go bak na ɛvin.
44010017	Di tin we Pita si mek i wɔnda ɛn i bin want no wetin dat min. Da sem tɛm de, dɛn pipul we Kɔnilyɔs sɛn bin dɔn rich na di os we Saymɔn Pita de ɛn dɛn bin tinap na di get.
44010018	Di pipul dɛn we Kɔnilyɔs sɛn, kɔnk na di do ɛn aks if dɛn gɛt tre nja de we nem Saymɔn Pita.
44010019	Di tin we Gɔd sho Pita bin mek Pita de wɔnda stil ɛn i bin stil want fɔ no wetin dat min, na in Gɔd in Spirit tɛl am se, “Tri man dɛn de luk fɔ yu.
44010020	So grap go mit dɛn ɛn nɔ fred fɔ fala dɛn go bikɔs na mi sɛn dɛn.”
44010021	So Pita grap go dɔng go mit dɛn. I se, “Na mi dis we una de luk fɔ, wetin mek una kam?”
44010022	Dɛn ansa se, “Na Kapten Kɔnilyɔs, da bigman fɔ dɛn soja man dɛn na Itali, sɛn wi to yu. Na gud man we fred Gɔd ɛn ɔl di Ju pipul dɛn rɛspɛkt am bad. Gɔd bin sɛn enjɛl to Kɔnilyɔs fɔ mek i kɔl yu fɔ go na in os, mek i go yɛri wetin yu gɛt fɔ tɛl am.”
44010023	Pita kɔl di man dɛn go insay di os ɛn i mek dɛn slip de, da nɛt de. Wɛn do klin, Pita wit di tri man dɛn, ɛn sɔm pan dɛn Gɔd pipul na Jɔpa lɛf fɔ go to Kɔnilyɔs na Siza ria.
44010024	Wɛn i rich Siza ria di ɔda de, Kɔnilyɔs bin de wet dɛn, i bin dɔn kɔl in fambul dɛn ɛn in padi dɛn.
44010025	Wɛn Pita want go insay di os, Kɔnilyɔs kam mit am ɛn butu ol in fut.
44010026	Pita tɛl am se, “Grap, mi na mɔta lman.”
44010027	Pita bin de tɔk to Kɔnilyɔs wɛn dɛn de go insay di os. I mit plɛnti pipul de.
44010028	I tɛl di pipul dɛn se, “Unasɛf no se wi Ju Lɔ tɛl wi se wi nɔ fɔ kip kɔmpin wit pipul dɛn we nɔto Ju ɔ miks to dɛn sɛf. Bɔt Gɔd dɔn sho mi se a nɔ fɔ se mi kɔmpin mɔta lman nɔ fit fɔ miks to wi.
44010029	Na dat mek, we yu sɛn kɔl mi a nɔ se nɔ; a kam. Kɔnilyɔs, mek a aks yu sɔntin, wetin mek yu sɛn kɔl mi?”
44010030	Kɔnilyɔs ansa se, “I dɔn tek fo dez naw, bay dis tɛm, tri oklok santɛm, a bin de pre na mi os. Wantɛm, wan man we wɛr klos we de shayn kam tinap bifo mi.
44010031	Di man se, ‘Kɔnilyɔs, Gɔd dɔn yɛri di pre we yu de pre ɛn i dɔn si du gud wok we yu dɔn du fɔ dɛn po pipul. I dɔn ansa yu.
44010032	Sɛn kɔl wan man we nem Saymɔn Pita, i de na Jɔpa; i de na wan Saymɔn we de wok dɛn bif kanda, in os we de klos di waf.’
44010033	Na dat mek a sɛn kɔl yu wantɛm. I gud we yu kam. Wi kam naya fɔ yɛri wetin di Masta dɔn tɛl yu fɔ tɛl wi. Gɔd de ya wit wi.”
44010034	Pita se, “Fɔ tru, Gɔd nɔ de luk ɛnibɔdi bɛtɛ pas in kɔmpin.
44010035	Gɔd go mek ɛnibɔdi we rɛspɛkt am ɛn du wetin i want, bi in yon.
44010036	Una no di mɛsej we Gɔd bin sɛn to di Ju pipul dɛn na Izrɛl, i tɛl dɛn di Gud Nyus se na Jizɔs Krays we na ɔlman Masta, go mek dɛn kam to Gɔd fɔ mek dɛn ɔl gɛt kol at.
44010037	Una no wetin dɔn bi na Judia. Da big wok de bin bigin na Galili afta Jɔn bin dɔn tɔk se di pipul dɛn fɔ lɛf fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du ɛn kam mek i baptayz dɛn.
44010038	Una no se Gɔd bin gi Jizɔs we kɔmɔt Nazarɛt in Spirit ɛn in pawa. Jizɔs bin de go ɔlɔbɔt de du gud fɔ pipul ɛn i mɛn ɔl dɛn wan we bin gɛt dɛbul insay dɛn. I bin ebul du ɔl dɛn tin ya bikɔs Gɔd bin de wit am.
44010039	Na wi si ɔl wetin Jizɔs du na Judia ɛn Jerusɛlɛm. Una no se dɛn nel Jizɔs na di krɔs fɔ mek i day.
44010040	Bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev di de we mek tri, afta i day. Jizɔs sho insɛf to wi.
44010041	I nɔ sho insɛf to ɔlman! Na to wi nɔmɔ, we Gɔd dɔn pik fɔ si am, i sho insɛf. Afta Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev, wi bin it ɛn drink wit am.
44010042	I tɛl wi fɔ tɛl ɔlman di Gud Nyus. I tɛl wi igen fɔ tɛl ɔlman se Gɔd dɔn pik am fɔ jɔj ɔl dɛn pipul we dɔn day ɛn ɔl dɛn wan we nɔ day yet.
44010043	Ɔl dɛn prɔfɛt bin tɔk bɔt Jizɔs se if ɛnibɔdi biliv pan am, Gɔd go padin da pɔsin de fɔ di bad tin dɛn we i du, bay di pawa we de na Jizɔs in nem.”
44010044	Pita bin stil de tɔk, na in Gɔd in Spirit kam pan ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de lisin wetin i de tɔk.
44010045	Dɛn Ju pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs we bin kɔmɔt Jɔpa fala Pita kam, bin wɔnda wɛn dɛn si se Gɔd gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju, in Spirit.
44010046	Dɛn yɛri dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju de tɔk difrɛn difrɛn langwej dɛn ɛn prez Gɔd. Na in Pita tɔk se,
44010047	“Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul ya in Spirit lɛkɛ aw i bin dɔn gi wisɛf. Ɛnibɔdi go se dɛn nɔ fɔ baptayz?”
44010048	Pita se mek dɛn kɔl Jizɔs Krays in nem we dɛn de baptayz dɛn. Di pipul dɛn mek Pita tap to dɛn lili bit.
44011001	Di apɔsul dɛn ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs na Judia yɛri se dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju biliv Gɔd in wɔd.
44011002	Dɛn Ju pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs tɔk pan Pita bikɔs i go Jerusɛlɛm.
44011003	Dɛn se, “Pita go to dɛn pipul we nɔ sakɔmsayz ɛn it wit dɛn.”
44011004	So Pita tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin bi frɔm fɔs to las. I se,
44011005	“A bin de pre na wan tɔng we nem Jɔpa, na in Gɔd sho mi sɔntin. A si sɔntin we tan lɛkɛ big bedshit de kam dɔng. Di bedshit bin tay na di fo kɔna dɛn wit rop. I kɔmɔt ɔp na ɛvin kam dɔng klos mi.
44011006	Wɛn a luk gud insay di bedshit, a si ɔl kayn tin dɛn fofut tin, dɛn tin lɛkɛ snek ɛn kondo, ɛn ɔl kayn bɔd dɛn.
44011007	A yɛri vɔys de tɛl mi se, ‘Pita, grap; kil ɛni tin ɛn it am!’
44011008	Bɔt a ansa se, ‘Masta, nɔ, sa; wan de a nɔ it ɛni tin we dɔti ɔ we nɔ fayn fɔ it.’
44011009	Di vɔys tɔk bak se, ‘Ɛni tin we Gɔd dɔn se klin, yu nɔ fɔ se i dɔti.’
44011010	Di vɔys tɔk dis sem tin tri tɛm, na in ɔltin lɔs go bak na ɛvin.
44011011	Di sem tɛm we dis tin bi, tri man dɛn we kɔmɔt Siza ria, kam na di os we wi bin de.
44011012	Gɔd in Spirit tɛl mi mek a nɔ fred fɔ fala dɛn go. Siks pipul na Jɔpa we bin biliv pan Jizɔs fala mi go Siza ria na Kɔnilyɔs in os.
44011013	Kɔnilyɔs tɛl mi se Gɔd sɛn wan enjɛl to am we tɛl am se, ‘Sɛn, kɔl wan man we nem Saymɔn Pita. I de na Jɔpa.
44011014	I go kam tɛl yu aw yu ɛn ɔl yu fambul dɛn go sev.’
44011015	As a bigin fɔ tɔk so, Gɔd mek in Spirit kam pan dɛn pipul ya lɛkɛ aw i bin kam pan wi fɔstɛm.
44011016	Dat mek a mɛmba wetin di Masta bin se, ‘Jɔn baptayz una wit wata bɔt Gɔd go baptayz una wit in Spirit.’
44011017	Na tru se Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju di sem Spirit we i gi wi wɛn wi biliv pan Masta Jizɔs Krays. Udat na mi fɔ tɛl Gɔd se a nɔ go du wetin i tɛl mi fɔ du?”
44011018	Wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Pita tɔk, dɛn lɛf fɔ grɔmbul. Dɛn bigin prez Gɔd, dɛn se, “Gɔd dɔn gi dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju chans fɔ mek dɛn lɛf fɔ du dɛn bad tin we dɛn bin de du, so dat dɛn kin gɛt layf we go de sote go.”
44011019	Wɛn dɛn bigman na Jerusɛlɛm kil Sti vin ɛn mek dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs Krays sɔfa, di pipul dɛn skata ɔlɔbɔt. Sɔm go Fini shya, sɔm go Sayprɔs, sɔm go Antiɔk. Bɔt na to dɛn Ju pipul dɛn nɔmɔ dɛn bin de tɔk bɔt Jizɔs.
44011020	Sɔm pan di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs bin de na Sayprɔs, sɔm bin de na Sayrini. Dɛn kɔmɔt Sayprɔs ɛn Sayrini go tap na Antiɔk ɛn dɛn tɛl dɛn Grik pipul dɛn bɔt di Masta, Jizɔs.
44011021	Gɔd in pawa bin de pan dɛn, dat mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn tek Jizɔs fɔ dɛn Masta.
44011022	Wɛn di nyus bɔt wetin bin de bi na Antiɔk rich Jerusɛlɛm, di pipul dɛn we bin biliv Jizɔs sɛn Banabas go luk wetin de bi.
44011023	Wɛn Banabas rich Antiɔk ɛn si aw Gɔd de blɛs di pipul dɛn, insɛf gladi. I tɛl dɛn mek dɛn fala di Masta wit ɔl dɛn at.
44011024	Banabas na bin gud man; Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay am ɛn i bin biliv Gɔd. Dat mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan di Masta.
44011025	Banabas go Tasɔs fɔ go luk fɔ Sɔl.
44011026	Wɛn i si Sɔl, i bring am kam na Antiɔk. Banabas ɛn Sɔl te na Antiɔk. Dɛn bin de mit wit di chɔch pipul dɛn fɔ lan dɛn, di pipul dɛn kin plɛnti. Antiɔk na di fɔs ples we dɛn bigin kɔl dɛn pipul we biliv pan Jizɔs, Kristiɛn.
44011027	Da sem tɛm de, sɔm prɔfɛt dɛn bin kɔmɔt Jerusɛlɛm go Antiɔk.
44011028	Wan pan dɛn prɔfɛt ya bin nem Agabɔs. Gɔd in Spirit bin tɛl am fɔ tɔk bɔt di bad angri we bin gɛt fɔ kam na wɔl. Dis bad angri bin kam da tɛm we Klɔdiɔs bin de rul na Rom.
44011029	Jizɔs in lanin bɔy dɛn gri fɔ ɛp dɛn Kristiɛn na Judia.
44011030	Dɛn gi Banabas ɛn Sɔl kɔpɔ fɔ kɛr go fɔ dɛn pipul na Jerusɛlɛm.
44012001	Wɛn ɔl dɛn tin ya bin de bi, na in King Ɛrɔd Agripa bigin mek dɛn Kristiɛn dɛn sɔfa bad bad.
44012002	I mek dɛn tek sɔd kil Jems we na bin Jɔn in brɔda.
44012003	Wɛn di king si se di Ju pipul dɛn gladi fɔ wetin i du, i du ɔda bad tin; i mek soja man dɛn ol Pita. Ɔl dis bi di tɛm we dɛn bin gɛt wan Ju ɔlide we dɛn kin it bred we nɔ gɛt yist.
44012004	Wɛn dɛn ol Pita, dɛn put am na sɛl. Dɛn mek sikstin soja man dɛn de gyad am; di soja man dɛn bin de fo-fo we dɛn de gyad am. Ɛrɔd Agripa bin mekɔp fɔ lɛ dɛn jɔj Pita wɛn di Ju ɔlide we nem Pasova dɔn.
44012005	Wɛn Pita bin de na sɛl, di Kristiɛn dɛn bin de pre fɔ am tra nga wan.
44012006	Di nɛt bifo di mɔnin we Ɛrɔd bin mekɔp fɔ mek dɛn jɔj Pita, Pita bin de slip midul tu soja man dɛn. Dɛn bin tay am wit tu chen ɛn ɔda soja man dɛn bin tinap na di get de gyad di ples.
44012007	Wantɛm, di Masta in enjɛl bɔs kam insay di sɛl ɛn brayt brayt layt shayn ɔlsay na di sɛl. Di enjɛl shek Pita in sho lda fɔ wek am. I se, “Pita, mekes grap!” Di chen dɛn pan Pita in an kɔt kɔmɔt.
44012008	Di enjɛl tɛl Pita se, “Wɛr yu klos, tay yu bɛlt, ɛn wɛr yu sus. Kam lɛ wi go.” Pita du ɔl wetin di enjɛl tɛl am fɔ du.
44012009	Pita fala di enjɛl kɔmɔt insay di sɛl. I nɔ bin no se na tru tin di enjɛl de tɛl am, i bin min se in de drim.
44012010	Pita ɛn di enjɛl pas di gyad dɛn na di fɔs get, dɛn pas di sɛkɛn gyad dɛn na di ɔda get. Wɛn Pita ɛn di enjɛl rich na di big ayɛn get, di get opin fɔ insɛf. Pita ɛn di enjɛl kɔmɔt na do. Dɛn ɔl tu bin de waka go dɔng di trit; wantɛm, di enjɛl lɔs lɛf Pita in wan gren.
44012011	Pita kechɔp se i nɔ bin de drim ɛn ɔl wetin bi na tru tin. I se, “A no naw se na tru tin dis we bi! Na di Masta sɛn in enjɛl fɔ kam pul mi kɔmɔt na Ɛrɔd in an ɛn fɔ mek di Ju pipul dɛn nɔ ebul du ɔl dɛn bad tin we dɛn bin want du mi.”
44012012	Wɛn Pita no wetin bi, i go na Meri in os. Dis Meri ya na bin Jɔn Mak in mama. Pita mit plɛnti pipul de pre na di os.
44012013	I nak na di do; wan uman we nem Roda we bin de wok de, kam fɔ opin di do.
44012014	Wɛn i yɛri Pita in vɔys, i so gladi, i rɔn go bak, i fɔgɛt fɔ opin di do. I go tɛl di ɔda pipul dɛn se na Pita de nak.
44012015	Di pipul dɛn se, “Roda, yu dɔn kres!” Bɔt i pin se na tru. Di pipul dɛn se, “Na Pita in enjɛl.”
44012016	Pita bin stil de nak; wɛn dɛn opin di do, dɛn wɔnda fɔ si Pita.
44012017	Pita mek sayn wit in an to dɛn fɔ mek dɛn sɛt mɔt, dɔn i tɛl dɛn aw di Masta pul am kɔmɔt na sɛl. Bifo Pita go, i tɛl di Kristiɛn dɛn fɔ tɛl Jems ɛn di ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn we nɔ bin de, wetin bi.
44012018	Wɛn do klin, di gyad dɛn bigin de wɔri bad, dɛn bigin de aks dɛn kɔmpin se, “Wetin apin to Pita?”
44012019	King Ɛrɔd Agripa tɛl dɛn fɔ go fɛn Pita, bɔt dɛn nɔ si am, so i kwɛshɔn di soja man dɛn we bin de gyad Pita, dɔn i mek dɛn kil dɛn. Wɛn dat dɔn, King Ɛrɔd kɔmɔt Judia go tap na Siza ria.
44012020	Ɛrɔd bin vɛks bad pan dɛn pipul na Taya ɛn Saydɔn, so di pipul dɛn na dɛn tu tɔng de gɛda wan ples fɔ go tɔk to am. Di fɔs tin we dɛn du, dɛn mek wanwɔd wit di bigman we de luk ɔl di king in prɔpati. Dis man ya bin nem Blastɔs. Dɛn go to Ɛrɔd go beg am mek dɛn ɔl gɛt wanwɔd, bikɔs di it we dɛn bin de it bin de kɔmɔt na di kɔntri we Ɛrɔd bin de rul.
44012021	Ɛrɔd pik wan de we i drɛs wit di klos dɛn we king de wɛr. I go sidɔm na di chia we i kin sidɔm pan fɔ rul, dɔn i bigin tɔk to di pipul dɛn we bin gɛda.
44012022	Di pipul dɛn ala se, “I nɔ de tɔk lɛkɛ mɔta lman, i de tɔk lɛkɛ wan gɔd!”
44012023	Di Masta in enjɛl kam put sik pan Ɛrɔd bikɔs i nɔ rɛspɛkt Gɔd; wɔrɔm it in bɔdi ɛn i day.
44012024	Di Kristiɛn dɛn go ɔlɔbɔt de tɔk Gɔd in wɔd ɛn dat mek mɔ ɛn mɔ pipul biliv pan Gɔd.
44012025	Banabas ɛn Sɔl kɛr di kɔpɔ go gi di chɔch bigman dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm. Wɛn dɛn de tɔn bak, dɛn kɛr Jɔn Mak go Antiɔk.
44013001	Di chɔch na Antiɔk bin gɛt sɔm prɔfɛt dɛn ɛn sɔm ticha dɛn. Dɛn na bin Banabas, Simyɔn we dɛn bin de kɔl Blak Pɔsin, Lushyɔs we bin kɔmɔt Sayrini, Manɛn we na in ɛn di gɔvna Ɛrɔd gro, ɛn Sɔl.
44013002	Wan de wɛn dɛn bin de pre ɛn fas, Gɔd in Spirit tɛl dɛn se, “Una put Banabas ɛn Sɔl wansay bikɔs a dɔn pik dɛn fɔ du spɛshal wok fɔ mi.”
44013003	Di chɔch pipul dɛn na Antiɔk fas ɛn pre. Dɛn put an pan Banabas ɛn Sɔl dɛn ed fɔ blɛs dɛn, dɔn dɛn sɛn dɛn go.
44013004	Gɔd in Spirit bin sɛn Banabas ɛn Sɔl go na wan tɔng we nem Silu shya. Dɛn tek bot go na wan ples we de midul wata we nem Sayprɔs.
44013005	Wɛn dɛn rich na wan tɔng we nem Sala mis, dɛn go na di Ju mitin os go tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt Gɔd. Dɛn bin kɛr Jɔn Mak go fɔ ɛp dɛn.
44013006	Dɛn pas na Pefɔs; dɛn mit wan maji kman de we bin nem Ba-Jizɔs. Na Ju man we bin de kɔl insɛf prɔfɛt.
44013007	Ba-Jizɔs na bin di gɔvna in padi. Di gɔvna bin nem Sajiɔs Pɔlɔs, na man we bin gɛt sɛns. Di gɔvna sɛn kɔl Banabas ɛn Sɔl, bikɔs i bin want yɛri Gɔd in wɔd.
44013008	Ɛli mas (na so dɛn Grik pipul bin de kɔl Ba-Jizɔs) ambɔg Banabas ɛn Sɔl. I tray fɔ mek Gɔvna Sajiɔs Pɔlɔs tap fɔ biliv pan Gɔd.
44013009	Gɔd in Spirit bin de insay Sɔl, we in ɔda nem na Pɔl, so i grap go mit Ɛli mas, di maji kman; i luk am ping,
44013010	ɛn tɛl am se, “Yu na Setan in pikin, yu nɔ lɛk ɛni tin we gud. Na bad ful yu at. Wetin mek yu want pul pipul dɛn kɔmɔt na di Masta in tret rod?
44013011	Di Masta dɔn put in an pan yu naw; yu go blɛn ɛn yu nɔ go ebul si di san sɛf sote di tɛm we Gɔd dɔn mak fɔ opin yu yay.” Wantɛm Ɛli mas in yay dak, i bigin waka de fɛn udat go ol in an waka wit am.
44013012	Di gɔvna biliv pan Jizɔs gud wan wɛn i si wetin bi. Ɔl di tin we dɛn lan am bɔt di Masta mek i wɔnda.
44013013	Pɔl ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn kɔmɔt Pefɔs, dɛn tek big bot go na Paga we de Pamfi lya. Jɔn Mak lɛf Pɔl ɛn Banabas dɛn na Paga tɔn bak go Jerusɛlɛm.
44013014	Pɔl ɛn Banabas kɔmɔt Paga, go Antiɔk we de Pisi dya. Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo rich, dɛn go na di Ju mitin os.
44013015	Wɛn di pipul dɛn dɔn rid di Lɔ we Gɔd bin gi Mozis ɛn wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt, di bigman dɛn na di Ju mitin os sɛn pɔsin fɔ go tɛl Pɔl ɛn Banabas dis mɛsej ya: “Wi brɔda dɛn, wi want mek una tɔk to di pipul dɛn if una gɛt ɛni wɔd fɔ kɔrej dɛn.”
44013016	Pɔl tinap; i mek sayn to di pipul dɛn fɔ sɛt mɔt, dɔn i se, “Mi Ju pipul dɛn ɛn una we nɔto Ju, una ɔl we fred Gɔd; una lisin wetin a de tɔk!
44013017	Wɛn wi Izrɛl pipul dɛn bin de na Ijipt, di Gɔd we wi pipul dɛn de pre to pik wi gra npapa-papa dɛn ɛn blɛs di Izrɛl neshɔn. Na bay Gɔd in pawa mek di Izrɛl pipul dɛn kɔmɔt pan slev layf.
44013018	Di fɔti ia we di Izrɛl pipul dɛn bin de na dɛzat, Gɔd bin bia wit dɛn ɛn gi dɛn ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ gɛt.
44013019	Gɔd mek dɛn pul sɛvin neshɔn kɔmɔt na da kɔntri we nem Kenyan, dɔn i mek dɛn sheb di ples gi di Izrɛl pipul dɛn.
44013020	Na fo ɔndrɛd ɛn fifti ia i tek bifo ɔl dɛn tin ya bi. “Wɛn dat pas, Gɔd mek difrɛn difrɛn jɔj dɛn rul di Izrɛl pipul dɛn te di tɛm we prɔfɛt Samyɛl kam.
44013021	Afta dat, di Izrɛl pipul dɛn aks Gɔd fɔ pik king fɔ dɛn. Gɔd pik Sɔl we na bin Kish in pikin, ɛn wan pan Bɛnja min in fambul dɛn. King Sɔl rul Izrɛl fɔti ia.
44013022	Wɛn Gɔd pul Sɔl kɔmɔt na pawa, i pik Devid fɔ bi king na Izrɛl. Gɔd tɔk bɔt Devid se, ‘A dɔn pik Devid, Jɛsi in pikin, fɔ bi una king; a gladi fɔ am bikɔs i go du ɔl wetin a want am fɔ du.’
44013023	Na wan pan Devid in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn we nem Jizɔs, Gɔd pik fɔ sev in Izrɛl pipul dɛn. Na dat Gɔd bin dɔn tɔk se go bi.
44013024	Bifo Jizɔs bigin in wok, Jɔn go ɔlsay na Izrɛl de tɛl pipul mek dɛn lɛf fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we dɛn de du ɛn mek dɛn kam mek i baptayz dɛn.
44013025	Bifo Jɔn dɔn di wok we Gɔd sɛn am fɔ kam du, i aks di pipul dɛn se, ‘Udat una tink se a bi? Mi nɔto di pɔsin we una de luk rod fɔ. Da pɔsin de go kam wɛn a dɔn du di wok we Gɔd sɛn mi fɔ kam du. A nɔ fit sɛf fɔ lus di sus we i wɛr.’
44013026	“Mi pipul dɛn we de wɔship Gɔd, una we na Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn ɛn una we nɔto Ju; Gɔd mek dɛn kam tɛl wi bɔt aw i de sev pipul.
44013027	Dɛn pipul na Jerusɛlɛm ɛn dɛn bigman nɔ bin no se na in de sev wi ɛn dɛn nɔ bin sabi wetin dɛn kin de rid di de fɔ pre ɛn blo, we dɛn prɔfɛt bin dɔn rayt. Bɔt wɛn dɛn kɔndɛm Jizɔs, dɛn mek wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin dɔn rayt bɔt am kam bi tru.
44013028	Jizɔs nɔ bin du natin bad we fɔ mek dɛn kil am, bɔt di pipul dɛn tɛl Paylet fɔ kil am.
44013029	Wɛn di pipul dɛn dɔn du ɔl wetin dɛn prɔfɛt bin rayt bɔt am, dɛn pul am pan di krɔs, bɛr am insay wan ston grev.
44013030	Bɔt Gɔd mek i rayz frɔm di grev.
44013031	Jizɔs sho insɛf plɛnti tɛm to dɛn pipul we fala am kɔmɔt Galili go Jerusɛlɛm, ɛn dɛn pipul ya bin de tɛl ɔda pipul dɛn na Izrɛl bɔt am.
44013032	Wi kam ya fɔ tɛl una di Gud Nyus bɔt wetin Gɔd bin se i go du fɔ wi gra npapa-papa dɛn.
44013033	I dɔn du am fɔ wi we i dɔn mek Jizɔs rayz bak wit layf. Dɛn rayt na di sɛkɛn Sam se, Gɔd se, ‘Yu na mi Pikin; a dɔn bi yu Papa tide.’
44013034	Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk bɔt Jizɔs in day wan se, wɛn Gɔd mek Jizɔs rayz frɔm di grev, i nɔ go day igen. Gɔd se, ‘A go gi una di tru blɛsin we na mi nɔmɔ de gi, we a bin prɔmis Devid.’
44013035	Gɔd tɔk ɔda say se, ‘Yu nɔ go gri mek yu yon savant we de du ɔl wetin yu gi am fɔ du day ɛn rɔtin.’
44013036	Wɛn Devid dɔn du wetin Gɔd bin want am fɔ du, i day. Dɛn bɛr am klos in gra npapa-papa dɛn ɛn in bɔdi rɔtin.
44013037	Bɔt di wan we Gɔd mek rayz frɔm di grev nɔ bin rɔtin.
44013038	Mi pipul dɛn, a want mek una no se na fɔseka Jizɔs mek dɛn de tɛl una se Gɔd go padin una fɔ di bad tin dɛn we una de du. A want mek una no se ɛnibɔdi we biliv pan am, Gɔd go mek da pɔsin de tap fɔ du di bad tin dɛn we i de du, ɛn dat na wan tin we di Lɔ we Gɔd bin gi Mozis nɔ ebul du.
44013040	Una tek tɛm, mek wetin dɛn lɔntɛm prɔfɛt bin tɔk, nɔ bi to una.
44013041	Di prɔfɛt dɛn bin se, ‘Una we de laf wetin Gɔd dɔn tɔk, una go luk, una go wɔnda, ɛn una go day! A go du big wok we una go si, ɛn ilɛk dɛn tɛl una di minin sɛf, una nɔ go biliv.’ ”
44013042	Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin want kɔmɔt na di Ju mitin os, di pipul dɛn tɛl dɛn fɔ kam ɔda de we dɛn de pre ɛn blo, fɔ tɛl dɛn mɔ bɔt wetin dɛn bin jɛs tɔk bɔt.
44013043	Wɛn dɛn ɔl kɔmɔt na di Ju mitin os go na dɛn os, plɛnti Ju pipul dɛn fala Pɔl ɛn Banabas go, wit plɛnti pipul we nɔto bin Ju bɔt we bin gri fɔ tɔn to Ju. So Pɔl ɛn Banabas kɔrej dɛn fɔ mek dɛn abop pan Gɔd we gud to ɔlman ɛn we lɛk ɔlman ilɛk sɛf dɛn nɔ fit fɔ mek i lɛk dɛn.
44013044	Di ɔda de we dɛn pre ɛn blo, ɔlman na di tɔng go fɔ yɛri Pɔl ɛn Banabas wɛn dɛn de tɔk bɔt di Masta.
44013045	Wɛn di Ju pipul dɛn si ɔl di pipul dɛn na di Ju mitin os, dɛn jɛlɔs Pɔl ɛn Banabas. Dɛn se na lay Pɔl de lay ɛn dɛn tɔk bad bɔt am.
44013046	Pɔl ɛn Banabas nɔ fred fɔ tɔk; dɛn se, “Wi bin gɛt fɔ tɛl una dɛn Ju pipul bɔt Gɔd bifo wi tɛl dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju. We una nɔ gri biliv pan am, una dɔn kɔndɛm unasɛf se una nɔ fit fɔ gɛt layf sote go. Na dat mek wi de tɛl dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju bɔt Gɔd naw.
44013047	Di Masta dɔn tɛl wi se, ‘A dɔn put una lɛkɛ lamp fɔ dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju. Na una a go yus fɔ sev ɔlman na di wɔl.’ ”
44013048	Wɛn dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju yɛri dat, dɛn gladi ɛn dɛn prez di Masta fɔ wetin i tɛl dɛn. Dɛn pipul we Gɔd bin dɔn pik fɔ gɛt layf sote go, biliv pan Jizɔs Krays.
44013049	Di Masta in wɔd prɛd ɔlsay na di kɔntri.
44013050	Bɔt di Ju pipul dɛn put wɔd na di bigman na di tɔng dɛn yes, dɔn dɛn put wɔd na dɛn big uman we nɔto bin Ju we fred Gɔd, dɛnsɛf yes. So dɛn du Pɔl ɛn Banabas bad bad tin dɛn ɛn drɛb dɛn kɔmɔt na di tɔng.
44013051	Di apɔsul dɛn shek di dɔti kɔmɔt na dɛn fut fɔ sho se dɛn nɔ go gɛt natin fɔ du wit di pipul dɛn na di tɔng igen, dɔn dɛn go Aykonyɔm.
44013052	Dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs we bin de na Antiɔk bin gladi ɛn Gɔd in Spirit bin kam pan dɛn.
44014001	Di sem tin bi na Aykonyɔm. Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin de na Aykonyɔm, dɛn go na di Ju mitin os; bay aw dɛn tɔk to di pipul dɛn plɛnti Ju pipul ɛn plɛnti pipul we nɔto bin Ju we kɔmɔt Gris, biliv pan Jizɔs.
44014002	Bɔt dɛn Ju pipul we nɔ bin gri fɔ biliv pan Jizɔs put wɔd na dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju dɛn yes ɛn dɛn du di Kristiɛn dɛn bad.
44014003	Di apɔsul dɛn bin de lɔng na Aykonyɔm. Di apɔsul dɛn nɔ bin de fred fɔ tɛl di pipul dɛn bɔt di Masta ɛn di Masta sho se na tru tin di apɔsul dɛn bin de tɔk wɛn dɛn se i gud, ɛn i gi dɛn pawa fɔ du plɛnti wɔnda ful wok.
44014004	Di pipul dɛn na di tɔng bin sheb; sɔm pipul bin de fɔ di Ju pipul dɛn ɛn sɔm bin de fɔ di apɔsul dɛn.
44014005	So dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju, dɛn Ju pipul, ɛn dɛn yon bigman dɛn mek bagin fɔ du di apɔsul dɛn bad ɛn fɔ ston dɛn.
44014006	Wɛn di apɔsul dɛn yɛri dat, dɛn rɔnawe go ayd na wan kɔntri we nem Laykao nia. Di tɔng dɛn we dɛn go na Listra, Dabi, ɛn dɛn tɔng we de klos de.
44014007	Dɛn bin de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus wɛn dɛn de na dɛn tɔng ya.
44014008	Wan man bin de na Listra we nɔ bin ebul waka. In fut dɛn bin day frɔm we in mama bɔn am.
44014009	I bin sidɔm de lisin we Pɔl de tɔk. Pɔl bin no se di man biliv se Gɔd go mek i wɛl, so i luk di man ping,
44014010	ɛn i tɔk lawd wan se, “Tinap tret wan!” Di man grap ɛn bigin waka ɔlɔbɔt.
44014011	Wɛn di pipul dɛn si wetin bi, dɛn bigin ala na di Laykao nia langwej se, “Dɛn gɔd dɔn tɔn to mɔta lman ɛn dɛn dɔn kam to wi!”
44014012	Dɛn kɔl Banabas “Zus” ɛn dɛn kɔl Pɔl “Amis” bikɔs na Pɔl bin de tɔk.
44014013	Di man we de mek sakri fays to da gɔd we nem Zus kɛr kaw ɛn flawa go na di get. In ɛn di pipul dɛn bin want mek sakri fays. Di ples we pipul dɛn bin de pre to Zus bin de klos di get na di tɔng.
44014014	Wɛn Banabas ɛn Pɔl yɛri se di pipul dɛn want mek sakri fays, dɛn chɛr di klos we dɛn bin wɛr pantap. (Na so dɛn Ju pipul kin du fɔ sho se dɛn nɔ gri wit wetin de bi.) Dɛn rɔn go na di ples we di pipul dɛn we bin de pre to Zus bin gɛda. Dɛn ala tɛl di pipul dɛn se,
44014015	“Wi pipul dɛn, wetin mek una de du dɛn tin ya? Wi na mɔta lman lɛkɛ unasɛf! Wi kam naya fɔ tɛl una di Gud Nyus fɔ mek una lɛf fɔ du dɛn tin ya we go mek una day, ɛn kam to Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go. Na Gɔd mek dis wɔl, di klawd, di wata, ɛn ɔltin we de na di wɔl.
44014016	Fɔs tɛm Gɔd bin de lɛf pipul to dɛnsɛf.
44014017	Bɔt stil i bin de sho ɔlman udat i bi bay di gud we i kin du fɔ dɛn ɔl. Gɔd kin gi una ren. Di ren kin fɔdɔm frɔm di klawd, ɛn mek wetin una plant bia wɛn di tɛm rich, so dat una go gladi.”
44014018	Pan ɔl we di apɔsul dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn, dɛn wɔd ya, i bin tra nga fɔ mek dɛn tap dɛn, mek dɛn nɔ mek di sakri fays.
44014019	Sɔm pan di Ju pipul dɛn bin kɔmɔt Antiɔk ɛn sɔm bin kɔmɔt Aykonyɔm. Dɛn tɔk sote di pipul dɛn gri fɔ du wetin dɛn want. Dɛn ston Pɔl ɛn drɛg am kɔmɔt na di tɔng bikɔs dɛn bin min se i dɔn day.
44014020	Bɔt wɛn dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs go mit am, i grap, dɛn i go bak na di tɔng. Di ɔda de Pɔl ɛn Banabas go Dabi.
44014021	Pɔl ɛn Banabas tɛl di pipul dɛn na Dabi di Gud Nyus ɛn dɛn mek plɛnti pipul biliv pan Jizɔs. Dɛn kɔmɔt Dabi go Listra, dɛn go Aykonyɔm, dɔn dɛn go Antiɔk we de na Pisi dya.
44014022	Pɔl ɛn Banabas kɔrej di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn dɛn tɛl dɛn mek dɛn biliv pan Jizɔs mɔ ɛn mɔ. Pɔl ɛn Banabas tɛl di pipul dɛn se, “Ɔlman we biliv pan Jizɔs gɛt fɔ sɔfa plɛnti na dis wɔl fɔ mek dɛn go de ɔnda Gɔd in rul.”
44014023	Wɛn dɛn dɔn fas ɛn pre to Gɔd, dɛn pik sɔm bigman dɛn na ɔl dɛn chɔch fɔ du di wok, dɛn lɛf dɛn na di Masta, we dɛn biliv, in an.
44014024	Wɛn dɛn dɔn waka ɔlsay na Pisi dya, dɛn go Pamfi lya.
44014025	Dɛn tɛl di pipul dɛn na Paga di Gud Nyus, dɔn dɛn go Ata lia.
44014026	Dɛn kɔmɔt Ata lia, dɛn tek big bot go Antiɔk, na da tɔng de, di pipul dɛn put Pɔl ɛn Banabas na Gɔd an mek i ɛp dɛn fɔ du di wok we i gi dɛn fɔ du, we dɛn bin de du.
44014027	Wɛn dɛn rich Antiɔk, dɛn gɛda ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin biliv pan Jizɔs ɛn tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin Gɔd mek dɛn du ɛn aw Gɔd mek dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju biliv pan Jizɔs.
44014028	Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin de lɔng wit dɛn pipul we bin biliv pan Jizɔs.
44015001	Sɔm pipul kɔmɔt Judia go Antiɔk. Dɛn go tɛl di pipul dɛn na Antiɔk se, Gɔd nɔ go sev dɛn pas dɛn sakɔmsayz bikɔs na dat di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se.
44015002	Pɔl ɛn Banabas nɔ bin gri wit di tin we dɛn pipul ya bin de lan di pipul dɛn na Antiɔk, so dɛn bigin agyu tra nga wan wit di Judia pipul dɛn bɔt dat. Dɛn gri fɔ mek Pɔl ɛn Banabas ɛn sɔm ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn na Antiɔk go Jerusɛlɛm fɔ tɔk bɔt dat to di apɔsul dɛn ɛn dɛn bigman na di chɔch.
44015003	Di chɔch mɛmba dɛn sɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas go. Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin de pas na Fini shya ɛn Same ria, dɛn tɛl di chɔch pipul dɛn se dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju dɔn biliv Gɔd. Dis nyus mek ɔl di Kristiɛn dɛn gladi bad.
44015004	Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas rich Jerusɛlɛm, di chɔch pipul dɛn, di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di chɔch bigman dɛn gladi fɔ si dɛn, ɛn Pɔl ɛn Banabas tɛl dɛn ɔl wetin Gɔd ɛp dɛn fɔ du.
44015005	Bɔt sɔm pan dɛn pipul we de na di Faresi grup se, “Dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju fɔ sakɔmsayz ɛn du di tin dɛn we Mozis in Lɔ se dɛn fɔ du.”
44015006	Di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di chɔch bigman dɛn mit fɔ tɔk bɔt dat.
44015007	Wɛn dɛn dɔn tɔk dɔn, na in Pita tinap fɔ tɔk. I se, “Mi pipul dɛn, una no se Gɔd bin dɔn pik mi lɔntɛm fɔ go tɛl dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju dis Gud Nyus so dat dɛn go yɛri am ɛn biliv pan di Masta.
44015008	Bɔt Gɔd we no mɔta lman at, dɔn gri fɔ gi dɛn in Spirit lɛkɛ aw i bin gi wi in Spirit.
44015009	Gɔd sho se wi ɛn dɛn na di sem ɛn bikɔs dɛn biliv, i pul bad kɔmɔt na dɛn at.
44015010	So wetin mek wi want du di tin we go mek Gɔd vɛks? Wetin mek wi de kam put lod pan dɛn pipul we dɔn biliv pan di Masta, da lod we wi gra npapa-papa dɛn nɔ bin ebul tot, da lod we wisɛf nɔ ebul tot?
44015011	Lɛkɛ aw wi biliv se Masta Jizɔs sɔri fɔ wi ɛn sev wi, na di semwe dɛnsɛf biliv se Masta Jizɔs sɔri fɔ dɛn ɛn sev dɛn.”
44015012	Nɔbɔdi na di mitin nɔ se fing wɛn dɛn yɛri wetin Banabas ɛn Pɔl de tɔk bɔt ɔl di wɔnda ful wok dɛn we Gɔd mek dɛn du fɔ dɛn pipul we nɔto bin Ju.
44015013	Wɛn Banabas ɛn Pɔl dɔn tɔk dɔn, na in Jems se, “Mi pipul dɛn, a want mek una lisin mi!
44015014	Saymɔn jɛs tɛl una bɔt aw Gɔd dɔn sho se i kia bɔt dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju ɛn i dɔn kɔl dɛn fɔ bi in yon pipul.
44015015	Wetin di prɔfɛt dɛn bin tɔk, na in de bi so; dɛn bin se,
44015016	‘Gɔd se, Wɛn dɛn tin ya dɔn bi, a go kam bak ɛn bil Devid in os we bin dɔn fɔdɔm. Pan ɔl we i bin dɔn pwɛl ɔltogɛda, a go bil am bak.
44015017	Ɔl dɛn ɔda pipul ɛn dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju we dɔn bi mi yon, go fɛn di Masta.
44015018	Na di tin dis we di Masta bin dɔn tɔk, ɛn i dɔn mek wi no dat lɔntɛm.’ ”
44015019	Pantap dat, Jems se, “A tink se wi nɔ fɔ mek tin tra nga fɔ dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju we dɔn gri fɔ tɔn to Gɔd.
44015020	Bɔt una lɛ wi rayt tɛl dɛn se dɛn nɔ fɔ it ɛni tin we pipul dɔn sakri fays to dɛn gɔd, dɛn nɔ fɔ liv fri layf, dɛn nɔ fɔ it bif we gɛt blɔd pan am, ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ it blɔd.
44015021	I dɔn te we dɛn de rid di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis, dɛn de go ɔlsay fɔ tɛl pipul wetin Mozis bin tɔk.”
44015022	Di apɔsul dɛn, di bigman dɛn na di chɔch, ɛn ɔl di chɔch mɛmba dɛn gri fɔ pik sɔm pipul na di chɔch we dɛn fɔ sɛn wit Pɔl ɛn Banabas go na di Antiɔk chɔch. Di chɔch pipul dɛn pik Judas we dɛn bin de kɔl Basa bas, ɛn Saylas. Dɛn tu man ya, na bin pipul we di chɔch mɛmba dɛn rɛspɛkt.
44015023	Di chɔch pipul dɛn gi dɛn lɛta fɔ kɛr go; dɛn rayt na di lɛta se, “Wi, di apɔsul dɛn ɛn dɛn chɔch bigman, we na una brɔda dɛn, de sɛn adu to una dɛn pipul we nɔto Ju ɛn we biliv pan Jizɔs, we tap na Antiɔk, Sirya, ɛn Sili shya.
44015024	Wi yɛri se sɔm pipul we kɔmɔt to wi naya de mek tin tra nga fɔ una ɛn dɛn de kɔnfyus una wit di tin we dɛn de tɔk. Nɔto wi sɛn dɛn.
44015025	So wi gri fɔ sɛn sɔm pipul to una wit Pɔl ɛn Banabas, wi padi dɛn we wi lɛk bad wan.
44015026	Sɔm pipul bin want kil Pɔl ɛn Banabas bikɔs dɛn de wok fɔ wi Masta Jizɔs Krays.
44015027	Wi sɛn Judas ɛn Saylas fɔ tɛl una wetin wi dɔn rayt.
44015028	Gɔd in Spirit nɔ want mek wi put mɔ lod pan una ɛn wisɛf nɔ want du dat, bɔt una fɔ kip dɛn Lɔ ya:
44015029	una nɔ fɔ it ɛni bif we dɛn dɔn sakri fays to dɛn yon gɔd, una nɔ fɔ it bif we gɛt blɔd pan am, una nɔ fɔ it blɔd, ɛn una nɔ fɔ liv fri layf. I go gud if una nɔ du dɛn tin ya we wi dɔn rayt to una. Una mekes, o!”
44015030	Di pipul dɛn we dɛn sɛn go Antiɔk, gɛda ɔl di chɔch mɛmba dɛn, dɛn gi dɛn di lɛta.
44015031	Wɛn di pipul dɛn na Antiɔk rid di lɛta, dɛn gladi fɔ di mɛsej we kɔrej dɛn.
44015032	Judas ɛn Saylas dɛnsɛf na bin prɔfɛt; dɛn tek plɛnti tɛm fɔ tɔk to di pipul dɛn ɛn dɛn kɔrej dɛn fɔ biliv mɔ.
44015033	Dɛn bin te lili bit na Antiɔk. Di chɔch mɛmba dɛn na Antiɔk blɛs dɛn bifo dɛn lɛf dɛn mek dɛn go bak to di pipul dɛn we sɛn dɛn. [
44015034	Bɔt Saylas bin mekɔp fɔ tap na Antiɔk.]
44015035	Pɔl, Banabas, ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul bin te lili bit na Antiɔk de lan di pipul dɛn ɛn tɛl dɛn wetin di Masta se.
44015036	I nɔ bin tu te, na in Pɔl tɛl Banabas se, “Lɛ wi go fɛn dɛn pipul we wi bin dɔn tɛl di Masta in mɛsej, lɛ wi go luk aw dɛn de du.”
44015037	Banabas bin want mek dɛn kɛr Jɔn Mak go,
44015038	bɔt Pɔl bin tink se i nɔ go gud fɔ mek dɛn go wit Jɔn Mak bikɔs i nɔ bin de wit dɛn sote dɛn dɔn di fɔs patrol. I bin tɔn bak, i lɛf dɛn na Pamfi lya.
44015039	Pɔl ɛn Banabas bin gɛt cham-mɔt so ɔlman go in yon we. Banabas go wit Jɔn Mak, dɛn tek big bot go Sayprɔs.
44015040	Pɔl tek Saylas. Bifo dɛn go, di chɔch mɛmba dɛn na Antiɔk lɛf Pɔl ɛn Saylas na di Masta in an.
44015041	Pɔl go ɔlsay we chɔch de na Sirya ɛn Sili shya fɔ kɔrej di chɔch mɛmba dɛn.
44016001	Pɔl go sote i rich Dabi ɛn Listra. I mit wan Kristiɛn man na Listra we bin nem Timoti. In mama na bin Ju uman we bin biliv pan di Masta, bɔt Timoti in papa na bin Grik man.
44016002	Ɔl di Kristiɛn dɛn na Listra ɛn Aykonyɔm bin de tɔk gud bɔt Timoti.
44016003	Pɔl bin want Timoti fɔ go wit dɛn, so i mek dɛn sakɔmsayz Timoti, bikɔs ɔl di Ju dɛn na dɛn ples de, bin no se Timoti in papa na Grik man.
44016004	Wɛn Pɔl ɛn Timoti bin de go na dɛn tɔng, dɛn bin de tɛl di chɔch pipul dɛn wetin di apɔsul dɛn ɛn di bigman dɛn na Jerusɛlɛm se ɛn dɛn bin de tɛl di pipul dɛn di rul dɛn we dɛn fɔ kip.
44016005	So dat mek di chɔch pipul dɛn biliv mɔ ɛn mɔ ɛn plɛnti ɔda pipul bigin de go chɔch ɛvri de.
44016006	Pɔl ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn go ɔlsay na Fri jya ɛn Galeshya bikɔs Gɔd in Spirit nɔ gri mek dɛn tɔk Gɔd in mɛsej na wan smɔl ples we dɛn kɔl Eshya.
44016007	Wɛn Pɔl ɛn in kɔmpin dɛn rich na di bawndri we de na Mishya, dɛn bin want go na Biti nya bɔt Jizɔs in Spirit nɔ gri mek dɛn go de.
44016008	So dɛn go insay Mishya, dɔn dɛn go Troas.
44016009	Da nɛt de, Gɔd sho Pɔl wan Masi do nya man we bin de beg Pɔl se, “Duya, kam ɛp wi na Masi do nya.”
44016010	Wɛn Pɔl si wetin Gɔd sho am, na in wi rɛdi fɔ go Masi do nya. Wi bin shɔ se na Gɔd tɛl wi fɔ go de go tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus.
44016011	Wɛn wi kɔmɔt Troas, wi tek big bot go tret na Samo tres, dɔn di ɔda de, wi go Nia polis.
44016012	Wi lɛf Nia po lis go Fili pay. Fili pay na wan big Roman tɔng we de na Masi do nya; wi bin tap de tu tri de.
44016013	Wɛn di de fɔ pre ɛn blo rich, wi kɔmɔt na di tɔng go klos di riva. Wi bin min se ples lib de we di Ju pipul dɛn kin pre. Wi sidɔm ɛn bigin tɔk to sɔm uman dɛn we bin gɛda de.
44016014	Wan pan di uman dɛn we bin de lisin bin nem Lidia, i bin kɔmɔt na da tɔng we nem Taya tira. Na uman we bin de sɛl dɛn dia klos. Na uman we bin fred Gɔd ɛn di Masta mek i lisin gud wetin Pɔl tɔk, ɛn i biliv am.
44016015	Dɛn baptayz Lidia ɛn ɔl di pipul dɛn we bin de na in os. I kɔl wi go na in os ɛn tɛl wi se, “Ɛnti una si se a dɔn biliv pan di Masta gud, una kam tap to mi.”
44016016	Wan de we wi bin de go na di ples we dɛn Ju pipul kin pre, wan slev titi kam mit wi. Dis titi bin gɛt dɛbul we bin de mek i ebul tɛl pipul wetin go bi.
44016017	I fala wi ɛn Pɔl de ala se, “Dɛn man ya na Gɔd we pas ɔl, in savant dɛn! Dɛn kam fɔ sho una aw una go sev!”
44016018	Di titi kin de du dis sem tin ɛvri de. I du am sote Pɔl tɔmɛnt. Pɔl tɔn to di slev titi ɛn tɛl di dɛbul we bin de insay am se, “Dɛbul, bay Jizɔs Krays in pawa, kɔmɔt insay dis titi ya!” Da sem tɛm de, di dɛbul kɔmɔt insay am.
44016019	Wɛn di pipul dɛn we bin gɛt di slev titi no se di titi nɔ go ebul mek mɔni fɔ dɛn igen, dɛn go grip Pɔl ɛn Saylas drɛg dɛn go bifo di bigman dɛn na di tɔng; di bigman dɛn bin de na di ples we pipul kin mit.
44016020	Di pipul dɛn kɛr Pɔl ɛn Saylas go bifo di bigman dɛn na di kot. Dɛn tɛl di bigman dɛn se, “Dɛn man ya na Ju pipul ɛn dɛn de ambɔg dɛn pipul na dis tɔng.
44016021	Dɛn de lan wi dɛn tin we wi Roman lɔ se wi nɔ fɔ du. Wi na Roman pipul ɛn wi nɔ go gri fɔ du wetin dɛn man ya de tɛl wi fɔ du.”
44016022	Di pipul dɛn bigin bit Pɔl ɛn Saylas. Di bigman dɛn mek di soja man dɛn chɛr Pɔl ɛn Saylas dɛn klos ɛn bit dɛn.
