53003018	A de pre mek wi Masta Jizɔs Krays sho una ɔl aw i gud ɛn aw i lɛk una.
54001001	Mi, Pɔl, na Jizɔs Krays in apɔsul. Na Gɔd we dɔn sev wi ɛn Masta Jizɔs Krays insɛf, we wi abop pan, tɛl mi fɔ bi in apɔsul.
54001002	A de rayt to Timoti we a bring kam to Krays, na dat mek i bi mi yon tru pikin: mek Gɔd we na wi Papa ɛn Jizɔs Krays wi Masta sho yu aw i gud, mek i sɔri fɔ yu, ɛn mek i gi yu kol at.
54001003	Yu nɔ fɔ kɔmɔt na Ɛfisɔs lɛkɛ aw a bin tɛl yu di tɛm we a bin de go Masi do nya, so dat yu go tɛl dɛn pipul we de lan ɔda pipul tin we wi nɔ lan dɛn, mek dɛn lɛf fɔ du dat.
54001004	Yu fɔ tɛl dɛn se dɛn fɔ lɛf fɔ lisin to dɛn pipul we jɛs de tɔk stori we dɛn yɛri, ɛn dɛn gra npapa-papa dɛn nem we nɔ de dɔn, bikɔs dɛn tin de jɛs de mek pipul mek plaba nɔmɔ; dɛn nɔ de ɛp fɔ mek dɛn no bɔt Gɔd in plan fɔ sev wi; na di biliv we pɔsin biliv pan Gɔd de ɛp fɔ mek ɔda pipul no bɔt Gɔd in plan fɔ sev wi.
54001005	Gɔd sɛn wi fɔ ɛp pipul mek dɛn gɛt da lɛk we kɔmɔt insay klin at, ɛn we pɔsin we de tray fɔ du ɔl wetin rayt, gɛt, ɛn we pɔsin we biliv Gɔd fɔ tru, gɛt.
54001006	Sɔm pipul de we nɔ biliv dɛn tin ya igen, naw dɛn de tɔk plɛnti fulish fulish tin.
54001007	Dɛn want fɔ lan pipul bɔt di Lɔ, bɔt dɛnsɛf nɔ ɔnda stand di Lɔ ɛn di tin dɛn we dɛnsɛf de tɔk bɔt, pan ɔl we dɛn de tɔk lɛkɛ se dɛn shɔ se dɛn tin de na tru.
54001008	Wi no se di Lɔ gud, if pɔsin fala am lɛkɛ aw i fɔ fala am.
54001009	Pɔsin fɔ no se nɔto fɔ pipul we gud lɔ de, bɔt na fɔ dɛn wan we de brok di Lɔ, dɛn wan we de tif ɛn du ɔl kayn bad tin, dɛn wan we nɔ no Gɔd; dɛn wan we nɔ de fɔ Gɔd, we nɔ tek Gɔd biznɛs mek natin, dɛn wan we de kil dɛn yon mami ɛn dadi, ɛn dɛn wan we de kil dɛn kɔmpin mɔta lman,
54001010	dɛn wan we liv fri layf, dɛn man we de kip dɛn kɔmpin man, dɛn wan we de kech pipul fɔ tɔn dɛn to slev, dɛn wan we de lay, dɛn wan we de lay bɔt dɛn de swɛ se na tru dɛn de tɔk, ɛn ɛnibɔdi we de du ɛni tin we difrɛn frɔm di tru tin we wi dɔn lan una.
54001011	Di tru tin we a lan una de pan di Gud Nyus bɔt di wɔnda ful Gɔd we wi de prez, we tɛl mi di Gud Nyus fɔ tɛl pipul.
54001012	A tɛl Jizɔs Krays, wi Masta, tɛnki. Na in de gi mi trɛnk fɔ du dis wok ɛn na in pik mi fɔ du am bikɔs i si se a go du am gud,
54001013	pan ɔl we fɔstɛm a bin de tɔk bad bɔt am, a bin de fɛt in pipul dɛn ɛn a bin de kɔs am; bɔt Gɔd sɔri fɔ mi bikɔs a nɔ bin no wetin a de du di tɛm we a nɔ bin biliv pan Krays yet,
54001014	ɛn Gɔd we na wi Masta bin so gud to mi we i mek a biliv Krays ɛn we i mek a lɛk mi kɔmpin mɔta lman bikɔs a gɛt wanwɔd wit Krays.
54001015	Na tru wɔd dis ɛn na wɔd we ɔlman fɔ biliv we dɛn se Jizɔs Krays kam na di wɔl fɔ sev dɛn pipul we de pan sin, ɛn na mi na di wan we dɔn sin pas ɔlman.
54001016	Bɔt we Gɔd sɔri fɔ mi, i bin want fɔ sho aw Jizɔs Krays go bia wit mi fɔ mek ɔda pipul si se, if i ebul bia wit mi we dɔn sin pas ɔlman, i go ebul bia wit ɔda pipul we go kam biliv pan am fɔseka dat ɛn gɛt layf we go de sote go.
54001017	Frɔm naw sote go mek wi ɔna ɛn prez di King we bin de, we de naw ɛn we go de sote go, we nɔ de day, ɛn we pɔsin nɔ de si; na in wan gren na Gɔd. Emɛn.
54001018	Timoti, mi pikin, a de fala dɛn mɛsej we Gɔd bin gi dɛn prɔfɛt bɔt yu, so dat wɛn yu yɛri dɛn yu go gɛt di maynd fɔ fɛt dis gud fɛt; dat na fɔ tap dɛn ticha we nɔ de lan pipul di tru tin. Na di wok dis we a gi yu fɔ du.
54001019	Yu fɔ biliv fɔ tru ɛn du wetin yu no se rayt. Sɔm pipul we nɔ bin gri fɔ du wetin dɛn fɔ du, nɔ biliv Krays igen:
54001020	Imɛniɔs na wan ɛn Alɛgza nda na ɔda wan; a dɔn lɛf dɛn gi Setan te dɛn tap fɔ tɔk bad bɔt Gɔd.
54002001	Fɔs tin, a de beg una fɔ pre to Gɔd fɔ unasɛf ɛn fɔ ɔda pipul ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki fɔ ɔlman na wɔl;
54002002	fɔ dɛn wan we de rul ɛn ɔl dɛn bigman, so dat waala nɔ go de na wi layf, wi go gɛt kol at, wi go de waka klos Gɔd ɛn wi nɔ go du ɛni tin we go mek wi shem.
54002003	Na so wi fɔ pre; na dat go mek Gɔd we de sev wi, sati sfay.
54002004	Gɔd want mek ɔlman sev ɛn mek dɛn no wetin tru.
54002005	Na wan gren Gɔd de, ɛn wan pɔsin de midul Gɔd ɛn mɔta lman fɔ bring dɛn togɛda, dat na Jizɔs Krays we insɛf na mɔta lman,
54002006	i sakri fays in layf fɔ tek bay mɔta lman bak. Na di tin dat we, wɛn di rayt tɛm rich, Gɔd sho mɔta lman fɔ mek dɛn no se in want sev dɛn.
54002007	Na dat mek Gɔd pik mi fɔ bi in apɔsul, ɛn fɔ lan dɛn wan we nɔto Ju aw fɔ biliv pan Krays ɛn fɔ mek dɛn no wetin tru. Na tru a de tɔk, a nɔ de lay.
54002008	So a want mek dɛn man dɛn ɔlɔbɔt pre. Dɛn fɔ bi pipul we dɔn gi Gɔd dɛn layf, so dat wɛn dɛn es dɛn an ɔp fɔ pre, dɛn nɔ go vɛks pan pipul ɛn dɛn nɔ go de mɛmba bad fɔ dɛn pipul we ambɔg dɛn.
54002009	A nɔ want mek di uman dɛn de kɔl atɛnshɔn bay di we we dɛn drɛs, dɛn fɔ tek tɛm pik di klos we dɛn de wɛr, ɛn dɛn fɔ drɛs gud, dɛn nɔ fɔ de wɛr dɛn dia klos; dɛn nɔ fɔ de plant dɛn ia fayn tumɔs; dɛn nɔ fɔ wɛr gold ɔ pal.
54002010	Bɔt dɛn fɔ de du dɛn gud wok we uman we kɔl insɛf Gɔdu man fɔ du.
54002011	Uman fɔ sidɔm saful de lan, i fɔ put in yay dɔng.
54002012	A nɔ de gri mek uman tich ɔ tinap oba man ed, i fɔ sidɔm saful.
54002013	Bikɔs na Adam fɔs Gɔd mek, bifo i mek Iv;
54002014	nɔto Adam di snek bin mek ful, na di uman; na dat mek di uman sin.
54002015	Bɔt uman go sev wɛn i de bɔn pikin, if i biliv Krays, if i lɛk pipul, if i de fɔ Gɔd ɛn if i de kɔntrol insɛf pan ɔltin.
54003001	Na tru dɛn kin tɔk we dɛn kin se: If man want bi ova sia na gud gud wok i want du so.
54003002	Ova sia nɔ fɔ gɛt bɔt na in layf; na wan wɛf nɔmɔ i fɔ gɛt, i fɔ bi siryɔs pɔsin, i fɔ ebul kɔntrol insɛf, i fɔ de biev lɛkɛ pɔsin wit sɛns; i fɔ opin in os to tre nja; i fɔ ebul tich pipul;
54003003	i nɔ fɔ de drɔnk, i nɔ fɔ de vɛks kwik kwik, i nɔ fɔ de mek plaba; i nɔ fɔ lɛk mɔni;
54003004	i fɔ si dat ɔltin de go fayn na in os, i fɔ mek in pikin dɛn rɛspɛkt am ɛn yɛri in wɔd.
54003005	If pɔsin nɔ ebul mek ɔltin fayn na in yon os, aw i go ebul mek ɔltin fayn na Gɔd in chɔch?
54003006	I nɔ fɔ bi man we jɛs no Krays bikɔs sɔntɛm i go prawd, ɛn dat go mek Gɔd kɔndɛm am lɛkɛ aw i bin kɔndɛm Setan.
54003007	I fɔ bi man we pipul we nɔto Kristiɛn sɛf de tɔk gud bɔt, so dat shem nɔ go mit am ɛn i nɔ go fɔdɔm insay Setan in trap.
54003008	Dɛn wan we de ɛp fɔ du Gɔd wok na chɔch, dɛnsɛf fɔ siryɔs, dɛn fɔ min wetin dɛn se; dɛn nɔ fɔ de drɔnk, dɛn nɔ fɔ want plɛnti tin fɔ dɛnsɛf;
54003009	dɛn fɔ biliv di tru tin we Gɔd tɛl dɛn wit ɔl dɛn at; ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ dawt se wetin dɛn biliv na di rayt tin.
54003010	Na fɔ tray dɛn fɔs, if dɛn du wɛl, una kin mek dɛn bigin ɛp fɔ du Gɔd wok na chɔch.
54003011	Dɛn wɛf sɛf fɔ siryɔs, dɛn nɔ fɔ de kongosa; dɛn fɔ soba, dɛn fɔ ebul kɔntrol dɛnsɛf, ɛn dɛn fɔ de waka tret ɔltɛm.
54003012	Man we de ɛp fɔ du Gɔd wok na chɔch fɔ gɛt wan wɛf ɛn fɔ ebul manej in wɛf ɛn pikin dɛn biznɛs gud.
54003013	Dɛn wan we du dɛn wok gud go gɛt rɛspɛkt ɛn dɛn nɔ go de dawt ɛn fred wɛn dɛn de tɔk bɔt di biliv we dɛn biliv pan Jizɔs.
54003014	A de abop fɔ kam fɛn yu, i nɔ go te igen, bɔt a de rayt dɛn tin ya so dat
54003015	if sɔntin sɛf mek a te fɔ kam, dis lɛta ya go mek yu no aw wi fɔ de du wɛn wi de wit Gɔd in pipul dɛn, dat na Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go, in chɔch, ɛn Gɔd in chɔch na di bakbon fɔ di tru tin we wi de tɛl pipul.
54003016	Nɔbɔdi nɔ go dinay se di sikrit we de insay wi rilijɔn na big wan: I kam lɛkɛ mɔtalman, Gɔd in Spirit sho se i rayt fɔ du dat. Enjɛl dɛn si am. Pipul tɔk bɔt am ɔlɔbɔt na dɛn difrɛn neshɔn. Pipul na wɔl bin biliv pan am, Gɔd tek am go ɛvin, ɛn put am na in raytan.
54004001	Gɔd in Spirit dɔn tɔk plen wan se tɛm go kam we sɔm pipul go lɛf fɔ biliv Gɔd; dɛn go de du wetin dɛn spirit we de lay tɛl dɛn fɔ du, ɛn dɛn go de fala wetin dɛbul lan dɛn.
54004002	Na dɛn pipul we de lay, de lan pipul dɛn tin ya i tan lɛkɛ dɛn dɔn bɔn dɛn at na faya ɛn dat mek dɛn nɔ gɛt kɔnshɛns igen.
54004003	Dɛn man ya de tɛl pipul se i nɔ rayt fɔ mared ɛn i nɔ rayt fɔ it sɔm kayn tin dɛn. Bɔt Gɔd mek dɛn tin ya fɔ it, ɛn dɛn pipul we biliv am ɛn no wetin tru, kin it dɛn afta dɛn dɔn pre ɛn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki.
54004004	Ɔltin we Gɔd mek gud, so pɔsin nɔ fɔ luk se sɔm tin dɛn nɔ gud fɔ it, if i dɔn tɛl Gɔd tɛnki.
54004005	Na Gɔd in wɔd ɛn di pre we pɔsin de pre de mek Gɔd put in blɛsin pan di it.
54004006	If yu tɛl wi brɔda dɛn fɔ du dɛn tin ya we a tɛl yu, yu go de du Jizɔs Krays in wok gud, ɛn dat go sho se yu put ɔl yu at pan dɛn tru tin we yu biliv ɛn dɛn tru tin ya we a lan yu, we gud, we yu de fala.
54004007	Nɔ lisin to dɛn stori we nɔ tru ɛn we nɔ de tɔk ɛni tin bɔt Gɔd. Tren yusɛf fɔ liv fɔ Gɔd nɔmɔ.
54004008	I gud fɔ tren di bɔdi, bɔt fɔ tren di spirit gud pas ɔl, bikɔs i go ɛp yu na dis layf ɛn na da layf we go de sote go.
54004009	Na tru wɔd dis we pɔsin fɔ biliv ɛn we i nɔ fɔ dawt at ɔl.
54004010	Na dat mek wi de wok tra nga wan ɛn wi de tray, bikɔs wi abop pan Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go, we de fɔ sev ɔlman, ɛn mɔso, dɛn wan we biliv pan Krays.
54004011	Yu fɔ de lan pipul dɛn tin ya ɛn tɛl dɛn fɔ du dɛn.
54004012	Nɔ mek nɔbɔdi se bikɔs yu smɔl yu nɔ go ebul du dis wok. Na yu fɔ sho dɛn pipul we biliv Gɔd aw dɛn fɔ de du bay aw yu de tɔk, aw yu de du, aw yu lɛk pipul, aw yu biliv Gɔd, ɛn di kayn layf we yu liv.
54004013	Te a kam, yu fɔ de tray ɔltɛm fɔ rid dɛn tin we rayt na Gɔd in Buk bifo ɔlman, fɔ tɔk to pipul bɔt dɛn tin ya ɛn fɔ lan dɛn dɛn tru tin we dɛn fɔ no bɔt Gɔd.
54004014	Nɔ lɛf fɔ du da tin we yu sabi fɔ du, we Gɔd bin mek yu ebul du da tɛm we dɛn prɔfɛt bin tɔk wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ yu, ɛn dɛn bigman na chɔch bin put dɛn an pan yu ed ɛn pre fɔ yu.
54004015	Yu fɔ de du dɛn tin ya ɔltɛm ɛn put ɔl yu at pan dɛn, mek ɔlman go si se yu wok de go bifo.
54004016	Yu fɔ bikya ful wetin yu de du ɛn wetin yu de lan pipul. Nɔ fɔ lɛf fɔ du dɛn tin ya; if yu de du dɛn ɔltɛm yu go sev yusɛf ɛn ɔl dɛn wan we de lisin to yu.
54005001	Yu nɔ fɔ ala pan man we big pas yu, yu fɔ tɔk to am lɛkɛ se na yu papa. Yu fɔ tek dɛn yɔngman lɛkɛ yu brɔda dɛn;
54005002	dɛn big uman dɛn lɛkɛ yu mama; dɛn yɔng uman lɛkɛ yu sista dɛn, yu nɔ fɔ go tu fa wit dɛn.
54005003	Yu fɔ rɛspɛkt dɛn mare du man we dɛn man dɔn day, we nɔ gɛt nɔbɔdi fɔ ɛp dɛn.
54005004	Bɔt if uman we in man dɔn day gɛt pikin ɔ gra npi kin, in pikin ɔ gra npi kin fɔ du wetin ɔl pikin ɛn gra npi kin fɔ du fɔ dɛn mami ɛn dadi ɛn fɔ dɛn grani ɛn gra ndadi dɛn fɔ gi dɛn ɔl wetin dɛn fɔ gɛt, bikɔs if dɛn du dat, Gɔd go sati sfay wit dɛn.
54005005	Uman we in man dɔn day we nɔ gɛt nɔbɔdi fɔ mɛn am go abop pan Gɔd ɛn i go de pre de ɛn nɛt de aks Gɔd fɔ ɛp am.
54005006	Bɔt uman we in man dɔn day we jɛs liv fɔ ɛnjɔy layf, na uman we dɔn day pan ɔl we i gɛt layf.
54005007	Tɛl dɛn pipul ya fɔ du dɛn tin we a tɛl dɛn fɔ du, so dat nɔbɔdi nɔ go blem dɛn fɔ ɛni tin.
54005008	If ɛnibɔdi nɔ de mɛn in fambul dɛn, pati kla in yon mami ɛn dadi, da pɔsin de de du lɛkɛ se fɔ biliv pan Gɔd nɔ min natin, i wɔs pas pɔsin we nɔ biliv pan Gɔd wan de.
54005009	Nɔ put ɛni uman we in man dɔn day in nem dɔng na rɛji sta wit dɛn ɔda uman dɛn we dɛn man dɔn day te i dɔn rich siksti ia. Pantap dat, na wan tɛm nɔmɔ i fɔ dɔn mared,
54005010	ɛn ɔlman fɔ no am fɔ di gud tin dɛn we i de du: i fɔ bi uman we tren in pikin dɛn gud, we kin du gud fɔ tre nja, we kin wok fɔ di Kristiɛn dɛn, we kin ɛp dɛn pipul we de pan trɔbul, ɛn we kin du ɔl kayn gud wok.
54005011	Nɔ put dɛn yɔng uman we dɛn man dɔn day we nɔ rich siksti ia yet dɛn nem dɔng, bikɔs wɛn dɛn want mared bad bad, dɛn kin lɛf fɔ fala Krays,
54005012	so dɛn kin mek Gɔd kɔndɛm dɛn bikɔs dɛn brok di prɔmis we dɛn bin dɔn prɔmis fɔs fɔ fala Krays.
54005013	Pantap dat, dɛn kin jɛs de go frɔm os to os aydul wan, dɛn kin de kongosa, de bizabɔdi, ɛn tɔk bɔt tin we dɛn nɔ fɔ tɔk bɔt.
54005014	So a fil se i bɛtɛ mek dɛn yɔng uman we dɛn man dɔn day mared bak, gɛt pikin ɛn wok mek dɛn man ɛn pikin biznɛs rayt, so dat dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk wi nɔ go ebul tɔk ɛni bad tin bɔt wi.
54005015	Sɔm pan dɛn uman we dɛn man dɔn day dɔn lɛf fɔ fala Krays, na Setan dɛn de fala naw.
54005016	Bɔt if ɛni Kristiɛn uman gɛt sɔm fambul dɛn we dɛn man dɔn day, na in fɔ mɛn dɛn, i nɔ fɔ mek di chɔch gɛt da wɔri de, so dat di chɔch kin fri fɔ mɛn dɛn uman we dɛn man dɔn day, we nɔ gɛt nɔbɔdi fɔ mɛn dɛn.
54005017	Dɛn bigman we de du dɛn chɔch lida wok gud, pati kla di wan dɛn we de wok tra nga wan fɔ tɛl pipul bɔt Gɔd ɛn tich, fɔ gɛt gud pe ɛn rɛspɛkt.
54005018	Lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk, we dɛn se, “Nɔ fɔ tay dɛn ebi kaw dɛn mɔt wɛn dɛn de mas rɛs fɔ mek di kanda kɔmɔt” ɛn igen “Wokman fɔ gɛt di pe we i wok fɔ”.
54005019	Yu nɔ fɔ lisin if dɛn se wan bigman du tin we nɔ rayt, pas if na tu ɔ tri pɔsin we si, tɔk am.
54005020	Yu fɔ tɔk pan ɔl dɛn wan we nɔ gri lɛf fɔ sin, bifo dɛn kɔmpin, mek dɛn kɔmpin go fred fɔ sin.
54005021	Bifo Gɔd, Jizɔs Krays, ɛn in gud enjɛl dɛn, a de tɛl yu fɔ du dɛn tin ya; trit ɔlman di sem we, pɔsin we na yu padi ɛn pɔsin we nɔto yu padi.
54005022	Nɔ ɔri fɔ put yu an pan pɔsin ed fɔ pre fɔ am fɔ mek i go du Gɔd wok. Nɔ miks wit ɔda pipul fɔ sin; sin nɔ fɔ de na yu layf.
54005023	Nɔ jɛs de drink wata nɔmɔ, tek lili wayn fɔ mek yu it go go dɔng gud ɛn fɔ we yu kin de sik sik.
54005024	Sɔm pipul kin sin ɛn ɔlman kin si wetin dɛn de du ɛn dɛn kin no se Gɔd ɔ mɔta lman go jɔj dɛn, bɔt sɔm pipul kin sin ɛn nɔbɔdi nɔ no naw, bɔt pipul go no bambay.
54005025	Semwe so, ɔlman kin si ɛn no wok we gud, bɔt if dɛn nɔ si am wantɛm so sɛf, di gud wok nɔ go ayd te go.
54006001	Ɔl dɛn Kristiɛn pipul we na slev fɔ luk se dɛn masta dɛn na pipul we dɛn fɔ rɛspɛkt, so dat nɔbɔdi nɔ go tɔk bad bɔt Gɔd in nem ɔ tɔk bad bɔt dɛn tin we wi de lan dɛn.
54006002	Dɛn slev we dɛn masta na Kristiɛn nɔ fɔ se bikɔs dɛn ɔl na brɔda, dɛn nɔ go gi dɛn rɛspɛkt. Dɛn fɔ du dɛn wok bɛtɛ sɛf, bikɔs di wok we dɛn de du go bɛni fit dɛn masta we na Kristiɛn ɛn we lɛk Gɔd, lɛkɛ dɛnsɛf. Yu fɔ de lan pipul dɛn tin ya ɛn yu fɔ de tɛl pipul bɔt dɛn.
54006003	Ɛnibɔdi we de lan pipul difrɛn tin ɛn we nɔ gri wit di tru wɔd dɛn we wi Masta Jizɔs tɔk, dat na aw wi de lan pipul fɔ waka wit Gɔd,
54006004	da pɔsin de prawd bad ɛn i nɔ sabi natin; i jɛs lɛk fɔ de agyu ɛn mek plaba fɔ wan wan wɔd dɛn, ɛn dat bad bikɔs i de mek pipul jɛlɔs dɛn kɔmpin, i de mek dɛn nɔ gɛt wanwɔd, i de mek dɛn kɔs dɛn kɔmpin ɛn mek dɛn luk se dɛn kɔmpin want du dɛn bad;
54006005	ɛn i de mek dɛn man we nɔ de tink rayt ɛn we nɔ sabi igen wetin tru bɔt Krays, agyu ɔltɛm. Dɛn fil se Gɔd yon we na in fɔ tek jɛntri. Yu nɔ fɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit dɛn.
54006006	Fɔ du wetin Gɔd want de mek pɔsin jɛntri, if da pɔsin de sati sfay wit in layf ɛn gladi fɔ di wok we i de du.
54006007	Wi nɔ bring natin kam na dis wɔl, wi nɔ go kɛr natin go.
54006008	If wi gɛt it fɔ it ɛn klos fɔ wɛr nɔmɔ, wi fɔ sati sfay.
54006009	Bɔt dɛn wan we want jɛntri go want du bad, ɛn dɛn fulish tin we dɛn want we nɔ gud fɔ dɛn, na trap we de mek dɛn layf pwɛl ɔltogɛda.
54006010	Fɔ lɛk mɔni de mek pɔsin du ɔl kayn bad tin. Sɔm Kristiɛn dɛn we bin want mɔni bad bad dɔn lɛf fɔ fala Gɔd, bɔku waala dɔn pwɛl dɛn at.
54006011	Bɔt yu we de wok fɔ Gɔd nɔ fɔ miks pan ɔl dɛn tin ya. Tray fɔ de waka tret, fɔ de du lɛkɛ aw Gɔd want, fɔ biliv Gɔd, fɔ lɛk pipul, fɔ de bia ɛn fɔ de du tin saful, saful.
54006012	Fɛt fɔ di biliv we yu biliv pan Krays we gud, ɛn ol di layf we go de sote go we yu gɛt wit Gɔd, gud; na Gɔd kɔl yu fɔ gi yu da layf de ɛn na bɔt dat yu dɔn tɔk plen wan bifo plɛnti pipul.
54006013	Bifo Gɔd we de gi ɔltin layf, ɛn bifo Jizɔs Krays we nɔ fred fɔ tɔk bɔt insɛf bifo da gɔvna we dɛn kɔl Pɔnchɔs Paylet, a de tɛl yu dɛn tin ya:
54006014	Yu fɔ du ɔl wetin a dɔn tɛl yu, yu nɔ fɔ miks pan sin, so dat nɔbɔdi nɔ go blem yu frɔm naw te wi Masta Jizɔs kam bak.
54006015	Gɔd we na di wan gren Rula we gɛt prez, di King fɔ ɔl dɛn king, di Masta fɔ ɔl dɛn masta go mek pipul si Krays wɛn di rayt tɛm rich.
54006016	Na in wan gren nɔ de day, ɛn i de na layt we mɔta lman nɔ ebul kam klos, nɔ mɔta lman nɔ si am yet ɛn nɔ mɔta lman nɔ ebul si am. Mek wi rɛspɛkt am ɛn mek in pawa rul di wɔl sote go! Emɛn.
54006017	As fɔ dɛn wan we jɛntri na dis wɔl, tɛl dɛn mek dɛn nɔ prawd, ɛn mek dɛn nɔ abop pan dɛn jɛntri, we sɔntɛm nɔ go de tumara; mek dɛn abop pan Gɔd we de gi wi ɔltin plɛnti plɛnti fɔ mek wi at gladi.
54006018	Dɛn yon jɛntri fɔ bi di plɛnti plɛnti gud wok we dɛn de du, dɛn fɔ fri an ɛn dɛn fɔ lɛk fɔ sheb wetin dɛn gɛt.
54006019	If dɛn du dat dɛn go rɛdi fɔ di tɛm we gɛt fɔ kam, so dat dɛn go gɛt da layf we na di tru layf.
54006020	Duya, Timoti, kip ɔl dɛn tin we a dɔn tɛl yu insay yu at ɛn du dɛn ɔltɛm. Nɔ miks pan dɛn tɔk ɛn dɛn fulish plaba we nɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit Gɔd, we sɔm pipul de mistek kɔl “sabi”.
54006021	Sɔm pipul we bin se dɛn “sabi” dɛn tin ya, nɔ no usay dɛn de tide, dɛn nɔ biliv Gɔd igen. Mek Gɔd sho una ɔl aw i gud.
55001001	Na mi Pɔl, we dɔn bi Krays Jizɔs in apɔsul bikɔs Gɔd want mi fɔ bi so, na mi Gɔd sɛn fɔ kam tɔk bɔt di layf we i prɔmis fɔ gi wi, ɛn we wi gɛt bikɔs wi gɛt wanwɔd wit Krays Jizɔs.
55001002	Na mi de rayt to mi pikin, Timoti, we a lɛk. Mek Gɔd we na wi Masta Jizɔs Krays in Papa sho yu aw i gud, mek i sɔri fɔ yu ɛn mek i gi yu kol at.
55001003	A tɛl Gɔd tɛnki ɛn a de du in wok lɛkɛ aw i want mi fɔ du am, lɛkɛ aw mi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin de du. Wɛn a de pre fɔ yu de ɛn nɛt a kin tɛl am tɛnki.
55001004	A mɛmba we yu bin de kray di tɛm we a bin lɛf yu, ɛn a want si yu bad, so dat mi at go gladi.
55001005	A mɛmba aw yu biliv Gɔd wit ɔl yu at lɛkɛ yu grani Lɔis ɛn yu mami Yuna ysi. A shɔ se yusɛf biliv Gɔd lɛkɛ dɛn.
55001006	Na dat mek a de mɛmba yu fɔ bigin yus di spɛshal pawa bak we Gɔd bin gi yu da tɛm we a bin put mi an na yu ed ɛn pre fɔ yu.
55001007	Di Spirit we Gɔd dɔn gi wi nɔto spirit we de mek wi fred, i de mek wi gɛt maynd, i de put lɛk na wi at ɛn i de mek wi ebul kɔntrol wisɛf.
55001008	So yu nɔ fɔ fred fɔ tɔk bɔt wi Masta in wok; ɛn yu nɔ fɔ shem fɔ mi we de na jel fɔseka di Masta. Bɔt, yu fɔ gɛt yu yon pan di sɔfa we dɛn Kristiɛn de sɔfa fɔseka di Gud Nyus, wit di pawa we Gɔd gi yu fɔ mek yu ebul bia.
55001009	Gɔd nɔ sev wi ɛn kɔl wi fɔ bi in yon pipul fɔseka ɛni tin we wi dɔn du, bɔt na fɔseka wetin in bin dɔn mekɔp fɔ du bifo di wɔl bigin ɛn bikɔs i gud. Na tru Jizɔs Krays i mek wi no di gud we i du.
55001010	Gɔd dɔn sho wi di gud we i du plen wan naw, we wi Sevyɔ, Jizɔs Krays dɔn kam. I dɔn pwɛl di pawa we day bin gɛt pan mɔta lman, ɛn i dɔn mek pipul no bɔt da layf we go de sote go, bay di Gud Nyus we wi de tɛl dɛn.
55001011	Gɔd dɔn pik mi fɔ sɛn mi go lɛkɛ apɔsul fɔ tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus ɛn fɔ lan dɛn bɔt am,
55001012	ɛn na di rizin dis we mek a de sɔfa ɔl dɛn tin ya. Bɔt a nɔ de dawt at ɔl, bikɔs a no di wan we a abop pan; a no fɔ tru se i ebul kip ɔl wetin i dɔn gi mi fɔ du sote di de we Krays go kam bak.
55001013	Dɛn tru wɔd we a tɛl yu, yu fɔ put ɔl yu at pan dɛn; na dɛn yu fɔ de fala pan ɛni tin we yu de du, yu nɔ fɔ lɛf fɔ biliv Gɔd lɛkɛ aw yu biliv am naw, ɛn yu nɔ fɔ tap fɔ lɛk yu kɔmpin. Na bikɔs wi gɛt wanwɔd wit Jizɔs Krays mek wi ebul biliv Gɔd ɛn lɛk wi kɔmpin so.
55001014	Kip dɛn gud tin ya we Gɔd dɔn gi yu bay in Spirit, we de insay wi, in pawa.
55001015	Yu no se ɔlman na wan pat na Eshya bin lɛf mi go. Fijɛlɔs insɛf wit Amo ji nis dɔn lɛf mi go.
55001016	Mek di Masta blɛs Onɛsifɔrɔs wit in wɛf ɛn pikin dɛn bikɔs i kɔrej mi plɛnti tɛm. I nɔ shem bikɔs a de jel,
55001017	bɔt jɛs i rich Rom so, i bigin luk fɔ mi wantɛm te i si mi.
55001018	Lɛ Masta Jizɔs Krays mek Gɔd di Masta sɔri fɔ am di de we Jizɔs go kam bak! Yusɛf no di wok we i du na Ɛfisɔs.
55002001	Yu, mi pikin, lɛ di gud we Gɔd de du fɔ wi, bikɔs wi gɛt wanwɔd wit Jizɔs Krays, mek yu tinap tra nga.
55002002	Dɛn wɔd we yu kin yɛri a de tɛl plɛnti pipul, yusɛf fɔ tɛl dɛn pipul we yu kin abop pan, we go kip dɛn na dɛn at, so dat dɛnsɛf go ebul lan ɔda pipul dɛn sem tin ya.
55002003	Yusɛf fɔ sɔfa yu yon, bikɔs yu na Krays Jizɔs in soja man ɛn natin nɔ go pul yu biɛn am.
55002004	Ɛni soja man we de na ami go want fɔ mek di ɔfisa we na in bɔs sati sfay wit am, so i nɔ go miks pan dɛn tin we dɛn pipul we nɔto soja man dɛn de du.
55002005	Man we de rɔnres nɔ go win di kɔp pas nɔmɔ i de fala di rul dɛn.
55002006	Fama we dɔn wok tranga na in fam na in fɔs fɔ gɛt pan di tin dɛn we gro.
55002007	Tink bɔt ɔl wetin a de tɛl yu, di Masta go mek yu ɔnda stand ɔltin.
55002008	Mɛmba Jizɔs Krays, we Gɔd mek rayz frɔm di grev, we kɔmɔt na Devid in fambul layn, ɛn we a de tɔk bɔt wɛn a de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus.
55002009	A de sɔfa bikɔs a de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus, dɛn chen mi sɛf lɛkɛ jelman, bɔt dɛn nɔ go chen Gɔd in wɔd;
55002010	na dat mek a de bia ɔltin fɔseka dɛn pipul we Gɔd dɔn pik, so dat dɛnsɛf go sev if dɛn gɛt wanwɔd wit Krays Jizɔs ɛn dɛn go gɛt di tru layf we de na ɛvin sote go.
55002011	Na tru dɛn kin tɔk we dɛn kin se: “If wi day wit am, wi go liv wit am.
55002012	If wi nɔ lɛf fɔ bia, wi go rul wit am. If wi se wi nɔ no am, insɛf go se in nɔ no wi.
55002013	If wi nɔ du wetin i tɛl wi, in go stil de du wetin i dɔn tɛl wi se in go du, bikɔs i nɔ go lay pan insɛf.”
55002014	Mɛmba yu pipul dɛn bɔt dɛn wɔd ya, ɛn wɔn dɛn siryɔs wan bifo Gɔd mek dɛn nɔ fɛt fɔseka dɛn wɔd we nɔ min natin. Dat nɔ de ɛp ɛnibɔdi, bifo dat i de mek dɛn pipul we de lisin, nɔ biliv Gɔd.
55002015	Tray gud mek Gɔd sati sfay wit yu, bikɔs i si se yu na wokman we nɔ de shem fɔ du in wok ɛn yu de lan pipul di tru wɔd bɔt Gɔd, aw yu fɔ lan dɛn.
55002016	Nɔ lisin to dɛn fulish tɔk we nɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit Gɔd, ɛn we jɛs de mek pipul lɛf fɔ fala Gɔd mɔ ɛn mɔ.
55002017	Di tin we dɛn de lan pipul tan lɛkɛ sofut we de it di say we i de pan di bɔdi go insay. Tu pan dɛn ticha ya na Imɛniɔs ɛn Faylitɔs.
55002018	Dɛn nɔ biliv wetin tru igen, dɛn de tɔk se di tɛm we pipul we dɔn day go rayz frɔm dɛn grev dɔn pas; dat de mek sɔm pipul we bin biliv, bigin dawt.
55002019	Bɔt natin nɔ go shek di tranga fawndeshɔn we Gɔd dɔn mek; di wɔd dɛn we rayt pan di fawndeshɔn na dɛn dis: “Di Masta sabi di wan dɛn we na in yon” ɛn “Ɛnibɔdi we se in blant di Masta fɔ lɛf fɔ du dɛn tin we nɔ rayt.”
55002020	Insay jɛntri man os yu kin gɛt ɔl kayn plet ɛn pan: silva wan dɛn, gold wan dɛn, sɔm we dɛn tek bod mek, sɔm we dɛn tek kle mek; sɔm na fɔ yus wan tɛm nɔmɔ fɔ big biznɛs, sɔm na fɔ yus ɛvri de.
55002021	So if pɔsin lɛf fɔ du ɔl kayn bad tin, Gɔd go yus am fɔ du dɛn spɛshal wok bikɔs di pɔsin dɔn gi in Masta ɔl in layf ɛn i de du ɔl di wok we in Masta gi am fɔ du, ɛn i rɛdi fɔ du ɔl kayn gud wok.
55002022	Nɔ du dɛn tin we dɛn yɔng pipul dɛn at kin gi dɛn fɔ du we dɛn nɔba ebul kɔntrol; tray fɔ de du wetin rayt na Gɔd yay, tray fɔ abop pan Gɔd, fɔ lɛk ɔlman ɛn fɔ mek kol at de; yu fɔ tray fɔ de du ɔl dɛn tin ya wit ɔl dɛn pipul we gɛt klin at ɛn we de pre mek di Masta ɛp dɛn.
55002023	Nɔ miks pan dɛn fulish agyumɛnt we pipul we nɔ sabi natin de gɛt; yu no se na plaba dɛn kin ɛnd pan.
55002024	Di pɔsin we de du Gɔd wok nɔ fɔ mek plaba, i fɔ gud to ɔlman; i fɔ bi gud ticha we de bia,
55002025	we nɔ de tek pawa tɔk to dɛn wan we nɔ si wit am. I de go kɛlɛkɛlɛ wit dɛn bikɔs i no se sɔntɛm Gɔd go gi dɛn di chans fɔ sɔri fɔ dɛn bad trik ɛn kam no di tru tin we dɛn fɔ biliv.
55002026	Da tɛm de dɛn go kechɔp se wetin dɛn bin de du nɔ rayt ɛn dɛn go kɔmɔt insay Setan in trap; Setan bin dɔn kech dɛn ɛn i bin de mek dɛn du wetin i want.
55003001	Nɔ fɔgɛt dis: Jɛs bifo Jizɔs kam bak di tɛm go tra nga.
55003002	Pipul go de mɛmba dɛnsɛf nɔmɔ, dɛn go want ɔltin, dɛn go de bost ɛn dɛn go prawd; dɛn go de kɔs, dɛn nɔ go de yɛri dɛn mami ɛn dadi wɔd, dɛn nɔ go de tɛl tɛnki fɔ ɛni gud we pɔsin du fɔ dɛn, dɛn nɔ go lɛk Gɔd biznɛs;
55003003	dɛn nɔ go de du gud, dɛn nɔ go gɛt sɔri at, dɛn go de tɔk bad bɔt pipul, dɛn nɔ go ebul kɔntrol dɛnsɛf, ɛn dɛn go wayl if pɔsin ambɔg dɛn; dɛn nɔ go lɛk ɛni tin we gud;
55003004	dɛn nɔto pipul we ɛnibɔdi go abop pan; dɛn nɔ go bisin if dɛn de du tin we bad ɛn dɛn go prawd bad; dɛn go lɛk fɔ ɛnjɔy dɛnsɛf, dɛn nɔ go lɛk Gɔd;
55003005	dɛn go de fɔm ipo krit lɛkɛ se dɛn bisin bɔt Gɔd wok, bɔt dɛn nɔ go biliv se Gɔd gɛt pawa. Nɔ miks wit dɛn pipul ya.
55003006	Sɔm pan dɛn de go na pipul os, go tɔn dɛn uman dɛn at we nɔ no wetin dɛn de pan bikɔs dɛn sin de mɔna dɛn ɛn dɛn de du ɛni tin we dɛn at gi dɛn fɔ du;
55003007	dɛn uman ya de tray fɔ lan, bɔt dɛn nɔ ebul no wetin tru.
55003008	Lɛkɛ aw Janiz ɛn Jambriz nɔ bin de fɔ Mozis, na semwe so, dɛn man ya nɔ de fɔ di tru tin dɛn na pipul we nɔ de tink rayt ɛn nɔto di rayt tin dɛn biliv bɔt Gɔd.
55003009	Bɔt dɛn nɔ go go fa, bikɔs ɔlman go si aw dɛn ful, lɛkɛ aw i bin bi to Janiz ɛn Jambriz.
55003010	Bɔt yu dɔn yɛri dɛn tin we a lan yu, yu dɔn si aw a de du, ɛn yusɛf no wetin a want du na layf; yu dɔn no wetin a biliv, yu dɔn no aw a de bia, aw a lɛk pipul, aw a tinap tra nga.
55003011	Yu no aw pipul de fɛt mi, ɛn di sɔfa we a de sɔfa. Yu no ɔl wetin bin bi to mi na Antiɔk, Aykonyɔm ɛn Listra, di bad bad tin dɛn we pipul du mi, we a bia! Bɔt wi Masta pul mi pan dɛn ɔl.
55003012	Pipul go fɛt ɔl dɛn wan we gɛt wanwɔd wit Jizɔs Krays, we want fɔ liv dɛn layf lɛkɛ aw Gɔd want dɛn fɔ liv am.
55003013	Wikɛd pipul ɛn dɛn wan we de mek pipul ful go de wɔs mɔ ɛn mɔ, dɛn go de mek plɛnti mɔ pipul ful ɛn dɛn go de mek dɛnsɛf ful.
55003014	Bɔt yu nɔ fɔ lɛf fɔ biliv di tru tin dɛn we yu dɔn lan ɛn we yu biliv gud wan. Yu no dɛn wan we bin de tich yu,
55003015	ɛn yu fɔ mɛmba se frɔm we yu smɔl, yu dɔn no dɛn tin we rayt na Gɔd in Buk we de mek yu no se yu fɔ biliv pan Jizɔs fɔ mek yu sev.
55003016	Na Gɔd tɛl pipul ɔltin we rayt na in Buk, ɛn ɔl dɛn tin de gud fɔ mek pipul lan di tru tin, fɔ mek dɛn no dɛn tin we dɛn de du we nɔ rayt, fɔ mek dɛn wan we nɔ de du rayt bigin du wetin rayt, ɛn fɔ tɛl dɛn aw fɔ liv di layf we Gɔd want dɛn fɔ liv,
55003017	so dat ɛnibɔdi we de du Gɔd wok go gɛt ɔl wetin i fɔ gɛt ɛn bi wetin i fɔ bi so dat i go ebul du ɔl kayn gud wok lɛkɛ aw i fɔ du am.
55004001	A de wɔn yu siryɔs wan bifo Gɔd ɛn bifo Krays Jizɔs we go jɔj dɛn wan we nɔ day yet ɛn dɛn wan we dɔn day: bikɔs Krays gɛt fɔ kam bak na wɔl ɛn rul lɛkɛ King, a de tɛl yu,
55004002	fɔ de tɛl pipul di mɛsej we Gɔd gi yu ɔltɛm, wɛn dɛn de lisin ɔ wɛn dɛn nɔ want lisin; yu fɔ sho pipul wetin rayt fɔ du; yu fɔ tɛl dɛn wan we no se wetin dɛn de du nɔ rayt, fɔ tap; yu fɔ tɔk to dɛn mek dɛn waka tret; ɛn bia wit dɛn ɔltɛm wɛn yu de lan dɛn dɛn tin ya.
55004003	Di tɛm go kam we pipul nɔ go want yɛri dɛn tin we ɔda pipul de lan dɛn we gud fɔ dɛn, bɔt dɛn go de fala wetin dɛn at gi dɛn fɔ du, ɛn dɛn go de gɛda mɔ ɛn mɔ ticha dɛn we go de tɛl dɛn tin we dɛn lɛk fɔ yɛri.
55004004	Dɛn go lɛf fɔ lisin Gɔd yon mɛsej we tru, dɛn go put dɛn ed pan dɛn stori we mɔta lman mek.
55004005	Bɔt yu fɔ kɔntrol yusɛf ɔltɛm; yu fɔ bia wɛn yu de sɔfa, yu fɔ de tɛl pipul di Gud Nyus, ɛn yu fɔ du ɔl wetin pɔsin we de wok fɔ Gɔd fɔ du.
55004006	Fɔ mi yon pat, di tɛm dɔn rich fɔ mek a day lɛkɛ sakri fays fɔ Gɔd; di tɛm dɔn kam fɔ mek a lɛf dis layf.
55004007	Di rɔn we a bin de rɔn fɔ mi Masta dɔn dɔn, a dɔn rich di say we fɔ tap, a nɔ lɛf fɔ biliv pan Gɔd, a nɔ lɛf fɔ lan pipul dɛn tin we wi biliv bɔt Gɔd.
55004008	Bikɔs a dɔn rich di say we a fɔ tap, di prayz we a wok fɔ de wet mi, na di prayz dat we ɛnibɔdi we de waka tret wit Gɔd go gɛt, di Masta we de jɔj rayt go gi mi di prayz di de we i go kam bak; ɛn nɔto mi nɔmɔ i go gi, i go gi ɔl dɛn wan we go gladi fɔ si am wɛn i kam.
55004009	Tray mek yu kam to mi, nɔ te igen.
55004010	Bikɔs Dimas lɛk dɛn tin we de na di wɔl, i dɔn lɛf mi go; i dɔn go Tɛsalonayka. Krɛsɛns go Galeshya, Taytɔs go Dalme shya.
55004011	Na Lyuk nɔmɔ de wit mi naya. Bring Mak kam wit yu wɛn yu de kam, bikɔs in kin de ɛp mi fɔ du di wok.
55004012	A sɛn Taychikɔs go Ɛfisɔs.
55004013	Wɛn yu de kam, bring mi kot we a lɛf to Kapos we de na Troas, ɛn mi buk dɛn, nɔ fɔgɛt dɛn wan we dɛn tek bif kanda mek, na dɛn a want bad.
55004014	Alɛgza nda we na bla ksmit du mi bad bad tin. Gɔd go pe am fɔ wetin i du.
55004015	Yusɛf fɔ bikya ful wit am, bikɔs i nɔ want yɛri di mɛsej we wi de tɛl pipul at ɔl, ɛn ɔltɛm i de tɔk bad bɔt am.
55004016	Di fɔs tɛm we a go kot, nɔbɔdi nɔ bin tinap fɔ mi; ɔlman lɛf mi. Mek Gɔd nɔ mak dɛn fɔ dat!
55004017	Bɔt di Masta bin de wit mi ɛn i gi mi pawa, we mek a ebul tɛl pipul ɔl di mɛsej, mek ɔl dɛn wan we nɔto Ju, yɛri; ɛn i mek a nɔ go insay layɔn mɔt.
55004018	If ɛni bad tin mit mi di Masta go pul mi kɔmɔt pan am, i nɔ go mek natin du mi ɛn i go kɛr mi go na ɛvin we i de rul lɛkɛ King. Mek wi prez am ɛn ɔna am sote go! Emɛn.
55004019	A de sɛn adu fɔ Prisila ɛn Akwila ɛn fɔ Onɛsifɔrɔs wit in wɛf ɛn pikin dɛn.
55004020	Irastɔs nɔ kɔmɔt na Kɔrint yet, ɛn a lɛf Trɔfimɔs na Miletɔs, bikɔs i bin sik.
55004021	Tray fɔ mek yu kam bifo di kol sizin. Ubulɔs, Pudɛns, Laynɔs ɛn Klɔdia, wit ɔl dɛn ɔda Kristiɛn brɔda dɛn sɛn adu fɔ yu.
55004022	Mek di Masta de wit yu spirit ɔltɛm. Mek Gɔd sho una ɔl aw i gud.
56001001	Na mi, Pɔl, we na Gɔd in savant ɛn Jizɔs Krays in apɔsul, de rayt dis lɛta. Gɔd pik mi ɛn sɛn mi to in pipul dɛn we i dɔn pik fɔ mek a ɛp dɛn fɔ biliv pan am, ɛn fɔ no fɔ tru wetin Gɔd want fɔ mɔta lman, we wi bin de lan pipul,
56001002	we go mek dɛn abop fɔ gɛt layf we go de sote go. Gɔd, we nɔ de lay, bin dɔn prɔmis fɔ gi wi da layf de bifo i mek di wɔl,
56001003	ɛn i mek pipul no bɔt di prɔmis wɛn di rayt tɛm rich bay di mɛsej we i sɛn. Na mi Gɔd fil se go du wetin i want so i gi mi di mɛsej fɔ tɛl pipul; ɛn bikɔs in we de sev wi tɛl mi fɔ tɛl pipul di mɛsej, na dat mek a de tɛl dɛn.
56001004	A de rayt to Taytɔs, mi yon tru pikin, bikɔs i biliv pan Krays lɛkɛ aw misɛf biliv pan am. Mek Gɔd we na mi Papa ɛn Krays Jizɔs we de sev wi blɛs yu ɛn mek ɔltin wɛl wit yu.
56001005	A bin lɛf yu na Krit fɔ mek yu du wetin wi nɔ bin du de yet, ɛn mek yu pik ova sia na ɔl dɛn tɔng. Mɛmba dɛn tin we a bin tɛl yu:
56001006	Ova sia na pɔsin we nɔ fɔ du ɛni tin we go mek pipul pɔynt finga pan am; na wan gren wɛf nɔmɔ i fɔ gɛt; in pikin dɛn fɔ bi Kristiɛn, ɛn pipul nɔ fɔ de tɔk se dɛn wayl ɛn dɛn nɔ de yɛri wɔd.
56001007	Na ova sia in an Gɔd in wok de, so i nɔ fɔ du ɛni tin we go mek pɔsin pɔynt finga pan am. I nɔ fɔ prawd, i nɔ fɔ de vɛks kwik kwik, i nɔ fɔ de drɔnk, i nɔ fɔ de fɛt, i nɔ fɔ want plɛnti tin fɔ insɛf.
56001008	I fɔ gud to tre nja, ɛn i fɔ lɛk wetin gud. In ed fɔ stɛdi, i fɔ de waka tret, i fɔ de du dɛn tin we go mek Gɔd sati sfay, ɛn i fɔ ebul kɔntrol insɛf mek i nɔ du ɛni tin we bad.
56001009	I fɔ biliv di tru mɛsej we nɔ go chenj, dat na di sem mɛsej we wi lan dɛn; ɛn i fɔ fala am wit ɔl in at. If i du dat, insɛf go ebul lan pipul dɛn tin we gud fɔ dɛn, so dat i go kɔrej dɛn ɛn sho dɛn wan we de tɔk se dɛn tin we i de lan dɛn nɔ rayt, se dɛn nɔ fɔ de tɔk so.
56001010	Plɛnti pipul de, we nɔ de yɛri wɔd, we de mek ɔda pipul ful wit di nɔnsɛns we dɛn de tɔk, ɛn na dɛn Ju pipul mɔ de du so.
56001011	Yu fɔ mek dɛn pipul ya tap fɔ tɛl pipul dɛn tin we dɛn de tɔk, bikɔs dɛn de skata mami, dadi, ɛn pikin, we dɛn de lan dɛn tin we dɛn nɔ fɔ lan dɛn. Dɛn de du dat fɔ mek mɔni nɔmɔ, ɛn dat na tin we fɔ mek dɛn shem.
56001012	Wan pan dɛn yon prɔfɛt, we insɛf kɔmɔt Krit, na in bin tɔk se, “Pipul we kɔmɔt Krit nɔba tɔk tru, dɛn na wikɛd bist, dɛn les ɛn dɛn de it tumɔs.”
56001013	Ɛn wetin i tɔk na tru, na dat mek yu fɔ tɔk pan dɛn tra nga wan, so dat dɛn go biliv Gɔd gud gud,
56001014	ɛn lɛf fɔ biliv dɛn stori we na dɛn Ju pipul dɛnsɛf mek, ɛn lɛf fɔ du dɛn tin we dɛn pipul we dɔn tɔn dɛn bak pan di tru tin, tɛl dɛn fɔ du.
56001015	Ɔltin klin to pipul we gɛt klin at; bɔt natin nɔ klin to pipul we nɔ gɛt klin at ɛn we nɔ biliv Gɔd, bikɔs na dɔti tin dɛn de mɛmba ɛn na dat de na dɛn at.
56001016	Dɛn de se dɛn no Gɔd, bɔt di tin dɛn we dɛn de du sho se dɛn nɔ no am. Dɛn gɛt bad at, dɛn nɔ de yɛri wɔd, dɛn nɔ fit fɔ du ɛni tin we gud.
56002001	Bɔt yu fɔ de lan pipul dɛn tin we wi bin de lan dɛn bɔt aw Gɔd want mɔta lman fɔ liv ɛn ɔl wetin i want dɛn fɔ du.
56002002	Tɛl di bigman dɛn se dɛn fɔ soba, dɛn fɔ gɛt sɛns, ɛn dɛn fɔ de kɔntrol dɛnsɛf; dɛn fɔ ol Gɔd tra nga wan, dɛn fɔ lɛk fɔ du gud ɛn dɛn fɔ ebul bia wɛn dɛn de sɔfa.
56002003	Semwe so, tɛl di big uman dɛn se dɛn fɔ de du lɛkɛ aw dɛn uman we de waka wit Gɔd fɔ du. Dɛn nɔ fɔ tɔk bad bɔt pipul, dɛn nɔ fɔ drink sote dɛn nɔ ebul lɛf wayn igen. Dɛn fɔ de lan pipul dɛn tin we gud fɔ dɛn,
56002004	so dat di yɔng uman dɛn go no se dɛn fɔ lɛk dɛn man ɛn dɛn pikin,
56002005	ɛn dɛn go no se dɛn fɔ ebul kɔntrol dɛnsɛf ɛn dɛn nɔ fɔ miks pan dɔti layf, dɛn fɔ de du dɛn os biznɛs gud, dɛn fɔ de du wetin dɛn man tɛl dɛn fɔ du, so dat nɔbɔdi nɔ go tɔk bad bɔt Gɔd in mɛsej.
56002006	Semwe so, yu fɔ wɔn di yɔng man dɛn fɔ de kɔntrol dɛnsɛf.
56002007	Yusɛf, bay aw yu de du ɔl wetin yu de du, na yu pipul fɔ de fala fɔ du gud. Wɛn yu de tich pipul, yu fɔ sho dɛn se yu min wetin yu de tɔk ɛn yu fɔ siryɔs.
56002008	Pik yu wɔd dɛn gud gud so dat pipul nɔ go gɛt ɛni tin fɔ se, ɛn dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk yu go shem, bikɔs dɛn nɔ go gɛt ɛni bad tin fɔ tɔk bɔt wi.
56002009	Slev fɔ de yɛri dɛn masta wɔd ɛn tray fɔ sati sfay dɛn pan ɔltin. Dɛn nɔ fɔ de agyu wit dɛn
56002010	ɔ tif dɛn. Bɔt dɛn fɔ sho dɛn masta se dɛn gud ɛn dɛn na pipul we dɛn masta kin biliv, so dat dɛn go mek pipul want fɔ yɛri ɛn biliv dɛn tin we wi de lan dɛn bɔt Gɔd we de sev wi.
56002011	Gɔd dɔn sho wi aw i gud we i want sev ɔlman.
56002012	We i gud, i de sho wi se wi fɔ lɛf fɔ liv lɛkɛ pipul we nɔ no am, wi fɔ lɛf dɛn bad tin we wi want du na di wɔl, ɛn lan fɔ kɔntrol wisɛf, fɔ waka tret, ɛn fɔ waka wit am na dis wɔl,
56002013	naw we wi de wet fɔ da tɛm we wi abop se Jizɔs Krays, we na wi wɔnda ful Gɔd ɛn Sevyɔ go kam wit ɔl in wɔnda ful pawa.
56002014	I sakri fays in layf fɔ pul wi kɔmɔt pan di bad ɛn dɔti layf we wi bin liv, fɔ mek wi klin so dat wi go bi in yon pipul dɛn we want du wetin gud wit ɔl wi at.
56002015	Yu fɔ de tɛl pipul dɛn tin ya ɛn tek di pawa we Gɔd gi yu kɔrej dɛn, ɛn tɛl dɛn wan we nɔ de du rayt fɔ tap fɔ du wetin dɛn de du. Nɔ gri mek ɛnibɔdi luk se wetin yu de tɔk na tin we pɔsin nɔ fit fɔ yɛri.
56003001	Mɛmba di Kristiɛn dɛn we yu de wok wit fɔ de du wetin di gɔvmɛnt ɛn di pipul dɛn we dɛn put oba dɛn, tɛl dɛn fɔ du ɛn fɔ rɛdi fɔ du ɔltin we gud.
56003002	Tɛl dɛn mek dɛn nɔ tɔk bad bɔt ɛnibɔdi, mek dɛn nɔ lɛk fɔ mek plaba, mek dɛn de bia wit pipul ɛn mek dɛn nɔ ala pan ɛnibɔdi.
56003003	Tɛm bin de we wisɛf bin de pan fulish layf, wi nɔ bin de lisin to Gɔd, wi nɔ bin de lisin to mɔta lman, ɛn wi nɔ bin de du wetin rayt. Wi nɔ bin ebul kɔntrol wisɛf, ɛn na wetin wi at tɛl wi nɔmɔ wi bin de fala; wi bin de pan ɔl kayn ɛnjɔymɛnt, na bad nɔmɔ wi bin de mɛmba fɔ pipul, wi bin de jɛlɔs pipul, pipul nɔ bin lɛk wi ɛn wisɛf nɔ bin lɛk dɛn.
56003004	Bɔt we Gɔd, we de sev pipul, want sho wi aw i gud ɛn aw i lɛk wi,
56003005	i sev wi; ɛn nɔto fɔseka ɛni gud tin we wi bin dɔn du mek i du so, bɔt na bikɔs i sɔri fɔ wi, na dat mek i mek in Spirit klin wi layf ɛn gi wi nyu spirit ɛn nyu layf.
56003006	Fɔseka wetin Jizɔs, we de sev pipul, du, Gɔd mek in Spirit kam pan wi wit ɔl in pawa,
56003007	so dat di gud we Jizɔs du fɔ wi, go mek ɔltin rayt bitwin wi ɛn Gɔd ɛn wi go gɛt da layf we go de sote go we wi de abop fɔ gɛt.
56003008	Na tru tin a de tɛl yu so, ɛn yu fɔ biliv am. A want fɔ mek yu mek shɔ se dɛn du dɛn tin ya, so dat dɛn wan we biliv pan Gɔd go want du gud wok we go ɛp ɔlman.
56003009	Bɔt nɔ gɛt natin fɔ du wit dɛn nɔnsɛns agyu, nɔ agyu bɔt wi gra npapa-papa dɛn nem, nɔ mek plaba ɛn fɛt bɔt dɛn tin we di Lɔ se wi fɔ du. Ɔl dat nɔ min natin ɛn dɛn nɔ go mek yu gen ɛni tin.
56003010	Yu fɔ wɔn di pɔsin we de skata pipul, tu ɔ tri tɛm; if i nɔ yɛri, yu nɔ fɔ gɛt ɛni tin fɔ du wit am igen.
56003011	Yu no se pɔsin lɛkɛ dat in layf nɔ bɛtɛ, ɛn i de pan sin; insɛf dɔn kɔndɛm insɛf.
56003012	Wɛn a sɛn Atɛmas ɔ Taychikɔs go to yu, tray fɔ kam mit mi na Niko po lis, bikɔs a dɔn mekɔp fɔ tap de wɛn di kol sizin kam.
56003013	Tray fɔ ɛp Zinas, we na lɔya, ɛn Apɔlɔs fɔ mek dɛn bigin go patrol, ɛn mek shɔ se dɛn gɛt ɔltin we dɛn fɔ gɛt.
56003014	Sho wi pipul aw fɔ yus dɛn tɛm fɔ du gud wok, so dat dɛn kin ɛp ɔda pipul fɔ gɛt wetin dɛn fɔ gɛt; dɛn nɔ fɔ du ɛni wok we nɔ go ɛp ɔda pipul.
56003015	Ɔl dɛn pipul we de naya, sɛn adu fɔ yu. Tɛl ɔl wi Kristiɛn padi dɛn adu. Mek Gɔd sho una ɔl aw i gud.
57001001	Mi, Pɔl, we de na jel fɔseka Jizɔs Krays, mi ɛn wi brɔda Timoti, de rayt yu, Faylimɔn, wi Kristiɛn brɔda we de ɛp wi pan di wok.
57001002	Dis lɛta ya na fɔ Afia insɛf we na wi Kristiɛn sista, ɛn Akipɔs we de wok tra nga wan fɔ Krays pan ɔl we pipul de fɛt am, ɛn fɔ dɛn Kristiɛn pipul we de mit na una os.
57001003	A de pre mek Gɔd we na wi Papa ɛn Masta Jizɔs Krays sho una aw i gud ɛn gi una kol at.
57001004	Faylimɔn, ɔltɛm we a de pre, a de tɛl Gɔd tɛnki fɔ yu we na mi Kristiɛn brɔda,
57001005	bikɔs a yɛri se yu lɛk Gɔd in pipul dɛn ɛn yu abop pan Masta Jizɔs.
57001006	A de pre mek di abop we una abop pan Jizɔs ɛp ɔda pipul fɔ sabi mɔ ɛn mɔ bɔt di blɛsin we Gɔd de gi wi we wi gɛt wanwɔd wit Krays.
57001007	Mi brɔda, a kin gladi bad ɛn a kin tek kɔrej wɛn a yɛri aw yu lɛk Gɔd in pipul dɛn, bikɔs yu dɔn mek ɔl Gɔd in pipul dɛn at gladi.
57001008	We mi na yu Kristiɛn brɔda, a gɛt di pawa fɔ tɛl yu wetin yu fɔ du,
57001009	bɔt bikɔs a lɛk yu, a nɔ de du dat, a jɛs de beg yu nɔmɔ, pan ɔl we a de wok fɔ Jizɔs Krays ɛn naw sɛf a de na jel fɔseka di wok we a bin du fɔ am.
57001010	A de beg yu fɔ Onɛsimɔs we Gɔd dɔn mek bi mi pikin. I bi mi pikin frɔm di tɛm we dɛn put mi na jel.
57001011	Onɛsimɔs nɔ bin de ɛp yu fɔs tɛm, bɔt naw i de ɛp wi ɔl tu.
57001012	So a de sɛn am go bak to yu, ɛn i go kam lɛkɛ se na misɛf de kam to yu.
57001013	A bin fɔ lɛk mek Onɛsimɔs de wit mi naya, naw we a de na jel fɔseka di Gud Nyus, so dat i kin ɛp mi naw we yu nɔ de wit mi so.
57001014	Bɔt a nɔ go kip am wit mi naya if yu nɔ gri. Na dat mek a de sɛn am go bak to yu, mek i nɔ bi se na fos a de fos fɔ mek i ɛp mi naya, pas yu gri fɔ mek i du dat.
57001015	Sɔntɛm Onɛsimɔs bin lɛf yu fɔ sɔm tɛm so dat wɛn i go bak to yu, i nɔ go lɛf yu igen.
57001016	I nɔ de kam bak to yu lɛkɛ slev nɔmɔ, i dɔn pas dat naw. I de kam naw lɛkɛ yu Kristiɛn brɔda fɔseka wi Masta. A lɛk am bad, bɔt yu go lɛk am pas mi naw we i de wok fɔ yu ɛn pantap dat, na yu Kristiɛn brɔda.
57001017	If yu tek mi lɛkɛ yu kɔmpin wokman, yu go ol Onɛsimɔs lɛkɛ aw yu bin fɔ ol mi.
57001018	If i bin dɔn du yu bad ɔ if i bin gɛt fɔ pe yu, mek a pe fɔ am.
57001019	A de sayn naya wit mi yon an: Mi, Pɔl, go pe yu ɛni tin we Onɛsimɔs gɛt fɔ pe yu. (A nɔ go tɔk bɔt di dɛt we yu gɛt fɔ pe mi, da dɛt de na yu layf.)
57001020	A de beg yu, mi brɔda, duya, du dis fɔ mi fɔseka wi Masta. Mi na yu Kristiɛn brɔda, duya, mek mi at gladi.
57001021	Lɛkɛ aw a de rayt yu so, a biliv se yu go du wetin a dɔn beg yu fɔ du, ɛn a biliv se yu go du pas wetin a dɔn beg yu fɔ du sɛf.
57001022	Wan ɔda tin, a want fɔ mek yu rɛdi ples fɔ mi. A op se Gɔd go ansa di pre we una ɔl de pre ɛn pul mi insay dis jel fɔ mek a go mit una bak.
57001023	Ɛpa fras, we wi ɔl tu de jel fɔseka Jizɔs Krays, tɛl una adu.
57001024	Mak, Ari stakɔs, Dimas ɛn Lukas we wi ɔl de wok togɛda dɛnsɛf tɛl una adu.
57001025	A de pre mek di Masta Jizɔs Krays sho una aw i gud.
58001001	Fɔstɛm, Gɔd bin de tɔk to wi gra npapa-papa dɛn, plɛnti tɛm, ɛn i bin de yus difrɛn difrɛn we. Na in prɔfɛt dɛn i bin de sɛn fɔ tɛl wi gra npapa-papa dɛn in wɔd.
58001002	Bɔt dis tɛm we di wɔl de dɔn, na in Pikin i sɛn fɔ tɛl wi in wɔd. Na bay dis Pikin ya, i mek ɔl di wɔl, ɛn na in i pik fɔ gɛt ɔltin we i gɛt.
58001003	I de sho pipul Gɔd in wɔnda ful pawa. Wɛn una si di Pikin, una dɔn si Gɔd, ɛn na di Pikin in wɔd we gɛt pawa de mek ɔltin na di wɔl de aw dɛn fɔ de. Afta di Pikin dɔn pul mɔta lman sin kɔmɔt pan dɛn, so dat dɛn go klin na Gɔd yay, i go na ɛvin ɛn sidɔm na Gɔd we de rul ɔltin, in raytan.
58001004	Gɔd mek in Pikin pas di enjɛl dɛn fawe, lɛkɛ aw di nem we i gi am pas di enjɛl dɛn nem fawe.
58001005	Wan enjɛl nɔ de we Gɔd dɔn tɛl se, “Yu na mi Pikin; a dɔn bi yu Papa tide.” Ɔ Gɔd nɔ tɔk bɔt ɛni enjɛl se, “A go bi in Papa, ɛn in go bi mi Pikin.”
58001006	Ɛn igen, wɛn Gɔd bin want sɛn in fɔs Pikin kam na wɔl, Gɔd se, “Una ɔl we na mi enjɛl dɛn fɔ nil dɔng bifo mi Pikin.”
58001007	Wɛn Gɔd tɔk bɔt di enjɛl dɛn, i se, “A mek di enjɛl dɛn we de sav mi tan lɛkɛ briz, ɛn lɛkɛ faya we de blez.”
58001008	Bɔt wɛn Gɔd tɔk bɔt in Pikin, i se, “O Gɔd, yu go rul sote go! Ɛn yu de rul di rayt we.
58001009	Yu lɛk wetin rayt, yu nɔ lɛk wetin nɔ rayt. Na dat mek Gɔd we na yu Gɔd pik yu fɔ mek yu gɛt ɔna ɛn jɔy pas ɔl yu kɔmpin dɛn.”
58001010	Gɔd tɔk igen se, “Masta, da tɛm we natin nɔ bin de yet, na yusɛf mek di wɔl ɛn na yu yon an yu tek mek ɔltin we de na di klawd.
58001011	Ɔltin we yu mek go dɔn, bɔt yu go de sote go; ɔl dɛn tin de go ol ɛn pwɛl lɛkɛ aw klos de ol ɛn pwɛl.
58001012	Yu go fol dɛn lɛkɛ ol klos we pɔsin de fol, dɛn go chenj lɛkɛ aw pɔsin de chenj in ol klos fɔ nyu wan. Bɔt yu go de sote go, ɛn yu nɔ go ol.”
58001013	G ɔd nɔ tɛl ɛni wan pan in enjɛl dɛn se, “Sidɔm na mi raytan sote a mek yu mas dɛn wan we nɔ lɛk yu lɛkɛ na grɔn yu de mas.”
58001014	Udat na di enjɛl dɛn? Dɛn na spirit ɛn dɛn na Gɔd in mɛse nja dɛn; na dɛn Gɔd de sɛn fɔ ɛp dɛn pipul we Gɔd go sev.
58002001	Na dat mek, wi fɔ put ɔl wi at pan di tru wɔd we dɛn dɔn tɛl wi, so dat wi nɔ go kɔmɔt na di rayt rod.
58002002	Wi no se, di mɛsej we di enjɛl dɛn bin bring fɔ wi na tru. Ɛnibɔdi we bin jomp dɛn wɔd, ɛn we bin du wetin di enjɛl dɛn nɔ tɛl am fɔ du, Gɔd pɔnish da pɔsin de di rayt we.
58002003	Wetin mek wi fil se, wi go pul wi ed pan di pɔnish we Gɔd go pɔnish mɔta lman, if wi nɔ gri fɔ dis wɔnda ful we we Gɔd de sev wi? Na Jizɔs we na di Masta, fɔs tɛl wi bɔt di wɔnda ful we we Gɔd go sev wi, dɔn dɛn pipul we yɛri am, dɛnsɛf pruv to wi se na tru.
58002004	Gɔd insɛf pruv se in mɛsej bɔt di wɔnda ful we we i go sev pipul, na tru, bay di wɔnda ful tin we i du we sho wetin gɛt fɔ bi bambay; we i du ɔl kayn big wok we mek pipul wɔnda; ɛn we i mek in Spirit gi pipul dɛn pawa fɔ du difrɛn difrɛn tin lɛkɛ aw in want.
58002005	Gɔd nɔ bin pik enjɛl dɛn fɔ rul na di nɛks wɔl, we wi de tɔk bɔt.
58002006	Bɔt dɛn rayt wan say na in Buk se, “Gɔd, udat na mɔtalman we mek yu fɔ tink bɔt am? Mɔtalman nɔto ɛnitin, so wi wɔnda wetin mek yu kam na wɔl fɔ ɛp am?
58002007	Yu mek enjɛl pas mɔtalman fɔ shɔt tɛm, dɛn yu gi mɔtalman pawa ɛn ɔna.
58002008	Semwe so, yu mek mɔtalman fɔ rul ɔltin.” Wɛn dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se “Gɔd mek mɔta lman fɔ rul ɔltin,” dat min se, natin nɔ de we mɔta lman nɔ go rul. Wi nɔ si we mɔta lman de rul ɔltin yet.
58002009	Bɔt wi no se Jizɔs de rul ɔltin. Fɔstɛm, Gɔd bin mek di enjɛl dɛn pas Jizɔs fɔ shɔt tɛm, so di lɛk we Gɔd lɛk mɔta lman ɛn di sɔri we i sɔri fɔ am, mek i mek Jizɔs sɔfa ɛn day fɔseka mɔta lman. Bikɔs Jizɔs sɔfa ɛn day, dat mek Gɔd gi am pawa, ɔna ɛn rɛspɛkt.
58002010	Bikɔs na Gɔd mek ɔltin ɛn na in de kip ɔltin, i rayt we i mek Jizɔs sɔfa aw i sɔfa fɔ dɔn di wok we i kam fɔ du, so dat plɛnti pipul go bi Gɔd in pikin dɛn, ɛn go na ɛvin. Na Krays de lid dɛn pipul de so dat i go sev dɛn.
58002011	Na Jizɔs we de mek sin nɔ gɛt pawa oba pipul, ɛn ɔl dɛn pipul we i dɔn pul ɔnda sin in pawa, gɛt wan Papa. Na dat mek Jizɔs gladi fɔ kɔl dɛn in brɔda dɛn.
58002012	Jizɔs se, “Gɔd, a go tɛl mi brɔda dɛn bɔt yu; a go tinap di say we yu pipul dɛn gɛda fɔ prez yu.”
58002013	I tɔk igen se, “Na Gɔd a put ɔl mi at pan.” I tɔk ɔda say se, “A de ya wit ɔl di pikin dɛn we Gɔd dɔn gi mi.”
58002014	We dɛn pikin ya na mɔta lman, na dat mek Jizɔs insɛf kam na wɔl lɛkɛ mɔta lman, so dat di day we i day go pwɛl Setan, we gɛt pawa fɔ kil, ɔltogɛda.
58002015	So, i go sev ɔl dɛn pipul we bin de lɛkɛ slev ɔnda Setan ɔl di tɛm we dɛn liv, bikɔs dɛn bin de fred fɔ day.
58002016	I plen naw se, nɔto di enjɛl dɛn i bin kam fɔ ɛp, na Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.
58002017	Na dat mek, i bin tan lɛkɛ aw in brɔda dɛn tan pan ɔltin, so dat i go sɔri fɔ dɛn ɛn wok fɔ Gɔd wit ɔl in at, lɛkɛ di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we i bi, so dat i go padin ɔl Gɔd in pipul dɛn sin.
58002018	Na bikɔs Setan bin dɔn tray Jizɔs ɛn Jizɔs bin dɔn sɔfa, mek i ebul ɛp dɛn pipul we Setan de tray.
58003001	Mi Kristiɛn brɔda dɛn, Gɔd kɔl unasɛf fɔ bi in yon pipul. Na dat mek una fɔ mɛmba Jizɔs we Gɔd dɔn sɛn fɔ bi di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, fɔseka wetin wi biliv.
58003002	Na Gɔd pik Jizɔs fɔ du in wok, ɛn Jizɔs du ɔl wetin Gɔd bin want lɛkɛ aw i bin want mek i du am, lɛkɛ aw Mozis bin du wetin Gɔd bin want am fɔ du fɔ Gɔd in pipul dɛn.
58003003	I rayt fɔ mek pipul rɛspɛkt ɛn ɔna Jizɔs pas aw dɛn bin rɛspɛkt ɛn ɔna Mozis, lɛkɛ aw pɔsin de prez di wan we bil os, pas aw i de prez di os insɛf.
58003004	Na tru se, os nɔ de we nɔto pɔsin bil, bɔt na Gɔd mek ɔltin.
58003005	Mozis na bin wokman we put ɔl in at pan ɔl di wok we i bin de du na Gɔd in Os. I bin de tɛl pipul wetin Gɔd go se bambay.
58003006	Bɔt Krays na di Pikin we de luk Gɔd, we na di Papa, in Os, ɛn i bin du in wok lɛkɛ aw Gɔd want am fɔ du. Wi we na Gɔd yon pipul, go bi Gɔd in Os, if wi gɛt kɔrej ɔltɛm ɛn put wi at pan ɔl wetin Gɔd prɔmis se in go du fɔ wi.
58003007	Na dat mek wi fɔ lisin Gɔd in Spirit we de tɛl wi se, “If una yɛri Gɔd in vɔys tide,
58003008	una lisin am, una nɔ tranga yes lɛkɛ aw una pipul dɛn bin tranga yes lɔntɛm, wɛn Gɔd bin tray dɛn na di dɛzat, dɛn nɔ bin gri mek Gɔd rul dɛn.
58003009	Gɔd se, Lɔntɛm, wɛn una granpapa-papa dɛn bin de na di dɛzat, dɛn bin de kɔmplen ɛn tray mi plɛnti tɛm fɔ si aw lɔng a go bia wit dɛn, pan ɔl we dɛn si wetin a bin du wɛn dɛn bin de fɔti ia na di dɛzat.
58003010	Na dat mek a bin vɛks pan dɛn, ɛn a se, ‘Dɛn dɔn pul dɛn at kɔmɔt pan mi, ɛn dɛn nɔ ɔndastand di we we a de du ɔltin.’
58003011	A bin vɛks pan dɛn, so a tek oth se, ‘Dɛn nɔ go kam da say we a de, dɛn nɔ go sidɔm blo!’ ”
58003012	Mi Kristiɛn brɔda dɛn, una fɔ tek tɛm, so dat nɔn pan una nɔ go gɛt bad at ɛn so nɔ biliv pan Gɔd dat i go tɔn in bak pan Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go.
58003013	Bɔt una fɔ de kɔrej una kɔmpin dɛn ɔltɛm, so dat sin nɔ go mek ɛni wan pan una ful ɛn mek una tra nga yes. Na dat una fɔ de du ɛvri de, wans nɔmɔ “Tide” na tide.
58003014	Una fɔ mɛmba se, if wi put wi at pan ɔl wetin Gɔd tɛl wi se in go du lɛkɛ aw wi bin de du di tɛm we wi jɛs bi Kristiɛn, ɛn wi nɔ tap fɔ du dat, wi go gɛt pan ɔl wetin Krays gɛt.
58003015	Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “If una yɛri Gɔd in vɔys tide, una nɔ tranga yes, lɛkɛ aw una granpapa-papa dɛn bin tranga yes lɔntɛm, we dɛn nɔ bin gri mek Gɔd rul dɛn.”
58003016	Udat na di pipul dɛn we bin yɛri Gɔd in vɔys, bɔt dɛn nɔ bin gri fɔ mek i rul dɛn? Na ɔl dɛn pipul we na bin slev na Ijipt, we Mozis bin fri.
58003017	Udat na di pipul dɛn we Gɔd bin vɛks pan fɔ fɔti ia? Gɔd bin vɛks pan dɛn pipul we bin sin ɛn dɛn bin day na di dɛzat.
58003018	Udat na di pipul dɛn we Gɔd bin prɔmis se, nɔ go go na di ples we i de ɛn dɛn nɔ go sidɔm blo? Gɔd bin de tɔk bɔt dɛn pipul we nɔ bin du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du.
58003019	So, wi si se, dɛn nɔ bin ebul go na di ples we Gɔd de, bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin biliv am.
58004001	Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis wi se, wi go go na di ples we i de, ɛn wi go sidɔm blo. Na dat mek wi fɔ tek tɛm, so dat dɛn nɔ go tɛl ɛni wan pan wi se, i nɔ go go de.
58004002	Pipul dɔn tɛl wi di Gud Nyus bɔt Gɔd, lɛkɛ aw dɛn bin dɔn tɛl dɛn lɔntɛm pipul we bin de na di dɛzat; bɔt pan ɔl dat wi si se di Gud Nyus we dɛn yɛri, nɔ bin ɛp dɛn, bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin biliv am.
58004003	Bɔt wi we biliv go go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn wi go sidɔm blo. I de plen wan na Gɔd in Buk se, “A bin vɛks so a prɔmis se, dɛn nɔ go go na di ples we a de ɛn dɛn nɔ go sidɔm blo.” Gɔd tɔk dat pan ɔl we i bin dɔn du ɔl di wok frɔm di tɛm we i mek di wɔl.
58004004	Dɛn rayt wan ɔda say na Gɔd in Buk bɔt di de we mek sɛvin de, se, “Di de we mek sɛvin de, Gɔd blo, bikɔs i bin dɔn du ɔl in wok dɔn.”
58004005	Dɛn rayt bɔt di sem tin na ɔda say we Gɔd se, “Dɛn nɔ go go na di ples we a de ɛn sidɔm blo.”
58004006	Na tru se, sɔm pipul go gɛt chans fɔ go na di ples we Gɔd de, ɛn na tru igen se, dɛn lɔntɛm pipul we bin yɛri di Gud Nyus, nɔ bin biliv am, so dɛn nɔ bin go na di ples we Gɔd de.
58004007	Na dat mek, Gɔd dɔn fiks ɔda de, dat na “Tide”. Afta plɛnti ia dɔn pas, Gɔd mek Devid tɔk dɛn wɔd ya we a jɛs tɔk, we se, “If una yɛri Gɔd in vɔys tide, una nɔ tranga yes.”
58004008	If dɛn lɔntɛm pipul bin rich di say we Jɔshwa bin de lid dɛn go, ɛn di ples we Gɔd de ɛn dɛn bin sidɔm blo, Gɔd nɔ bin fɔ tɔk bɔt ɔda de we nɔ kam yet.
58004009	Wetin Gɔd tɔk sho wi se, tɛm stil de we Gɔd in pipul dɛn go blo lɛkɛ aw Gɔd blo di de we mek sɛvin.
58004010	If ɛnibɔdi go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn sidɔm blo, di pɔsin go lɛf ɔl in wok, lɛkɛ aw Gɔd insɛf lɛf in wok ɛn blo.
58004011	Na dat mek, wi fɔ tray gud gud wan fɔ go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn sidɔm blo. Mek wi ɔl naya go na di ples we Gɔd de rul ɛn sidɔm blo, mek nɔn nɔ lɛf we nɔ go go de bikɔs i nɔ du wetin Gɔd want lɛkɛ aw wi gra npapa-papa dɛn bin du we mek dɛn nɔ go de.
58004012	Wi no se Gɔd in wɔd gɛt layf ɛn i gɛt pawa. In wɔd shap pas sɔd we gɛt tu ɛj. I de go insay insay pɔsin sote i rich di say we in at ɛn in spirit dɛn mit togɛda, lɛkɛ aw sɔd de kɔt bon midul. Na so Gɔd in wɔd dɛn de go insay insay pɔsin in at ɛn sho ɔl wetin lib de.
58004013	Natin nɔ de we Gɔd mek we i nɔ de si; natin nɔ de we ayd, we Gɔd nɔ de si; Gɔd de si ɔltin, ɛn na bifo am wi ɔl gɛt fɔ tinap bambay ɛn tɔk ɔl wetin wi bin du na wɔl.
58004014	Wi fɔ stil biliv di Gud Nyus we wi bin dɔn biliv, bikɔs pɔsin de we na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na in dɔn go na di ples we Gɔd de. Na Jizɔs, we na Gɔd in Pikin, na di edman.
58004015	Di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin na di wan we wi gɛt we ɔnda stand ɔltin we tra nga fɔ wi, bikɔs insɛf na bin wan pan wi, ɛn ɔl wetin de mit wi fɔ tray wi bin dɔn mit am. Bɔt i nɔ sin wande.
58004016	Fɔseka dat, wi nɔ fɔ fred. Lɛ wi kam bifo Gɔd we go sho wi aw i lɛk wi, ɛn we go sɔri fɔ wi, ɛn ɛp wi di rayt tɛm.
58005001	Ɛni edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we na mɔta lman, fɔ tinap fɔ mɔta lman bifo Gɔd, so dat i kin mek sakri fays fɔ dɛn sin.
58005002	Bikɔs insɛf na mɔta lman ɛn i kin du tin we nɔ rayt, i kin sɔri fɔ dɛn wan we nɔ du di rayt tin bikɔs dɛn nɔ no wetin rayt.
58005003	Na bikɔs insɛf na mɔta lman we kin du tin we nɔ rayt, mek i fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ in yon sin, jɛs lɛkɛ aw i de mek sakri fays fɔ di ɔda pipul dɛn sin.
58005004	Nɔbɔdi nɔ de mek insɛf edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na Gɔd nɔmɔ de kɔl pɔsin fɔ du dis kayn wok lɛkɛ aw i bin pik Erɔn lɔntɛm fɔ du di sem kayn wok.
58005005	Semwe so, Krays nɔ put insɛf ɔp fɔ mek i bi edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na Gɔd tɛl am se, “Yu na mi Pikin, a dɔn bi yu Papa tide.”
58005006	Ɛn Gɔd tɔk ɔda say se, “Yu na di wan we de mek sakrifays fɔ pipul sin sote go, yu go du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlkizidɛk insɛf bin du.”
58005007	Wɛn Jizɔs bin de na dis wɔl, i ala lawd ɛn kray wɛn i de pre to Gɔd we ebul sev am, mek i nɔ day. Gɔd yɛri di pre we Jizɔs bin pre bikɔs Jizɔs bin gri fɔ du ɔl wetin Gɔd want am fɔ du.
58005008	Bɔt ivin we Jizɔs na bin Gɔd in Pikin, di sɔfa we i sɔfa mek i no gud wan wetin i min fɔ du wetin Gɔd se.
58005009	Wɛn Jizɔs dɔn sho se in ebul du ɔltin, i kam bi di wan we de sev ɔl dɛn pipul we de du wetin i tɛl dɛn fɔ du, ɔltɛm.
58005010	Na dat mek Gɔd pik am fɔ bi edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, lɛkɛ Mɛlki zidɛk.
58005011	Plɛnti tin stil de we wi want tɛl una bɔt wetin wi jɛs tɔk, bɔt dɛn tin ya tra nga fɔ ɛksplen to una, bikɔs una nɔ de ɔnda stand kwik.
58005012	I dɔn rich tɛm we unasɛf fɔ bigin lan ɔda pipul bikɔs i dɔn te we una de lan, bɔt pɔsin stil gɛt fɔ lan una di fɔs tin dɛn we una bin dɔn lan bɔt Gɔd in mɛsej. Una fɔ stil drink milk lɛkɛ pikin we de sɔk bɔbi, bikɔs una nɔ du yet fɔ it tin we fɔ cham lɛkɛ big pɔsin.
58005013	Ɛnibɔdi we stil de drink milk, na pikin stil, i nɔ no yet wetin gud ɛn wetin bad na Gɔd in yay.
58005014	Bɔt pɔsin we de it tin we fɔ cham, na big pɔsin; i dɔn no wetin gud ɛn wetin bad, bikɔs i dɔn lan aw fɔ no wetin gud ɛn bad bay dɛn tin we i de du we rayt na Gɔd in yay.
58006001	So, mek wi lɛf fɔ de tɔk bɔt dɛn tin we wi bin de tɛl una bɔt Krays, fɔstɛm; lɛ wi go bifo ɛn lan dɛn tin we bigman fɔ lan bɔt Krays. Wi tap fɔ lan una dɛn tin we wi bin dɔn lan una fɔstɛm we wi se pipul fɔ chenj ɛn lɛf fɔ du dɛn bad tin we go mek dɛn day, ɛn dɛn fɔ biliv pan Gɔd.
58006002	Wi nɔ fɔ bigin fɔ tɛl una bak bɔt dɛn tin we wi bin dɔn tɛl una, dat is: una fɔ was unasɛf fɔ mek una klin na Gɔd in yay; una fɔ le an pan pɔsin ed fɔ pre fɔ am; Gɔd go mek dɛn pipul we bin dɔn day rayz frɔm dɛn grev; ɛn Gɔd gɛt fɔ jɔj ɔlman di las de.
58006003	Mek wi lɛf fɔ tɔk bɔt dɛn tin ya ɛn go bifo; ɛn na dat wi go du, if Gɔd gri.
58006004	Wi fɔ go bifo, bikɔs pɔsin nɔ go bring dɛn pipul we dɔn tɔn dɛn bak pan Gɔd, kam bak to Gɔd, bikɔs dɛn pipul de bin dɔn no wetin tru bɔt Gɔd, dɛn bin dɔn gɛt dɛn blɛsin we Gɔd de gi, dɛn bin dɔn gɛt dɛn yon pat pan Gɔd in Spirit,
58006005	dɛn bin dɔn si se Gɔd in mɛsej gud, ɛn dɛn bin dɔn no bɔt dɛn pawa we gɛt fɔ kam.
58006006	If pipul dɔn no ɔl dat, dɔn dɛn stil tɔn dɛn bak pan Gɔd, natin nɔ go bring dɛn kam bak to Gɔd ɛn mek dɛn lɛf dɛn bad tin we dɛn de du, igen, bikɔs dɛn de nel Gɔd in Pikin na di krɔs wan tɛm mɔ ɛn laf am bifo ɔlman.
58006007	Wɛn plɛnti ren dɔn fɔdɔm pan grɔn, dat kin mek tin gro fɔ dɛn pipul we de mek fam, dat min se Gɔd dɔn blɛs di grɔn.
58006008	Bɔt if na chu kchuk bush ɛn gras nɔmɔ gro, da grɔn de nɔ bɛtɛ igen. Di tɛm dɔn kam klos we Gɔd go kɔs di grɔn ɛn mek faya bɔn ɔltin we lib de ɛn pwɛl di grɔn.
58006009	Mi padi dɛn we a lɛk, bɔt pan ɔl we wi tɔk lɛkɛ aw wi tɔk so sɛf, wi shɔ se una go du bɛtɛ, pas fɔstɛm, so dat Gɔd go sev una.
58006010	Gɔd nɔ de du ɛnibɔdi bad, so i nɔ go fɔgɛt di wok we una dɔn du, ɛn i nɔ go fɔgɛt di lɛk we una lɛk am we una bin ɛp una kɔmpin Kristiɛn dɛn, ɛn aw una stil de ɛp dɛn.
58006011	Di tin we de na wi at we wi want una fɔ du, na fɔ mek una ɔl de tray fɔ du wetin Gɔd want sote una day, ɛn mek una nɔ tap fɔ du am, so dat una go gɛt dɛn tin we Gɔd gɛt fɔ una we una abop fɔ gɛt.
58006012	Wi nɔ want fɔ mek una lezi, bɔt wi want una fɔ bi lɛkɛ dɛn pipul we biliv pan Gɔd, we de bia, bikɔs dɛn na di wan dɛn, we go gɛt ɔl wetin Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis fɔ gi in pipul dɛn.
58006013	Lɔntɛm, wɛn Gɔd bin prɔmis Ebraam, na insɛf yon nem i bin tek oth se in go du wetin i bin prɔmis Ebraam, bikɔs nɔbɔdi nɔ pas am.
58006014	Da tɛm de, Gɔd tɛl Ebraam se, “Fɔ tru, a go blɛs yu ɛn a go mek yu gɛt plɛnti plɛnti pikin, gra npi kin, ɛn gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.”
58006015	Bikɔs Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis dat, Ebraam nɔ bin dawt, so i gɛt ɔl wetin Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis se i go gi am.
58006016	Wɛn pipul de mek prɔmis, dɛn kin tek pɔsin we pas dɛn fɔ swɛ, so di swɛ kin mek pipul nɔ agyu igen.
58006017	Gɔd bin want sho dɛn pipul we i go gi wetin i bin dɔn prɔmis, klia wan se, in nɔ go chenj in maynd. Na dat mek i bin tek in nem tek oth se, in go du wetin i bin dɔn prɔmis se in go du.
58006018	So, dɛn tu tin ya, dat na di prɔmis we Gɔd mek ɛn di tin we i tek oth se in go du, nɔ go chenj, bikɔs Gɔd nɔ de lay. Na dɛn tu tin ya mek wi tinap tra nga, so dat wi we dɔn go ayd to Gɔd, go put ɔl wi at pan wetin Gɔd go gi wi bambay.
58006019	Wetin wi de put ɔl wi at pan tan lɛkɛ anka fɔ wi layf, we de mek wi tinap tra nga. Na fɔseka dat, wi go go insay insay di ples we Gɔd de na ɛvin, ɛn wi go pas di big tik kɔtin we ɛng ɛn kɔba di ples we Gɔd de.
58006020	Na Jizɔs insɛf fɔs go insay da ples de bifo wi, fɔseka wi; bikɔs in na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, sote go, ɛn i de du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlki zidɛk bin du.
58007001	Mɛlki zidɛk na bin king na wan ples we nem Selɛm ɛn na in Gɔd, we pas ɔl, bin pik fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Wɛn Ebraam bin kɔmɔt fɛt na wan wa we i bin kil plɛnti king dɛn, na Mɛlki zidɛk go mit am na rod ɛn blɛs am.
58007002	Da tɛm de, Ebraam bin sheb ɔl wetin i siz na di wa, tɛn pat, ɛn i gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat. Mɛlki zidɛk min, “King we de du wetin rayt;” ɛn dɛn de kɔl am, “King we de bring kol at,” bikɔs Selɛm, di ples we i bin de rul, min “Kol at.”
58007003	Pipul nɔ no natin bɔt Mɛlki zidɛk in mama, in papa ɛn in fambul layn. Dɛn nɔ no ustɛm i bɔn ɛn ustɛm i day. So i tan lɛkɛ Gɔd in Pikin: na man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, sote go.
58007004	Una mɛmba aw Mɛlki zidɛk in pawa bin big. Wɛn Ebraam we na ɔl di Ju pipul dɛn papa bin go fɛt dɛn king, i sheb ɔl wetin i gɛt tɛn pat ɛn gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat.
58007005	Di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis tɔk bɔt dɛn Ju man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, dat na Livay in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn, we i se, di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl fɔ sheb wetin dɛn gɛt, tɛn pat, ɛn tek wan pat gi Livay in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin. Dat min se dɛn kɔntri man bin de gi dɛn Ju man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, wan pat, pan ɔl we dɛn ɔl na Ebraam in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.
58007006	Pan ɔl we Mɛlki zidɛk nɔ bin kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn, Ebraam sheb ɔl wetin i gɛt tɛn pat ɛn gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat, ɛn Mɛlki zidɛk blɛs Ebraam we Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis sɔntin.
58007007	Wi no fɔ tru se, di pɔsin we de blɛs pas di wan we i blɛs.
58007008	Dɛn Ju man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we bin kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn ɛn we bin de tek wan pat pan ɛvri tɛn pat, na pipul we bin gɛt fɔ day; bɔt Mɛlki zidɛk we tek wan pat pan di tɛn pat, na pɔsin we nɔ bin day, lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk.
58007009	Wɛn Ebraam bin sheb wetin i gɛt tɛn pat ɛn gi Mɛlki zidɛk wan pat, i bin jɛs tan lɛkɛ se na Livay insɛf tek wan pat gi Mɛlki zidɛk. (Livay na di gra npapa-papa dɛn fɔ ɔl dɛn Ju man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn we de tek wan pat pan ɛvri tɛn pat pan ɔltin fɔ gi Gɔd.)
58007010	Wi no se na so i bi, bikɔs wi no gud gud se, wɛn Mɛlki zidɛk bin go mit Ebraam, i bin jɛs tan lɛkɛ se na Livay, pan ɔl we Livay nɔ bin bɔn yet, bin gi Ebraam di wan pat fɔ gi Mɛlki zidɛk, bikɔs Livay na bin Ebraam in blɔd fambul.
58007011	Lɔntɛm Gɔd bin put di Lɔ na Mozis in an fɔ gi di Izrɛl pipul dɛn, da tɛm de sɔm pan Livay in fambul dɛn na bin man dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin na Izrɛl. If dɛn man lɛkɛ Erɔn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, bin ebul wok fɔ mek ɔl wetin Gɔd want bi, natin nɔ bin fɔ mek ɛni ɔda man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kam, we go du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlki zidɛk insɛf bin du.
58007012	If Gɔd bin pul dɛn lɔntɛm Ju man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kɔmɔt pan dɛn wok, dɔn i put ɔda pɔsin fɔ du di wok difrɛn we, dat sho se di lɔ insɛf go chenj.
58007013	Wi Masta Jizɔs we dɛn de tɔk bɔt, kɔmɔt na difrɛn fambul; nɔn pan in fambul dɛn nɔ bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, wande.
58007014	Wi no se na Juda in fambul layn wi Masta Jizɔs kɔmɔt; ɛn Mozis nɔ bin tɔk natin bɔt Juda in fambul dɛn wɛn i bin de tɔk bɔt dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.
58007015	Dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn, nɔ bin ebul fɔ mek pipul no Gɔd. Wetin mek wi no dat gud, na we Gɔd sɛn ɔda man, we tan lɛkɛ Mɛlki zidɛk, kam fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.
58007016	Nɔto fɔseka di lɔ ɛn wetin mɔta lman de du mek i bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, na bikɔs i gɛt pawa fɔ de sote go.
58007017	Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “Yu go bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin sote go, yu go du di sem kayn wok we Mɛlki zidɛk bin de du.”
58007018	So, Gɔd dɔn put di fɔs lɔ dɛn wansay, bikɔs dɛn nɔ bin gɛt pawa, dɛn nɔ bin ebul fɔ ɛp pipul.
58007019	Di Lɔ dɛn we Gɔd bin gi Mozis nɔ bin gɛt pawa fɔ mek ɔltin rayt bitwin mɔta lman ɛn Gɔd. Gɔd dɔn bring pɔsin we pas di Lɔ dɛn we i bin gi Mozis, ɛn na dis pɔsin ya wi abop pan fɔ mek wi kam klos Gɔd.
58007020	Pantap dat, Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis se, Jizɔs go bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin sote go, bɔt i nɔ bin prɔmis dat wɛn dɛn bin mek Livay in pikin dɛn bi man dɛn we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin.
58007021	Bɔt wɛn Gɔd mek Jizɔs bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, i bin mek prɔmis we i tɛl Jizɔs se, “Gɔd, we na di Masta, dɔn prɔmis se yu go bi man we de mek sakrifays fɔ pipul sin sote go; Mi wɔd nɔ go chenj.”
58007022	Na fɔseka dis prɔmis ya we Gɔd prɔmis, na dat mek Jizɔs bi di pɔsin we sho se fɔ tru di nyu agrimɛnt we Gɔd dɔn mek wit wi, pas di fɔs wan.
58007023	Di ɔda tin we difrɛn na in dis: di ɔda man dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we kɔmɔt na Livay in fambul layn, bin plɛnti bikɔs dɛn kin day, ɛn na ɔda pipul kin kam du di wok we dɛn bin de du.
58007024	Bɔt Jizɔs difrɛn, i nɔ de day, in layf de sote go. I nɔ de lɛf in wok we na fɔ mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, gi ɔda pɔsin.
58007025	Na dat mek Jizɔs gɛt pawa ɔltɛm fɔ sev dɛn pipul we de kam to Gɔd tru am. Bikɔs i gɛt layf we go de sote go, i de pre bifo Gɔd ɔltɛm fɔ dɛn.
58007026	So Jizɔs na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn i de gi wi ɔl wetin wi fɔ gɛt. I de du wetin rayt ɔltɛm; i nɔ gɛt sin na in layf; sin nɔ gɛt pawa pan am; ɛn i de na in ples we de na ɛvin.
58007027	Dɛn ɔda edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, bin de mek sakri fays ɛvri de fɔseka dɛn yon sin, bifo dɛn mek sakri fays fɔ di ɔda pipul dɛn sin. Bɔt Jizɔs nɔ bin de mek dɛn kayn sakri fays de, bikɔs i bin dɔn mek wan sakri fays nɔmɔ we go de sote go, ɛn na in layf i tek mek da sakri fays de.
58007028	Dɛn edman we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we di Lɔ we Gɔd gi Mozis se fɔ pik, na bin mɔta lman dɛn we kin du tin we nɔ rayt. Bɔt wɛn Gɔd prɔmis di prɔmis we tek di Lɔ we i gi Mozis, in ples, i pik in Pikin we dɔn sho se in ebul du ɔltin sote go.
58008001	Di tin we wi de kam tɛl una so, impɔtant pas ɔl: Di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we wi gɛt, na Jizɔs we sidɔm na Gɔd we de rul wit pawa na ɛvin, in raytan.
58008002	Fɔstɛm, dɛn ɔda man we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bin de du Gɔd in wok na bafa we mɔta lman bil, bɔt Jizɔs de wok na di ples we Gɔd de, na Gɔd bil da ples de, nɔto mɔta lman.
58008003	Ɔl dɛn edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, fɔ gi Gɔd wetin dɛn gɛt ɛn dɛn fɔ sakri fays ani mal to Gɔd. Semwe so, di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we wi gɛt, fɔ gɛt sɔntin we insɛf go gi Gɔd.
58008004	If Jizɔs bin de na dis wɔl te naw, i nɔ bin fɔ bi man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin atɔl, bikɔs dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin we de na dis wɔl de mek dɛn sakri fays ya lɛkɛ aw di Ju Lɔ se.
58008005	Di wok we dɛn bin de du bin jɛs tan lɛkɛ pikchɔ we de sho di wok we Jizɔs we na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we wi gɛt, de du na ɛvin. Di Bafa na lɛkɛ pikchɔ we sho aw di ples, we Gɔd de, tan. Wɛn Mozis bin rɛdi fɔ bil di Bafa, dat na di ples we dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin bin de du dɛn wok, Gɔd tɛl am se, “Tek tɛm bil ɔltin jɛs lɛkɛ aw a bin sho yu wɛn yu bin de na Mawnt Saynay.”
58008006	So wi si se di wok we Jizɔs de du pas di wan we dɛn ɔda man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin de du. Semwe so, di agrimɛnt we Jizɔs mek bitwin Gɔd ɛn mɔta lman bɛtɛ pas di ol wan, bikɔs na Jizɔs in agrimɛnt mek Gɔd mek prɔmis to wi, we bɛtɛ pas di fɔs wan.
58008007	If di fɔs agrimɛnt bin du fɔ sev pipul, Gɔd nɔ bin fɔ mek ɔda agrimɛnt.
58008008	Bɔt Gɔd insɛf si se di pipul dɛn nɔ bin du wetin di fɔs agrimɛnt se, na dat mek i se, “Di tɛm de kam we a go mek ɔda agrimɛnt wit di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl ɛn di wan dɛn na Juda.
58008009	Dis nyu agrimɛnt ya nɔ go tan lɛkɛ di wan we a bin mek wit dɛn granpapa-papa dɛn, da tɛm we misɛf bin tek dɛn kɔmɔt na Ijipt. Dɛn bin pwɛl di agrimɛnt we a mek wit dɛn, so a bin lɛf dɛn to dɛnsɛf.
58008010	Wɛn di tɛm rich, na di agrimɛnt dis we a go mek wit di pipul dɛn na Izrɛl: A go mek dɛn no mi lɔ dɛn ɛn mek dɛn nɔ fɔgɛt dɛn. A go bi dɛn Gɔd, ɛn dɛn go bi mi pipul.
58008011	Di pipul dɛn nɔ go gɛt fɔ lan dɛn kɔmpin ɔ dɛn brɔda igen se, ‘Una fɔ no Gɔd we na di Masta.’ Bikɔs dɛn ɔl, pikin ɛn bigman, go no mi.
58008012	A go sɔri fɔ dɛn ɛn a go padin dɛn fɔ ɔl di sin we dɛn dɔn sin, a nɔ go mɛmba dɛn sin igen.”
58008013	Wɛn Gɔd tɔk bɔt nyu agrimɛnt, dat min se, di fɔs wan dɔn ol. Wi no se ɛni tin we dɔn ol, dɔn dɔn.
58009001	Wɛn Gɔd bin mek di fɔs agrimɛnt wit mɔta lman, di agrimɛnt bin gɛt plɛnti lɔ bɔt aw pipul fɔ pre to Gɔd. Ples bin de we mɔta lman bil fɔ pre to Gɔd.
58009002	Di ples na bin Bafa. Di Bafa na bin big ples we dɛn sheb tu, dɛn kɔl di fɔs pat “Di ples we Gɔd de”. Dɛn tin we dɛn bin de kip de, na lamp, tebul, ɛn bred we pipul kin kɛr go put bifo Gɔd.
58009003	Wɛn yu pas di sɛkɛn big tik kɔtin, wan ɔda pat bin de we dɛn kɔl “Di ples we Gɔd de pas ɛni ɔda ples.”
58009004	Insay da ples de dɛn bin gɛt smɔl gold tebul we dɛn bin de bɔn insɛns we gɛt fayn smɛl. Di bɔks we di agrimɛnt we Gɔd mek wit mɔta lman de, bin de insay dis sem ples ya. Gold bin kɔba di wan ol bɔks. Insay di bɔks dɛn bin de kip wan gold pɔt we dɛn kin put da tin we dɛn kɔl mana we Gɔd bin de gi dɛn fɔ it. Erɔn in wɔki nstik we lif gro pan, ɛn dɛn tu ston we Gɔd bin rayt in lɔ dɛn pan, dɛnsɛf bin lib de.
58009005	Oba di bɔks dɛn bin gɛt sɔm krichɔ we gɛt fɛda fɔ sho pipul se Gɔd de na da ples de. Di krichɔ dɛn fɛda kɔba Gɔd in chia we i sidɔm fɔ padin pipul dɛn sin. Bɔt nɔto naw wi go ɛksplen ɔl dɛn tin ya to una gud.
58009006	Afta dɛn dɔn rɛdi di ples lɛkɛ dat, di man dɛn we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin kin go insay di fɔs ples ɔltɛm we dɛn de go du Gɔd in wok.
58009007	Bɔt na di edman we bin de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, in wan gren kin go insay di sɛkɛn ples we de insay insay, wan tɛm fɔ ia. Na di tɛm dat we i kin tek bif blɔd mek sakri fays to Gɔd fɔseka in yon sin, dɛn i kin mek sakri fays fɔ ɔl di ɔda pipul dɛn sin we dɛn nɔ bin no se na sin.
58009008	Gɔd in Spirit yus ɔl dɛn tin ya fɔ sho wi klia wan se, wans di fɔs ples na di Bafa stil de, mɔta lman nɔ gɛt rayt fɔ go insay di sɛkɛn ples we Gɔd de.
58009009	Di Bafa jɛs de sho wi dɛn tin we de naw, ɛn wetin dɛn tin de min. I sho wi se nɔto wetin pɔsin we de pre de gi ɛn di sakri fays we i de mek to Gɔd de mek ɔltin rayt bitwin in ɛn Gɔd.
58009010	Ɔl dɛn tin ya na lɔ we tɔk bɔt tin fɔ it ɛn drink ɛn aw fɔ was dɛn tin we go mek pipul klin na Gɔd yay. Ɔl dɛn lɔ ya jɛs de fɔ dis wɔl, ɛn dɛn pawa go jɛs de sote di tɛm rich we Gɔd go chenj ɔltin.
58009011	Bɔt naw we Krays dɔn kam, in na di edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin ɛn i dɔn bring di gud tin dɛn we wi dɔn gɛt naw. Di ples we i de du in wok bɛtɛ fawe pas di Bafa we de na dis wɔl. Nɔto mɔta lman mek di ples de we Krays de wok, ɛn da ples nɔ de na dis wɔl.
58009012	Wɛn Krays bin go insay di ples we Gɔd de, na wan tɛm nɔmɔ i go insay de. Nɔto got ɛn mankaw blɔd i bin sakri fays de, na in yon blɔd. Na da blɔd de i tek gi wi layf we go de sote go.
58009013	Fɔstɛm dɛn bin de tek got blɔd, mankaw blɔd, ɛn asis we kɔmɔt pan yɔng kaw we dɛn bɔn skata dɛn pan pipul we nɔ klin na Gɔd in yay, fɔ mek dɛn go klin.
58009014	If di bif dɛn blɔd bin gɛt pawa fɔ klin pipul, dat min se, Krays in blɔd gɛt pawa pas di bif dɛn blɔd fɔ klin wi at. I tek insɛf we nɔ sin wande, mek sakri fays fɔ wi, ɛn na Gɔd in Spirit we de sote go gi am pawa fɔ sakri fays insɛf. Fɔseka dat, Krays mek wi at klin, so dat wi nɔ go du bad igen we go mek wi day, bɔt wi go sav Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go.
58009015	Dis sho se na Krays tinap midul Gɔd ɛn mɔta lman, i mek nyu agrimɛnt, so dat dɛn pipul we Gɔd dɔn kɔl fɔ bi in pipul go gɛt dɛn gud tin we Gɔd prɔmis fɔ gi dɛn, ɛn dɛn gud tin de go blant dɛn sote go. Na bikɔs Krays day mek dat go bi, di day we i day mek Gɔd padin in pipul dɛn fɔ di bad we dɛn bin dɔn du, wɛn dɛn bin de ɔnda di fɔs agrimɛnt.
58009016	Wɛn pɔsin rayt pepa fɔ ɛksplen wetin pipul fɔ du in prɔpati wɛn i day, da pɔsin de fɔ day fɔs bifo di pipul dɛn go du wetin i bin rayt.
58009017	Di pepa nɔ min natin if di pɔsin nɔ day yet. Wɛn di pɔsin day, na in di pepa gɛt pawa.
58009018	Na dat mek di fɔs agrimɛnt we Gɔd bin mek wit mɔta lman nɔ bin gɛt pawa, pas nɔmɔ wɛn pipul kin tek bif blɔd mek sakri fays to Gɔd.
58009019	Lɔntɛm, Mozis bin tɛl ɔl di pipul dɛn ɔl di lɔ dɛn we Gɔd se dɛn fɔ fala. Mozis tɛl dɛn ɔl di lɔ dɛn fɔs, dɔn i tek gras we dɛn kɔl “isɔp” ɛn ship ia we dɛn kɔla wit rɛd, dɔk dɛn insay kaw blɔd ɛn insay wata, dɔn i ib ib am ɔlsay pan di Lɔ buk ɛn pan ɔl di pipul dɛn.
58009020	Wɛn i bin de ib ib di blɔd ɔlsay, i se, “Dis na di blɔd we dɛn tek mek di agrimɛnt we Gɔd tɛl una fɔ fala.”
58009021	Semwe so, Mozis bin ib ib di blɔd pan di Bafa we dɛn bin de mek sakri fays to Gɔd ɛn pan ɔl dɛn tin we dɛn kin yus wɛn dɛn de pre to Gɔd.
58009022	Fɔ tru, bay aw di Lɔ se, dɛn tin we dɛn nɔ bin de tek blɔd klin nɔ bin plɛnti. Ɔda we nɔ bin de fɔ padin pɔsin sin, pas fɔ kil bif ɛn tek di blɔd mek sakri fays to Gɔd.
58009023	Fɔstɛm, dɛn bin jɛs gɛt fɔ ib ib blɔd pan ɔl dɛn tin ya we de sho wi aw dɛn tin we de na ɛvin, tan, so dat dɛn ɔl go klin na Gɔd yay. Fɔ di tin dɛn we de na ɛvin, i gud fɔ mek pɔsin mek sakri fays we bɛtɛ pas bif sakri fays.
58009024	Krays dɔn go insay di ples we Gɔd de na ɛvin. Na dat mek i tinap bifo Gɔd fɔ wi. I nɔ go insay di Bafa we mɔta lman bil, we jɛs de sho aw di ples we Gɔd de na ɛvin, tan.
58009025	Di Ju edman we kin mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, kin go insay di sɛkɛn ples na di Bafa wan tɛm ɛvri ia; i kin kɛr bif blɔd go insay de, nɔto in yon blɔd. Bɔt na wan tɛm nɔmɔ Krays go na di ples we Gɔd de ɛn sakri fays insɛf to Gɔd. I nɔ du dat pas wan tɛm.
58009026	If nɔto bin so, Krays bin fɔ sɔfa plɛnti tɛm frɔm di tɛm we Gɔd mek di wɔl. Bɔt i dɔn kam di fɔs ɛn las tɛm, naw we di wɔl de dɔn, fɔ sakri fays insɛf, so dat i go pul sin kɔmɔt na wi layf, wan tɛm fɔ ɔl.
58009027	Na wan tɛm ɔlman gɛt fɔ day, ɛn afta dɛn dɔn day Gɔd go jɔj dɛn fɔ ɔl wetin dɛn bin du.
58009028	Krays insɛf day wan tɛm nɔmɔ fɔ fri pipul, mek sin nɔ go gɛt pawa oba dɛn igen. I go kam bak na wɔl di sɛkɛn tɛm, bɔt da tɛm de i nɔ de kam fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na pipul layf, i de kam fɔ gi dɛn pipul we de wet fɔ am layf we go de sote go na ɛvin.
58010001	Di Ju Lɔ de sho wi aw dɛn gud tin we gɛt fɔ kam, go tan, bɔt i nɔ ebul sho wi klia wan aw dɛn go tan, fɔ tru. Dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin de mek di sem kayn sakri fays ɛvri ia. Dɛn kayn sakri fays de nɔ gɛt pawa fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn pipul we want kam klos Gɔd, dɛn layf.
58010002	If dɛn sakri fays de bin gɛt pawa fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na pipul layf, pipul nɔ bin fɔ de mek sakri fays igen, bikɔs if dɛn sakri fays de bin de mek dɛn klin sote go, dɛn nɔ bin fɔ stil de se sin de na dɛn layf.
58010003	Bɔt di sakri fays we dɛn de mek ɛvri ia, de mek dɛn mɛmba di sin we dɛn dɔn sin.
58010004	Wi no se dɛn mankaw ɛn got blɔd nɔ gɛt pawa fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na pipul layf.
58010005	Na dat mek lɔntɛm wɛn Krays bin de kam na wɔl, wɛn i de tɔk to Gɔd, i se, “Yu nɔ want bif sakrifays, bɔt yu gi mi bɔdi we a fɔ sakrifays to yu.
58010006	Wɛn pipul de bɔn bif, lɛkɛ mankaw ɛn got, fɔ gi yu ɔ wɛn dɛn sakrifays dɛn fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf, yu nɔ de satisfay wit dɛn tin de.
58010007	Na dat mek a se, ‘Gɔd, luk mi naya, a dɔn rɛdi fɔ du wetin yu want mi fɔ du, jɛs lɛkɛ aw dɛn rayt bɔt mi na di Ju Lɔ buk.’ ”
58010008	Di tɛm we Krays tɔk dɛn wɔd ya, di fɔs tin we i tɔk na dis: “Yu nɔ want mek pipul mek sakri fays ɛn bring ɛni tin kam gi yu; semwe so, yu nɔ want mek dɛn bɔn bif fɔ gi yu ɛn yu nɔ want fɔ mek dɛn mek sakri fays fɔ pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf. Dɛn tin de nɔ go sati sfay yu.” Krays tɔk dɛn wɔd ya, pan ɔl we pipul bin de du ɔl dɛn tin de lɛkɛ aw di Ju Lɔ se dɛn fɔ du dɛn.
58010009	Di sɛkɛn tin we i tɔk, na dis: “Gɔd, luk mi naya, a rɛdi fɔ du wetin yu want mi fɔ du.” Na dat mek Krays put dɛn fɔstɛm sakri fays wansay, ɛn mek in yon blɔd tek dɛn ples.
58010010	Na bikɔs Jizɔs Krays want du wetin Gɔd want am fɔ du, mek i sakri fays in bɔdi. Na wan tɛm nɔmɔ i mek da sakri fays de ɛn di sakri fays gɛt pawa ɔltɛm. Na da sakri fays de mek wi at klin. I dɔn mek wi bi Gɔd yon pipul.
58010011	Dɛn man we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin de wok fɔ Gɔd ɛvri de, dɛn de tek kaw ɛn got mek di sem kayn sakri fays ɔltɛm, bɔt dɛn kayn sakri fays de, nɔ ebul pul di pipul dɛn sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf.
58010012	Bɔt di sakri fays we Krays mek wan tɛm nɔmɔ, gɛt pawa fɔ pul di pipul dɛn sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf, wan tɛm fɔ ɔl, ɛn wɛn i dɔn mek di sakri fays dɔn, i go sidɔm na Gɔd in raytan.
58010013	I de wet de sote di tɛm we Gɔd go mek i mas ɔl dɛn pipul we nɔ lɛk am ɔnda in fut.
58010014	Di wan gren sakri fays we Krays mek, na in i de tek mek dɛn pipul we i de mek klin ɛn we i de put wansay fɔ du in wok, bi lɛkɛ aw i want dɛn fɔ bi.
58010015	Gɔd in Spirit sɛf de sho wi se dɛn tin ya na tru. I tɔk fɔs se,
58010016	“Di Masta se, ‘Wɛn di rayt tɛm rich, na di agrimɛnt dis we a go mek wit dɛn: A go mek dɛn no mi lɔ dɛn, ɛn a go mek dɛn nɔ fɔgɛt dɛn.’ ”
58010017	Gɔd in Spirit tɔk igen se, “A go fɔgɛt bɔt di bad we dɛn dɔn du ɛn aw dɛn dɔn pwɛl mi lɔ dɛn.”
58010018	Ɛnti Gɔd dɔn padin di pipul dɛn sin, dɛn nɔ gɛt fɔ de mek sakri fays igen fɔ mek Gɔd go pul sin kɔmɔt na dɛn layf.
58010019	Mi brɔda dɛn, fɔseka Jizɔs in blɔd we kɔmɔt pan am wɛn dɛn kil am na di krɔs, wi gɛt maynd fɔ go insay, insay di ples we Gɔd de.
58010020	Jizɔs sakri fays in bɔdi fɔ opin rod fɔ pipul fɔ gɛt nyu layf. In bɔdi tan lɛkɛ di tik kɔtin we bin ɛng insay, insay Gɔd in Os fɔ kɔba di ples we Gɔd de. (Da tik kɔtin de bin chɛr frɔm ɔp kam dɔng wɛn Krays day na di krɔs.)
58010021	Wi gɛt wan edman we de mek sakri fays fɔ pipul sin, we pas ɔl di ɔda wan dɛn; na in de rul wi we na Gɔd in pipul dɛn.
58010022	So, lɛ wi biliv pan Jizɔs Krays gud wan; lɛ wi kam klos Gɔd wit ɔl wi at, bikɔs Jizɔs in blɔd dɔn klin wi at; ɛn wi na pipul we dɔn was wi bɔdi na di klin wata.
58010023	Una lɛ wi tinap tra nga, ɛn lɛ wi abop se wi go gɛt dɛn tin we wi biliv se Gɔd go gi wi. Una lɛ wi nɔ dawt bikɔs Gɔd dɔn prɔmis se in go du dɛn tin de, ɛn i go du wetin i se, fɔ tru.
58010024	Una lɛ wi tink aw wi go ɛp wisɛf mek wi go lɛk wi kɔmpin dɛn ɛn du gud to dɛn.
58010025	Una lɛ wi nɔ tap fɔ de mit, lɛ wi nɔ fala dɛn pipul we nɔ de gri fɔ go mitin. Bɔt una lɛ wi de kɔrej wi kɔmpin dɛn, mɔ igen we wi no se di De we wi Masta go kam bak de kam jisnɔ.
58010026	Wi dɔn no wetin tru, so if ɛni wan pan wi stil de du bad, nɔn sakri fays nɔ de igen fɔ pul di bad tin dɛn we di pɔsin du kɔmɔt na in layf.
58010027	If ɛnibɔdi de du dɛn bad tin de, i fɔ fred, bikɔs Gɔd go jɔj am ɛn se i dɔn du bad, ɛn big big faya go kam bɔn ɔl dɛn pipul we nɔ de du wetin Gɔd tɛl dɛn fɔ du.
58010028	If ɛnibɔdi brok di Lɔ we Mozis gi mɔta lman, ɛn if tu ɔ tri pipul gri se dɛn si am we i de brok di Lɔ, dɛn go kil da pɔsin de, dɛn nɔ go sɔri fɔ am.
58010029	Una fɔ no se, da pɔsin we nɔ tek in Pikin mek ɛni tin, Gɔd go mɔs pɔnish am tra nga wan; da pɔsin de de se Krays in blɔd we Gɔd tek mek agrimɛnt wit mɔta lman fɔ mek mɔta lman bi in yon, nɔ gɛt pawa; ɛn i fityay Gɔd in Spirit we bring blɛsin kam.
58010030	Wi no di pɔsin we se, “Na mi gɛt di rayt fɔ pɔnish pɔsin we de du bad, na mi go tɔn di bad gi am bak.” I tɔk igen se, “Gɔd we na di Masta go jɔj in pipul dɛn.”
58010031	I go bad fɔ di pɔsin we Gɔd we gɛt layf sote go, go kɔndɛm so.
58010032	Una fɔ mɛmba aw una bin de du fɔstɛm, wɛn una bin dɔn ɔnda stand Gɔd yon we. Da tɛm de, pan ɔl we una bin de sɔfa bad, una bin bia ɛn tinap tra nga.
58010033	Da tɛm de pipul bin de fityay una ɛn dɛn bin de mek una sɔfa bifo ɔda pipul, ɛn tɛm bin de we una bin rɛdi fɔ sɔfa wit ɔda Kristiɛn dɛn.
58010034	Una bin de sɔri fɔ dɛn pipul we de na jel, una nɔ bin de wɔri, bɔt una bin stil gladi ivin wɛn pipul siz una prɔpati, bikɔs una bin no se una gɛt sɔntin we bɛtɛ pas da prɔpati de, we go de sote go.
58010035	Na dat mek una nɔ fɔ dawt, bikɔs if una biliv Gɔd sote go, i go gi una big blɛsin.
58010036	Una gɛt fɔ bia, so dat una go du wetin Gɔd want, ɛn una go gɛt wetin i dɔn prɔmis una.
58010037	Dɛn rayt na Gɔd in Buk se, “I nɔ go te, di pɔsin we gɛt fɔ kam, go kam; i nɔ go wes tɛm.
58010038	Dɛn pipul we de waka tret na layf go gɛt layf we go de sote go, bikɔs dɛn biliv dɛn wɔd ya; bɔt if ɛnibɔdi lɛf fɔ biliv mi bikɔs i de dawt mi, a nɔ go pliz wit am.”
58010039	Wi nɔto dɛn pipul we go tɔn bak ɛn tap fɔ fala Gɔd, so wi nɔ go sev. Bɔt wi biliv Gɔd, so dat i go sev wi ɛn wi go de sote go.
58011001	Wetin dɛn min we dɛn se pɔsin biliv? If pɔsin biliv, dat min se di pɔsin no se in go gɛt di tin we i put in at pan, ɛn i no se, dɛn tin we wi nɔ de si, de, fɔ tru.
58011002	Na bikɔs dɛn lɔntɛm pipul bin biliv Gɔd, mek Gɔd bin sati sfay wit dɛn.
58011003	Na bikɔs wi biliv Gɔd mek wi ɔnda stand se, na di wɔd we Gɔd bin tɔk na in mek dis wɔl, so dɛn tin we wi de si kɔmɔt frɔm dɛn tin we wi nɔ de si.
58011004	Na bikɔs Ebɛl bin biliv Gɔd, mek i mek bɛtɛ sakri fays to Gɔd, pas di wan we Ken mek. Na bikɔs Ebɛl bin biliv Gɔd mek Gɔd se Ebɛl na tret pɔsin. Na we Gɔd tek di sakri fays we Ebɛl mek mek wi no se Gɔd se Ebɛl na tret pɔsin. Pan ɔl we Ebɛl dɔn day, wi stil de lan bɔt wetin i min fɔ biliv Gɔd bay aw in bin biliv Gɔd.
58011005	Na bikɔs Inɔk bin biliv Gɔd, mek i nɔ day, Gɔd tek am go na ɛvin wɛn i bin stil gɛt layf. Nɔbɔdi nɔ si am igen, bikɔs Gɔd tek am go ɔp. Dɛn rayt bɔt am na Gɔd in Buk se, we i bin de na wɔl, bifo Gɔd tek am go ɔp, i bin du di tin we mek Gɔd sati sfay.
58011006	If pɔsin nɔ biliv Gɔd, i nɔ go ebul pliz am. Pɔsin lɛkɛ dat nɔ go kam klos Gɔd pas i biliv se Gɔd de ɛn i de du gud to dɛn pipul we de pre to am ɔltɛm.
58011007	Na bikɔs Noa bin biliv Gɔd mek i lisin di tɛm we Gɔd wɔn am bɔt dɛn tin we go bi. Pan ɔl we i nɔ bin si di tin dɛn yet, Noa du wetin Gɔd tɛl am fɔ du. I mek wan big bot we in, in wɛf ɛn in pikin dɛn go insay, so di wata we bin kɔba di wɔl nɔ bin du dɛn natin. So di biliv we Noa biliv Gɔd dɔn pruv se di pipul dɛn na di wɔl bin de du bad we dɛn nɔ bin biliv Gɔd. Gɔd tek Noa fɔ bi tret pɔsin bikɔs Noa bin biliv am.
58011008	Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd mek i du wetin Gɔd tɛl am fɔ du wɛn Gɔd kɔl am ɛn sɛn am fɔ go na di ples we i prɔmis fɔ gi am. I grap ɛn go, pan ɔl we i nɔ bin no di ples we i de go.
58011009	Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd mek i bin go na di ples we Gɔd prɔmis fɔ gi am, i bin tap na bafa lɛkɛ tre nja. Na bafa Ebraam, Ayzik ɛn Jekɔb bin tap, bikɔs na to dɛn Gɔd bin mek di prɔmis.
58011010	Ebraam bin de wet na di bafa fɔ go na di tɔng we Gɔd bin dɔn plan ɛn bil, we tinap tra nga, ɛn we nɔ go fɔdɔm.
58011011	Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd, mek, ilɛk sɛf we in ɛn Sera bin dɔn ol, dɛn ebul bɔn pikin. Ebraam bin biliv se Gɔd na Gɔd we de du wetin i dɔn prɔmis.
58011012	Da tɛm de, Ebraam bin dɔn ol, ɛn pan ɔl we i bin lɛf smɔl fɔ mek i day, Gɔd gi am gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn we plɛnti lɛkɛ di sta dɛn na klawd, ɛn lɛkɛ sansan na bich we pɔsin nɔ ebul kɔnt.
58011013	Ɔl dɛn lɔntɛm pipul ya, we a tɔk bɔt so, bin biliv Gɔd sote dɛn day. Dɛn nɔ bin gɛt ɔl dɛn tin we Gɔd prɔmis dɛn bifo dɛn day, bɔt dɛn bin dɔn si wetin Gɔd go gi dɛn, fawe, ɛn dɛn bin gladi fɔ wetin dɛn si. Dɛn bin no se dɛn na tre nja na dis wɔl.
58011014	Di pipul dɛn we tɔk dɛn wɔd ya sho klia wan se dɛn bin de luk fɔ ples we go blant dɛn.
58011015	Dɛn nɔ bin de mɛmba di ples we dɛn kɔmɔt igen. If dɛn bin de mɛmba di ples, dɛn bin fɔ gɛt di chans fɔ tɔn bak go de.
58011016	Bɔt dɛn bin want ples we bɛtɛ pas dat, dat na di ples we de na ɛvin. So Gɔd nɔ shem wɛn dɛn kɔl am dɛn yon Gɔd, bikɔs i bin dɔn rɛdi ples fɔ dɛn.
58011017	Na bikɔs Ebraam bin biliv Gɔd, mek, wɛn Gɔd tɛst am, i gri fɔ tek Ayzik, we na bin in wan gren pikin, fɔ sakri fays am to Gɔd. Ebraam bin go fɔ sakri fays Ayzik pan ɔl we Gɔd bin dɔn prɔmis Ebraam
58011018	se, na Ayzik go bɔn plɛnti pikin dɛn we go bi in gra npi kin-pi kin dɛn.
58011019	Bɔt Ebraam bin biliv se Gɔd ebul mek Ayzik rayz bak, if i day. So, wi kin se, ivin we Ayzik nɔ day, i tan lɛkɛ pɔsin we bin dɔn day, bɔt i rayz bak ɛn fala Ebraam.
58011020	Na bikɔs Ayzik bin biliv Gɔd, mek i tɛl Jekɔb ɛn Isɔ se, “Gɔd go blɛs una.” I bin de tɔk bɔt dɛn blɛsin we dɛn go gɛt bambay.
58011021	Na di sem tin bi fɔ Jekɔb. Na bikɔs Jekɔb bin biliv Gɔd mek i blɛs Josɛf in bɔy pikin dɛn, wan bay wan, wɛn di tɛm we i fɔ day bin dɔn de rich. Na da tɛm de i ling pan in wɔki nstik ɛn prez Gɔd.
58011022	Na bikɔs Josɛf bin biliv Gɔd mek, wɛn di tɛm rich we i fɔ day, i tɔk bɔt di tɛm we di Izrɛl pipul dɛn go kɔmɔt Ijipt, ɛn i tɛl dɛn wetin dɛn fɔ du wit in bɔdi.
58011023	Na bikɔs Mozis in mama ɛn papa dɛn bin biliv Gɔd, mek dɛn ayd am na os tri mɔnt afta i bɔn. Dɛn si se di pikin fayn, so dɛn nɔ fred fɔ brok di lɔ we di king pas se dɛn fɔ kil ɔl dɛn bɔy pikin.
58011024	Na bikɔs Mozis bin biliv Gɔd, mek wɛn i dɔn big, i nɔ gri mek dɛn se na di King na Ijipt in gyal pikin bɔn am.
